cocktail.name: A Furlong Too Late
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: A Night In Old Mandalay
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the light rum, aejo rum, orange juice, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: A. J.
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Abbey Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Abilene
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Acapulco
cocktail.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

cocktail.name: Adam
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Adonis Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Affair
cocktail.instructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

cocktail.name: Affinity
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: After Dinner Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: After Supper Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Alabama Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

cocktail.name: Alaska Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Alexander
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Alexander #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Brandy Alexander
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Alexander's Big Brother
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Alexander's Sister
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, creme de menthe, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Alfie Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Algonquin
cocktail.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Allegheny
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Allies Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Almeria
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Almond Joy
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Amaretto And Cream
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Mist
cocktail.instructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Amaretto Rose
cocktail.instructions: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Stinger
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Tea
cocktail.instructions: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

cocktail.name: Ambrosia
cocktail.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except champagne). Pour contents into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir lightly, and serve.

cocktail.name: Amer Picon Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: American Beauty
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, vermouth, creme de menthe, orange juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Pouring slowly and carefully, float the port on top.

cocktail.name: Andalusia
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Angel Face
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Angel's Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients carefully, in order given, into a pousse-cafe glass so that they do not mix.

cocktail.name: Angel's Wing
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients carefully, in order given, into a pousse-cafe glass so that they do not mix. Serve without mixing.

cocktail.name: Angler's Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, pour contents into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Ante
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Antoine Special
cocktail.instructions: Float vermouth on top of chilled Dubonnet in a red wine glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Apple Blow Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Apple Brandy Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour apple brandy over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel on top and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Apple Brandy Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake apple brandy, powdered sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with a half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Apple Colada
cocktail.instructions: Blend schnapps, cream of coconut, half-and-half, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour contents into a collins glass. Decorate with an apple slice and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Apple Pie
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Apple Rum Rickey
cocktail.instructions: Pour applejack and rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Squeeze lime and drop in glass. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Applecar
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Appled Rum Cooler
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, applejack, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda.

cocktail.name: Apricot Anise Collins
cocktail.instructions: Shake gin, brandy, anisette, and lemon juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir lightly. Decorate with the slice of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Apricot Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Apricot Lady
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

cocktail.name: Arcadia
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Archbishop
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Arise My Love
cocktail.instructions: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

cocktail.name: Arthur Tompkins
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Artillery
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: B And B
cocktail.instructions: Float brandy on top of Benedictine in a cordial glass without mixing and serve.

cocktail.name: Babbie's Special Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bacardi Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bahama Mama
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients and pour over cracked ice in a collins glass. Decorate with a strawberry or cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Balmoral
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Baltimore Bracer
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Baltimore Eggnog
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Banana Cow
cocktail.instructions: Shake rum, creme de banana, cream, and grenadine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the banana slice, sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve.

cocktail.name: Banana Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Banana Punch #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour brandy, vodka, and juice of lime into a collins glass over crushed ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with banana slices and mint sprigs and serve.

cocktail.name: Banana Rum Cream
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Barbary Coast
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Baron Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the lemon wedge and serve.

cocktail.name: Barrier Breaker
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingreedients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Barton Special
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Basic Bill
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Batida Abacaxi
cocktail.instructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

cocktail.name: Batida Mango
cocktail.instructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

cocktail.name: Batida Morango
cocktail.instructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

cocktail.name: Beachcomber
cocktail.instructions: Place sugar in a saucer. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into sugar to coat rim thoroughly, reserve lime. In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine rum, maraschino liqueur, cherry brandy, and lime juice. Shake well.

cocktail.name: Beadlestone Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Beal's Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Beauty Spot Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Pour a dash of grenadine in a cocktail glass. Shake remaining ingredients with ice, strain into glass over grenadine, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bee Stinger
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Belles Of St. Mary's
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bengal
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bennett Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bentley
cocktail.instructions: Stir Calvados and Dubonnet with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Bermuda Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Bermuda Rose
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bernardo
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Betsy Ross
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Between The Sheets
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Biffy Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bijou Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Bikini
cocktail.instructions: Shake rum, vodka, milk, sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a twist of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Billy Taylor
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and juice of lime into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bishop
cocktail.instructions: Shake juice of lemon, juice of orange, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add two ice cubes, fill with burgundy, and stir well. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

cocktail.name: Bitch-On-Wheels
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Black Baltimore
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Black Devil
cocktail.instructions: Stir rum and vermouth with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the black olive and serve.

cocktail.name: Black Hawk
cocktail.instructions: Stir blended whiskey and sloe gin with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Blackjack #1
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Black Maria
cocktail.instructions: Combine and stir all ingredients in a brandy snifter. Add cracked ice and serve.

cocktail.name: Black Monday
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Black Pagoda
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Black Russian
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Black Stripe Cold
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a mixing glass and stir well to dissolve the honey and molasses. Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Black Velvet
cocktail.instructions: Pour stout into a champagne flute. Add champagne carefully, so it does not mix with stout, and serve.

cocktail.name: Blackjack #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Blackthorn
cocktail.instructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Blarney Stone Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake Irish whiskey, anis, triple sec, and maraschino with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel, top with the olive, and serve.

cocktail.name: Blimey
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake wel. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Blinder
cocktail.instructions: Pour the scotch and grapefruit juice into a highball glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink.

cocktail.name: Bloodhound Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except strawberries) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the 3 crushed strawberries and serve.

cocktail.name: Bloody Bull
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, tomato juice, and beef bouillon over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime and the wedge of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Bloody Maria
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Bloody Mary
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Blue Cowboy
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Blue Devil Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Blue Hawaiian
cocktail.instructions: Blend light rum, blue curacao, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at high speed. Pour contents into a highball glass. Decorate with the slice of pineapple and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Blue Lagoon
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Blue Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Blue Mountain
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass alomst filled with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Bluebird
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

cocktail.name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Bolero
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Bombay Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Boomerang
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Border Crossing
cocktail.instructions: Pour the tequila, lime juice, lemon juice, and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Bosom Caresser
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Boston Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Boston Sidecar
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Boston Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bourble
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bourbon and Branch
cocktail.instructions: Pour the bourbon and water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Black Hawk
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon and sloe gin. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Black Hawk #2
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, sloe gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Cobbler #1
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the bourbon and stir well. Garnish with the cherry, orange and lemon slices.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Cobbler #2
cocktail.instructions: In a large wine glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Almost will the glass with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Garnish with starwberry, lime and pineapple wedges.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour the bourbon and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Bourbon County Cowboy
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Daisy
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, grenadine, and sugar. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Fix
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Flip
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour bourbon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Bourbon Milk Punch
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, half-and half, sugar, and vanilla extract. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Milk Punch #2
cocktail.instructions: In a highball glass, dissolve the sugar in the bourbon by stirring with a teaspoon. Add 6 ice cubes and the milk. Stir well. Garnish with the cinnamon.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Milk Punch #3
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, creme de cacao, and milk. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Classic Old-Fashioned
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Sling
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Sour
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Swizzle
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, bourbon, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

cocktail.name: Boxcar
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

cocktail.name: Brainstorm
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Brandied Egg Sour
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, crack the egg and add the rest of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Brandied Madeira
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Brandy Alexander #2
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, creme de cacao, and half-and-half. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Brandy Alexander #3
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Brandy And Soda
cocktail.instructions: Pour the brandy and club soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Brandy Blazer
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in brandy. Add the orange slice. Tilt the glass and carefully ignite the drink with a match. Stir with a long spoon until the flame is extinguished. Strain into a punch cup and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Brandy Cobbler
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

cocktail.name: Brandy Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Brandy Collins
cocktail.instructions: Shake juice of lemon, brandy, and powdered sugar with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Brandy Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour the brandy and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Brandy Daisy
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

cocktail.name: Brandy Fix
cocktail.instructions: Combine juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Stir, fill with shaved ice, and add brandy. Stir again, add the lemon slice, and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Brandy Fizz
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Brandy Flip
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Brandy Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour brandy into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, add the twist of lemon peel, stir gently, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Brandy Milk Punch
cocktail.instructions: Shake brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Brandy Sangaree
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water. Add brandy and pour into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

cocktail.name: Brandy Sling
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and brandy. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Brandy Smash
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the mint sprigs lightly with the sugar and club soda. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the brandy. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

cocktail.name: Brandy Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake brandy, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Brandy Swizzle
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, brandy, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

cocktail.name: Brandy Toddy
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Add brandy and one ice cube and stir. Add twist of lemon peel on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Brandy Vermouth Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Brantini
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Brave Bull
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Brazil Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Brian's Belief
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tea and stir well.

cocktail.name: Broken Spur Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bronx Cocktail (Dry)

cocktail.name: Bronx Golden Cocktail

cocktail.name: Bronx Silver Cocktail

cocktail.name: Bronx Terrace Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Brown Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Brown Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Buck Jones

cocktail.name: Buddy's Favorite

cocktail.name: Bull's Eye

cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Bushranger #2

cocktail.name: Button Hook Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Cabaret

cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.instructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: English Rose Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Entwistle's Error
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Ethel Duffy Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: European
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sherry, Dubonnet, vermouth, and Grand Marnier. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Everybody's Irish Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except green olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the green olive and serve.

cocktail.name: Executive Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Pour the tequila and the orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.

cocktail.name: Eye-Opener
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

cocktail.name: Fairy Belle Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Fallen Angel
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Fancy Bourbon
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, triple sec, sugar, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a coktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Fancy Brandy
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Fancy Gin
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Fancy Scotch
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the scotch, triple sec, sugar, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Fancy Whiskey
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Fantasio Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Farmer Giles
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Farmer's Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Fastlap
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Fat Face
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

cocktail.name: Favorite Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Fifth Avenue
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a parfait glass (in order given) so that each ingredient floats on preceding one. Serve without mixing.

cocktail.name: Fifty-Fifty
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the olive.

cocktail.name: Fifty-fifty Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Fino Martini
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glas half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka and the sherry. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Fireman's Sour
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lime juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda. Stir well. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

cocktail.name: Flamingo Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Fleet Street
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Flirting With The Sandpiper
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Florida
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Flying Dutchman
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Flying Scotchman
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Fog Cutter
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with a teaspoon of sweet sherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Fontainebleau Special
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Fort Lauderdale
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

cocktail.name: Fox And Hounds
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Fox River Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Foxy Lady
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Frankenjack Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Freddy Fudpucker
cocktail.instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon, float the Galliano on top of the drink.

cocktail.name: Free Silver
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: French "75"
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the Champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

cocktail.name: French 125
cocktail.instructions: Pour brandy and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled champagne and stir lightly. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: French Connection
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a old-fashioned glass over ice, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Frisco Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Froth Blower Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Frozen Apple
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Frozen Berkeley
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

cocktail.name: Frozen Brandy And Rum
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Frozen Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Frozen Margarita #1
cocktail.instructions: Place salt in a saucer. Rub rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into salt to coat rim thoroughly, reserve lime. Pour tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and crushed ice into a blender. Blend well at high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Frozen Matador
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the pineapple stick, and serve.

cocktail.name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

cocktail.name: Gareth Glowworm
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink.

cocktail.name: Gates Of Hell
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Drizzle the cherry brandy over the top.

cocktail.name: Gauguin
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cherry) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the cherry on top, and serve.

cocktail.name: Gent Of The Jury
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the onions.

cocktail.name: Gentleman's Club
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Gilroy Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Gimlet
cocktail.instructions: Pour the gin and lime cordial into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Gin And Bitter Lemon
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water.

cocktail.name: Gin And It
cocktail.instructions: Stir gin and vermouth in a cocktail glass. (No ice is used in this drink.)

cocktail.name: Gin And Pink
cocktail.instructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, gonic, and bitters. Stir well and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Gin And Sin
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Gin And Tonic
cocktail.instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Gin Buck
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and juice of lemon into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Cobbler
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the gin. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

cocktail.name: Gin Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir gin and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

cocktail.name: Gin Daisy
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

cocktail.name: Gin Fix
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the gin. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

cocktail.name: Gin Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake gin, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Milk Punch
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Rickey
cocktail.instructions: Pour juice of lime and gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Sangaree
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and add gin. Pour into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Sling
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Smash
cocktail.instructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Sour
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

cocktail.name: Gin Squirt
cocktail.instructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin Swizzle
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

cocktail.name: Gin Toddy
cocktail.instructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

cocktail.name: Gin-Cassis Fizz
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.

cocktail.name: Godchild
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

cocktail.name: Godfather
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve. (Bourbon may be substituted for scotch, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Godmother
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

cocktail.name: Golden Bronx
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

cocktail.name: Golden Cadillac
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at low speed for ten seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and serve.

cocktail.name: Golden Daze
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Golden Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

cocktail.name: Golden Slipper
cocktail.instructions: Stir brandy and chartreuse with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float unbroken egg yolk on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Grand Master
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Scotch, schnapps, and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Grapefruit Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Grapefruit Nog
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes and serve.

cocktail.name: Grass Skirt
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

cocktail.name: Grasshopper
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Green Demon
cocktail.instructions: Shake vodka, rum, and liqueur and pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, add the cherry on top, and serve.

cocktail.name: Green Devil
cocktail.instructions: Shake gin, creme de menthe, and lime juice with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Decorate with mint leaves and serve.

cocktail.name: Green Dragon
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Green Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Green Opal
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Greenback
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Greenham's Grotto
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Greyhound
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Grog
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum and the water into an old-fashioned glass with no ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Gypsy
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Gypsy Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: H.P.W. Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Haidin-Haidin
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Hair Raiser
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Harlem Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake gin, pineapple juice, and maraschino with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with pineapple chunks and serve.

cocktail.name: Harvard Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Add powdered sugar and stir. Add ice cubes and apple brandy. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

cocktail.name: Harvey Wallbanger
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and orange juice into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir. Float Galliano on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Hasty Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Hat Trick #1
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the dark rum, light rum, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Hat Trick #2
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Havana Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Headless Horseman
cocktail.instructions: Put vodka and bitters into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with ginger ale, and stir. Add the orange slice and serve.

cocktail.name: Highland Fling Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

cocktail.name: Highland Sling
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and Scotch. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Hokkaido Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Hole-In-One
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Honeymoon Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Honolulu Cocktail No. 2
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Hoots Mon
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Hop Toad
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Hornpipe
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Horse And Jockey
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Horse's Neck
cocktail.instructions: Place the lemon peel spiral in a highball glass and drape one end of it over the rim of the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the brandy, ginger ale, and bitters into the glass. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Horsley's Honor
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, applejack, and triple sec. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice

cocktail.name: Hot Gold
cocktail.instructions: Gently heat the orange juice and pour it into a red wine glass. Add amaretto. Garnish with a stick of cinnamon.

cocktail.name: Hot Springs Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Hotel Plaza Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except pineapple) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the crushed slice of pineapple and serve.

cocktail.name: Howell Says So
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Hudson Bay
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Hummer
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Hurricane
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Ice-Cream Flip
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a coupette glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Ice Palace
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange and a cherry (if desired) and serve.

cocktail.name: Ideal Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Iguana
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the lime slice and serve.

cocktail.name: Immaculata
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Imperial Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Irish Rickey
cocktail.instructions: Pour Irish whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Irish Spring
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

cocktail.name: Italian Delight
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Italian Heather
cocktail.instructions: Pour the scotch and Galliano into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Italian Sombrero
cocktail.instructions: Shake amaretto and cream well, pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

cocktail.name: J. R.'s Godchild
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the boubon, amaretto, and milk. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: J. R.'s Godfather
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine both of the ingredients. Stir to mix the flavors.

cocktail.name: J. R.'s Revenge
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Jack Rose Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Jack-In-The-Box
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Jade
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Jamaica Glow
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Jamaica Hop
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Banana
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients (except sliced banana) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a large brandy snifter and add sliced banana. Sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, top with a whole strawberry, and serve.

cocktail.name: James The Second Comes First
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Japanese
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lime peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Japanese Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Jersey Lightning
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Jet Black
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Jewel Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Jewel Of The Nile
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Jeyplak Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Jillionaire
