cocktail.name: Pendennis
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in a few drops of water. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Stir well and garnish wth the lemon slice.

cocktail.name: Peppermint Stick
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

cocktail.name: Peregrine's Peril
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Perfect Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Perfect Rob Roy
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, sweet vermouth, and dry vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry or a lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Peter Pan Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Petticoat Lane
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, and Campari. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Piccadilly Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Pina Colada #1
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Put white wine, pineapple juice, powdered sugar, and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so the end dangles over rim of glass.

cocktail.name: Ping-Pong Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Pink Cream Fizz
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, sugar, cream, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Pink Gin
cocktail.instructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

cocktail.name: Pink Lady
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Pink Pussycat
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and pineapple juice. Stir well. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink.

cocktail.name: Pink Squirrel
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Piper At Arms
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Piper At The Gates Of Dawn
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Kahlua, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pour the cream over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink.

cocktail.name: Pistachio Cream
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

cocktail.name: Plaza Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the stick of pineapple and serve.

cocktail.name: Polo Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Polonaise
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Polynesian Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vodka, cherry brandy, and juice of lime with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Poop Deck Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Poppy Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Port And Starboard
cocktail.instructions: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

cocktail.name: Port Wine Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Port Wine Flip
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Prairie Chicken
cocktail.instructions: Open egg without breaking the yolk and put into a red wine glass. Pour gin on top of egg, add salt and pepper to taste, and serve.

cocktail.name: Preakness Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Presbyterian
cocktail.instructions: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of cola and ginger ale and stir well. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Prince's Smile
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Princeton Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Puerto Apple
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Puffer
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum, orange juice, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost fillled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink.

cocktail.name: Purple Mask
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Quaker's Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Queen Bee
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Queen Charlotte
cocktail.instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Queen Elizabeth
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Quentin
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Ragged Company
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, vermouth, Benedictine, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Cream
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

cocktail.name: Rattlesnake Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rebel Yell
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, Cointreau, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the orange slice.

cocktail.name: Red Apple
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Red Cloud
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Red Gin
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin and Cherry Heering. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Red Raider
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Red Ruby
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Redcoat
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Reform Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Remsen Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Put powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and gin, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

cocktail.name: Resolute Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Riley's Sparrow
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Ritz Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Fill champagne flute with chilled champagne. Add blue curacao, amaretto, and lemon juice. Stir, add the twist of lemon, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rob Roy
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Robin's Nest
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Robson Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rock And Rye Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rococo
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rolls-Royce
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Root Beer Fizz
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the root beer. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Root Beer Float
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, galliano, and light cream into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola, stir lightly, top with whipped cream, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rory O'more
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rose Cocktail (English)
cocktail.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vermouth, gin, brandy, lemon juice, and grenadine with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rose Cocktail (French)
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Roselyn Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Rouge Martini
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Chambord. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Royal Clover Club Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Royal Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Royal Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

cocktail.name: Royal Gin Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Royal Smile Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Royalty Fizz
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, Curacao, sugar, and egg. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Ruby Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Ruby In The Rough
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Rum Cobbler
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

cocktail.name: Rum Collins
cocktail.instructions: Shake rum, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rum Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Rum Daisy
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

cocktail.name: Rum Dubonnet
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rum Eggnog
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Rum Fix
cocktail.instructions: Stir juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Fill glass with ice, add rum, and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Rum Gimlet
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum and Rose's lime juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Rum Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Rum Martini
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktial glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or an olive.

cocktail.name: Rum Milk Punch
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Rum Old-fashioned
cocktail.instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rum Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rum Sour
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

cocktail.name: Rum Swizzle
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of 2 oz. carbonated water and juice of lime in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and stir. Add bitters and rum. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve with a swizzle stick.

cocktail.name: Rum Toddy
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Russian Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Rusty Nail
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Rye Whiskey Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Saketini
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka with the sake. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the olive.

cocktail.name: Salty Dog
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: San Francisco Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Sand-Grown-Un
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktial glass.

cocktail.name: Sand-Martin Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sandra Buys A Dog
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Santiago Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Saratoga Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Saucy Sue Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Savannah
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Saxon Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Sazerac
cocktail.instructions: Pour Ricard into a glass and swirl around to coat glass, discard any excess. Place the sugar, Peychaud bitters, and water int othe glass and muddle with the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the bourbon over the ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Scooter
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Scotch And Water
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Scotch and the water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Scotch Bird Flyer
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

cocktail.name: Scotch Bishop Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Scotch Cobbler
cocktail.instructions: Pour scotch, brandy, and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice, top with the mint sprig, and serve.

cocktail.name: Scotch Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour scotch and creme de menthe over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Scotch Daisy
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

cocktail.name: Scotch Fix
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the Scotch. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

cocktail.name: Scotch Flip
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Scotch Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour scotch in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Scotch Holiday Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Scotch Mist
cocktail.instructions: Pack a collins glass with crushed ice. Pour in scotch. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Scotch Old-Fashioned
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the scotch. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

cocktail.name: Scotch Rickey
cocktail.instructions: Pour scotch and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lime peel/rind and serve.

cocktail.name: Scotch Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Screaming Banana Banshee
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Put 3 ice cubes into a highball glass. Pour in vodka. Fill balance of glass with orange juice, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Seaboard
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint leaves) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Decorate with mint leaves and serve.

cocktail.name: Secret Place
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Sensation Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint sprigs) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprigs of mint and serve.

cocktail.name: September Morning
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Serpentine
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, brandy, vermouth, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Seventh Heaven Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint sprig) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

cocktail.name: Sevilla Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sevilla Cocktail #2
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

cocktail.name: Shady Lady
cocktail.instructions: Pour melon liqueur, tequila, and grapefruit juice over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Shalom
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

cocktail.name: Shamrock
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

cocktail.name: Shanghai Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sherry Eggnog
cocktail.instructions: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Sherry Flip
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Sherry Milk Punch
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Shriner Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Sidecar
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Sidecar Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Silent Broadsider
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Silk Stockings
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cinnamon) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Silver Bronx
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

cocktail.name: Silver Bullet #1
cocktail.instructions: In a mixng glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Scotch. Stir well. Strain into a shot glass. Carnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Silver Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Silver King Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Silver Stallion Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake gin and vanilla ice-cream with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Singapore Sling
cocktail.instructions: Pour grenadine, gin, and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with carbonated water and top with cherry brandy. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Sir Walter Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sister Starseeker
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum, lemon juice, grenadine, and tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Sitarski
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Skip And Go Naked
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled beer, stir lightly, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sloe Gin Collins
cocktail.instructions: Shake sloe gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Add slices of lemon and orange, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Sloe Gin Flip
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Sloe Gin Rickey
cocktail.instructions: Pour sloe gin and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Sloe Vermouth
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sloeberry Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail No. 1
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail No. 2
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Slow Comfortable Screw
cocktail.instructions: Pour sloe gin and Southern Comfort into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

cocktail.name: Slow Screw
cocktail.instructions: Pour sloe gin into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sly Goes To Havana
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old fashioned glass alomst filed with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Smart Christine
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Benedictine, and orange juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Smile Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Smiler Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Smith And Kearns
cocktail.instructions: Pour Kahlua and light cream into a highball glass filled with ice and stir well. Fill with carbonated water, stir lightly, and serve.

cocktail.name: Snyder
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Sol Y Sombra
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

cocktail.name: Sombrero
cocktail.instructions: Pour brandy into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Float cream on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Son Of Adam
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Sonny Gets Kissed
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Soother Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Soul Kiss Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: South Of The Border
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Southern Belle
cocktail.instructions: Pour the brandy into a pousse cafe glass. Tilt the glass to a 45-degree angle and slowly pour the creme de cacao down the side of the glass so that it floats on the brandy. Repeat this precedure with the Benedictine.

cocktail.name: Southern Bride
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Southern Gin Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Soviet
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Spark In The Night
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Special Rough Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Spencer Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake brandy, gin, orange juice, and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sphinx Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Spring Feeling Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: St. Charles Punch
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except port) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with port, add the slice of lemon, and serve.

cocktail.name: St. Patrick's Day
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Stanley Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Stanley Senior
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Starseeker
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Stiletto
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve. (Bourbon may be substituted for blended whiskey, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Stinger
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Stirrup Cup
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Stone Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Stone Fence
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add whiskey and bitters and fill with apple cider. Both Bourbon and Scotch can be used.

cocktail.name: Stone Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Straight Law Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Stranger-In-Town
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, Calvados, and cherry brandy. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Strawberries And Cream
cocktail.instructions: Place schnapps, half-and-half, sugar, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a high speed. Add 2 of the strawberries and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a parfait glass, top with the other strawberry, and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Dawn
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients (except mint sprig) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass, add the sprig of mint, and serve.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Fields Forever
cocktail.instructions: Pour brandy and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sue Riding High
cocktail.instructions: Let the hot chocolate cool to room temperature. In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and hot chocolate. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the cream into the center of the drink.

cocktail.name: Suffragette City
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Sugar Daddy
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Sunshine Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Surf Rider
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the orange slice, top with a cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Surrey Slider
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum, peach schnapps, and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice.

cocktail.name: Susan Littler
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Sweet Maria
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Sweet Patootie Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Swiss Family Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: T.N.T. No. 2
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

cocktail.name: Tailspin Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve. (An olive may be substituted for the cherry, if preferred.)

cocktail.name: Tango Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Tartan Swizzle
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine lime juice, sugar, Scotch, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain mixture in shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

cocktail.name: Tartantula
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, vermouth, and Benedictine. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Temptation Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, Dubonnet, triple sec, and anis with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twists of orange and lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Tempter Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Ten Quidder
cocktail.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, and bitters. Stir well. Pour the Curacao into the center of the drink.

cocktail.name: Tequila Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Tequila Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Tequila Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Shake tequila, vermouth, and lime juice with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Tequila Matador
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

cocktail.name: Tequila Old-Fashioned
cocktail.instructions: Mix sugar, bitters, and 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Add tequila, ice cubes, and carbonated water. Add the stick of pineapple and serve.

cocktail.name: Tequila Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Tequila Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice and stir well. Top with blackberry brandy and stir lightly. Add the cherry on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Tequini
cocktail.instructions: Stir tequila, vermouth, and bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel, top with the olive, and serve.

cocktail.name: Thanksgiving Special
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: The Bronx Ain't So Sweet
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: The Original Singapore Sling
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Benedictine, and chery brandy. Stir well. Strain into a colliins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda and stir well.

cocktail.name: The Shoot
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Third-Rail Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Three Miller Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Thriller
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Thunder
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Thunder-And-Lightning
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Thunderclap
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Tidbit
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Tipperary Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: To Hell With Swords And Garter
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Tom Collins
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

cocktail.name: Top Banana
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Torridora Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake light rum, brandy, and cream with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float 151 proof rum on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Tovarich Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Triad
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum, vermouth, amaretto, and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Trilby Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Trinity Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Tropical Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Turf Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Tuxedo Cocktail

cocktail.name: Twenty Thousand Leagues

cocktail.name: Twin Hills

cocktail.name: Twister

cocktail.name: Typhoon
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill glass with chilled champagne, stir lightly, and serve.

cocktail.name: Ulanda Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Union Jack Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Valencia Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Van Vleet
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Velvet Hammer #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Verboten
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Vermouth Cassis
cocktail.instructions: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

cocktail.name: Vesuvio
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Vicious Sid
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over two or three ice cubes. Fill with apple juice, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Vodka And Tonic

cocktail.name: Vodka Gimlet
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Vodka Grasshopper
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Vodka Salty Dog
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

cocktail.name: Vodka Stinger
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Waikiki Beachcomber
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Wallick Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a red wine glass filled with cracked ice. Add the orange slice, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Warsaw Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Washington Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Watermelon
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a collins glass over ice cubes, and serve.

cocktail.name: Webster Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Wedding Belle Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Weep-No-More Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Wembly Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Western Rose
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: What The Hell
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Whip Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Collins
cocktail.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Decorate with slices of orange, lemon, and top with the cherry. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Eggnog
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinke nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Fix
cocktail.instructions: Shake juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add blended whiskey and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Flip
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Milk Punch
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Rickey
cocktail.instructions: Pour blended whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Whisky Mac
cocktail.instructions: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

cocktail.name: White Heart
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: White Lady
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filler with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: White Lily Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: White Lion Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: White Russian
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

cocktail.name: White Way Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Why Not?
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Widow Woods' Nightcap
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Widow's Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Will Rogers
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Woo Woo
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Woodward Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: X.Y.Z. Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Xanthia Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Xeres Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Yale Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktail.name: Yellow Rattler
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cocktail onion) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onion and serve.

cocktail.name: Yellow Strawberry
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except banana slice) with ice and strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass. Garnish with the banana slice and serve.

cocktail.name: Yolanda
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

cocktail.name: Zombie #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except 151 proof rum) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Float the 151 proof rum on top, add a cherry (if desired), and serve.

cocktail.name: Afterglow
cocktail.instructions: Mix. Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Alice Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Apple Karate
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Berry-Berry
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Black & Blue Berries
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Bobby Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bora Bora
cocktail.instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

cocktail.name: Cranberry Juice Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Wash the cranberries and put them into a nonreactive saucepan with the water, a pinch of salt and if you wish, the orange slices. Cook over medium heat until all the berries burst -- about 10 minutes. Pour the fruit and liquid into a cheesecloth-lined sieve. Strain the juice to the saucepan, add the sugar and boil for two or three minutes. Taste and add more sugar if it is needed. Cool and chill the juice before serving.

cocktail.name: End Wrench
cocktail.instructions: Add ice. Tastes remarkably like a screwdriver.

cocktail.name: Grapefruit and Orange Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Mix and stir with ice in a mixing glass, strain off into a large cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Grapefruit Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler, add grenadine syrup and grapefruit juice, top up with soda water. Stir a little and serve with a drinking straw.

cocktail.name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #1
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a food processer or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbl spoons of batter to a mug of very hot water. Serve in irish coffee cup.

cocktail.name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #2
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a food processer or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbl spoons of batter to a mug of very hot water. Serve in irish coffee cup.

cocktail.name: Hot Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Squeeze the juice of the lemon into a 10-oz. glass. Add maple syrup and a dash of cayenne pepper. Fill with ice water. Stir. Drink.

cocktail.name: Kanaan
cocktail.instructions: Prepare in a blender with a little ice, serve in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Lemon Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir orange juice and lemon juice with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Lemon Flip
cocktail.instructions: Put several ice cubes in a shaker, add egg yolk, sugar syrup and lemon juice. Shake very well and strain into a highball glass. Serve with a drinking straw.

cocktail.name: Lemon Squash
cocktail.instructions: Mix lemon juice with sugar syrup in a highball glass, stir well and fill up with soda water. Serve with drinking straw.

cocktail.name: Honey Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Lucky Driver
cocktail.instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Garnish with one orange slice, and one lemon slice. Use only fresh squeezed juice for best result!

cocktail.name: Mint Julep #3
cocktail.instructions: In electric blender, blend on high for a few seconds, until leaves are reduced. Strain into silver tumbler packed with shaved ice, add more Bourbon to saturate the ice, garnish with a sprig of mint.

cocktail.name: Grenadine Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: The proportions are approximate, vary according to taste. Mix together, serve with lots of ice.

cocktail.name: Orangatang
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Orange Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir lemon juice and orange juice in a mixing glass, strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Orange Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Put several ice cubes in a large tumbler, add sugar syrup and orange juice, top up with ginger ale. Stir.

cocktail.name: Orange Flip
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a blender.

cocktail.name: Orange Smile
cocktail.instructions: Shake egg, grenadine syrup, orange juice, and several ice cubes well. Strain into a small tumbler, serve with a drinking straw.

cocktail.name: Orange Squash
cocktail.instructions: Put one ice cube in a large tumbler, add lemon juice and orange juice. Stir well. Serve sugar and cold water on the side, so the guest can modify the taste, and a drinking straw and a spoon.

cocktail.name: Orange Velvet
cocktail.instructions: Shake cream, pineapple juice and orange juice with some ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Orangeade
cocktail.instructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

cocktail.name: Orgeat Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Mix lemon juice and orgeat syrup in a tumbler with 2-3 small ice cubes. Fill up with soda water and stir.

cocktail.name: Parisette
cocktail.instructions: Pour grenadine syrup over some ice cubes in a large tumbler. Stir. Fill up with cold milk. Stir again, serve with a drinking straw.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Mix juice and sugar syrup in a large tumbler with several ice cubes. Stir well and top up with cold Soda Water. Serve with a drinking straw.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Power
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Pussy Foot
cocktail.instructions: Shake or blend briefly, strain into a highball glass. Garnish with fresh fruit, cherry, and a drinking straw.

cocktail.name: Rail Splitter
cocktail.instructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Rose de Mai Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake very well pineapple juice, raspberry fruit-syrup and cream with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: St. Clement's
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice, serve. "Oranges and lemons say the bells of St. Clement's"

cocktail.name: Rhubarb Syrup
cocktail.instructions: Remove strings from rhubarb, wash, and cut into 1/2" pieces. Wrap rhubarb in cheesecloth and tie shut. Bring sugar and water to boil. Put cheesecloth in the syrup and simmer over medium heat for 30 minutes or until it thickens. Remove cheesecloth, squeeze it to get the juice out. Pour syrup into a clean, dry bottle and cork tightly. To mix add 1 part syrup to 3 parts water and add 2 ice cubes per person. Serve well chilled.

cocktail.name: Shirley Temple
cocktail.instructions: Build in a highball glass. Add ginger ale over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Tomato Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir in a mixing glass Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, tomato juice, and a little salt and pepper over ice cubes. Strain off into a large cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Grape Flip
cocktail.instructions: Shake or blend very well, serve icecold in a burgundy glass. If you wish to garnish, use grapes.

cocktail.name: Tropical
cocktail.instructions: Shake or build directly in the glass.

cocktail.name: Sammensurium (Mix up)
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Ishav
cocktail.instructions: Shake vodka, Pisang and sour mix well with ice. Pour into a highball glass. Fill with soda water.

cocktail.name: Homemade Ginger Beer
cocktail.instructions: Combine the crushed ginger,lime peel,juice and sugar in a jar or bottle larger than 32 oz with a lid that can be tightly sealed. Pour in the boiling water. Cover loosely and let cool to room temp. Dissolve the yeast in the lukewarm water and add. Seal the jar as tightly as possible and let stand at room temp overnight. Chill, strain and serve.

cocktail.name: Homemade Snapple
cocktail.instructions: Let tea steep for at about 5 mins so it's nice and strong. After tea is cool, mix together the remaining ingredients. Add more sugar and/or lemon juice to suit your taste. Some flavors may need more juice concentrate.

cocktail.name: Banana Milk Shake
cocktail.instructions: Blend very well, preferably in a household mixer. Serve in a wine glass, garnish with whipped cream and a piece of banana.

cocktail.name: Banana Strawberry Shake
cocktail.instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

cocktail.name: Banana Strawberry Shake Daiquiri-type
cocktail.instructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

cocktail.name: Cool Cow
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Crazy Cow
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Dutch Treat
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Earth Shake
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Egg Cream
cocktail.instructions: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add soda water, serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Fruit Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Toss strawberries with sugar, and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon, reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor, really). In glasses, put ice cubes, and a slice of apple. Pour drink in, and serve.

cocktail.name: Fruit Flip-Flop
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Fruit Shake
cocktail.instructions: Blend til smooth.

cocktail.name: Grapple
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Great Grapes
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Hot Cider
cocktail.instructions: Stud the oranges with cloves. (Push the pointy end into them until the flower part is flush with the peel.) I use about 10 per orange. You may want to peel the top layer of skin off the orange if you don't want to ingest the dyes they put on them to make them orange. Put the cider into a large saucepan, and add the oranges and some cinnamon sticks (one or two will do). Heat for hours (you can just leave it on all day for a party). It gets better with age. Just pour in more cider when it starts getting low.

cocktail.name: Hot Mulled Cider #1
cocktail.instructions: Dump cider, cinnamon sticks and a couple of teaspoons of nutmeg into a pot over very low heat. Slice oranges (after washing them well!!), and stick whole cloves into the rind, then float in cider as it warms. That's it. Drink when it gets warm. You can dump more cider into it up to a point when the spices get old - then just start again with a new set of spices, and a new orange.

cocktail.name: Hot Spiced Cider #1
cocktail.instructions: Add allspice, clove and cinnamon stick to the apple cider and let simmer for 1 hour (or longer). This may not look like much spice, but it really does make a pleasantly spicey cider.

cocktail.name: Jungle Juice #2
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Just a Moonmint
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Lassi - A South Indian Drink
cocktail.instructions: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Lassi is one of the easiest things to make, and there are many ways of making it. Basically, it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Lassi Khara
cocktail.instructions: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

cocktail.name: Lassi Raita
cocktail.instructions: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

cocktail.name: Lassi - Sweet
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

cocktail.name: Lassi - Mango
cocktail.instructions: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

cocktail.name: Vegan - Hot indian "milk" drink
cocktail.instructions: In a large cooking pot (at least twice the size needed to contain your soy milk), mix everything together and heat on high while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil (remember to stir constantly!), and the concoction will froth up. Remove from heat, let the froth subside, and repeat this cycle three more times. This is why your pot has to be bigger: the frothing would cause a major spill if you used a smaller pot. Serve and drink while hot. You can also adjust sweetness in your cup. Some people may want to strain this, as the ground spices sometimes have some coarse particles. This is a very nice hot drink, with a definite indian-food flavour, spicy-sweet and rich. The original recipe using milk also called for a tablespoon of butter for each serving (yuk!), and that was intended to make the drink rich-tasting. The thicker soy milk already has that thick rich texture, and is much lower in fat content.

cocktail.name: Lemouroudji
cocktail.instructions: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.

cocktail.name: Limeade
cocktail.instructions: In a large glass, put the lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass. Drink. Repeat until limes or soda run out.

cocktail.name: Imperial Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Juice cantaloupe, pour juice into blender, add banana, and liquify.

cocktail.name: Apple Berry Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

ingredient.name: Berries (strawberries, raspberries, any berry as you wish)

cocktail.name: Grape lemon pineapple Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

cocktail.name: Kiwi Papaya Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

cocktail.name: Mango Orange Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

cocktail.name: Kill the cold Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Juice ginger and lemon and add it to hot water. You may add cardomom.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Shivers
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Sweet Bananas
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Tomato Tang
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

cocktail.name: Yoghurt Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up. Note: Use lots of ice in this one - great on hot days! To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.

cocktail.name: Castillian Hot Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Shift the cocoa and sugar together into a medium-sized saucepan. Dissolve the cornstarch in the water, and stir into the cocoa and sugar until it is a smooth paste. Begin heating the mixture, stirring it with a whisk, and gradually pour in the milk. Continue stirring with the whisk as you bring the liquid to a simmer. Allow the chocolate to simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring often, until it is thick, glossy and completely smooth. Serve steaming hot in coffee mug. Serves six.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Beverage
cocktail.instructions: Boil milk in the top of a deep double boiler five minutes. Remove from fire and add chocolate, mixed with the cinnamon, a little at a time, beating with molinillo or egg beater after each addition. When the chocolate is thoroughly blended, heat to the boiling point. Place over bottom of double boiler and add eggs, whipping constantly, until they are thoroughly blended and the mixture is frothing. Serve in coffee mug. Serves eight.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Drink
cocktail.instructions: Melt the bar in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat, whipping gently (with a whisk, i would assume) until heated well. Don't let it boil! Serve in coffee mug.

cocktail.name: Drinking Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). Remove the bean and cinnamon. Add the chocolate. Mix until fully melted. Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream. Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are. For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.

ingredient.name: Vanilla bean, split in half length wise

cocktail.name: Hot Chocolate to Die for
cocktail.instructions: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream.

cocktail.name: Hot Chocolate #1
cocktail.instructions: Combine sugar and cocoa, add milk and a dash of salt. Makes 8 servings. For 1 serving place 1/3 cup dry mixture in a coffee mug, add boiling water and stir.

cocktail.name: Hot Chocolate #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix milk, cocoa, sugar and coffemate. For 1 serving place 1/3 cup dry mixture in coffee mug, add boiling water and stir.

cocktail.name: Microwave Hot Cocoa
cocktail.instructions: Combine sugar, cocoa, salt and hot water in 1-quart micro-proof measuring cup (or coffee mug). Microwave at HIGH (100%) for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until boiling. Add milk, sitr and microwave an additonal 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until hot. Stir in vanilla, blend well.

cocktail.name: Nuked Hot Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.

cocktail.name: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

cocktail.name: Spanish chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

cocktail.name: Lemon Shot
cocktail.instructions: Mix Galliano and Absolut Citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour a rum over wedge and glass. light rum with a lighter and let burn for a second. Do shot quickly and suck on lemon. If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktail.instructions: Half fill with cranberry juice and grapefruit juice, stir in highball glass.

cocktail.name: Autodaf
cocktail.instructions: Mix and fill up with soda water. Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.

cocktail.name: Gagliardo
cocktail.instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

cocktail.name: Surf City Lifesaver
cocktail.instructions: Lots of ice and soda top up in tall glass with cherry and a grin.

cocktail.name: Grizzly Bear
cocktail.instructions: Served over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

cocktail.name: Karsk
cocktail.instructions: Put a copper coin in a coffe-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

cocktail.name: Happy Skipper
cocktail.instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)

cocktail.name: Frapp
cocktail.instructions: Mix together. Blend at highest blender speed for about 1 minute. Pour into a glass and drink with a straw. Notes: This works best if everything is cold (if you make fresh coffee, mix it with the milk and let it sit in the fridge for 1/2 hour. If it is not frothy, add more milk, or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass, so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour, with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Very refreshing.

cocktail.name: Iced Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in coffee mug.

cocktail.name: Iced Coffee Fillip
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

cocktail.name: Masala Chai
cocktail.instructions: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

cocktail.name: Melya
cocktail.instructions: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.

cocktail.name: Russian Tea #1
cocktail.instructions: First make tea in the water. Then add all the other stuff. Simmer at least 1/2 hour. Makes a nice smell in the kitchen at Christmas parties.

cocktail.name: Spiking coffee
cocktail.instructions: Incidentally, a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course, you serve it in a coffee mug.

cocktail.name: Thai Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.

cocktail.name: Thai Iced Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee, add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot, then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice, with cream. To get the layered effect, place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.

cocktail.name: Thai Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

cocktail.name: Absinthe #1
cocktail.instructions: Steep wormwood in vodka for 48 hours. Remove, add the rest and steep for one week. Age.

cocktail.name: Absinthe #2
