Finally, dribble the grenadine (dribbling onto a spoon then into the schnapps helps) directly into the center of the irish cream mass . As the grenadine amount slowly increases it will eventually burst through the irish cream creating a "hemoraging" "brain".

cocktail.name: Snitchee's Cider
cocktail.instructions: Used crushed ice. Can be made in anysizefrom punchbowl to personal serving.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Dip the rim of a cocktail glass in Kahla, then in brown sugar. Shake the spirits and cream with ice, strain into the frosted glass and sprinkle cinnamon on top. This drink is created by Sami Taalas (Sheraton Malm, Sweden) Caribbean Kiss won Trois Rivires After Dinner Cocktail Competition Swedish Championship 1994

cocktail.name: Green Goblin
cocktail.instructions: Cider First, Lager then Curacao

cocktail.name: Oreo Mudslide
cocktail.instructions: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

cocktail.name: ABC
cocktail.instructions: Layered in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Marvellaid
cocktail.instructions: Chill martini glass. Mix equal parts stoli and Cointreau. Chill and strain. Garnish with orange slice.

cocktail.name: Bite of the Iguana
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients and shake. Strain and pour into shotglass. Share with a friend.

cocktail.name: Combustible Edison
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker full of cracked ice, combine Campari and lemon juice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Heat brandy in a chaffing dish. When warm, ignite the brandy and pour in a flaming stream into the cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingrdients. Serve over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with lime wedge and maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Something Peachie #1
cocktail.instructions: serve in a tall glass over ice garnish with a cherry and orange

cocktail.name: Cheapo student bevvy
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a pint glass. Down very quickly.

cocktail.name: Velvet Hammer #2
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in blender with ice. Puree until smooth.

cocktail.name: Red Eye
cocktail.instructions: fill glass 1/2 to 3/4 full with beer add vodka if wanted top with tomato juice

cocktail.name: Prarie Dog
cocktail.instructions: build contents into a shot glass guaranteed night-ender for 21st birthday outings! (invented @ 901 Club, Los Angeles)

cocktail.name: Ariel's Frappe Punch
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in blender and serve in Highball glass. Decorate with a Marashino chery and a grapefruit slice

cocktail.name: Doh
cocktail.instructions: Just throw them all together add some ice and drink. If you can't get Tahiti Treat use pineapple juice

cocktail.name: Napalm
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass putting the 151 in last. Light the 151 and Bombs away!!! (Be sure to blow it out before drinking)

cocktail.name: Cape Codder
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka and Cranberry Juice into a High Ball glass over ice. Stir well, add the wedge of lime, and serve.

cocktail.name: Peppermint Beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice. Serve cold. [Our studies show this drink to taste quite foul at the beginning of the evening but rather refreshing after several other drinks have been consumed.]

cocktail.name: Sizzler
cocktail.instructions: Mix all to gether until fizzing.

cocktail.name: Falix
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Baccardi into the shot glass. Add the Margarita mix. Top it with lemon juice and shoot it.

cocktail.name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
cocktail.instructions: Shake well

cocktail.name: Yukon Cornelius
cocktail.instructions: In a shot glass pour the Yukon Jack to just below the rim. Add Goldschlager, filling the glass to full. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Ice Pick #1
cocktail.instructions: Put Vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

cocktail.name: Frothy Redhead
cocktail.instructions: Add in said order. Do not shake, soda will mix. Garnish with 2-3 grapes and sprinkle with sugar. Named after a friend who demanded a new drink.

cocktail.name: Mojito #2
cocktail.instructions: In a tall thin glass, crush part of the mint with a fork to coat the inside. Add the sugar and lemon juice and stir thoroughly. Top with ice. Add rum and mix. Top off with the club soda (or seltzer). Add a lemon slice and the remaining mint. Serves one.

cocktail.name: Something Peachie #2
cocktail.instructions: Serve in a tall glass over ice. Garnich with a cherry and orange slice

cocktail.name: Maek
cocktail.instructions: Mix this and add orange peel.

cocktail.name: Boilermaker
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass with whiskey. Drop full shot glass into mug o' beer. Drink immediately, enjoy.

cocktail.name: Ice Pick #2
cocktail.instructions: In large ice filled glass, pour vodka, then tea. Add a lemon wedge for garnish. Surprisingly refreshing.

cocktail.name: Mad Cow
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a shaker 1/4 filled with ice and pour into liberal shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Hard Core
cocktail.instructions: Combine all into a tall glass or wine goblet. Add the Cola last. Hang orange on rim of glass. Taste good but is super strong.

cocktail.name: Williams Explosion
cocktail.instructions: Blend pear half, vodka and pear juice well (until the pear is drinkable) Pour in a high glass, over ice and fill with soft drink

cocktail.name: Godhead
cocktail.instructions: Pour Rum, Vodka, Raspberry Liqueur and Lime Juice a strainer glass. Chill with ice and strain into your shot glass. Float 151 Rum on top of shot. Throw down or ignite and throw down. (Igniting the 151 Rum will lower the alcoholic content.)

ingredient.name: Raspberry liqueur or Creme de Cassis

cocktail.name: Slippery Nipple #1
cocktail.instructions: Serve as is

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #2
cocktail.instructions: For the shooter you mix all ingredients together over ice. For the shot you decrease the Pineapple Juice to 1 ct. Chill and then strain.

cocktail.name: Alien Urine Sample
cocktail.instructions: Hand shake or blend with ice the liquer with the sour. Strain the drink from the ice into a pounder glass. Float Blue Curacao before serving

cocktail.name: Robitussin
cocktail.instructions: Stirred, best without the rocks. Tastes just like the real thing

cocktail.name: Blueberry Tea
cocktail.instructions: Mix amaretto and grand marnier in a brandy snifter or glass. Add hot tea to taste.

cocktail.name: Liquid cocaine 8 ball
cocktail.instructions: Mix it and wait for the effects. Its called a liquid cocaine. Because it's expensive and once you try it your hooked.

cocktail.name: Killer Kool-Aid
cocktail.instructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Layer ingredients. Do not stir.

cocktail.name: All American
cocktail.instructions: Serve with two ice-cubes. You can vary the amount of Coca-Cola, all after how soft you want the drink to be.

cocktail.name: Peach 200
cocktail.instructions: Poor the Koskenkorva Peach in a glas, fill up with Coca-Cola and stir. To be served cold, but without ice.

cocktail.name: Mexican Virgin
cocktail.instructions: Pour into an 8 oz. glass and stir. Then pour into another 8 oz. glass over ice.

cocktail.name: Liquid Cocaine #2
cocktail.instructions: Chill over ice and pour.

cocktail.name: Key Largo Kooler
cocktail.instructions: Mix juices and alcohol in mixing tin, flash blend, and pour over ice in a 23 oz. squall glass and float Bacardi 151 rum. Garnish with an orange flag and umbrella.

cocktail.name: Mudslide #2
cocktail.instructions: measure all ingredients into a shot glass and drink

cocktail.name: Mike Tyson
cocktail.instructions: Mix it and serve with ice

cocktail.name: Green Cow
cocktail.instructions: Blend the two ingredients together. Use about half of each.

cocktail.name: Brutal Hammer
cocktail.instructions: Put them in a glass; Pray to God; Then slam it!!!

cocktail.name: Rangers Rocker
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into mason jar; Stir; Sit down; Drink.

cocktail.name: Purple Hooter #1
cocktail.instructions: Just shoot the damn thing!

cocktail.name: Scarlet Fever
cocktail.instructions: mix together and shake, pour into a draft glass add 3 ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel on the side.

cocktail.name: Red Death (MAC style)
cocktail.instructions: mix together in large container....stir in the alcohol from atart of list till the halls....for melted halls centers do the following...: use a needle and thread and put it through each halls..tie a knot after each one...place in 1 to 2 litres of boiling..and i mean boiling hot water until all are melted pour into bowl and mix in the water and raspberry juice. have fun should serve 10 to 20 people at 1 litre each we use this for our residence house drink ..it is safe and actually very tastey..try it and see.

cocktail.name: Stop Light
cocktail.instructions: Line up three shot glasses. Pour 1 shot of vodka into each glass. Add a splash of midori to one, a splash of orange juice to another and a splash of cranberry juice to the third. Drink them down Red, Yellow, Green. It's a stop light!

cocktail.name: GSM
cocktail.instructions: Stir it all together

cocktail.name: The Crying Game
cocktail.instructions: Mix JD and Vodka together with Kahlua. Heat over medium flame Bailey's, Tequila, and Rum. Mix all together with tomato juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a stalk of celery and green onion. Enjoy!!!

cocktail.name: Bushwacker #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender 3/4 with ice (small cubes best). Add a small splash of vodka, a small splash of Grand Marnier. Add a healthy serving of kahlua and a little less healthy splash of amarreto. Fill the blender with Bailey's until liquid is 1/2 inch from top of icecubes. Mix until smooth. Pour in hurricane glass and sprinkle some nutmeg on top! (Sorry about the vagueness. I learned this recipe while bartending in the Virgin Islands -- St. Thomas before it was demolished by Marylin. The drink is kick ass! The consistency should be like a milk shake, except without the milk. Also, this drink may be a bit expensive here (liquor is EXTREMELY cheap in the Caribbean)).

cocktail.name: Dead Nazi
cocktail.instructions: pour rumple minze(should be pre chilled) into shot glass add jager(should also be pre chilled), serve

cocktail.name: Green Monster
cocktail.instructions: Into an old fashion glass, pour vodka over ice. Add pickled pepper, and stir around with its stem. Devour pepper after draining drink.

cocktail.name: Scorpion
cocktail.instructions: Fill a 12 oz wine glass with ice, add a lime wedge and transfer into shaker. Add ingredients, shake and pour back into glass. Garnish stirrer, straw, cherry-pineapple, parasol, and mint.

cocktail.name: Friar Tuck
cocktail.instructions: Shake and pour into a v-shape, and garnish with cinammon.

cocktail.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila in a highball glass with ice, and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Garnish stirrer, straw and cherry-orange.

cocktail.name: Brown cow
cocktail.instructions: In a champagne flute with ice, add kahlua and top with milk. Stir. Garnish stirrer, nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Screaming Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first.

cocktail.name: Poor Man's Mommosa
cocktail.instructions: Pour Beer into a highball glass, add orange juice til desired color

cocktail.name: Dark Nightmare
cocktail.instructions: Mix milk last. Stir. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Keremiki
cocktail.instructions: Mix and shoot.

cocktail.name: Albysjn
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka in glass then the rest, stir well. By the way for best results add Kiwi juice concentrate last

cocktail.name: Danny Q's Aruba Rum Punch
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass with ice. Shake Vigrously Serve with a cherry and orange slice for garinsh.

cocktail.name: Hina Blast
cocktail.instructions: Heat vine, add raisines and boiled. Mix Coca-Cola, tequila, orange juice and add to boiled vine with raisines. Toss bananas with hot red pepper flakes. Pour Don Perignon over bananas. Mix everything thougether and store in a glass jar. Put in a fridge for 8 hours. Served chilled with fresh cherries. Enjoy !!!

cocktail.name: Jamaican Beer
cocktail.instructions: first of all pour in a glass vermouth,gin,whisky. next add the beer and last curacao and vodka's drops

cocktail.name: Beeaauu's Rum and Coke
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Smooth Operator
cocktail.instructions: Blend with a scoop of ice

cocktail.name: Pjolter Bay
cocktail.instructions: Have it all in a shaker, add 50/50 Fanta orange/Lemon mix. Sahake. Serv in highball glass. garnish with lemon an cherry.

cocktail.name: Graveyard (light)
cocktail.instructions: Mix the 5 whites in equal amounts in a beer mug. fill up the rest of the space with half beer and half stout.

cocktail.name: Graveyard
cocktail.instructions: Mix the 5 whites and 2 whiskies in a beer mug in equal amounts. Top up the rest of the mug with half beer and half stout.

cocktail.name: The Constable Shuffle
cocktail.instructions: Put everything into a pint glass with one Ice Cube. Serve with Wheelchair.

cocktail.name: King of Denmark
cocktail.instructions: Stir the Pernod&Black, add several big icecubes.

cocktail.name: Frozen Mudslide
cocktail.instructions: Blend alcohol with ice-cream. Serve in frosted glass.

cocktail.name: Pain Killer
cocktail.instructions: Fill cup with ice. Pour Pusser's Rum to fill about 1/4 of the glass. Fill with an equal amount of Cream of Coconut (Coco Lopez is good. Add some pineapple juice and a good splash of orange juice. Shake well. Add cherry and sprinkly nutmeg. Grab a staw and get ready! This was originally made in the Britsh Virgin Islands -- Pussers is the official rum of the Royal British Navy. Alter the amount of rum to your taste. Sorry about the inexact measurements -- that's the way we do it down in de islans mon!

cocktail.name: Green Frog
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball glass with 1 part Pisang Ambon. Pour 2 parts sprite in glas. then add some lime. Remember some ice-cubes. Drink with straw.

cocktail.name: Brendan's PUnch of happiness
cocktail.instructions: POur ingredients into large pot, stir, serve as punch disappears continue to add more rum..

cocktail.name: Liquid Asphault
cocktail.instructions: Just layer chilled Jgermeister on top of sambuca

cocktail.name: Russian Brunch
cocktail.instructions: mix vodka and o.j. in blender with ice. add champaine and stir in.

cocktail.name: StumbleFuck
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three in a shooter! Slight burn on the way down is normal, just enjoy it.

cocktail.name: Christer Petterson
cocktail.instructions: Mix and serv with crushed ice

cocktail.name: Felix's feast
cocktail.instructions: Mix the milk and the Bailys, add some ice, and drink it in a whiskeyglass.

cocktail.name: Watermelon Crawl
cocktail.instructions: Fill a 16 oz pint glass with ice, pour the above in. Garnish with cherries.

cocktail.name: Flander's Flake-Out
cocktail.instructions: Bang 'em both in.

cocktail.name: Sneaky Pete
cocktail.instructions: Put Kahlua on the bottom over ice. Then add milk Then add Rye. Stir before drinking.

cocktail.name: Tidal Wave
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin, vodka, rum and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Add orange and pineapple juices, a dash of grenadine, and float 151 rum on top. Garnish with a piece of fresh cut pineapple. The wave will sweep you away!!!!!

cocktail.name: Brown Pelican
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a mixing glass, stir gently and pour over ice cubes in a highball glass

cocktail.name: Apple Slammer
cocktail.instructions: pour into a shot glass and present to consumer, they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with thier palm, raise the glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

cocktail.name: Pussy Paws
cocktail.instructions: Stir Cranberry, amaretto, sour mix. Pour into a frosted highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with club soda; add twist of lime. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

cocktail.name: Manhattan Sweet #2
cocktail.instructions: Serve on the rocks

cocktail.name: Texas Rose
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice. Wonderful smooth tasting drink. But watch out it will knock your socks off!

cocktail.name: Frozen Margarita #2
cocktail.instructions: In blender add the can of limeaide. Using the empty can measure the tequila and the triple sec and add to the blender. Blend, adding ice cubes until the drink becomes slushy and holds in peaks. Serves: 4

cocktail.name: The Big Johnson
cocktail.instructions: Mix Lime Juice, then Vodka, then JD and 7-UP. Optional Grenadine dash last--pour around side of glass for effect. Serve on ice.

cocktail.name: Cynar Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice cubes in a cordial glass. Stir and squeeze in an orange wedge. Serve.

cocktail.name: Fire in Heaven
cocktail.instructions: Fill up shot glass with 151 proof Rum. Then add a dash of Tabasco into the glass. Allow a few seconds to settle. Drink fast and stand back.

cocktail.name: Lil' Johnson
cocktail.instructions: Just mix them up however you want.

cocktail.name: Obadoba
cocktail.instructions: Mix the o'boy n' the salt in a tall glass, add the heated milk. Put some whipped cream at the top and serve.

cocktail.name: Bacardi Gold & Cola
cocktail.instructions: Fill a tall glass completely with ice cubes. Mix the ingredients into the glass and serve with a slice of lemon put on the glass. It is a very simple drink, but never the less it is very deliscious - especially in the summertime.

cocktail.name: Titty Twister-Rita
cocktail.instructions: pour ingredients into blender over crushed ice blend until you see the top of the mix stop moving pour into margarita glass and garnish with a lemon or lime slice... (by the way, this makes 1 to 2 servings only) hope ya enjoy it...

cocktail.name: Pink Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Mix Shake Can be made as an up cocktail or on the rocks

cocktail.name: Georgian Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Combine and blend all four ingredients and serve in a highball glass with a lime garnish.

cocktail.name: Prriebl (Norwegian version of Prairie Fire)
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequlia in a double shot glass. Then pour Tabasco in the same glass.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Dust
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three ingredients in a strainer with ice, serve chilled

cocktail.name: The Beavis
cocktail.instructions: Pour all the shit together, and hope it don't explode! Drink as fast as you can, with no food, and say your prayers.

cocktail.name: Roswell
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Top with a splash of grenadine.

cocktail.name: North Polar
cocktail.instructions: Mix and server over ice with a slice of orange

cocktail.name: STP (the motor oil of course)
cocktail.instructions: Add whiskyand vodka to glass of ice. Stir in maple syrup. Wait 2 minutes and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Cramit
cocktail.instructions: Fill and stir, they love the name.

cocktail.name: Utar
cocktail.instructions: mix in glass and chug

cocktail.name: Gorilla Fart #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour in shot glass. Take a sniff and shoot!

cocktail.name: Patsy mix
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Brandy and Babycham on ice

cocktail.name: Amaretto Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

cocktail.name: Ground Zero
cocktail.instructions: Just god damn mix em! :)

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Screw
cocktail.instructions: pour over ice in regular glass. Add pineapple and orange juice to taste. Sort of like a regular screwdriver except with a tropical twist! Can also use orange-strawberry juice or any kind of funky fruit combination!

cocktail.name: Blue PolarBear
cocktail.instructions: Shake schnapps and vodka together until well-mixed. Add crushed ice, shake lightly, then pour to shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Silver Bullet #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour scotch in iced glass and coat sides empty scotch out pour in vodka

cocktail.name: Rocky Mountain Mother Fucker
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in shaker over ice and chill. Strain and pour in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
cocktail.instructions: Just pour and drink. No chill.

cocktail.name: Screaming Viking
cocktail.instructions: Stir liquids with ice then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with celery and cucumber. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Wong Tong Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquids into a strainer glass with 4-6 ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries.

cocktail.name: Vincent Vega
cocktail.instructions: Add ice cubes to a glass. Mix the ingredients.

cocktail.name: Cuba Libra
cocktail.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Russian Boilermaker
cocktail.instructions: Pour cold beer into a large glass, and drop whole shot glass full of vodka into beer. Guzzle as fast as you can, and let out a roar, a REAL man.

cocktail.name: Wild Ass Indian
cocktail.instructions: shake

cocktail.name: An Arif
cocktail.instructions: Combine everything together in order it is listed, you may add Kool-Aid mix if desired, but make sure to add the lemon juice last. It is called an Arif because it will tend to block your nuts from getting off if you have too many of these.

cocktail.name: Kiltlifter
cocktail.instructions: Shake gently and pour over ice in old fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: French Sailor
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1 part warm Cointreau and 1 part Vodka into a tumbler with a cube of sugar. Stir until sugar is disolved.

cocktail.name: D+d lay
cocktail.instructions: "shaken not stirred"

cocktail.name: Mellon Collie and The Infinite Gladness
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients and shake with ice. Serve in 140ml martini glass. Garnish with strawberries marinated in Cointreau and Monin Passionfruit syrup and a pineapple leaf.

cocktail.name: Gorilla's Puke
cocktail.instructions: Layer in normal shot glass. Can be lit and shot through straw.

cocktail.name: Black Martini #1
cocktail.instructions: Poor ingredients over ice. Shake gently. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Slippery Dick
cocktail.instructions: pour over ice in rock glass

cocktail.name: Jelly Bean
cocktail.instructions: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!

cocktail.name: Dirty Girl Scout
cocktail.instructions: Mix the vodka, Kahlua and Bailey's and pour over ice. Pour the Creme de menthe down the center of the glass. Looks gross, but tastes delicious!

cocktail.name: Spunky Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Add above ingrediants in a blender. Blend on high until the ice is crushed. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Swamp Water
cocktail.instructions: in a glass 1/2 full of ice,mix one shot lime vodka, one shot apricot brandy and fill the rest with half sweet and sour and half 7-up. (sorry no fancy glass, we usually get it in the standard plastic cups!!)

cocktail.name: Patti's Blow Job
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order in shot glass. Drink without using your hands!!

cocktail.name: Bahama Todd
cocktail.instructions: Add light rum, dark rum, spiced rum, and malibu rum to ice filled glass. Mix in pineapple juice and blue curacao. Float 151 rum on top.

cocktail.name: Camen Miranda
cocktail.instructions: Squeeze lime wedge over ice Pour rum, juice, & cola Stir lightly Add club soda or tonic to taste

cocktail.name: Cold Shower
cocktail.instructions: Use about 1:4 of creme de menthe to club soda, and stir.

cocktail.name: Broken down golf cart
cocktail.instructions: Shaken and strained through ice !!! Mmmmm.....

cocktail.name: Orange Climax
cocktail.instructions: Mix one after the other then shake and top with whip cream

cocktail.name: Grape ape
cocktail.instructions: tall, tall glass

cocktail.name: Wet Dream
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients except Chambord. Chill and strain mixture into a martini glass. Float Chambord to the bottom of the glass.

cocktail.name: JimPop's Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Lightly rub the rim of a cocktail glass with some lime juice, dip glass rim in the salt. Mix all ingredients with ice, strain into fresh ice in the salt-rimmed glass, and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Fishbone
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice add liquor, orange juice, and sour mix. shake well add 1 oz of 7 up to the top.

cocktail.name: Three Wise Men
cocktail.instructions: layer in a shot glass, Jimmy, Jack, then Johnnie

cocktail.name: Loud-Mouth
cocktail.instructions: This is a Winter drink which can only be consumed outdoors preferbly in an alpine environment. It is should be consumed in small swigs from a French Canteen type of devide and only after a epic day of skiing...Why yes it's strong but you'll be the better for it.

cocktail.name: After Five
cocktail.instructions: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled

cocktail.name: Andrea's Colada Collision
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender about 1/4 full with ice. Add all ingredients to blender. Blend to a smooth consistency. Serve in either a hurricane glass or a tall glass or goblet. Garnish with a pineapple spear is optional.

ingredient.name: Cream of coconut (La Prererida is good)

cocktail.name: Urine
cocktail.instructions: Mix and serve warm

cocktail.name: Harlee's Planters Punch
cocktail.instructions: measure light and dark rum into glass, add juices, grenadine...shake well, top with 151 rum... garnish with cherry and orange slice.

cocktail.name: Don's Bloody Mary
cocktail.instructions: Put 4 or 5 ice cubes in a large old-fashioned glass and fill 3/4 full with Clamato juice. (Clamato may be mixed 1/2 and 1/2 with any other favorite tomato or veggie juice). Add the vodka, Worcestershire, Tabasco, and Horseradish and stir thoroughly with a spoon or swizzle. Twist the lime slice over the glass edge and stick a scallion in as a casual stirrer and delicious finish to the drink.

cocktail.name: Brandy Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Fill rocks glass with ice. Add Cherry juice and cherry, then bitters. Add brandy, then sweet vermouth. Add water, stir.

cocktail.name: Pink Elephant Ears
cocktail.instructions: Mix pink lemonade per instructions on can. Add vodka, slices of lime, and ice. Mix well. Enjoy on a hot summer day on the boat!

cocktail.name: Banshe
cocktail.instructions: Pour over chrusted ice. Lightly stir.

cocktail.name: Southern Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into Cocktail glasses.

cocktail.name: Midnight Manx
cocktail.instructions: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Eye of the Storm
cocktail.instructions: Add lime juice, then THE CAPTAIN, then the Coca-Cola. Stir gently so you don't kill the carbonation. Enjoyed most after several weaker drinks.

cocktail.name: Whoomp
cocktail.instructions: Add all the shit into one large cooler or what ever you have that will hold it add one block of ice and mix then consume till it whomps you in the ASS

cocktail.name: Wisconsin Lunchbucket
cocktail.instructions: In a beer mug large enough to hold a shot glass, mix beer and O.J. Drop in shot of Amaretto (depth charge) and slam.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Dust-Buster
cocktail.instructions: mix ingredients in a glass and knock off those dust-bunnies

cocktail.name: Kir Royale
cocktail.instructions: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top

cocktail.name: Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Combine the vermouth, whiskey, bitters and ice in a mixing glass. Stir gently, don't bruise the spirits and cloud the drink. Place the cherry in a chilled cocktail glass and strain the whiskey mixture over the cherry. Rub the cut edge of the orange peel over the rim of the glass and twist it over the drink to release the oils but don't drop it in.

cocktail.name: Lash
cocktail.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice. add Vodka and Amaretto. Fill remainder of glass with Sprite or 7up

cocktail.name: The Extinguisher
cocktail.instructions: Combine all alchohol in 12 Oz. glass with ice. Add Sour Mix. Splash Cranberry Juice. Enough to form a layer of red at the top of the glass. Top with foam from draft beer tap.

cocktail.name: The James Robert Dean
cocktail.instructions: Makes huge punch.

cocktail.name: Jackhammer
cocktail.instructions: Serve over ice- Warning,Deadly!

cocktail.name: Midori Sour - Frozen
cocktail.instructions: Mix all indredients in a blender with enough ice to freeze. Serve in a tall glass with a lime twist garnish

cocktail.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper (alternative)
cocktail.instructions: Put Amaretto in bottom of shot glass, top with Rum. Pour Beer into glass. Light shot, pick up shot by the sides and drop entire shot glass (bottom first) into beer. When bottom of shot glass hits bottom of beer glass chug (the beer will put out the flame).

cocktail.name: Flaming Jesse or Tropical SunShine
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, strain into a collin's glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktail.name: Hurricane Hugo
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice in large Shaker. Add more juice to taste for the lightweights. Shake well and strain into shot glass. This recipe may be doubled or quadrupled. We strongly encourage this. Enjoy!!

cocktail.name: L&C
cocktail.instructions: Put pineapple in the blender and blend (duh) till smooth. Add vodka, rum, and enough ice to raise the level to five cups. Blend until the ice gets all smashed up. Pour into tall glasses; garnish with the cherry. Drink until YOU get all smashed up.

cocktail.name: Pineberry
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodkas in a cocktail shaker over ice. Strain into shot glasses. Squeeze juice from the lemon wedge into each glass.

cocktail.name: Nutty Irishman
cocktail.instructions: Serve over ice

cocktail.name: Greazy Deigo
cocktail.instructions: Empty zima into glass. Then add the 2 shots of 151 rum. next add the Kool-Aid. Mix until a light froth is achieved...and enjoy

cocktail.name: Harley Davidson #1
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing tin add bailys and midori over ice stir and strain into 4oz bucket and top with Jgermeister

cocktail.name: Carmel Coke
cocktail.instructions: Fill a rocker glsa with ice add the Coca-Cola then the schnapps

cocktail.name: Modified Duck Fart
cocktail.instructions: Layer liquors in order listed from top to bottom in shot glass. Drink all at once.

cocktail.name: Vit Ryss
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything in a highballglas and add some ice.

cocktail.name: Windex
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Five dollar shake
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into pint glass.

cocktail.name: Neon Ghost
cocktail.instructions: Shake it with ice, and serve it in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Buttery Nipple #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour Butterscotch Schnapps halfway in shot glass. Pour Cream Whiskey down the side of the glass to fill the shot the rest of the way . Object is to float the Irish Cream on the Schnapps

cocktail.name: Gold Driver
cocktail.instructions: Fill a short glass with ice. Pour the Cuervo into glass until about half full (more if you like it like I do). Top off with the Orange Juice. Squeeze a slice of lime into the drink. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Iron Hindu
cocktail.instructions: Shake with plenty of ice, pour into Hurricaine glasses. Grind a moderate amount of green cardomom on top. (This is extremely important, and gives the drink it's characteristic purfume.) Garnish with fruit, a frilly umbrella, etc.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Storm
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredience together except cream. Float cream on top. Garnish with pineapple spear and cherry.

cocktail.name: Aranov
cocktail.instructions: Mix Vodka and Juice in a any kind of bottle.

cocktail.name: Grateful Dead #1
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins Class with Ice. Add all the white alcohol. Add the sour mix. Top off glass with Razzmatazz or Chambourd. Then shake to mix contents. A fruity version of a Long Island Iced Tea

cocktail.name: Lemon Drop #1
cocktail.instructions: to consume: place sugar on lemon, place in mouth and take shot, then bite down on lemon -enjoy sweet/tart flavor as vodka goes down! YummY!

cocktail.name: Sex under the bleachers with a KU cheerleader
cocktail.instructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients and kiwi in blender, then add the food coloring and stir. Pour into glass and top with cherry.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Raspberry Delight
cocktail.instructions: Serve on ice or blend for a milk shake effect.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Tea
cocktail.instructions: Fill 12 oz. glass with ice. Add all the alcohol and sour mix. Top off glass with pineapple juice to taste then watch out.

cocktail.name: 3 Wise Men
cocktail.instructions: put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.

cocktail.name: Mountain Dew #1
cocktail.instructions: Fill half beer glass with beer. Fill other half with 7-UP soda (If you have the patience, pour a little of one, then a little of the other, until the glass is full). Fill a shot glass with Melon liqueur. Drop entire shot glass into glass of beer. Immediately drink entire pint of beer with shot glass still inside (do not swallow the shot glass).

cocktail.name: The Breakfast Drink
cocktail.instructions: The amount of ingredients can vary depending upon the size of the punch bowl,

cocktail.name: Irish Cream, Home Made
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a blender or mix in a bowl with a whisk until fully blended.

cocktail.name: Rolf's Scandinavian Glogg
cocktail.instructions: take seeds out of cardamom pods, put the seeds and the rest of the spices (1-4) in cheesecloth bag. combine 1qt port, 1qt red wine, raisins and spice bag, simmer for 15-20 minutes. add remaining port, red wine and almonds, heat through (but not hot enough to evaporate remaining alcohol). In another pan, mix sugar with 1/3 of the brandy, light brandy on fire and melt sugar. When sugar is melted add remaining brandy. Then combine with the wine/port mixture. Drink!!!

cocktail.name: Lloyd Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass and shoot it back.

cocktail.name: Canadian Funky Electric Cider
cocktail.instructions: Place 3/4 oz. of whiskey in an old-fashioned glass. Add 2.5 oz. of optinally warmed Canadian Apple Cider. If served cold, crushed ice is optional.

cocktail.name: The Boiling Panther
cocktail.instructions: Poor shots into glass. Fill with Dr. Pepper or Mt. Dew and mix. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Jersey Devil
cocktail.instructions: Put cranberry juice in punch bowl. Add apple cider/juice and apple juice brandy to taste. Slice apple in 3/16th

cocktail.name: Fat Hooker
cocktail.instructions: Pour first three ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange or pinapple juice, stir well, and serve.

cocktail.name: Galliano Hotshot
cocktail.instructions: Layer Galliano, then hot coffee, then cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Blue Blazer
cocktail.instructions: boil water and whisky in seprate glasses, ignite whisky, slowly mix whisky and water 4-6 times

cocktail.name: Tanqueray and Tonic
cocktail.instructions: Add ice to glass. Fill 2/3 of the way up with Tanqueray Gin, and the remaining 1/3 with tonic water. Add lime.

cocktail.name: Grateful Dead #2
cocktail.instructions: fill glass with ice. Add each liquor, then pour sour mix to top. stir. splash of 7up or sprite.

cocktail.name: Butterfinger
cocktail.instructions: fill glass with ice. pour butterscotch scnapps and bailey's into glass. fill with milk. shake. serve with sip straw.

cocktail.name: Dead green frog
cocktail.instructions: Chill on ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Hot Damn
cocktail.instructions: shake all ingredients adding less or more orange juice for you preferance of taste. serve in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Bloody Brain
cocktail.instructions: Pour schapps into cordial glass then gently float Bailey's on top. Drip grenadine into glass. It is very important to drip the grenadine one drop at a time for maximum effect.

cocktail.name: Fart In the Ocean
cocktail.instructions: Add tequila and chilled 7-UP to glass, drop in one sweet prune in each glass. Add ice if you wish.

cocktail.name: Miami Vice
cocktail.instructions: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

cocktail.name: AT&T
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir

cocktail.name: 69 Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.

cocktail.name: Machine
cocktail.instructions: Add the orange juice in the glass so it fills it about 1/3. Then take a napkin and put it over the glass pushing it down toward the juice. Push napkin down as far as it can go without touching the juice. Next pour the vodka very slowly so it dribbles on top of the juice. This will create a layer of vodka that lays on top of the juice because of the different densities of the liquids.

cocktail.name: Golden Eye
cocktail.instructions: pour 1 oz of goldshlager shapps then pour in the baileys. This is a layered drink with the baileys on the bottom. Garnish with a nut in the middle of the drink.

cocktail.name: Joe Cocker
cocktail.instructions: Put all into a Shot Glass

cocktail.name: Nuts and Berries #1
cocktail.instructions: In a ice filled mixing cup add all ingredients and shake well, pour into cocktail glass, garnish with berries in season

cocktail.name: John's Bomb
cocktail.instructions: pour very cold tequila with Benedictine in a shot glass.You serve it with a slice of orange that has cinnamon on it nad kalo methisi(that was Greek)

cocktail.name: Long Island Iced Tea #4
cocktail.instructions: Mix all liquors and sweet and sour and top off with Pepsi Cola. Stir and Serve with a Lemon wheel.

cocktail.name: South Side
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to blender including one mint leaf as it will be blended up and leave little specks at top of drink. After drink is complete add other whole mint leaves. A lime wedge can also be added. Amount of soda water should fluxuate according to how strong the lemon-lime solution is.

cocktail.name: Cherry Martinsen
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the brandy and then the coke, biatch. Hold up the glass and say dude. Enjoy dude.

cocktail.name: Pink Police
cocktail.instructions: In a pitcher add one can of beer. Next add one can of frozen pink lemonade. Note: do not mix the lemonade with water. Finally use the empty lemonade container to measure and add the vodka. Stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: French Pirate
cocktail.instructions: Pour Orange curacao into champagne flute, add Dark rum, top off with Champagne, I recommend Brut

cocktail.name: Muppet
cocktail.instructions: With the shot glass you pour half a glass with Tequila and the other half with 7-up. Take the glass already filled with both drinks, take it with palm holding the top of the glass (so the liquid would not come out) and you hit to the table so it will stirr, and you drink the whole.

cocktail.name: Bushwacker #3
cocktail.instructions: Put all contents in a blender and blend until smooth. Ice-cream can be substituted for the half-and-half

cocktail.name: Four Horsemen
cocktail.instructions: Pour contents in shaker over ice and shake well. Pour into glass. This is a big shooter so you have to use a small rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Dublin Doubler
cocktail.instructions: Mix irish whiskey, irish cream, and ice cubes. Shake to chill. Serve with or without the ice, it is very good either way.

cocktail.name: Irish Coffee (Simple)
cocktail.instructions: Start with sugar in the empty glass. Next pour in the whiskey, followed by the coffee. Stir till sugar is disolved, let mixture settle. Float whipped cream on top. Curl up in front of the fireplace with J. Joyce and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Kahlua Fudge Shake
cocktail.instructions: Just like making a milk shake, but add the Kahlua. This drink is very rich, but it tastes great. We invented it one summer day!!

cocktail.name: Afterburner #2
cocktail.instructions: pour 1 shot a vodka pour 1/2 shot of Tobasco sauce in seperate shot glass (take vodka shot immediately followed by the Tobasco shot) ***amount can be changed to liking

cocktail.name: Partymeister
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 cl of gin (no special gin required) in a glass. Add 2 cl of Malibu. On top of that, enough of Rose'e lime juice to match the taste of Malibu. Fill up with lemonade. Add some ice and a straw.

ingredient.name: Rose's sweetened lime juice to taste

cocktail.name: Mocha Mint Irish Cream Cappuccino
cocktail.instructions: By adding the steamed milk last, the ingredients mix well. Make sure to stir all of the chocolate from the bottom of glass.

cocktail.name: Ersh
cocktail.instructions: Take 1 part Vodka and shake well with 1 part of Best beer you know.

cocktail.name: Ekatherina Andreevna
cocktail.instructions: Always put ice in glass first to cool the mixers when they are poured.

cocktail.name: Crack Juice
cocktail.instructions: In a large container, fill half way with ice. Pour in all contents and mix well. You are ready to serve.

cocktail.name: Screaming Orgasm II
cocktail.instructions: Stir together and serve over ice

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #3
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher of ice to chill, adding just enough grenadine to color pink. Add more or less OJ and 7-up to achieve desired strength. Strain into bottle to serve as shooters or serve the whole pitcher with a number of straws for a group to slurp down at the same time!!

cocktail.name: Burning Nazi
cocktail.instructions: Keep bottles chilled or mix over ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Spicey Scot
cocktail.instructions: Add equal parts of liqeuer to hot chocolate or cocoa and top with whipped cream and shave chocolate, cinnamon or nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Apple Pie Shot #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour one shot of Apple Juice and another of Vodka. Sprinkle cimmamon on the tougue and pour both shots into your mouth. Without drinking, shake your head until cimmamon is dissovled and drink. (Repeat if nessesary....or unconscious on the floor.)

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Navel
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into glass, top with ice.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Chip
cocktail.instructions: Half fill shaker with ice. Add liquers and top with milk. Shake and pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Tequillya
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients together into glass, over ice. Mix well. Serve with lime and salted glass if desired.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Sour Old-Fashioned
cocktail.instructions: Mix Whiskey, Bitters, and Cherry Juice in a ice-filled cocktail class, and fill the remaining class with sour. Garnish with olives or mushrooms and use a stir stick to mix and your mouth and taste buds to enjoy.

cocktail.name: Toolkit
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour into shot glasses. Slam it!!

cocktail.name: Big Red Hooter
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila and amaretto over ice into collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Catalina Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into chilled cocktail or margarita glass.

cocktail.name: Sloe Tequila
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients with a half-cup of crushed ice in blender. Blend at low speed and pour into old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes and twist of cucumber peel.

cocktail.name: Tijuana Taxi
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila, curacao, and schnapps over ice into large highball glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda and garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Wild Thing
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice into old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktail.name: Fraustadt
cocktail.instructions: Fill the Boston shaker with all the ingridiens and a lot of icecubes, then shake untill your hands goes into hypothermia. Pour up in a highball glas and put a lemonslice on the edge.

cocktail.name: Mudwrestle
cocktail.instructions: mix in shaker, serve over lots of ice

cocktail.name: Blue Tahoe
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in together followed by the champagne last

cocktail.name: Pineapple Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Optional splash of 7up or Sprite can be added... Shake Until condensation forms on outside of shaker Strain into shot glasses

cocktail.name: Fin N' Tonic
cocktail.instructions: mix ingredients and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Kurant
cocktail.instructions: Put some icecubes into a highball glass. Pour Absolut Kurant in the glass and fill up with Russian. Add a straw. Drink.

cocktail.name: '57 Chevy with a White License Plate
cocktail.instructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir

cocktail.name: Beelzebub
cocktail.instructions: Usually you mix the Cointreau with the hot chili sauce before you start to mix the drink. It needs to mix well. Then you pour the right amount into a shot glass, and add the vodka.(50/50)(The amount of chili sauce can be altered to find the mix that will grow hair on your chest)

cocktail.name: Desert Water
cocktail.instructions: Use a spoon when You pour the Tequila into the glass, so it doesn't mix with the Tabasco

cocktail.name: Cape Cod Crush
cocktail.instructions: Blend the Southern Comfort, cranberry juice, and ice in a blender. Pour and serve.

cocktail.name: Sweet Flower
cocktail.instructions: 1. Shake all ingredients. 2. pour into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Sweet Temptation
cocktail.instructions: Fill a Higball glass 2/3 with ice cubes. build the alcoholic and the sprite into the glass. The sour mix on top as a fizz.(shaken/mixed). Served with straw and a slice of citrus on top.

cocktail.name: Violent fuck
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add 1oz. curaco 1/2oz sloe gin fill 1/2 sour mix, 1/2 oj blend for 2 secs, garnish with cherry

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Chartreuse
cocktail.instructions: Fill Glass half full with crushed ice Add Midori Then fill glass the rest of the way full with Ginger Ale This should result in a Chartreuse colored drink. Add more Midori to your taste.

cocktail.name: Chapman
cocktail.instructions: Take the pisang ambon in the glas, and then the milk. Then shake it... Enjoy...!

cocktail.name: Bloody O.J.
cocktail.instructions: Pour the ingredients in a glass, stir.

cocktail.name: Dead Dog Vomit
cocktail.instructions: In a high-ball glass add 0ne shot of 151 rum and then layer each if the other ingredents on top.

cocktail.name: Stabilizer
cocktail.instructions: Chill the Rumple Minze until VERY cold. Then pour over the 151 in a shot glass. They will not layer, so don't try it. Then drink the shot quickly...don't waste time smelling the shot or sipping it...just drink it. The sit back and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Mother's Milk
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

cocktail.name: The Triple
cocktail.instructions: Straight out of the freezer, pour into a double shot glass the vodka, then Jgermeister, then Goldschlager.

cocktail.name: Sinfonian
cocktail.instructions: In the Shot Glass, layer equal parts of each Liquer, the Grenadine on the bottom, the Kahlua in the middle, and the Grand Marnier on top. This creates red, Black, and Gold Layers.

cocktail.name: Dickhead's Delight
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquor and chocolate milk in a higball glass, then top with whipped cream and cinnamon.

cocktail.name: Kilted Black Leprechaun
cocktail.instructions: Layer ingredients in the glass, in the following order: Baileys first, Malibu next, Drambuie last Serve with a smile (to placate the Leprechauns), wearing no underwear (och!), and thinking of sex (mon). Glug. Whee!

cocktail.name: Irish Monk #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into the shot glass in the following order: - Baileys first, - Frangelico next, - Brandy on top.

cocktail.name: Zippy's Revenge
cocktail.instructions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

cocktail.name: Sangrita
cocktail.instructions: Fill one shooter with Tequila. Take a second shot glass and fill it with clamato. Then add a couple drops of tabasco and worchestershire sauce. Shoot the tequila and chase it with the second shot. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Coco Cognac
cocktail.instructions: Pour the ingredients in a shaker with ice cubes, shake, and pour in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Belgian Blue
cocktail.instructions: Just pour all ingredients in the glass and stir...

cocktail.name: B-52 #3
cocktail.instructions: Layer the three ingredients in that order. And, I am terrible sorry, this is the only way to make a B-52 the right way.

cocktail.name: Black and White
cocktail.instructions: Stir the ingredients with and and pour into a well-chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Pure White Evil
cocktail.instructions: Mix toghter, light, drink, wake up in bed.

cocktail.name: Evil Slider
cocktail.instructions: Mix well

cocktail.name: Screaming Orgasm (San Francisco Style)
cocktail.instructions: Simply mix then add ice.

ingredient.name: Triple sec or other Orange Liquer

cocktail.name: Gladiator
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1/2 oz Amaretto with 1/2 oz Southern Comfort. Drop into glass of 2 oz orange juice mixed with 2 oz 7-up.

cocktail.name: Hard Green Bricaki
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add liquors. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Shake well and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Red Snapper
cocktail.instructions: One shot each, shake n shoot

cocktail.name: Shamrocks
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts Curacao and Vodka and and O.J for a Light Green color. Erin Go Bragh!!

cocktail.name: Russian Qualude
cocktail.instructions: Pour alchol over ice, top with milk, stir and serve

cocktail.name: Triple Asp
cocktail.instructions: Poor the ingredients in a glass. Ice if preffered. Drink it on a hot summer-night.

cocktail.name: Jamaica Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of Tia Maria and a shot of Jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

cocktail.name: PEZ
cocktail.instructions: mix all three ingredients together over ice in tumbler. shake well. for shot, strain ice. for drink, retain ice. adjust sour mix ratio to taste.

cocktail.name: Robyn
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka into a highballglass, add russian 'til the glass is a little more than half-full, fill up with fruitsoda and top it with a drop of lime juice.

cocktail.name: White Spider #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour over lots of ice.

cocktail.name: Copenheering
cocktail.instructions: Mix Cherry Heering and vodka and pour into a ice cold glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Squashed Frog
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori then Advocaat in glass. Add a few dashes of grenadine and then float Bailey's on top.

cocktail.name: Absolut Summertime
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients except lemon to shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake vigorously. Strain contents into ice filled collins glass. Garnish with lemon.

cocktail.name: The Jack Hammer
cocktail.instructions: Pour both shots into one shot glass, straight up!

cocktail.name: Paralyzer #1
cocktail.instructions: Built in a 8-10 oz zombie or collins glass,over ice .First add the tequila, vodka & kahlua.fill glass 1/2 full with coke,then top with light cream or milk.There is no garnish. but stir gently with straw.

cocktail.name: Pink Panther #2
cocktail.instructions: Add all the ingredients into the glass, and stir for a moment.

cocktail.name: Red Alert
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients together and serve

cocktail.name: The Terminator
cocktail.instructions: Pour in your favorite shot glass and enjoy. Ahh... so smoothe!

cocktail.name: San Juan Tea
cocktail.instructions: Shake liquor and sour mix. Garnish with lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Smooth Sailin'
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a medium-sized bowl. Freeze in small airtight containers. To serve, remove from freezer and let thaw about 10 minutes. Scrape or scoop into stemmed glasses. Serve with straws, if desired. Makes 14 six-ounce drinks.

cocktail.name: Buzzer's red cream soda
cocktail.instructions: Place crushed ice in blender (at least 5 cup size) Add other ingredients in order given (alcohol first) Blend until ice crystals are thoroughly mixed and drink turns red.

cocktail.name: Formula 3
cocktail.instructions: Add the 2 rums and vodka together in a beer mug. Then add the other 2 ingredients to it. Then top off the beer mug with lemonade.

cocktail.name: Leg spreader
cocktail.instructions: Mix in glass and enjoy

cocktail.name: Gorilla Milk
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Golden Miller
cocktail.instructions: Mix above ingred. together with LOTS of crushed ice. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Cosmopolitan Martini
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice, shake and strain into chilled Martini glass.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and shots in a hurricane or other tall glass. Add 1/2 of the sprite. Shake Well Add rest of sprite. Finished ingredient should look similar to pink lemonade. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Rensselaer Slam
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquor with hot coffee.

cocktail.name: Firetruck
cocktail.instructions: Serve in a Shotglass, and toss it straight down.

ingredient.name: Ginger ale or Red Soda Water

cocktail.name: Brevann (Springwater)
cocktail.instructions: Everything goes in a highballglass with ice. Pour Seven Up or Sprite on the top Garnish with lemon and some other fresh fruit. Drink with a straw

cocktail.name: Carrot Cake #1
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Place a tsp. (float) of Goldschlager in glass. Fill rest of glass with Irish Creme and Coffee Liqueur. Shake. Pour into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Dit Kicker
cocktail.instructions: Pour the fruit punch into a glass. Add the Vodka and Schnapps. The correct amount of lemon juice all depends on personal preference. A couple of splashes is a good mix to start with.

cocktail.name: Slimer
cocktail.instructions: Add liquer first. Use a glass beverage container to highlight the the green color.

cocktail.name: Football
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with Fernet Branca and drop a splash of cream in. You can always use also foamed cream.

cocktail.name: Reynolds Special
cocktail.instructions: In a tall glass pour a generous shot or two of gin and a roughly equal amount of grapefruit juice add plenty of ice fill with tonic (preferably diet) lime twist is optional

cocktail.name: Carrot Cake #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill mixing cup up with ice Add ingredients Shake and strain

cocktail.name: Woody Woodpecker
cocktail.instructions: Shake Cachaca and juice with ice. Fill it in the glas. Add Galiano.

cocktail.name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
cocktail.instructions: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.

cocktail.name: Pitbull on Crack #1
cocktail.instructions: chill and serve

cocktail.name: Bullshot
cocktail.instructions: Combine the ice, vodka and beef boullion in a mixing glass, add salt and pepper to taste. Stir. Strain into a chilled wineglass.

cocktail.name: Salty Dog #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine the grapefruit juice, vidka sugar and 4 or 5 ice cubes in a mixing glass, and stir gently with a bar spoon to dissolve the sugar and combine the ingredients. Strain into a chilled wineglass. Add 1 ice cube to the wineglass if desired.

cocktail.name: Fiery Balls of Death
cocktail.instructions: Pour the shit in the shot glass. Light on fire, pray for your life and down it.

cocktail.name: Vodka Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake the vodka and vermouth together with a number of ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive and serve.

cocktail.name: KiBa
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes and serve.

cocktail.name: Passion Chi-Chi
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a mixer, and then put them in a glass with all ice.

cocktail.name: Volga Boatman
cocktail.instructions: Combine the orange juice, vodka and kirsch in a mixing glass and add the ice cubes. Place a shaker on top of the glass and, grasping them firmly together with both hands, shake vigorously. Remove the shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Shark Bite
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add the spiced rum, light rum, sour, and blue curacco. Shake the ingredients well. Strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with three drops of grenadine.

cocktail.name: Honolulu Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pack a tall glass with crushed ice, add lime juice and southern comfort. Fill with pineapple juice and stir.

cocktail.name: Pepper Slammer
cocktail.instructions: add southern comfort to glass with ice. fill with dr. pepper pop.

cocktail.name: Cafe Savoy
cocktail.instructions: Fill mug almost to top with coffee.Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.

cocktail.name: Pearl Harbour
cocktail.instructions: Straight with ice.

cocktail.name: Fireball
cocktail.instructions: Pour the cinnamon schnapps in shot glass and add the dash of Tabasco Sauce. Then shoot.

cocktail.name: Italian Ice
cocktail.instructions: Shake Well - Do not stir. Best if served with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Barcardi Volcano
cocktail.instructions: Put the juice of 1/2 Lime in glass, then pour in cola and barcardi dark. Top up with Everclear. Light. Figure out how to drink it!

cocktail.name: Hot Shot
cocktail.instructions: Pour the hot coffee in the shot glass and gently add the Galliano, so it floats on the coffee. Then add some lightly whipped cream over it.

cocktail.name: Irish Coffee #3
cocktail.instructions: Stud the strips of orange and lemon peel with 2 cloves each and place them in a frying pan or chafing dish with the stick of cinnamon and the 2 teaspoons of sugar. Place over moderate heat, stirring occationally with a wooden spoon, until the sugar has melted. Pour the Irish Whiskey into the pan and light a match to the liquid. (Be sure to step back since the flame will flare up instantly.) Shake the pan to and fro slowly until the flame dies out. Pour in the hot coffee all at once and let it come to a simmer. Remove from the heat. Rub the cut edge of a strip of lemon peel around the inside of each the irish coffee cup and dip it into a dish of caster sugar so that the sugar adheres to the inside rim. Pour in the coffee, trying not to disturb the sugar. Top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Snowball
cocktail.instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

cocktail.name: Cokaretto
cocktail.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour Coca-Cola into glass. Add amaretto and stir. Drink with straw.

cocktail.name: Tripple Pleasure
cocktail.instructions: dump it in a glass of ice and enjoy

cocktail.name: Robot
cocktail.instructions: Mix well, add ice last. Serves two normal people or one alcoholic.

cocktail.name: Green Orange
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Pisang Ambon into a glass, of the approx. size 1 dl. Slowly pour the OJ into the liquor. No stirring... Enjoy !

cocktail.name: Kalimocho
cocktail.instructions: Drink (or throw away) one half of a 1.5 ltr. bottle of Coke. Then simply pour the wine into the bottle, slowly, so that it gets full. Do not shake the bottle, but simply turn it over a couple of times.

ingredient.name: Red wine, cheap wine will do

cocktail.name: Charlie Shaker
cocktail.instructions: Add aquavite and Charleston Follies and stir it with ice. Add lime and tonic water. Fresh up with slice of lemon and red cocktail berry.

cocktail.name: Mocha-Berry
cocktail.instructions: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Tahitian Tea
cocktail.instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add 1/2 oz of each liquor. Fill with 3 oz of each juice. Shake. Serve in a Hurricane or Collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices (if you have the patience). Enjoy!

cocktail.name: C*m Shot
cocktail.instructions: Blend liquors in shot glass. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

cocktail.name: Navel Caribbean Love
cocktail.instructions: Pour 3 oz of Malibu into the Hurricane glass. Slowly pour in the Orange juice, and VOILA!

cocktail.name: Clam Eye
cocktail.instructions: Shake Clamato (keep at room temperature). Pour Clamato into Pilsner glass or oversized beer mug. Pour beer generously down the inside of the glass until full. Be careful of foaming head. Add celery salt, tobasco sauce, and/or worchestershire sauce for flavouring.

cocktail.name: Afterburner #1
cocktail.instructions: pour both ingredients and let them mix some(you can stir it some to help it out)

cocktail.name: Midori Splice
cocktail.instructions: Build all ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Float fresh cream last.

cocktail.name: Somebird
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in random order and shake on ice.

cocktail.name: Dr. Pepper #1
cocktail.instructions: Place half a beer into a beer mug. Add to this half a can of coke. Pour an ounce of amaretto into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the mug and CHUG immediately!!!

cocktail.name: Gumbys' Ruby Red
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Rum, grapefruit juice and pineapple juice. Stir well and add ice cubes to the top for a delicious drink.
pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

cocktail.name: Southern Doctor
cocktail.instructions: Pour Southern Comfort in mason jar, fill with Dr. Pepper, chill with ice, and throw a party!

cocktail.name: Strawberry Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass and slam. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Pisang Garuda
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice cubes. Garnish: Slice of orange. Two straws.

cocktail.name: Green Dinosaur #1
cocktail.instructions: Combine all and stir. Serve in highball glass over ice

cocktail.name: Comfort Driver
cocktail.instructions: Pour orange juice over 3 cubes ice in a highball glass add Southern Comfort and stir lightly

cocktail.name: Cosmopolitan #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake liquid ingredients like hell in a shaker with ice. Place lime wedge on the rim of a Martini glass. Pour mix into the glass, up. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Hot Whiskey
cocktail.instructions: Measure the whiskey in the glas. Add cloves in the fresh lemon and put it into the whiskey. Add hot water and one tbs sugar Serve imedeatly.

cocktail.name: Vodka & Schweppes
cocktail.instructions: For best result use Smirnoff vodka.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Covered Cherry
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Ngermeister
cocktail.instructions: Kahlua. Add Jger. Fill up with coffee. Serve with cream.

cocktail.name: Mussaka
cocktail.instructions: 1 oz ouzo 1/2 oz drambuie in an old fashion glass fill with pepsi cola add ice if desired

cocktail.name: Black Watch
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a shaker 2/3 full of ice. Stir well - strain into a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Buffalo Sweat
cocktail.instructions: Stir in a shotglass. Drink quickly.

cocktail.name: All Night Long
cocktail.instructions: Mix all together in hurricane glass. Shake well. Garnish-orange flag

cocktail.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster
cocktail.instructions: Take a pintglass (= approx. 0.5 litres) Put the Tia Maria, the vodka and the cherry brandy together. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill the rest of the glass up with (50% - 50%) with dry cider and 7 -up Add ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Bay Breeze
cocktail.instructions: First, add cubed ice, then add the three parts stoli, then add the pineapple juice and last but not least, add the cranberry juice for color.

cocktail.name: Water (the original)
cocktail.instructions: Funny how the program wouldn't let me post this without adding mixing instructions. There are so many ways to get hold of it. You can draw it, pour it, dig for it or simply dig it, you can get it from a well, a tap, a source, a fountain, a stream, you can drink it straight up, out of your hand, from a glass, a bottle, a jar and a container. Soft water may have the disadvantage of containing only minute quantities of magnesium, whereas hard water might be bad for your favourite sweat-shirt... But all in all, NO WATER - NO LIFE. So get a life, care for your water.

cocktail.name: Lemon Drop #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts Absolut Citron and sweet & sour over ice then strain into a shot glass. Sprinkle sugar on lemon slice. Drink shot, then suck the lemon!

cocktail.name: Bourbon and sprite
cocktail.instructions: Pour the bourbon into the highball or whiskey sour glass with some ice. cubes preferred then mix the rest of glass with Sprite or Seven up.

cocktail.name: Thunder king
cocktail.instructions: Just mix it and shake it..

cocktail.name: Bongs Anfield Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Just Mix it together, with the most alcoholic drinks in the end.... Good luck!!!!

cocktail.name: Addison Special
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

cocktail.name: Party Death
cocktail.instructions: Just mix them together, softs first, then the vodka. Serve ice cold.

cocktail.name: Ozone
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice Add Amaretto Add splash beer Add sweet & sour Top with sprite Stir lightly

cocktail.name: Cranberry Blast
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over cubed or crushed ice stir well and serve!

cocktail.name: Wiggle Worm
cocktail.instructions: Mix Well. Put Vodka in first. Put cherry in last. Add ice if needed.

cocktail.name: California Root Beer
cocktail.instructions: Put Kahlua and Galliano in highball glass fill with soda

cocktail.name: Nikki Delight
cocktail.instructions: Poor all ingredients over ICE and STIR don't Shake....

cocktail.name: Malibu Dreams
cocktail.instructions: Mix Malibu and Grenadine together. Fill with soda.

cocktail.name: Blackbeard
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan's, and root beer schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Coke or Pepsi and serve.

cocktail.name: Backdraft
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal amounts into Brandy Snifter and light.

cocktail.name: Jo-Jo Cool-Aid
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Southern Coffort and Amaretto. Fill the rest of the glass with cranberry juice

cocktail.name: The Whammie
cocktail.instructions: Fill a 20 ounce glass with ice. Add the 7 shots. Finish off with with orange and pineapple juice. Add Grenadine until it turns pink. Top with Cherries.

cocktail.name: Rocket Fuel
cocktail.instructions: Mix all in glass and drink rapidly

cocktail.name: The Vaitkus
cocktail.instructions: shake ingredients together and pour into a cocktail glass. drink quickly!

cocktail.name: Lysekil's groggen
cocktail.instructions: First you take vodka then you take O j then ster then you fill it up with russian and ice cubes

cocktail.name: Hot Dick #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquors into large irish coffee mug. Add enough strong hot coffee to fill mug. Top with whipped cream if desired, garnish with chocolate sprinkles or butterscotch sprinkles if desired.

ingredient.name: Coffee, or enough to fill mug

cocktail.name: BAV(BAW)
cocktail.instructions: Shake or stir and enjoy

cocktail.name: Amaretto Stone Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake and Serve over ice

cocktail.name: Elmer Fuddpucker
cocktail.instructions: The mixture is one large can (12 oz) of frozen limeade, that same can filled with any cheap vodka, and three cans of LITE beer.

cocktail.name: Cosmopolitan #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Quickly shake and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktail.name: Frozen Mudslide #2
cocktail.instructions: Add all liquid ingrediance into mixer. Add vanilla icecream and mix. Add more icecream till desired texture.

cocktail.name: Tropical Storm Jack
cocktail.instructions: Put all in hi-ball glass and shake garnish with lime

cocktail.name: Rum a'la Olof
cocktail.instructions: Poure the rum and the lemon-juice in the bowl, and mix it. Then you take the cocoa-powder and the hot coffee and mix it with the other stuff in the bowl. After that you poure your mixture in a shot-glass. The whipped cream you put on the top of the glass. Ready to be served!

cocktail.name: Bailey's Hot Shot
cocktail.instructions: - Put Irish Cream in large glass and microwave on HIGH power for half a minute or so. - While that's going, rim the shot glasses with sugar - Pour heated Bailey's into shot glasses and serve immediately

cocktail.name: Light and Dark
cocktail.instructions: Add sour mix and shake in whiskey sour rock glass or 10 oz. goblet. Garnish with lime wedge

cocktail.name: Pink Elephants On Parade
cocktail.instructions: Mix, drink fast, shudder

cocktail.name: White Spider #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Brown Cow from Hell
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients until no chocolate residue is left on bottom of glass. Serve chilled. Enjoy!!

cocktail.name: Apple Pie Shot #2
cocktail.instructions: bang glass on table and immediately take shot

cocktail.name: Stardust
cocktail.instructions: Fill shaker cup with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake and strain into shooter glass of preference.

cocktail.name: Kahlua and Cream
cocktail.instructions: Put Kahlua in a glass over ice and 1 ounce cream and shake.

cocktail.name: Top Shelf Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Fill mixing glass with ice Pour in all ingredients Shake well Pour into salt rimmed glass Add lime wedge or wheel

cocktail.name: Blue Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Mix into punch bowl and make sure that the koolaid is already pre measurable with sugar already added. Be careful, hard to taste alcohol so intoxication sets in quickly!

cocktail.name: Jeweler's Hammer
cocktail.instructions: This drink is sooo good you will probably want to add 2 oz. of Vodka to 8 oz. of white grape juice. Add more or less Vodka to taste and pour over ice. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Derailer
cocktail.instructions: This is the punch we serve at our annual Halloween party. We use a big, black, plastic cauldron to mix this punch in. You can use any LARGE vat to concoct this wonderful drink. Add all alcohols first, then add juices. Add the Sprite just before serving. If you want... do as we do, and drop in chunks of dry-ice to create a bubbling, smoking cauldron of pure Halloweeen evil! It's safe to drink, and does not really change the taste all that much! YAHOO! GET DERAILED!

cocktail.name: Lemon Drop #3
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass with rum. Dip lemon wedge in sugar.

cocktail.name: Lemon Drop #4
cocktail.instructions: pour over cracked ice, and strain into a cocktail glass with sugar around its rim.

cocktail.name: Antifreeze
cocktail.instructions: chill with ice cubes in shaker. Pour into rocks glass or split into two shots

cocktail.name: Warp Core Breach
cocktail.instructions: Put 1/2 ounce of Goldschlager in 1 1/2 ounce shot glass. Then put Tequila on top followed by Jack Daniels. Down it and party till she's cute.

cocktail.name: Shogun
cocktail.instructions: Mix in blender and garnish with orange slice

cocktail.name: Christmas Cheer
cocktail.instructions: stir it up and shoot it down. HO! HO! HO! Tastes like christmas with a pine tree twist.

cocktail.name: Amoco Shot
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Bacardi 151 in, then the Everclear. Just put a drop of Kahlua right in the middle. Don't smell it, and take it. It should start your engines!

cocktail.name: Blind Russian
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all liquers. Add milk. shake.

cocktail.name: Tummy Blower
cocktail.instructions: Just Mix together and drink fast !!

cocktail.name: Absolut Sex
cocktail.instructions: Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice: Strain into rocks glass: Splash of seven on top.Absolut Sex.

cocktail.name: Alien Secretion
cocktail.instructions: Just mix all in equal portions. Its good!

cocktail.name: Aztec Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher. Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available, the bigger the better! This drink packs a big punch, so don't over do it.

cocktail.name: Lemon Drop #5
cocktail.instructions: Shake vodka, Cointreau and juice of a lemon wedge well with plenty of ice. Strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon zest.

cocktail.name: Apfel Orange
cocktail.instructions: Mix the ingredients, add a couple of ice cubes. Put a slice of orange or lemon (any fruit will do!) on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Vaina
cocktail.instructions: Put all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake it well. Serve in a red wine glass and add in the top a bit of powdered cinnamon .

cocktail.name: Absolut limousine
cocktail.instructions: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.

cocktail.name: Absolut Evergreen
cocktail.instructions: Mix, pour over ice and top up with Bitter Lemon.

cocktail.name: Smeraldo
cocktail.instructions: Put all in a Shacker with Ice, shake it for a while and serve in a cold Cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Lunch Box
cocktail.instructions: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

cocktail.name: Starla's Waver
cocktail.instructions: Get a large glass, (any glass but it must be large) Start from the top of the list and work your way down stirring each time you add an ingredient. When you've finished you need not do anything else just drink it.

cocktail.name: Status Quo
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything together and add some crunched ice and olives!

cocktail.name: JTDelight
cocktail.instructions: Put in the Vokda first then the Tropical Schnapps then add the OJ and the Cranberry Juice.

cocktail.name: Sacrilicious
cocktail.instructions: chill and strain into a shot glass

cocktail.name: Secret Blue
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredient vodka, lime and sugar with shaker. Add soda. Pour into Beer-pilsner with Ice. Drop curacao and creme de menthe. Decorate with cut-lime and cherry.

cocktail.name: Super Sangria
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients besides the ice in a large pitcher (or several smaller). Once thoroughly mixed, add the ice and serve in wine glasses.

ingredient.name: Fruit juice (preferrably a Sangria fruit juice mix)

cocktail.name: Traffic Light Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Into pilsner glass filled with ice cubes, first pour the melon liqueur, then the tequila, to create a green layer. Add sour mix. Slowly pour orange juice against side of glass to create the yellow layer. Add a few more ice cubes, if needed. Carefully float the sloe gin on top for the red layer. Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime wheels. Stir just before drinking.

cocktail.name: Snakebite (Aus)
cocktail.instructions: Pour Chartreuse into shot glass, and dash the Tabasco in. More Tabasco for a more venomous bite!

cocktail.name: Sjarsk
cocktail.instructions: Add the coffe first , then add alchohol and finally you should add the sugar. Shake well :c)

cocktail.name: Shut the hell up
cocktail.instructions: Pour Jager at bottom of glass. Mix Crown, Everclear, & 151 separately to layer on top of the Jager. Splash the Grenadine. Attempt to shoot & SHUT THE HELL UP.

cocktail.name: Sloe comfortable screw against the wall
cocktail.instructions: Shot of Sloe Gin, add half ounce Southern Comfort, fill with orange juice, float Galliano.

cocktail.name: Root Beer Barrel
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass with schnapps. Fill tumbler about 3/4 full of beer. Place filled shot glass upright in filled tumbler. Beer should be just short of covering top of shot glass. Just before drinking, cover entire drink with hand and slam on table or bar. Drink all at once.

cocktail.name: Smarty
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ing. over ice, strain and serve! Tastes like a sweet tart!

cocktail.name: Sex under the boardwalk
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: The Lunchbox
cocktail.instructions: Chill & strain.

cocktail.name: The Roni
cocktail.instructions: Pour the shit in a beer mug, mix, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Green wave
cocktail.instructions: pour alchol into glass and fill with equal parts of juices and sour mix add ice and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Milky Way
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with cut apple, lemon, pineapple-leaves.

cocktail.name: Cardicas
cocktail.instructions: Stir. No garnish.

cocktail.name: Pucker
cocktail.instructions: Pour whiskey generously over ice, add grapefruit juice (preferably unsweetened).

cocktail.name: The Liver Transplant
cocktail.instructions: Over Ice. Stir, dont shake.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Ethan
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker, then shake, and pour into glass. Add lime.

cocktail.name: What She's Having
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Vodka, then fill with the orange juice. Add the amaretto which should mostly sink to the bottom. Splash in some grenadine to cloud the center of the drink. Serve without mixing or stirring.

cocktail.name: Feel like holiday
cocktail.instructions: Stir Vodka and Grenadine with ice. Fill in Champagne-flute without the ice. Fill up with champagne.

cocktail.name: SD Special
cocktail.instructions: Make fresh homemade lemonade by mixing the juice of one lemon and 8 oz. (one glass) of water. Be sure not to add sugar. Add the vodka and stir then put in the ice.

cocktail.name: Satin Angel
cocktail.instructions: mix all ingredients in glass and enjoy!!
