cocktail.name: Jenny's Concoction
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and anisette into the glass and top it off with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Rafu Eighteen
cocktail.instructions: Fill vodka and Pisang in the glas. If you tihnk it's to strong you may fill in with more pisang. Fill then with orange juice and sprite, about half of each till the glas is filled. Take then a twist or two of lemon.

cocktail.name: Nuts and Berries #2
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients to a tumbler with ice. Shake well. Pour into snifter, ice included.

cocktail.name: Coppertone Punch
cocktail.instructions: Combine Creme de Banana, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice & ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Strain over ice and float Midori. Garnish with watermelon wedge.

cocktail.name: Fatkid on the Rocks
cocktail.instructions: Put the ice cubes in first then add the shots in the order that they're listed.

cocktail.name: Sweet-tart Lollipop
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a collins glass over ice (if a 32 oz. glass is available double all the ingredients), mix in a shaker and serve with a cherry. Should taste like the old chalky lollipops that cam on a hard plastic stem!!!!

cocktail.name: Kool-Aid Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.

cocktail.name: Liquid Heroine
cocktail.instructions: Mix Rumple Minze and Jgermeister in an iced shaker and strain into shot glass

cocktail.name: Oil Slick #2
cocktail.instructions: Place The Creme de menthe in a shot glass, using a tea spoon carefully float the Black Sambuca on top.

cocktail.name: Scope
cocktail.instructions: Put double of Creme de Menthe in a 10-12 oz (300-350ml) glass and fill to top with Ginger Ale, Tonic, or Soda Water.

cocktail.name: Gin Blossam
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass about two thirds full of Sprite. Pour in the Schnapps, then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.

cocktail.name: Kurant Tea
cocktail.instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Superfly
cocktail.instructions: Ice first, then the Gin (use high quality like Beefeeter). Then pour on the lime juice (use a sweet brand like Hearts) and the fill upp the class with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Peach Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila, peach schnapps, and sweet & sour over ice. Add grenadine and stir slightly. The drink should fade from yellow to red. You can also put ingredients in a blender with ice for a frozen version.

cocktail.name: Ultimate Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila, Cointreau, and sweet & sour over crushed ice. Add lime juice. Can be made frozen by putting in a blender with 3 cups ice.

cocktail.name: Cocaine Lady
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake, strain into shot glass. The amount of milk is optional depending on desired potancy of shot.

cocktail.name: Dirty Nipple
cocktail.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

cocktail.name: Woodpecker
cocktail.instructions: Add 4 ice cubes to old-fashioned glass. Pour 2 ounces of vodka over the ice. Add 15 dashes of peychaud bitters. Stir.

cocktail.name: The District III
cocktail.instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add one shot each of Bacardi Black Rum and Seagram's Extra Dry Gin. Add a splash of soda water and fill the rest of the glass with sweet & sour mix.

cocktail.name: Black River
cocktail.instructions: First you mix the alcohol into the glass with ice in it. Next you pour Sprite and Farris at the same time into the glas. At last you the drops from lime comes and you serve it with a slice of lime on the side.

cocktail.name: Salisbury Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour Coke in, then orange juice, then vodka. Stir it about a bit, then add cordial. Enjoy !

cocktail.name: Tootsie
cocktail.instructions: Add ice to glass, pour in Kahlua, fill with orange juice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Dick Deming Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix. Pretend it's a martini. Plastic glasses are the best for this beast.

cocktail.name: Die ruhige Sturm
cocktail.instructions: Mix the 2 half gallons of each in a large enough container, chill in the freezer for a maximum of 1 hour.

cocktail.name: Darkwood Sling
cocktail.instructions: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Soft Serbian
cocktail.instructions: Mix alcohol, then juice and tonic water. Add crushed ice and drink.

cocktail.name: Headcrush
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with Tequila then add Tabasco sauce carfully, put on a top with whipped cream and add some salt on it.

cocktail.name: Brass Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Basically, toss the Rum & Vodka together and stir gently. Next, pour in the orange juice . Shake well. Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Tina Baker
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1/1/2 oz. of peach scnapps. Then fill the glass about 1/2 full with o.j. Next fill the rest of the glass with 7-up or Sprite. Top the drink off with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a flag.

cocktail.name: Big Bull
cocktail.instructions: Mix tequila and kahlua in a whiskey glass and serve with lotsa ice...

cocktail.name: Buzz Inducer
cocktail.instructions: Put the two shots into frosty beer mug. Add IBC Root Beer into glass. Ice cubes are optional.

cocktail.name: Dephaekt
cocktail.instructions: Blend the Absolut kurant, Oregat and Frangelico in a mixer. Pour in highball glass, add 2 icecubes, fill with the cranberryjuice and sprite. Put a slice of lemon on the edge of the glass. Optional to add a dash of lime for an even fresher taste.

cocktail.name: Bambi's Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in glass Pour in vodka Add splash of Sour Mix Half fill with cola Half fill with 7-Up Roll drink to remove fizz Drink!

cocktail.name: Bartender's Wet Dream
cocktail.instructions: Just put the ingredients in a shot glass and put a little bit of whipped cream on the top.

cocktail.name: YoYo Blow Out
cocktail.instructions: Throw it all together and have fun. Adjust sour mix for a stiffer or weaker drink.

cocktail.name: Pyro
cocktail.instructions: Mix as normal, pour in shot glass, and set on fire. Put it out any way you want.

cocktail.name: Prince of Norway
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with Icecubes, pour all ingrediences into glass. Garnish with orange slice.

cocktail.name: Inferno
cocktail.instructions: Put the tabasco sauce in the bottom of a shot glass, pour equal parts Absolut Peppar and Everclear 190 then add salt. Set on fire and serve.

cocktail.name: Bailey's Dream Shake
cocktail.instructions: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !

cocktail.name: Dirty Banana
cocktail.instructions: blend ice and ice-cream in the blender until smooth. add liquers and continue blending until smooth. if needed add more ice-cream to acheive milk shake type consistency.

cocktail.name: Gremlin
cocktail.instructions: Into a mason jar filled with cracked ice, pour 6 oz Canadian Whisky and 3 oz Sweetened lime juice. Stir with a fork.

cocktail.name: Carmina Burana
cocktail.instructions: Crush the two pieces of candy until they are pulverised. Pour the vodka into the shot glass before adding the powder. Stir it until the candy has dissolved in the liquor.

cocktail.name: Charlie Coke
cocktail.instructions: Add 1.5 oz. Absolut Vodka to 10 oz. cocktail glass filled with ice, top off with Coka-Cola.

cocktail.name: Cape Breton Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Mix in the lemonade with the Bacardi Limon. If it is a good lemonade you're using you can mix as much as half & half and not be able to taste the rum.

cocktail.name: Monkey Spam
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Irish Cream into a highballglass. Pour the Fanta over it and watch as it explodes

cocktail.name: Coon Dawg Punch
cocktail.instructions: Put in punch first, then add everclear. For added flavor, soak the fruit wedges in everclear about an hour ahead of time. Fruit wedges make excellent snack. Best served in ice chest or jantorial trash can for mass comsumption.

cocktail.name: Cactus Bowl
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice. Serve in Margarita glass on rocks.

cocktail.name: Japanese Slipper #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice in cocktail shaker. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: The Green One
cocktail.instructions: shake with ice. pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Flaming Dragon
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in a double shot glass. Light on fire. Let the flames warm the concoction about 20 secs. Blow out fire. Swallow quickly. Be careful as the glass may be hot. Now lay on the ground, put your claws in the air, and "wrestle with the dragon".

cocktail.name: Hunka Hunka Burnin Luv
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass (larger than 12 oz.). Put a lid over the glass. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds.

cocktail.name: Bull's sweat
cocktail.instructions: just mix, shake and pour.

cocktail.name: Bumble Bee #1
cocktail.instructions: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!

cocktail.name: BonBon
cocktail.instructions: Shake & Strain.

cocktail.name: Bali Dream
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in shaker together with some ice-cubes. Shake well. Serve with piece of banana on top of the glass.

ingredient.name: Orange juice or tropical fruit mix

cocktail.name: Lime Time
cocktail.instructions: Pour the beer into the pint glass. Add the lime juice and the Hooch. Stir with a spoon or something like that. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Galliano Hotshot #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 cl Galliano into a shot glass, float 2cl hot filter coffee over it and top with lightly thickened cream as to create three layers.

cocktail.name: Captain Pepper
cocktail.instructions: Mix. Then drink. Repeat as necessary.

cocktail.name: Bailey's Comet #2
cocktail.instructions: layer in order given, splash 151 on top light on fire, sprinkle cinnamon on top to produce sparks instead of just a flame

cocktail.name: Watermelon Shooter #4
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Bartender's Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, sweet & sour, cranberry juice, and lime juice in a pint glass. Rim another pint glass with salt and transfer contents. Float the Gran Marnier, garnish with a lime and straw, and serve.

ingredient.name: Sweet and sour (FRESH lemon juice with equal parts simple syrup)

cocktail.name: Pulp Vega
cocktail.instructions: Crush the cherries in the glass and mix it with the other ingrediences

cocktail.name: Platina Blonde
cocktail.instructions: Poor Tequila in a glass, fill in with cream, stir.

cocktail.name: A.D.M. (After Dinner Mint)
cocktail.instructions: shake vigorously

cocktail.name: Twinkle My Lights
cocktail.instructions: mix in shaker over ice...strain into glass(es)

cocktail.name: A Splash of Nash
cocktail.instructions: Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

cocktail.name: Screaming White Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: fill up the shaker with ice and put the ingredience in it. Shake it until it gets frosty on the outside. Before you start shaking,put icecubes in the glass and fill it up with water so the glass is cold when you have shaked the drink. Take the icecubes and water out of the glass,and fill the glass again vith icecubes and pour the drink in the glass.

cocktail.name: Spider's Web
cocktail.instructions: put alchohol in shot glass, drop strawberry into glass, then try and make cream float on top.

cocktail.name: Illusion
cocktail.instructions: pour all spirits in the shaker ... & top with a splash of pineapple juice

cocktail.name: Earthquake #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, gin and creme-de-menthe over lots of ice.

cocktail.name: Pink Panther Shake
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Mix until smooth. Garnish with fresh of frozen berries.

cocktail.name: Sun Shake
cocktail.instructions: Mix in blender until smooth. Garnish with slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

cocktail.name: Matty's Magic Mixture
cocktail.instructions: combine ingredients in mug and stir until fizzy

cocktail.name: My Antonella
cocktail.instructions: In a highball glass, combine Gin and Chambord over ice. Stir. Add two Italian green olives and fill with tonic water. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Arizona Stingers
cocktail.instructions: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass . Add the 2 HEAPING shots of Absolute Vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of Absolute as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with the Arizona Icetea with lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!

cocktail.name: Orange Push-up
cocktail.instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

cocktail.name: 151 Florida Bushwacker
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.

cocktail.name: Beam Me Up Scottie Mac
cocktail.instructions: Chill rum. Then layer. Creme de Banana first, then Bailey's and float rum on top.

cocktail.name: Watermelon Shooter #3
cocktail.instructions: In a large juice or water pitcher filled with ice cubes, pour equal parts pineapple juice and Jack Daniels. Stir, then add a splash of grenadine to give the mixture a pink, almost watermelon, tint. Stir until well chilled. Pour into shot glass, straining ice, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Zizi Coin-coin
cocktail.instructions: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

cocktail.name: Banana Cream Pi
cocktail.instructions: This drink can be mixed with ice added, or put into a blender with ice, to be crushed. I like it on ice.
fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

cocktail.name: Sex On Acid
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain. Serve as a shooter.

cocktail.name: Tequila Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

cocktail.name: Gary's Poison
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Rum and then triple sec. Next pour in OJ and Pinapple. Grab that Gary.

cocktail.name: Laser Beam
cocktail.instructions: combine all liquor in full glass of ice. shake well. garnish with orange and cherry

cocktail.name: Cream Soda
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

cocktail.name: ACID
cocktail.instructions: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

cocktail.name: Agent Orange
cocktail.instructions: Hurricane glass filled with ice add ingredients shake cherry and orange garnish

cocktail.name: Grape Crush
cocktail.instructions: Small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

cocktail.name: Alien Secretion #2
cocktail.instructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

cocktail.name: Southern Blues
cocktail.instructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

cocktail.name: Darth Vader
cocktail.instructions: Collins glass filled with ice add ingredients up to sour mix shake fill with Jgermeister

cocktail.name: Arctic Fish
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice and fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. DO NOT STIR!!!!! Serve well chilled.

cocktail.name: Alligator
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Add o.j. and Midori and give a little stir.

cocktail.name: Crocodile
cocktail.instructions: Add a few cubes of ice to glass and then add Midori and Bacardi. Fill the rest of the way with the soda and give a little stir.

cocktail.name: Sweet Heart
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with cinamon-powder, cherry, mint, lemon-peel

cocktail.name: Gege
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with red cherry

cocktail.name: Finn Roses
cocktail.instructions: stir

cocktail.name: Lady Scarlett
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with cherry, lemon-peel

cocktail.name: Scanex
cocktail.instructions: shake.

cocktail.name: Yaka
cocktail.instructions: Combine the water and lemonade mix, following the directions on the lemonade mix. Add everclear and absolute vodka. Then add the lemon slices and shake to mix. serve cold

cocktail.name: Passcack Valley Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Put in iced shaker and mix well, strain in to a Highball glass

cocktail.name: Grim Reaper
cocktail.instructions: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

cocktail.name: Grateful Dead
cocktail.instructions: shake ingredients and pour over ice...

cocktail.name: Sweets to the Sweet
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half way with vodka, fill rest of way with Zima. Then add the lime juice (Rose's Lime Juice works best). Now stir and add the slice of lime.

cocktail.name: Richie Family
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, whiskey and Bailey's. Add the coffea and the brown sugar. Blend.

cocktail.name: Juicy Lucy
cocktail.instructions: Just mix them!!!

cocktail.name: Blue Kisok
cocktail.instructions: Pour an half ounce of Blue Curacao into shot glass. Follow with quarter of an ounce of Vodka. (Try and use Smirnoff) One table spoon of lime juice. Then fill rest of glass with sprite.

cocktail.name: Speedball
cocktail.instructions: just pour the alcoholic ingridents in a shot glas and when you done that squeze a little amount of lime juice on top

cocktail.name: San Diego Seabreeze
cocktail.instructions: Build all ingrediants in a collins glass, cover, shake and serve

cocktail.name: Russian Quallude
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients and serve over ice. (crushed)

cocktail.name: Fuck You
cocktail.instructions: Mix each ingredient in a glass. Tilt glass 180 degrees and slam it!

cocktail.name: Leche de Monja
cocktail.instructions: Place whole eggs, in shell, (organic would be preferable) in a jar. Cover with lemon/lime juice. Seal the jar and refrigerate. Leave the eggs to marinate for 2-3 weeks. The shells should become soft. Place the eggs and juice in a blender and blend until smooth. Strain to remove egg membranes. Add sugar and pisco to taste.

ingredient.name: Lime juice or lemon-lime juice (to cover eggs)

cocktail.name: Girl Scout Cookie
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing cup with ice. Shake and strain into double shot glass. Drink soon after pouring before liquors separate.

cocktail.name: The Dragon
cocktail.instructions: Just Dump 'EM All In A Glass & Mix 'Em All Up.

cocktail.name: Harry Alligator
cocktail.instructions: Layer ingrediants in order listed above. Then squeeze lemon over layered ingrediants. Be sure to mount lemon wedge on side of glass or place in glass.

cocktail.name: Lighthouse
cocktail.instructions: Pour Kahlua in shot glass then with a spoon slowly pour Irish Cream into the shot glass on top of the Kahlua then pour the 151 Rum with the Spoon slowly on top of the Irish Cream then light on fire.. Blow out Flame Before Drinking!

cocktail.name: Red Snapper #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix it all over ice, strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Satan's Revenge
cocktail.instructions: combine in sequence in shot glass, shoot!

cocktail.name: Psycho Joe
cocktail.instructions: 1) Put all ingredients in mixing glass 2) Shake 3) Pour into coffee mug 4) Add sugar and cream if neccasary

cocktail.name: The Pernod Demon
cocktail.instructions: 1) Coat the lemon wedge with sugar 2) Douse the lemon wedge with the 6 dashes of tobasco 3) Fill the shot glass with pernod To administer this shot, suck the lemon and then shoot the pernod.

cocktail.name: Irish Cream Special
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in bottom of glass. Slowly pour Baliey's Irish Cream over ice Next pour in milk and then stir gently. Add more to taste. For chocoholics add Hearshy's Chocolate sauce.

cocktail.name: El Presidente Cocktail #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry.

cocktail.name: Golden Furnace
cocktail.instructions: Pour Goldschlagger into a shot glass. Add a splash of Tabasco sauce. Drink and run for water.

cocktail.name: Sancho Panza
cocktail.instructions: Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.

cocktail.name: Freddy Kruger
cocktail.instructions: make it an ample size shot!!

cocktail.name: Gold Baron
cocktail.instructions: Float Goldschlager on top of Rumple and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Red Baron
cocktail.instructions: Float schnapps on top of Rumple and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Golden Star
cocktail.instructions: put two scoops ice-cream in blender add liquor and blend until like a milk shake.

cocktail.name: Forest Fire
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shot glass, it's that simple. Use more Tabasco for more fire, less for more alcohol.

cocktail.name: Vodka Orange
cocktail.instructions: serve with ice. fresh pressed juice tastes best.

cocktail.name: Firehammer
cocktail.instructions: combine with ice in shaker strain into cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Italian Ice #2
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Luftwaffe
cocktail.instructions: Put 1/3 chocolate syrup, then 1/3 Jgermeister, and then 1/3 Butterscotch of the glass.

cocktail.name: Giraffe
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori into a hurricane glass over ice, add Vodka, Pineapple juice, then float cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Concord
cocktail.instructions: Layer ingredients in above order in a shot glass. Light Bacardi 151 Rum, and serve.

cocktail.name: Lava Flow
cocktail.instructions: Blend banana, coconut cream, and pineapple juice in blender and set aside. In bottom of hurricane glass, stir together both rums and strawberries. Pour banana/coconut/pineapple mix into glass slowly. The strawberry/rum mix should creep up the sides of the glass to make a wonderful looking (and tasting) summertime cocktail!

cocktail.name: Pink Gin #2
cocktail.instructions: Add cranberry juice to gin and pour into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Purple Crayon
cocktail.instructions: Pour Chambord and Vodka over ice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Garnish with purple grape and pineapple slice.

cocktail.name: Feel The Burn
cocktail.instructions: Layer all ingredients and light on fire to warm. Blow out flame and drink in one gulp.

cocktail.name: Vanilla Vargas
cocktail.instructions: Fill the highball glass (or preferrably a 32oz glass) half way with crushed ice. Then add the shots of alcohol in this order: bacardi 151 rum, crown royal, and vanilla liqeur. Now pour one can of pepsi into the mixture. Finally, stir well with a barspoon, or any long spoon to evenly distribute the ingredients.

cocktail.name: Golden Cola
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass(or preferably a 32 oz. glass) halfway with crushed ice. Add alcohol contents over ice. Pour coke over mixture. Mix well.

cocktail.name: Full Moon Fever
cocktail.instructions: Add the three rums and the Midori in highball glass with ice. Add a little Sour mix for flavor and fill the rest with pineapple juice. It's a nice light green color. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Hunch Punch
cocktail.instructions: Put them all together and mix it with a lot of ice. For big parties use more of each and mix in a garbage can.

cocktail.name: Smashing Pumpkin
cocktail.instructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

cocktail.name: Caribbean Smoked Torch
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients, except for the 151 rum in a tin glass or shaker. Steam the snifter, using the 1/2oz. of 151 lighting it, until it consumes itself. After that pour the content of the shaker in the hot snifter. It will create a really good smelling cloud of smoke, that it's what distinguish this coktail.

cocktail.name: Bubble Gum
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Bahama Mama Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Serve over ice in a tall glass

cocktail.name: Bakkus
cocktail.instructions: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well, pour into a tall cocktail glass and add a slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Gun Barrel
cocktail.instructions: Put into mixing glass all of above. Mix well, pour into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Peppermint Patty
cocktail.instructions: Put a shot of peppermint schnapps in your mouth. Do not swallow. Squirt chocolate (not too much!) into your mouth. Shake head vigorously and then swallow.

cocktail.name: Frogster
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add the blue curacao, add the tequila and finally for that yummy green color, fill the glass with the orange juice.

cocktail.name: Snowball #2
cocktail.instructions: Take the glass and rub the edge on a lemon, then dip the rim in sugar. Drop the ice cubes into the glass, pour a 1/3 liqueur and fill it up with Sprite. Stir.

cocktail.name: Blue Bay
cocktail.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Moonlight Serenade
cocktail.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Peach Bowl
cocktail.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Cool Coco
cocktail.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with cherries.

cocktail.name: Kiwi Lemon
cocktail.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

cocktail.name: Terminator
cocktail.instructions: 151 first, then Rumple Minze

cocktail.name: Virgin Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice, strain and serve in a chilled cocktail glass, on on the rocks in an Old-fashioned glass. Granish with maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Green angel
cocktail.instructions: Blend Pisang Ambon, Peach Tree, Malibu and lemon squash together in a blender. Put ice cubes in the glas and pour the mix over. Fill up with Sprite, and add a drop of blue syrup. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Joel's Pet Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shot glass in order of appearance in ingredients list.

cocktail.name: Wave Runner (a.k.a. Rave Gunner)
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum and cranberry juice into a tall glass. Slowly add Sprite, stopping immediately when the color changes from red to pink.

cocktail.name: Urine Sample
cocktail.instructions: Just pour it in

cocktail.name: Wooly Mitten
cocktail.instructions: Put Coaca mix in the mug fill half way with hot water - stir. Pour in Southern Comfort, peppermint schnapps and Bailey's - stir. Top off with hot water. Top with whipped cream (optional) .

cocktail.name: Dr. Pepper #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine the shots in a 'collins' glass. Fill the rest of the glass 3/4 full with Coke. Add crushed ice.

cocktail.name: The Piledriver
cocktail.instructions: Add 1/3 rum,1/3 vodka , and combine coca-cola and orange juice to fill glass. Add ice if you have room!

cocktail.name: Spiced apple
cocktail.instructions: In a shot glass pour in apple brandy first, then Goldschlager, then Captain Morgan's. Shoot!

cocktail.name: Smooch
cocktail.instructions: pour into a tall glass over ice, shake to mix all ingredients well, garnish with a cherry or an orange slice if you so desire

cocktail.name: Nuthugger
cocktail.instructions: Pour in hard liquors first and lime juice follows. Top with beer until full. Do not stir. Enjoy!!

cocktail.name: Pink Squirrel #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice filled glass and shake or stir to mix and then strain.

cocktail.name: Kill Me Now
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in hurricane glass.

cocktail.name: Hot Creamy Bush
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass

cocktail.name: Hot Peppermint Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Make hot chocolate (preferably using water) according to instructions. Mix in Rumple Minze and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Exotic summernight
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and orange- and pineapplejuice and pour over ice in a glass. Layer a little grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Walker's Revenge
cocktail.instructions: Add rums over ice and fill glass with ice tea. Best in a tall frosty glass.

cocktail.name: Booty Juice
cocktail.instructions: Fill mixing glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all ingerdients. Strain into a rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Naked Navel
cocktail.instructions: Keep both bottles in the freezer. Pour vodka first to the 1 oz line. Pour in the schnapps, which will form a ball in the bottom of the glass.

cocktail.name: Jan's Jello Shots
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve jello with 1 cup boiling water, add 1 cup vodka and srir, pour into shot glasses, ice trays, or in 1 oz plastic cups found at party supply stores (they even have little lids for them), chill until firm. Each person can use a knife or their tongue to loosen the edges of the jello and then suck them down. If you use the 1 oz plastic cups and lids you can serve them by placing all of the cups in a large bowl filled with ice...they will stay cold longer, and they look really festive! * Try making an assortment using several flavors of jello!

cocktail.name: Grendel
cocktail.instructions: Shaken with ice and put in a pint glass and topped with lemonade.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Pool Table
cocktail.instructions: Over ice mix equal parts of each alchohol. Top with the grapefruit juice. Shake to blend.

cocktail.name: Three Wise Men (vodka)
cocktail.instructions: pour 2/3 of an oz. of each ingrediant into a shot glass and drink.

cocktail.name: Ruby Relaxer
cocktail.instructions: Combine shots of peach schnapps, vodka and malibu rum. Fill glass almost to top with pineapple juice and splash in cranberry juice for a touch o' color.

cocktail.name: Kamakazie #1
cocktail.instructions: shake well with ice, pour strained mixture into shooter. Salute'

cocktail.name: Raspberry kamikaze
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass and add ice ! Enjoy!!

cocktail.name: Nightcap
cocktail.instructions: Heat milk. Add sugar. Add Kahlua. Nutmeg on top. Sleep tight.

cocktail.name: Pinky
cocktail.instructions: Pour Rumple Minze into glass first, add Firewater

cocktail.name: Paul Raspberry
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka in medium-sized shot glass Add a mouthful of 2% milk Add a drop or two of grenadine Ice optional.

cocktail.name: Plead the 5th
cocktail.instructions: mix all on the rocks,shake,strain,and serve.

cocktail.name: Passed Out Naked on the Bathroom Floor
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient into the shot glass, in this order: Rumple Minze, Jgermeister, Jose Cuervo Gold Tequila, then Bacardi 151 Rum. No need to mix, it mixes fine in this order.

cocktail.name: Wild Sex
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice and pour Malibu, peach schnapps and 151 into glass. After putting the right amount of liquor put your juices on top and splash of grenadine. When you have all of that done take your shaker tin, fitting it on top of the glass and give it a couple of good shakes.

cocktail.name: Cazuela
cocktail.instructions: In a cazuela that is made of clay, put ice, salt, lime, orange, lemon, and grapefruit in cazuela then add granadine, and the tequila, then fill with Squirt, use a straw to stir.

cocktail.name: Lifesaver
cocktail.instructions: Shake well. Serve in rocks glass

cocktail.name: Voodoo Dew
cocktail.instructions: Poor shots into jar or glass and then poor can of dew in!! Mix well and enjoy!!!

cocktail.name: Hispaniola
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and a cherry. Stir.

cocktail.name: Geting
cocktail.instructions: Start with the ice then you take the vodka then the liquor then the ginger ale

cocktail.name: Jack Daniel's Lynchburg Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and stir. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries.

cocktail.name: Lemon Splash Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix Vodka, Amaretto, Tripple Sec and a 1/2 squeeze of Lemon wedge in a shaker with ice. Shake. Squeeze remaining lemon juice into Martini glass. Pour mixture into glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Moonlight Drive
cocktail.instructions: First apply a alcohol into cup. Then add juices. Shake,shake, rattle and roll. Then put into cup with ice. Add cherries and lemons.

cocktail.name: Camel Hump
cocktail.instructions: Pour Butterscotch Schnapps in a shot glass 3/4 of the way full. Fill rest of drink with Bailey's Irish Cream.

cocktail.name: The Drink
cocktail.instructions: Rinse glass with Sherry, discard Sherry. Shake gin over ice in separate glass to chill. Fill rinsed glass with ice, pour chilled gin over ice. Garnish with lemon twist (optional).

cocktail.name: Pablo's shot
cocktail.instructions: First, pour the scotch in a shot glass, then pour the kirsch and amaretto. Add the Dubonnet rouge very carefully trying not to mix the ingredients. Finally pour the mint. Do not mix. Drink in one shot.

cocktail.name: Midnight Mint
cocktail.instructions: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Creole Scream
cocktail.instructions: Mix the rum, grenadine, vermouth and angostura. Shake with ice. Add the olive.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Martini #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, then strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Gimlet #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass to 2/3 with ice cubes. Shake the gin and lime and pour into the glass.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice and strain in tall shot glass.

cocktail.name: Hot Nuts
cocktail.instructions: 1 ounce of brandy mixed with a small cup of hot coffee then add a few drops of tobasco sause

cocktail.name: Tiatip
cocktail.instructions: Chill Tia Maria and Baileys Irish cream 20 degrees In shot glass fill half way with Tia Maria then very carefully add Bailey Irish cream on top. Do not allow them to mix. Keep them seperated. There's your shot. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Grandmom's slipper
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2cl of Bailey's right in. Then pour the salmiac vodka in BUT don't let them mix into gray: there should be creamish white and also deep black visible in the drink, slightly mixed.

cocktail.name: Coco Rush
cocktail.instructions: Add OJ, Cranberry juice, and Malibu into a mixing glass and pour into the highball glass.

cocktail.name: Talos Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

cocktail.name: Harlem Mugger
cocktail.instructions: build over ice in order

cocktail.name: Ganggreen
cocktail.instructions: Take the Highball glass or anything that will hold 12 oz. of soda and pour the soda in the glass. Next take one shot of the Capt. Morgan and add it to the Dew. And finally add one shot of the Johnnie Walker red label to the mix. Stir it and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Goombay Smash
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in highball with ice and shake. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

cocktail.name: Ecto Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large (1/2 gallon) pitcher. Shake and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Hurricane Leah
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice into hurricane or parfait glass, stir. Garnish with orange peel.

cocktail.name: Boat drink
cocktail.instructions: To a glass of ice add Captain Morgan's spiced rum. Add a splash of tonic water. Rim glass with lime. Drink. Repeat.

cocktail.name: Flower of nippon
cocktail.instructions: Blend with ice and strained in to the cocktail glass and garnish whith a slice of lime and red cherry.

cocktail.name: Tequila Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila into shot glass. Next pour in Mountain Dew. Hold your hand over the top of the glass and slam it down. The shot will change color. Take the shot.

cocktail.name: Ankle Breaker
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Flaming Gorilla
cocktail.instructions: pour into shot glass, layering ingredients, from top to bottom light on fire and extinguish after 15 seconds.

cocktail.name: Buttafuoco
cocktail.instructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients except club soda and cherry with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice cubes and fill with club soda. Stir, then add cherry.

cocktail.name: Butternut Rum Lifesaver
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients Chill over ice Strain into shot glass

cocktail.name: Lutetd
cocktail.instructions: Mix Tequila and Tabasco together, then put it in the shot glass. Now put 1 cl of rum ontop.

cocktail.name: Zinger
cocktail.instructions: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.

cocktail.name: Malibu Milk Shake
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in a blender, blend till smooth, should create a small frothy head. Pour into to any glass handy, and enjoy your milkshake!

cocktail.name: Demon Drop
cocktail.instructions: Add the Everclear first and then the OJ so the OJ settles on the top. Then shoot it. Repeat.

cocktail.name: Tornado
cocktail.instructions: mix everything except cola, sugar and ice in glass. then stir in sugar. then add ice cubes. finally, pour in cola. stir three times. drink.

cocktail.name: Slow Painful Movement
cocktail.instructions: Shake the gin and the schnapps together in ice. Pour into glass Dribble the chocalte syrup in a circle on the bottom of the glass. (do not mix)

cocktail.name: Memachau
cocktail.instructions: Pour lager into beer mug or pint glass: add Kahlua. Stir.

cocktail.name: The G.O.A.T.
cocktail.instructions: Put all this together in a cup and pour into shot glasses, this obviously makes three shots. The Shots are ratios, the more the better.

cocktail.name: Leaving Las Vegas
cocktail.instructions: Layer and stir, garnish with lemon

cocktail.name: Karlsson
cocktail.instructions: Shake Well and pour into glass enjoy

cocktail.name: Cherry Bomb, Traditional
cocktail.instructions: Place all 6 8oz jars of cherries (drained), mixed with EVERCLEAR into sealable cannister for approx. 2 and half months, serve by the shot. To drown out flavor of everclear, put one cherry in shot glass, and fill with sprite or 7up. Take cherry and soda into mouth at same time, chew cherry, and swallow all together. Enjoy!!

cocktail.name: Sweet Death
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice then pour ingrediants in order then stir.

cocktail.name: Lasseman's Partysaver
cocktail.instructions: Mix the black coffee with the Ouzo(until you can't feel the ouzo taste anymore) and put a little blob of whipped cream on top - Drink and enjoy...

cocktail.name: Fruitopia
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients, Shake with Ice and serve with a straw. Garnish if desired with an Orange Slice.

cocktail.name: Mad Scientist
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass less than 1/2 full with blueberry schnapps, add same amount of raspberry schnapps. Slowly top off with grenadine. Dribble a small amount of Bailey's on top..

cocktail.name: Fairytale
cocktail.instructions: Just pour the vodka and the chocolate syrup together in a glass. Shake well. Then add the mixture of crushed ice and strawberries and voila'.

cocktail.name: Liquid Crack
cocktail.instructions: Pour one-third of Rumple Minze, Jgermeister, and Goldschlager into a shot glass

cocktail.name: Southern Joe
cocktail.instructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass. Consume Repeatedly

cocktail.name: Springtime
cocktail.instructions: Poor ingredients over lots of ice.Garnish with slice of lime.

cocktail.name: Hillbilly Bob's Mountaindrink
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients except coke.Poor over ice and top with coke for an extra creamy head. Serve with a straw on a sunny day.

cocktail.name: Pine Needle
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add the ingredients in the order listed.

cocktail.name: Photon Torpedo
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Aftershock with vodka, in no particular order.

cocktail.name: Submarine (conventional)
cocktail.instructions: Start with the gin, then fill up with the tonic water. And last, add the ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Submarine (nuclear)
cocktail.instructions: Start with the gin, then fill up the glas with tonic water. And last, add the ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Monkey Brain #2
cocktail.instructions: pour apfelkorn in shotglas. slowly pour drops of baileys in center of shot finally add a few drops of grenadine.

cocktail.name: Multiple Orgasm #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and top with a cherry. It tastes like a chocolate shake, but with a kick!

cocktail.name: Caesar
cocktail.instructions: Line rim of glass with salt & pepper. Over ice add vodka, fill with Clamato Juice then add remaining ingredients. Garnish with celery stick.

cocktail.name: R.B. Winter
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 oz. of Southern Comfort, 1 oz. of Amaretto, fill with Apple juice, do a short shake. While pouring the drink back in the glass add a splash of lime juice.

cocktail.name: Blue Balls
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients. Chill with ice and strain into a shooter glass!

cocktail.name: Acid Cookie
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquor togther. Add Cream. Shake Well. Strain & Serve

cocktail.name: Black Jack WV
cocktail.instructions: Mix all of the ingriedients together over ice,shake til very chilled and strain into two glasses.

cocktail.name: Fruit Loop
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour curacao over ice then fill with milk.

cocktail.name: B-54
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice

cocktail.name: Peach Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Layer in shot glass Yukon Jack, Jack Daniels and PeachTree Schnapps last

cocktail.name: Pure Pleasure
cocktail.instructions: Shake all the ingridiens whith lots of ice. Stir in a Hurricane glas.

cocktail.name: Jello shots
cocktail.instructions: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...

cocktail.name: Jetstream
cocktail.instructions: Shake the spirits with crushed ice in a shaker and pour in the cocktail glass. Fill with soda.

ingredient.name: Sprite or other lemon flavored softdrink

cocktail.name: The Real Cuba Libre
cocktail.instructions: sit outside on balcony, fill glass with crushed ice, sqeeze lime, hold glass up to the sky (best effect during sunset), pour rum up to horizon , add some coke to cover the sky (no overflow), stir smoothly, lean back & ENJOY! Maximum effect with bass heavy dub reggae in the background

cocktail.name: Purple Heart
cocktail.instructions: Pour both shots into same glass, add ice if want chilled, stir, and drink.

cocktail.name: Cran-Ram
cocktail.instructions: Combine Rum and Cranberry juice first. Add splash of Sunny D. May drink with crushed ice, if prefered.

cocktail.name: In and Out Martini
cocktail.instructions: Pack Cocktail glass with ice, add a splash of dry vermouth. While glass chills, add gin in a mixer glass with ice. Throw away ice/vermouth in cocktail glass then strain in Gin.

cocktail.name: Killer Kool-Aid (Rhode Island)
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal parts into a mug/glass. Add the alcohol first, then add the cranberry juice last. This drink may be mixed/stirred, but it isn't required.

cocktail.name: Purple Haze Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Cherry Bon Bon
cocktail.instructions: Layer 3/4 oz. of Godet on top of 3/4 oz. of Creme de Noyaux. Serve in a cordial or shot glass

cocktail.name: Ken and Kirsten's top shelf Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and add ice. Shake well pouring ingredients into a second glass. At this point coat the rim of the first glass with salt. Repour your drink into the salted glass. Add fresh squeezed lime, kick back and enjoy!

ingredient.name: Salt to coat the rim of the glass

cocktail.name: Nystedt
cocktail.instructions: Shake the orange juice and the grape tonic with lots of ice in a shaker. Pour it in a glass and add the 7-Up and the Vodka. Last, add some lemon and decorate with one slice of orange and one slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Rum Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

cocktail.name: Pensacola Bushwacker
cocktail.instructions: Throw all the ingredients in a blender. Then blend till mixed. Ice-cream suggested for more milk shake like drink.

cocktail.name: Southern Smile
cocktail.instructions: Fill jigger with ice. add all ingredients. Cover, shake and pour into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: The Hot Churchill
cocktail.instructions: Let Crushed Ginger sit in the 1 1/2 oz of rum for as long as possible -- overnight if you can. Add honey to glass. Top with hot water.

cocktail.name: Hot Dick
cocktail.instructions: Poyr Bailey's and Grand Marnier into mug. Add espress. Serve it hot with lots of cream and sprinkle with chocolate.

cocktail.name: Red Orange
cocktail.instructions: Shake in jigger with ice and pour into martini glasses

cocktail.name: Green Dinosaur #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients and mix well. Add ice and drink up.

cocktail.name: Electric Watermellon
cocktail.instructions: Add equal Parts Vodka, Rum, and Melon in a tall cocktail glass with ice. Add a couple of splashes of triple sec (orange Liquor). Fill to the top with sweet and sour. Add a splash of 7 up and grenadine.

cocktail.name: K-V-S Kaboom
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into a large punch bowl or ice chest. Slice fruit and add into mixture. More Cranberry juice may be added if you are a bunch of light-weights. Stir vigorously with a paddle.

cocktail.name: Liquid Jello
cocktail.instructions: Mix kool-aid according to instructions. Fill glass with ice. Pour in citrus vodka. Add kool-aid until glass is full.

cocktail.name: Exotica
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into the shaker. Shake hard and serve in cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Honolulu Action
cocktail.instructions: Layer ingredients in the above order, top with whipped cream, top with a sprinkle of Li Hing Powder.

cocktail.name: Blood Clot #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour Cointreau into glass. Using a spoon, drop the Cherry Advocaat in so it sits on the bottom of the glass. Making sure you have a straw handy, throw the shot back, place the glass on the nearest table and quickly cover the opening of the glass with your hand. Stick the straw between the fingers covering the glass and suck!

cocktail.name: Original Sin
cocktail.instructions: Add crushed ice to snifter or gobblet. Add Triple Sec, Brandy, Cherry Heering, Grenadine and Sour Mix. Stir contents. Add sliced fruit. Top off glass with Champagne.

cocktail.name: Turkeyball
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Shot-o-Happiness
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Add a splash of 7-up.

cocktail.name: Exploding Cherry
cocktail.instructions: pour it all into an ice-cream pail and add more vodka if you wish.

cocktail.name: Mint Russki
cocktail.instructions: Add crushed or twisted leaves of mint, ice cubes, then frozen vodka. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Beeraquirilla
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a blender in this order: ice - beer - tequila - rum - daquari mix - magarita mix. Blend until frothy, then pour.

cocktail.name: Nutty Irishman (without milk)
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Frangelico first over a glass with ice. Then, pour the Bailey's over the top, but do not stir the drink.

cocktail.name: Creamy Tan
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and all the ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Then serve in a large glass.

cocktail.name: Raging Indian
cocktail.instructions: Mix a lot and mix in shaker. Pour shot.

cocktail.name: Lady-Killer
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in shaker, strain into a Champagne flute or Longdrink glas over some cubes of ice. Decorate with mint and cherry

cocktail.name: Absolutely Cranberry Smash
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients together. Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Kiss me Quick
cocktail.instructions: mix in the glass

cocktail.name: Ersh (Russian)
cocktail.instructions: No special instruction. Just put some Vodka over Beer.

cocktail.name: Malaria Killer
cocktail.instructions: Pour Campari in the glass. Add Indian Tonic Water. Stir with a spoon. Add ice if you want & a slice of Orange.

cocktail.name: Canadian Hunter
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in shot glass and "discharge" into mouth!

cocktail.name: Dew-Driver #2
cocktail.instructions: The first thing to do is add the ice. 4 large cubes work well. Then add the vodka. A good way to measure is to fill it almost to the top of the ice cubes. Add the OJ until it is almost to the top of the glass and then add a little mountain dew. The more dew you add, the less vodka taste you have. (The oj also does a nice job of killing the vodka taste) . Then enjoy.

cocktail.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #1
cocktail.instructions: stir or shake ingredients & serve with ice

cocktail.name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass starting with tequila, followed by J.D. and finally Southern. Shoot it.

cocktail.name: Red Beard
cocktail.instructions: Mix on ice and serve.

cocktail.name: Berlin martini
cocktail.instructions: Take a shaker filled with ice. Add 2 oz smirnoff vodka, 3 dashes of schnapps, a wee splash of black zambuca and shake well, keeping your feet firmly planted, posture perfect. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry.

cocktail.name: Georgia Tea
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with large ice cubes. Mix alcoholic ingredients in the glass. Fill the rest of the glass with Dole pineapple-orange juice and stir.

cocktail.name: Yellow Birdie
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana, then top it up with Sprite & stir.

cocktail.name: Nazi Taco
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients together and pour into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Ru's Snap Shot
cocktail.instructions: Put Pop Rocks Candy in bottom of shot glass. Add Cinnamon Schnapps. Stir, and shoot immediately.

cocktail.name: Captain's Cream Soda
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Captain Morgan over plenty of ice in a highball glass. Top with the seven-up, stir and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Fuquay Friday Night
cocktail.instructions: Absolute can be varied to taste and alcohol tollerance. Discretion is advised. Also a dash of lime can be added for a slightly different taste.

cocktail.name: Grape Nehi
cocktail.instructions: Crush Ice with lemon (or orange) and alcohols in a large glass. Use a strainer and pour into a cocktail glass. Optional: add lemon wedge or salt to glass.

cocktail.name: Brass Balls
cocktail.instructions: Mix the three, and chill'em. Then pour and serve.

cocktail.name: Seaside-Summerbliss
cocktail.instructions: Red wine first, then the cider.

cocktail.name: Shlagerfloat
cocktail.instructions: Put two scoops of vanilla ice-cream in your cup. Pour in a shot of Goldschlager then fill the glass with root beer. Mix with a spoon and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Cookie Tosser
cocktail.instructions: Just throw it all together

cocktail.name: Blood of Satan
cocktail.instructions: Layer all 4 ingredients in shot glass. In this order Jgermeister, Goldschlager, Jameson's and Jack Daniels.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Me Crazy
cocktail.instructions: Stir in a mixing glass.

cocktail.name: Yucca
cocktail.instructions: Put the Vodka and the sugar into a container. Slice 10 lemons and 10 limes and add them to the Vodka. Mix for 10 minutes or until the sugar has dissolved.

cocktail.name: Banana Colada #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine All Ingredents in a blender except for the ice and blend. Then add Ice until the drink begins to thicken then serve.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #4
cocktail.instructions: This can be on the rocks or up... but best on the rocks! Start with the Midori since it is heaviest, then the Chambord and the Absolut. Fill the glass 2/3 full with Cranberry juice, and then a splash of grapefruit for color. It should be an orangish-red color. Garnish with several cherries.

cocktail.name: BlackJack Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add with Tequila, Triple Sec, and Chambord. Then add the Lime juice or sour mix. Shake. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

cocktail.name: Banana Colada #1
cocktail.instructions: Blend 4 first ingredients with 1/2 cut cracked ice at high speed in 15-25 seconds. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with cherry and pineapple slice.

cocktail.name: Opera House Special
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into a metal mixer and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Royal Flush
cocktail.instructions: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

cocktail.name: The Drink of Champions
cocktail.instructions: Pour Crown Royal into beer mug (or whatever type of glass that is available). Fill with chilled Dr. Pepper or add ice cubes before pouring. Stir gently with fork, spoon, knife, toothbrush or whatever is handy or forget to stir and wait for surprise at bottom.

cocktail.name: Limona Corona
cocktail.instructions: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

cocktail.name: Screaming Dead Nazi
cocktail.instructions: Pour all in shot glass, one by one. Set aflame, blow it out, and enjoy.....

cocktail.name: Pink Pysch
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice.

cocktail.name: Pysch Vitamin Light
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice.

cocktail.name: Good Morning To You My Love
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in mixer with ice. Serve in a small bowl garnished with strawberries or grapes and a straw.

cocktail.name: IAS-Special
cocktail.instructions: mix aquavit and banana liqueur insert dash with lime fill up with 7-up Served with ice cubes strawberry

cocktail.name: Puerto Rican Punch
cocktail.instructions: straight mix into glass.

cocktail.name: Kongepjolter
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Cognac in the mug, then mix the Champagne in.

cocktail.name: Olsen Driver
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice.

cocktail.name: Dream
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into highball glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Apello
cocktail.instructions: Stirr. Grnish with maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Belle Melon
cocktail.instructions: Shake and pour into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: By The Pool
cocktail.instructions: Shake briskley for 10 seconds and serve in a tall glass over ice.

cocktail.name: Alamo Splash
cocktail.instructions: Mix with cracked ice and strain into collins glass.

cocktail.name: Cactus Berry
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and pour into large salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass.

cocktail.name: Hairy Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in blender except grenadine. Pour into collins glass and float grenadine on top. Garnish with a lime slice.

cocktail.name: Hot Pants
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice cubes and pour into old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

cocktail.name: La Bomba
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients except grenadine with ice 3 times ONLY. Pour into sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add grenadine and garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktail.name: Mexicana
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Mexican Madras
cocktail.instructions: Pour juices and tequila into shaker 1/2 filled with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktail.name: Pacific Sunshine
cocktail.instructions: Mix with cracked ice and pour, with ice, into chilled parfait or hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktail.name: Purple Gecko
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and pour into salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Purple Pancho
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and pour into salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktail.name: Rosita
cocktail.instructions: Stir in old-fashioned glass with cracked ice. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve with short straws.

cocktail.name: Tequila Canyon
cocktail.instructions: Pour first 3 ingredients over ice into collins glass and stir gently. Top with pineapple and orange juices. Garnish with a lime wheel. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Tequila Collins
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with club soda and stir. Decorate with slices of lemon and orange, and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Tequila Mockingbird
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Tequila Pink
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Tequila (Straight)
cocktail.instructions: Put salt between thumb and index finger on back of left hand. Hold shot glass of tequila in salted hand and lemon wedge in the other. Lick salt, slam the tequila, then suck lemon.

cocktail.name: Tequonic
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila over ice cubes into old-fashioned glass. Add fruit juice, fill with tonic water, and stir.

cocktail.name: Toreador
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Top with a little whipped cream and sprinkle lightly with cocoa.

cocktail.name: Skinny Dip
cocktail.instructions: In a Blender Throw in: 8 scoops of sherbet, 1 can of Fresca and 2 shots of Vodka :o) Yummie Blend till desired thickness

cocktail.name: Ocean Drive
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquour first over ice. Add juices cranberry last down side of glass.

cocktail.name: Knacky
cocktail.instructions: Fill the liquor in the glass. Then fill the juice and the ice tea.

cocktail.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice in a tumbler. Strain and pour.

cocktail.name: Think Pink
cocktail.instructions: Put incrediments in cold glass. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Finnish Passion
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients,pour in longdrink glass. Garnish with a boat of orange and red cherry.

cocktail.name: LimLer
cocktail.instructions: Squeeze the 8 parts of the lime and the brown sugarwith a wooden muddler, fill up with Apple Juiceand crushed Ice.

cocktail.name: Lambada
cocktail.instructions: Shake all indrigiens in a shaker on ice in poorthem on crushed ice in a fancy glass.

cocktail.name: Alexander (Original)
cocktail.instructions: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Cocktail Glass.

cocktail.name: Panama Deluxe
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients together, serve in a tumbler over ice.

cocktail.name: Goombay Smash #2
cocktail.instructions: fill tall glass with ice, add all ingredients and shake well.

cocktail.name: Buttery Nipple #1
cocktail.instructions: The Butterscotch Schnapps makes up the bottom layer. The top layer of Baileys should be added using a spoon. This is a layered shot. Delicious!!

cocktail.name: Lethal Weapon
cocktail.instructions: Combine all into a tall glass and serve with ice. As an option, use two cans of Mountain Dew if the drink seems too strong for you.

cocktail.name: Nazi Surfer
cocktail.instructions: Chill, shake, and strain.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Put all in blender and wizz away until thick.

cocktail.name: Texas Rattlesnake
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...

cocktail.name: Caribbean Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shaker, top with grated nutmeg.

cocktail.name: After sex
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar

cocktail.name: San Francisco
cocktail.instructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

cocktail.name: Rum Rickey
cocktail.instructions: 1. Fill mixing glass with ice 2. Add light rum and lime juice and sugar syrup 3. Shake 4. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice 5. Fill with club soda. 6. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

cocktail.name: Far West
cocktail.instructions: Put in a Shaker with ice, shake well, pour out in cocktail glasses and add some cinnamon powder over it.

cocktail.name: Olympia-Flip
cocktail.instructions: Put ingredients in shaker with ice, shake very well, pour out in a cocktail glass and put some fine cracked almonds over it as a decoration.

cocktail.name: Pic-Walsh
cocktail.instructions: Swirl all ingredients in a blender.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Shake
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled glass garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

cocktail.name: Crickets
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Add enough ice-cream to make the drink thick like a malt. Serves two.

cocktail.name: Rain Man
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients together, then pour into a hurricane glass filled with ice.

cocktail.name: A Day at the Beach
cocktail.instructions: Shake Rum, Amaretto, and Orange Juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain over ice into a highball glass. Add Grenadine and garnish with a Pineapple Wedge and a Strawberry.

cocktail.name: Smooth Dog
cocktail.instructions: Mix and drink

cocktail.name: Gentle Ben
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in a high glass, add some ice and a straw. Enjoy it !

cocktail.name: Flaming Lamborgini
cocktail.instructions: In a cocktail glass, mix Kalhua, Amaretto, and Vodka. Float the Chartreusse. In a liqueur glass, put the Blue Curaco and float the Milk. Light the cocktail glass and drink quickly through a straw. When it's almost gone, pour the Blue Curaco and milk into the Cocktail glass and suck until all gone.

cocktail.name: Tiffany Marshall
cocktail.instructions: Mix as punch. Add orange or lemon slices, or olives.

cocktail.name: Mexican Mudslide
cocktail.instructions: Mix kalhua, amaretto, and ice-cream. Swirl chocolate in the glass and add whip cream on top.

cocktail.name: Down Home Punch #1
cocktail.instructions: Mix in pitcher with ice, Pour into glass with ice, And enjoy.

cocktail.name: The Big Banana!
cocktail.instructions: Over Ice in a 20oz Glass Pour booze in first and top with Pineapple, giving it a two layered look with the brown amaretto on bottom,. Two straws, Two cherries.

cocktail.name: Banana Cream Pie
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a shaker with ice then strain.

cocktail.name: Polar Bear, Swedish
cocktail.instructions: Mix Absolut Vodka and Blue Curaco, fill it up with Sprite. Use lots of icecubes.

cocktail.name: Sex On The Beach #5
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka over crushed ice, add cranberry juice, midori, chambord, and top off with pinapple, stir gently and serve.

cocktail.name: Malibu Twister
cocktail.instructions: Add rum & trister then, add cranberry jucie,stir

cocktail.name: Space Odyssey
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

cocktail.name: Gibson
cocktail.instructions: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onions and serve.

cocktail.name: Down Home Punch #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients. Serve with ice.

cocktail.name: Urine Sample #2
cocktail.instructions: strain over ice. serve in shot glass

cocktail.name: Tokyo Ice Tea
cocktail.instructions: Mix the alcohol. Add 1 oz sugarsyrup, ice, 7 up and some pieces of lemon. Stir.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #7
cocktail.instructions: Add all together and stir heavily. You will then serve cold.

cocktail.name: Sperm
cocktail.instructions: Fill the slammer glass with tequila and vodka and drop carefully some cream in it.

cocktail.name: Pink Poontang
cocktail.instructions: This drink is a shooter, so shake all ingredients with ice (in a mixing tin). Strain into a shooter glass.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Shooter. Shake ingredients with ice (in a mixing tin). Strain into a shooter glass.

cocktail.name: Klondyke
cocktail.instructions: In a shot-glass pour Jgermeister then Bailey's, do not blend. Drink it all at once.

cocktail.name: Tropical Lifesaver #1
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Then add the Malibu and Midori. Then fill the remainder of the glass up with Pineapple Juice. Shake and enjoy!!

cocktail.name: Scooby Snack #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. rocks glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Scooby Snack #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. rocks glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Watermelon shooter #1
cocktail.instructions: Mixing glass 1/4 filled with ice. Mix all four ingredients then strain into rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Zenmeister
cocktail.instructions: Mix together and enjoy

cocktail.name: Barrier Reef
cocktail.instructions: Blend.

cocktail.name: Banana Boat
cocktail.instructions: In a 12 Oz glass, place banana and ice. Combine the other ingredients in another glass and pour over the ice. Add the pineapple slice and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Monkey Brain #1
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shot glass with Apfelkorn almost to the rim. Then, very carefully pour a little Bailey's into the glass. The two liquors don't mix at if poured correctly, and the Bailey's will sink to the bottom as a nasty looking blob, not unlike a brain.

cocktail.name: Glacier Mint
cocktail.instructions: Stir the ingredients together and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with mintleaves.

cocktail.name: Exotic Finn
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Add the first three ingredients and stir. Top up with Sprite and garnish with mint leaves, a strawberry, a twist of orange and a straw. Ole Skeiedal, from Norway, took first place in the long drinks listing of the 1993 Finlandia Vodka International Drinks Competition.

cocktail.name: Avalon
cocktail.instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.

cocktail.name: B-57
cocktail.instructions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass in this order.

cocktail.name: Electric Jello
cocktail.instructions: Made in large quantities usually. Mixing varies depending on personal preference. Mix Jell-O as you normally would. Replace 26oz of water with 26oz of vodka (strong). Pour mixed Jell-O and Vodka into glasses or small cups for serving. Let set in freezer (vodka requires colder temperature to set). Serve after it has set with a spoon.

cocktail.name: Dark'n Dirty
cocktail.instructions: Mix like ordinary drink and serve with ice.

cocktail.name: Schnider
cocktail.instructions: Pour schnapps in a pint glass, top up with cider. Drink and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Snowball #3
cocktail.instructions: mix together into a double shotglass

cocktail.name: White Out
cocktail.instructions: Crushed ice Build up.

cocktail.name: Nuts and Berries #3
cocktail.instructions: mix all the ingredients, and shake well.

cocktail.name: Green Dinosaur #3
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients in ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Wild Thing #2
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in blender, blend until slushy. Adjust amount of ice to achieve proper consistency. Rim of glass can be salted if desired.

cocktail.name: Gorilla Fart #2
cocktail.instructions: Just add the 2 ingredients, and shoot it.
Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick

cocktail.name: Klingon Disrupter
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three ingredients together. (Real Klingons drink it warm!) Shoot it!

cocktail.name: Fuzzy F**ker
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingrediants in a highball glass. Serve overice. Enjoy!

ingredient.name: Sunny delight (or other orange blend juice)

cocktail.name: Irish Comfort
cocktail.instructions: combine Southern Comfort and Blue Curacao in a high ballglass over ice. Add enough orange juice to fill the glass. The orange juice and blue Curcao will combine to form a lovely green shade!

cocktail.name: Captain Creamsicle
cocktail.instructions: Add Captain Morgan's to blender. Add equal parts vanilla ice-cream and orange sherbert to taste (O.J. can be substitued for sherbert).

cocktail.name: Welcome delight
cocktail.instructions: Simple: Just put them into a bowl, and mix then together.

cocktail.name: 3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Blue Nut
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a shaker with ice and shake and strain

cocktail.name: Velvet Crush
cocktail.instructions: Add gin to a glass with ice. Add Kool Aid (any flavor, although I get the impression that purples and reds are often used).

cocktail.name: Jack Sprite
cocktail.instructions: Pour the 1 shot of Jack Daniels into glass followed by Sprite to taste and then 1 slice of lemon. Then stir the beverage and enjoy. Note this is a light drink, a good one to start the evening off.

cocktail.name: RumRunner's Easy Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Whisk all ingredients in pitcher. Serve over ice. If frozen Margarita required, substitute ice for water and blend.

cocktail.name: RumRunner's RubyRed
cocktail.instructions: Fill large glass with ice Add Vodka and Ruby Red juice Top with Tonic Pour from one glass to another to mix

cocktail.name: Bambus
cocktail.instructions: Pour the ingredients into a glass.

cocktail.name: Vulcan Mind-Probe
cocktail.instructions: Mix and sereve straight up.

cocktail.name: Suicide #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with lots of ice. Then fill a large (35cl) glass with ice cubes. Strain into glass.

cocktail.name: French Afternoon
cocktail.instructions: Served on ice in "rocks-glass" May be served with a little whipped creem on top!

cocktail.name: Aggravation
cocktail.instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice, then add Scotch and kahlua. Float cream on top and stir.

cocktail.name: Banshee
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients with crushed ice in a mixing glass, then shake & strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Ramos Fizz #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with cracked ice and add gin, cream, lemon juice, egg white, sugar and orange juice. Shake and strain into a chilled Collins glass, then add Club soda.

cocktail.name: Zorro
cocktail.instructions: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.

cocktail.name: Orange Crush
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

cocktail.name: Purple Haze #1
cocktail.instructions: Fill 12 oz glass with ice. Add alcohol and sour. Top off with 7 up.

cocktail.name: Cumulus #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake intensily with ice. Serve in frosted glass, and sprinkle with powdered coffee or nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Stinger Shot
cocktail.instructions: Tabasco in the bottom of the shot. Pour Vodka and Crme de Mnthe gently on top. Shoot!

cocktail.name: Cinnamon Road
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Serve with a slice of dried apple.

cocktail.name: Apricot adventure
cocktail.instructions: Crush part of the mint together with the sugar and some Zwack. Shake the rest of the Zwack with the Lime Juice and ice and pour into the glass. Fill up with club soda and decorate with the remaining mint and perhaps some lime.

cocktail.name: Snakebite #2
cocktail.instructions: Very carefully layer the vodka on top of the green Chartreuse. Drop in the Tabasco, which should sink to the bottom. Slam it.

cocktail.name: Green Dinosaur #4
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients and shake!

cocktail.name: 155 Belmont
cocktail.instructions: Blend with ice. Serve in a wine glass. Garnish with carrot.

cocktail.name: Hashi Bashi
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and campari over a couple of icecubes. Fill up with russian!

cocktail.name: Liquid After-Eight
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Creme de menthe in a Highball glass Fill the glass with the cold chocolate-milk.

cocktail.name: Arizona Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Add ice into a tall-stemed cocktail glass, pour grenadine over ice, add enough that some settles on the bottom of the glass Add tequila, orange juice, and lime juice into shaker with ice. Shake thourghly. Garnish with a straw, lime wedge OR orange and cherry.

cocktail.name: Arizona Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Add ice to tall-stemed cocktail glass. slowly pour cream de noyaux over ice until some settels on the bottom. add tequila, triple sec, lime juice, & orange juice into shaker with ice, shake thourghly. pour over ice. Garnish with straw, and lime slice or orange & cherry

cocktail.name: Crimson Tide
cocktail.instructions: combine all ingrediants, chill over ice, strain.

cocktail.name: Cyberlady
cocktail.instructions: Shake well and pour in a cocktail glass, frosted with strawberry.

cocktail.name: Net surfer
cocktail.instructions: shake well and pour in a cocktail glass frosted with strawberry.

cocktail.name: Sex On The Beach #6
cocktail.instructions: Highball glass 1/2 full ice. Add vodka and schapps. Fill to near top with OJ, amount depends on ice and glass size. Add cream last and stir. May be served up after mixing. The amount of OJ and dairy cream may be adjusted taste.

cocktail.name: King Willy
cocktail.instructions: Pour the melon liqueur and the Curacao on two cubes of ice in a highball glass. Fill up with 7 up or Sprite and pour the Grenadine in a way that will look like its shaping a stripe down the drink.

cocktail.name: Olle Goop
cocktail.instructions: Just mix in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Polar Bear #2
cocktail.instructions: Just blend with ice in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Hell Mary
cocktail.instructions: Fill with V-8 and shake vigorously. Add black pepper to taste and garnish with celery and lemon wedge. Serve in Collins glass filled with ice.

cocktail.name: Lemon Shooters
cocktail.instructions: Cover lemon slice with sugar. Shoot, then suck (on the lemon)!

cocktail.name: En snn en
cocktail.instructions: Fill longdrinks glas with ice-cubes, add vodka and sour-mix. Top with Coca-Cola, stir.

cocktail.name: Dr. Pepper #4
cocktail.instructions: Pour beer into beer stein, add coke. In a shot glass mix the three other ingredients. Pour contents of shot glass into beer stein and chug it all down. Tastes just like a Dr. Pepper.

cocktail.name: Polar Bear #3
cocktail.instructions: Mix drinks over ice before serving in a shot glass. Tastes like a peppermint patty!

ingredient.name: Peppermint schnapps or creme de menthe

cocktail.name: Dark and Stormy
cocktail.instructions: You can substitute any dark or spiced rum . Pour rum over ice, add ginger ale, stir.

cocktail.name: Poison Apple
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Karma Chameleon
cocktail.instructions: Mix well. Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Dr. Pepper #3
cocktail.instructions: fill shot glass with amaretto and gin. Drop shot glass into half glass of beer. Then, slam. It tastes just like Dr. Pepper (the soda)!!!!

cocktail.name: Watermelon Shooter #2
cocktail.instructions: Stir in an ice-filled mixing glass and strain into rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Knockout Punch
cocktail.instructions: pour all three together, mix well

cocktail.name: 1-900-FUK-MEUP
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a rocks glass.

cocktail.name: The Race
cocktail.instructions: Pour in a shaker and shake well, then serve in a cocktail glass frosted with tangerine.

cocktail.name: P.S. I Love you
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Baileys, Grand Marnier, and single cream together with some ice in a shaker. Shake thoroughly, and pour into a cocktail glass. Pour a splash (about 1/3 shot) through the mixture to the bottmo of the glass. Shake nutmeg over the top of the cocktail, and Bob's your Uncle.

cocktail.name: Penguino
cocktail.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice, add one shot light rum and one shot Cointreau or triple sec. Fill with tonic. Serve ungarnished, or with cherry.

cocktail.name: Vodka Russian
cocktail.instructions: Mix it as a ordinary drink .

cocktail.name: Malibu and Soda
cocktail.instructions: Mix above ingredients in cup with ice.

cocktail.name: Danbooka
cocktail.instructions: pour it in and mix it.

cocktail.name: Summer Tea
cocktail.instructions: Make the tea and add all the stuff. Mix and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Southern Blues #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix Schnapps and Southern Comfort together, chill, and serve cold. Tastes like Kool Aid.

cocktail.name: Tropical Life Saver #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix together, Tall glass...

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #8
cocktail.instructions: Coco-Rum can be substituted for Malibu Rum.

cocktail.name: Buttery Nipple #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour schnapps into shot glass. Carefully add Baily's to surface. Don not mix.

cocktail.name: Grainslide
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: 110 in the shade
cocktail.instructions: Drop shooter in glass. Fill with beer

cocktail.name: Suicide #2
cocktail.instructions: Just mix all ingredients together.

cocktail.name: Grand Blue
cocktail.instructions: Serve in an old fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Jelly Bean #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in the above order into highball glass. Tilt glass until mixture is close to top of glass and light. Wait a few seconds, then right before shooting it, blow it out so you don't burn your face off!

cocktail.name: Solaris
cocktail.instructions: Measure the parts so the glass is 2/3 full. The sugar teaspoonfull should be skimmed and stirred a little. .

cocktail.name: Pepito Lolito
cocktail.instructions: Add gin and Curaco, more gin than curaco. Mix the soda, which should have orange flavour (eg. Fanta or something like that) and the tonic, 1/2 of each.
