Fill up until the bitter gin taste is gone, and the drink is all green. Be sure that all the ingredients are very cold, and add ice. To make it perfect, a slice of lemon is to be slid around the edge of the glass, and then put in the drink.

cocktail.name: Green delight
cocktail.instructions: Just mix all the ingredients. It is also best served cold.

cocktail.name: Tom Collins ala Olsen
cocktail.instructions: Just mix the ingredients.

cocktail.name: Summertime
cocktail.instructions: Just mix the ingredients. It can also be served without alchohol. Just mix equal amounts of sprite light and orange juice.

cocktail.name: Cool Kid
cocktail.instructions: put the shit in a hurricane glass, mix it up, and suck it down

cocktail.name: Kretchma
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Soviet Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, except lemon peel, with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink and drop into glass.

cocktail.name: Cossack Charge
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: St. Petersburg
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and bitters into mixing glass with several ice cubes. Stir until very cold and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Score peel of orange wedge with tines of fork and drop into drink.

cocktail.name: Black Magic
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Siberian Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into highball glass.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Navel (original)
cocktail.instructions: Pour peach schnapps into ice filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice and stir to combine.

cocktail.name: Whop Me Down Sweet Jesus
cocktail.instructions: Best in large mason jar. Blue going down Blue coming up.

cocktail.name: Absolut Stress #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing tin and shake with ice. Pour into a collins glass. No garnish.

cocktail.name: Highball
cocktail.instructions: fill a medium glass most of the way with ice, pour in 1 shot, about 1.5 ounces of whiskey, fill the rest of the way with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Killing Light
cocktail.instructions: Highly dangerous mix-but taste it! You'll be surprised.

cocktail.name: The Tony Kelly
cocktail.instructions: Mix. Shoot.

cocktail.name: Big brothers
cocktail.instructions: Selfinstructing appetizer.

cocktail.name: Snowshoe
cocktail.instructions: Pour peppermint schnapps in shot glass, top with Wild Turkey, drink it up!

cocktail.name: Slider
cocktail.instructions: Add Rye, khalua and milk to a high ball glass, glass should be full off ice.Stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Slam Dunk
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a rock glass,filled with ice. Add 1.5oz of Southern Comfort. For the mix, add 1 can of cranberry juice with half a can of orange concentrate into a pitcher. Use this mix to top off the drink.

cocktail.name: New Orleans Salty Dog
cocktail.instructions: Coat the rim of a highball glass with salt. Mix Vodka and Grapefruit juice in another glass with ice and pour into glass with salted rim.

cocktail.name: Orgasm #2
cocktail.instructions: 1. Pour the two evenly into a 1-ounce shot glass.

cocktail.name: Love Potion
cocktail.instructions: chill all ingredients over ice, strain into chilled shot glass, serve, enjoy

cocktail.name: Freson
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Detroit Red Wing
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice.

cocktail.name: Berry Me In The Sand
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Black Army
cocktail.instructions: Pour gently, i'ts important to get 2 layers. Use a shot glass. You can use 2 cl of each, if 3 is to much for you.

cocktail.name: Southern Special
cocktail.instructions: Just mix it! Have a slice of lime on the top. Served with lots of ice...

cocktail.name: Ice Bear
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and Curacao. Pour in a high glass. Fill it up with soda.

cocktail.name: Gorilla
cocktail.instructions: none

cocktail.name: Copper Camel
cocktail.instructions: Add Bailey's to shot glass and and add Buterscotch on top.

cocktail.name: Dr. Daniel
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in ingredients. Gently swirl to mix. Drink.

cocktail.name: Doctor
cocktail.instructions: Mixit together and shake it not to hard. Pour it up in a ordinar cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Ugly
cocktail.instructions: fill beer glass 3/4 full of beer, slowly pour tomato juice down the side so it settles on the bottom. Shake salt in the palm of your hand. Throw salt into the glass and wait until the top foams up. Chug the drink and then scream UGLY!!

cocktail.name: Bullfrog (The Party Mix)
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the soda, and then add the Vodka. After mixing pour in the grain alcohol. Use a knife and cut the lemons and limes and squeeze the juice out of them. store bought lime and lemon juice can be substituted. Now you have a great party drink and should have a good night.

cocktail.name: God's Great Creation
cocktail.instructions: Pour Whiskey and Peach Schnapps over ice cubes in a High Ball Glass. Add frozen canned orange banana punch (no water). Add lemon juice and fill the rest with pepsi. Stir well and serve.

cocktail.name: Texas Sweat
cocktail.instructions: Mix all together and filter back and forth through ice to chill and mix. Not a sipping drink, shoot it.

cocktail.name: Baby Eskimo
cocktail.instructions: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

cocktail.name: Red Ox
cocktail.instructions: Fill a pint glass a quarter of the way with ice, then add the rums and juice. Fill the rest of the glass with the Sweet and Sour, almost to the top, then finish it off with the grenadine. Mix and serve.

ingredient.name: Sweet and sour mix (Mr. & Mrs. T)

cocktail.name: Tennesee Mud
cocktail.instructions: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

cocktail.name: Midori Chan
cocktail.instructions: Just pour it all into the blender and mix until desired consistency is achieved.

cocktail.name: Snow White
cocktail.instructions: Place Sprite/7up into glass. Pour Heineken to top off. Mixture can be varied. Good summertime drink.

cocktail.name: Swedish Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Pour the coffee in an ordinary coffee cup. Add the aquavit. Add sugar by taste. Stir and have a nice evening (morning)

cocktail.name: Duck's Ass
cocktail.instructions: mix in tumbler with ice strain in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Lombomba
cocktail.instructions: pour the ingredients into a norma drink glass with a few ice-cubes. stirr.

cocktail.name: Slippery Nipple #2
cocktail.instructions: pour sambuca into shot glass float Bailies on top enjoy

cocktail.name: The Betty Ford
cocktail.instructions: Add Grenadine (based on desired sweetness), followed by Absolut. Add ice and then Sprite (her preferred mixing).

cocktail.name: Dead Dog
cocktail.instructions: Add in the order given and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Lemonsquash a la vermouth
cocktail.instructions: Mix add shake all the ingredience except the soda water in a shaker with ice. Pour it into a collins glas, add up with sodawater. Add ice and a lemon slide.

cocktail.name: Casablanca #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake not too short with enough ice.

cocktail.name: Breathalizer
cocktail.instructions: just mix together

cocktail.name: Nuts and Berries #4
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients with ice and shake. Serve with ice strained out.

cocktail.name: Russian Qualude #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice, shake vigorously, Strain into martini style cocktail glass. Garnish with one filbert.

cocktail.name: Saint Paul
cocktail.instructions: Take a tall glass, put a few ice cubes on top of each other. Pour the Gin and the rum in the glass, Fill the glass with bitter lemon. Leave some of the ice over the surface, so that you can pour the angostura on top of it. It should leave a rather nice track of red down the ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Horny Toad
cocktail.instructions: Layer each part in glass first: Triple Sec second: Kahlua third: Cream

cocktail.name: Banana Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Put the ingredients in a shaker and shake them with ice. Pour the drink in a highball (without the ice!) and enjoy the fresh, creamy mix.

cocktail.name: Negroni
cocktail.instructions: Stir over ice and pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon zest.

cocktail.name: Snake Piss
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice (crushed or cubes). Add ingredients and stir ocassionally.

cocktail.name: Sweet Tart
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. old-fashioned glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Naked Twister
cocktail.instructions: Build into a Pint Glass and cheery garnish. It's a real lady killer in San Diego.

cocktail.name: DJ Shooters
cocktail.instructions: To Pitcher full of Ice, add Peach Schnapps, Rum, Vodka, Gin, and juices. Stir well. Serve.

cocktail.name: Red Square
cocktail.instructions: Mix it together.

cocktail.name: Mad Scientist #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix melon liqueur, sour, and soda with ice in shaker. Shake and strain into martini glass. Top with rum and ignite.

cocktail.name: Juniata Juice
cocktail.instructions: Add 1 shot rum to 12 oz beer, stir in 2 tbls lime juice concentrate.

cocktail.name: Big Stick
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice in an 11 oz. glass Looks and tastes like a big stick popsicle

cocktail.name: Adam Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with Bartons Vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

cocktail.name: Harley Davidson #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix it all togheter and stir it up.

cocktail.name: Brain Tumor #2
cocktail.instructions: Add Schnapps, Dribble Bailey's to give the look of a brain and add a few drops of grenadine to make that hemmorage look.

cocktail.name: C*m in a Hot Tub
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and rum carefully but not too carefully into a glass. They have different consistencies and you want them to mix just a little. Now let several drops of Bailey's fall into the liquor.

cocktail.name: Foggy Morning
cocktail.instructions: Serve on ice.

cocktail.name: Rainy Night
cocktail.instructions: Serve on ice.

cocktail.name: Dancing Dutchman
cocktail.instructions: Mix fruit juices together in one bowl, place in blender with ice cubes. When slushy mixture is complete, stir in alcohol and shake until completly mixed. Place mixture in punchbowl, and float cherries in the bowl if desired.

cocktail.name: Niagara Falls
cocktail.instructions: Build the sugar syrup, lemon juice, Mandarine Napoleon and Finlandia Vodka. Serve in a cocktail or champagne glass with a splash of ginger ale.

cocktail.name: William's Rainbow
cocktail.instructions: high ball glas fill it with ice. poor vodka over the ice, then fill up with sprite. poor slowly 1cl blue curacao, after that poor 1cl grenadine. Ready to serv. The guest will now stir it and the drink will turn purple.

cocktail.name: Red Witch
cocktail.instructions: Put Pernod in a pint glass. Fill almost to the top with cider and add the blackcurrant. After that, it's up to you.

cocktail.name: Lee's Drink
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 1/4 with coffee, pour Tia Maria, Frangelico, & Amaretto slowly, add whipped cream on top, cherry if you want to. When drinking, stir gently if you like your coffee light. Drink from the bottom with a straw if you like it strong. Still looking for a better name, e-mail me if you think of one, or if you've heard of it with another name. imrey@aol.com

cocktail.name: French Whore
cocktail.instructions: Shake vigorously over ice and strain into a rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Butcherblock
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a large (16 oz.)glass. Shake vigorously. Garnish with grated chocolate. YUMMM!

cocktail.name: Cosmopolitan #3
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients on ice and strain into martini glass.

cocktail.name: Absolut Stress #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy

cocktail.name: Timberwolf
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in a a large glass and fill remainder with Orange Juice. Serve Cold

cocktail.name: Vodka Kick
cocktail.instructions: Just mix it! Also add some lime.

cocktail.name: Morning Milk
cocktail.instructions: Blend until smooth and creamy.

cocktail.name: Nutty Irishman #2
cocktail.instructions: Prepare a cafe-latte as normal. Add liquors acording to taste. Serve hot or over ice as a chilled coffee beverage.

cocktail.name: Baso
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, strain into glass, garnish with lime.

cocktail.name: Green Death
cocktail.instructions: Serve in plastic Champagne Glasses without the plastic bottoms

cocktail.name: Sangria Classic
cocktail.instructions: Combine orange juice, wine, sugar, brandy and Cointreau. Add lemon and orange slices. Chill. To serve, add ice and club soda, stir gently.

cocktail.name: Melzinho
cocktail.instructions: Mix the two ingredients and shake it well.You may serve it pure or with ice on a small cafe glass

cocktail.name: Chocolate Monkey
cocktail.instructions: blend liqeuors with ice-cream, milk and syrup. pour into parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

cocktail.name: Brandy Alexandra
cocktail.instructions: Blend all the ingredients in blender, garnished with cinnamon powder.

cocktail.name: Shark's Bite
cocktail.instructions: Mix together the Southern Comfort and the Cranberry Juice and stir. then add the Lime Juice (be careful not to get too much lime). Serve cold! You can substitute lemon juice for the lime juice if needed.

ingredient.name: Cranberry juice or a fruit mixture

cocktail.name: Comfortable Screw
cocktail.instructions: Pour Southern Comfort and O.J together and serve chilled

cocktail.name: Cucaracha #2
cocktail.instructions: Use a shot-glass and fill to the above proportions. Light the drink on fire. (It helps if you move the lighter in a circular pattern around the top of the drink.) Shoot it through a straw. Be careful!

cocktail.name: Maria Theresa
cocktail.instructions: Combine with ice. Shake. Strain and add ice.

cocktail.name: Mango Mint
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a blender at low speed for 15 seconds. Strain, add ice.

cocktail.name: Belfast Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice drink with a straw.

cocktail.name: Schwartzy
cocktail.instructions: Serve in a tall glass

cocktail.name: Napalm-Death
cocktail.instructions: Take a shot glass and take equal amounts of the liquor. First the Kahlua, then slowly pour down the Drambuie, then the Bailey's and last the Cointreau. Try to get fine layers.

cocktail.name: Baltimore Zoo
cocktail.instructions: add the liquors and grenadine. Mix. Strain. Add splash of Sprite. Add lemon squeeze. Drinker adds shot of beer.

cocktail.name: Texas Sling
cocktail.instructions: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

cocktail.name: Whippet
cocktail.instructions: Made as in a normal Vodka and Orange, with raspberry cordial added last.

cocktail.name: Bull Shot #2
cocktail.instructions: Disolve bullion cube in water. Mix in vodka and Tabasco. Garnish with celery.

cocktail.name: Carolina
cocktail.instructions: pour strega into chilled wine glass, add champagne. Stir slightly.

cocktail.name: T.K.O.
cocktail.instructions: Just pour off the amount into a shot glass Shoot and Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Red Wine Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix the icing sugar with the red wine, and stir well. Pour in the soda. Put in some Orange/Lemon slices. Serve immediately with a lot of ice.

cocktail.name: Mansion Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Mix above ingredients in a shaker. Shake and serve on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Candy
cocktail.instructions: Fill a glass with ice. Pour the 151. Pour the Dr. Pepper. Pour the Amaretto. Stir.

cocktail.name: Peach Death
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients on the rocks and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Flying Tiger
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice: add Galliano, Creme De Menthe and Vodka. Top glass off with orange juice. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Sweet Dream
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 oz. of Malibu Rum into a 10 oz. glass. Then fill the rest of the glass with orange juice, strawberry juice, and a splash banana syrup.

cocktail.name: Caffine attack
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender with coffee ice-cream and the amount of kahula to your desire. Blend until drinkable, pour into a beer mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

cocktail.name: Concrete
cocktail.instructions: First you drink the vodka (no swallowing), then you drink the Baileys. You mix it in the mouth and swallow.

cocktail.name: TGV
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shotglass(es). Add Curacao last, to a nice blue-green color.

cocktail.name: Love Potion #9
cocktail.instructions: Pour Kool-aid into jug, add vodka and rum. add 1 pouch of Kool-aid (cherry or orange) cover and shake give to best looking girl in the room and party

cocktail.name: Smurfs Up
cocktail.instructions: Combine and Stir

cocktail.name: Hot Apple Pie
cocktail.instructions: Mix Tuaca and Cider in a large microwavable mug. Heat on high for 2 1/2 minutes. stirr again, and enjoy!!!

cocktail.name: Melonball
cocktail.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour in Melon Liqueur and Vodka. Fill glass with juice. Orange juice may also be used.

cocktail.name: A midsummernight dream
cocktail.instructions: Mix the strawberrys in a blender Pour it together with the vodka,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker. Shake well and pour in a highballglass. Fill up with the Russchian water

cocktail.name: Amaretto Stone Sour #2
cocktail.instructions: Add Amaretto, OJ, and Sour in a tub over ice.

cocktail.name: Midori Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Moisten rim of cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake ingredients together, and pour into glass filled with crushed ice. Option: Mix above ingredients with one cup of ice in blender for a smooth, "granita" type drink.

ingredient.name: Triple sec or other orange liqueur

cocktail.name: Black Gold
cocktail.instructions: pour both ingredients in shot glass and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Cherry Blow Pop
cocktail.instructions: Pour all three ingredients into an short shaker with ice. For better taste, let it chill for a bit.

cocktail.name: Gorilla Fart #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour in glass, drink!

cocktail.name: Jolly Green Giant
cocktail.instructions: mix just like you would a screwdriver, except substitute lime vodka

cocktail.name: Dirty Moma
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stur.

cocktail.name: Zoksel
cocktail.instructions: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.

cocktail.name: Smurf fart
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Bull Shot #3
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Nazi Cola
cocktail.instructions: Combine Jgermeister and Rumple Minze over ice in glass. Fill to top with Cola.

cocktail.name: Dirty Grasshopper
cocktail.instructions: Pour Creme de Menthe and Kahlua in a glass over ice. Add milk to fill. Garnish with whatever you'd like. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #2
cocktail.instructions: Splash a puddle of Angostura bitters into a saucer and place the sugar cube in it to soak. This will take a minute ot two. Stir the Champagne (or sparkling wine), the Vodka and the Blue Curacao together in a container and put into the fridge to chill. Place the soaked sugar cube in the bottom of the Champagne glass, pour in the mixture and add drop in the cocktail onion, which should be loose, not on a cocktail stick.

cocktail.name: CoonDogg
cocktail.instructions: Mix together then strain thru ice.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Cruise
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients, shake well and serve over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry (and an umbrella if handy).

cocktail.name: Porch Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together over ice. Stir well. Enjoy

cocktail.name: Vik 'n' Rum
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the Rum first followed by the 12 oz of Nestea. Make sure you have stirred well. Serve Chilled!!

cocktail.name: Tipsy Island
cocktail.instructions: Crush ice in a blender. Add frozen strawberries and banana to blender. Put on low speed and add Malibu & Banana liqueur. Pour into tall glass.

cocktail.name: Toxic Antifreeze
cocktail.instructions: Fill a 12 ounce glass with ice, add 1 ounce of vodka, 1 ounce of triple sec and 1 ounce of midori, fill with yellow lemonade and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Purple Plague
cocktail.instructions: Mix Zinfandel with Chambord and add 7-Up. Serve on ice.

cocktail.name: Tanga
cocktail.instructions: In blender add Orange Tang Mix, Absolut Vodka, and ice. Blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Doug's Modified Cement Mixer
cocktail.instructions: Put Bailey's into a shot glass about 2/3 full. Fill the rest of the shot with Lemon or Lime juice. Take the shot and Swish it around in your mouth. It feels really neat. Swallow it before it becomes solid.

cocktail.name: Twisted Screw
cocktail.instructions: Nothing special. Vodka, then oj, then twister. Add a splash of raspberry sparkling water if desired.

cocktail.name: Harley Davidson (the company way)
cocktail.instructions: Pour alcohol into the shot glass. Occassionally mix with ice then put into a shot glass. Serve with a lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Karlsson's dream
cocktail.instructions: Just blend and drink. It's deadly.

cocktail.name: Virulent Death
cocktail.instructions: Combine in shot glass and stir.

cocktail.name: Simpson Bronco
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingrediants in mixing tin with ice and strain

cocktail.name: Hand-Shaken Margarita on the Rocks
cocktail.instructions: use large metal container with plenty of ice and a strainer. Shake well, pour through strainer into margarita glass. Serve with salt and fresh lime.

cocktail.name: White Lightening
cocktail.instructions: Just pour it all into a blender. Vary the amount of Vodka according to how buzzed you want to be. Remember, it must have at least 2 oz. of Vodka in order to be called White Lightening.

cocktail.name: Gorilla's Tit
cocktail.instructions: After mixing each ingredient in order shown, light the 151 with a match. Blow out the flames, and sip drink quickly with a straw.

cocktail.name: Blonde Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Scoop ice-cream into a large bowl (stainless or glass, but plastic will do). Slowly pour wine into bowl and mix until smooth (but not runny, or melted). Fold in (well drained) fruit cocktail. Serve in wine glass with ice-cream scoop (add tacky paper umbrella if desired). Keep in freezer when not being served.

cocktail.name: Rontini
cocktail.instructions: Pour together serve over ice

cocktail.name: Monkey's Lunch
cocktail.instructions: Pour alcohol over ice in a cocktail glass and add milk! (For a bit of a twist you could add a splash of Bailey's Irish Cream. This drink is also tasty as a 'special' coffee. Just sugar your rim, add liqour, pour coffee and add some whip.)

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Asshole
cocktail.instructions: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

cocktail.name: Pit Bull on Crack #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three ingredients in mixing tin with ice. Serve in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: The Perfect Margarita #1
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients except the 3 lime wedges into a shaker. Squeeze 2 of the lime wedges into the shaker. SHAKE WELL! Rim outside of glass only, with lime. Salt only the outside of glass. Add fresh crushed ice to glass. Strain mixture over ice. Squeeze remaining lime wedge in glass. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Patti's Irish Bloody Mary
cocktail.instructions: Rim coffee mug with celery salt, Pour Baileys over ice and fill with bloody mary mix. Garnish with pickle spear and filberts.

cocktail.name: Dick-in-the-Dirt
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Rooster Piss
cocktail.instructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Flaming Dr.
cocktail.instructions: Pour both into a pint glass, mix and drink.

cocktail.name: Donivan Flowers' Rocks
cocktail.instructions: Put each of the ingredients into a punch bowl. Mix, and with a straw, SHOOT.

cocktail.name: Pineappleless Pineapple Juice
cocktail.instructions: Pour Southern Comfort to the first line of a 16 oz. Solo Brand plastic cup. Add splash of Bacardi 151 Rum. Add 7-Up, Orange Juice, and Coca-Cola. Swirl it around in the cup a little bit and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Quick-sand
cocktail.instructions: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

cocktail.name: Mellow Hiker
cocktail.instructions: Combine alcohol over ice and add Mountain Dew. Stir and Garnish with Melon ball if desired.

cocktail.name: Navy Grog
cocktail.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour alcohols. Pour juices. Shake Optional. Orange and Pineapple garnish Optional

cocktail.name: Smurf
cocktail.instructions: Take the vodka in first, then orange juice and sprite. Then you take some dashes of grenadine and stirr it around for 20 sec. On the top of it you have a little dash of Strawb.marg.mix. Add ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Root Beer
cocktail.instructions: Fill a large glass with ice. Add vodka and fill glass with Pepsi (Do NOT substitute Coke). Swirl a splash of Galliano on top.

cocktail.name: Jay In Your Tummy
cocktail.instructions: Shake all the above ingredients in a tin with ice.

cocktail.name: Crack Pipe
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice, strain into glass

cocktail.name: Phillips Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Place 2-3 ice cubes in your choice of glass, pour 2oz vodka followed by 6oz Sunny Delight (more or less to taste). Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Extended Jail Sentence
cocktail.instructions: Flash blend with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Ostrich Shit
cocktail.instructions: Pour one oz. of Peppermint Schnapps into a cup of coffee. Then ad two tps. of sugar and slowly stir.

cocktail.name: The Juice
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a five gallon pitcher, the canister of lemonade, water, everclear and mix. serve on ice.

cocktail.name: Skane-i-fier
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add whiskey, Malibu and Dr. Pepper Stir.

cocktail.name: Peach me Tender
cocktail.instructions: Shake all the ingredients. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of orange.

cocktail.name: Ponderosa
cocktail.instructions: Throw it all into a glass, shoot as fast as possible. Do this repeatadly until very inebriated!

cocktail.name: Snakebite and Black
cocktail.instructions: Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the larger and cider one after another.

cocktail.name: No Pressure
cocktail.instructions: In a hurricane glass or any tall glass: Fill glass 1/3 full of Fz. strawberry daiquiri. Layer next 1/3 of glass with Fz. Pina Colada. Add a splash of Blue Curacao on top. Insert straw and fill with 151 Rum.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Peachclari
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, then orange juice, then peach schnapps. Drink.

cocktail.name: xns Temptation
cocktail.instructions: Start by adding the vodka and the banan liqueur. Fill the glass with sprite or similar soft drink. Pour some conc. orange juice. Stir. Add some grenadine for that nice Tequila Sunrise effect, or don't if you think it will be to sweet. Add a slice of orange for decoration.

cocktail.name: Neon Iguana
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients together and stir

cocktail.name: Fu** me like a beast
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients except 151, shake well with ice, pour into highball glass and top it off with Bacardi 151.

cocktail.name: Zimadori Zinger
cocktail.instructions: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Golden shower
cocktail.instructions: Stire Rum and Banana liqueur with ice. Add Sprite

cocktail.name: Wild Peppertini
cocktail.instructions: Combine, chill and strain into either a shot glass or ups glass.

cocktail.name: Blue Smurf Piss
cocktail.instructions: Pour as listed.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Russian
cocktail.instructions: Mix both ingredients in a shot glass. Tilt head back. Swallow.

cocktail.name: Moilanen
cocktail.instructions: First slice half a lemon in small slices. Then some ice, I prefer alot of ice in this drink. Pour the vodka in, press the rest of the lemon in the glass. Mix around and then fill up with Schweppes lemon. Mix again and you're finished. If you don't got the Schweppes lemon you can always use Fanta lemon instead, but it will be a lot sweeter.

cocktail.name: Herbal flame
cocktail.instructions: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

cocktail.name: Lemonade Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Follow the instructions on the can of Lemonade concentrate, but substitute the Vodka for water. Mix well and add beer.

cocktail.name: Slemmig Slyna
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and midori and kiwi with ice. Add sourmix. Shake. Fill with soda. Decorate glass with pineapple.

cocktail.name: Green Apple #1
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three together.

cocktail.name: Summer Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Put ice cubes in the Collins glass. Then poor the white rum. Fill with the fruit punch and the ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Missle Pop
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add vodka, pineapple juice and fruit punch. Fill with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

cocktail.name: Hot Afternoon
cocktail.instructions: Throw the shit in the shot glass and drink it down!

cocktail.name: Wild Wild West
cocktail.instructions: Take ink pen and stir well!

cocktail.name: Strawberry Quick
cocktail.instructions: Mix the contents so that the color of the drink is a pink color. Serve and enjoy

cocktail.name: Ball Hooter
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Pour in equal parts liquor. Shake or swirl. Strain into shot glass(es). Serve with a short, cold glass of beer.

cocktail.name: Rambo Shot
cocktail.instructions: keep both liquors cold and serve ina chilled shot glass if possible

cocktail.name: Killer Koolade
cocktail.instructions: Add Vodka, Melon Liqueur and Cranberry Juice in a shaker, Fill glass with three ice cubes,strain mix into highball/zombie glass,add dash of Amaretto (Optional)

cocktail.name: Simpson Solution
cocktail.instructions: Get a sports container like the All Sport or Gatorade ones at sports events and combine three ingredients together. Put in about 4-5 pounds of cocktail ice and watch it disappear faster than water!

cocktail.name: Mojito #3
cocktail.instructions: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

cocktail.name: Bumble Bee #2
cocktail.instructions: Layer Barenjaeger on top of the Jgermeister. Both liquors should be chilled.

cocktail.name: Flaming Soda
cocktail.instructions: Serve over rocks if desired.

cocktail.name: White Mess
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a double shot glass.

cocktail.name: Apricot punch
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.

cocktail.name: Apricot Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingrediants over ice. Seven-Up may be used instead of champagne to cut alcohol content if so desired.

cocktail.name: B-52 #4
cocktail.instructions: First add the Bailey's irish cream, then the Tia Maria, and then carefully the Absinthe: Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.

cocktail.name: Unknown Warrior
cocktail.instructions: Blend vodka and cointreau in a shotglass. Set the drink on fire with a match. Put the piece of sugar on a fork and hold it over the flame from the drink and let it melt down into the glass. When the sugar has melted,use the palm of your hand to put out the flame.

cocktail.name: Rok-Shasa
cocktail.instructions: Just throw it together.

cocktail.name: Copperhead
cocktail.instructions: Combine in an ice cube-filled Collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge

cocktail.name: Blue Shark
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into chilled old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Double Jack
cocktail.instructions: Combine the two jacks in glass.

cocktail.name: Skydiver
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add SKYY vodka, add orange juice, prefeable fresh orange juice. Garnish with orange slice.

cocktail.name: Black Irish
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients and let sit for one minute.

cocktail.name: Weakness
cocktail.instructions: Pour all four shots into a low ball glass, chill if you care.

cocktail.name: Screwdriver la Carla
cocktail.instructions: Mix the orange juice with sugar and the yolk of an egg. Then pour in the vodka with some icecubes and stir. Serve well chilled.

cocktail.name: Speedy Gonzales
cocktail.instructions: Pour Bailey's and Amaretto into a shot glass, swish, and throw it back.

cocktail.name: Zombie #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Zombie #3
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingedients over ice, except the high-proof rum, the pineapple stick and the sugar. Strain and add ice. Garnish with pineapple and a cherry. Float the high-proof rum at top and sprinkle a litter sugar over it.

cocktail.name: Purple Cow
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into glass

cocktail.name: Field Of Hearts
cocktail.instructions: Simk Midori. Layer liqueur. Shake and strain Frangelico. On top of the creamy layer you add a couple of drops of red or pink food dye, run a toothpick through the center of each drop to create a heart shape :) Garnish with an open strawberry

cocktail.name: B-52 #5
cocktail.instructions: Fill 1/3th of the glass with Tia Maria. Then pour smootly on a spoon the baileys so it flows on the Tai Maria. Then fill the glass up with Grand Marnier also with a spoon. Afterwards you see 3 layers, the middle layer looks like a after boming scene.

cocktail.name: Suntan Lotion
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts over ice, shake, strain, and serve...SPF 30!

cocktail.name: Naked Yellow Bird
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts over ice then shake, strain, and serve.

cocktail.name: Apple Cobbler
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in shot glass. Shoot!

cocktail.name: Three Stages of Friendship
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three in a shot glass and shoot the damn thing.

cocktail.name: Wet Back
cocktail.instructions: Mix and shoot.

cocktail.name: Devil's Piss
cocktail.instructions: Using a large glass of water, add lemonade concentrate to taste (Best if you make it a little stronger than usual). Add the 1.5 shots of Everclear and be sure to mix well!

cocktail.name: Tossed Salad
cocktail.instructions: Dip rim of shot glass in chocolate syrup. Add Kahlua and Jgermeister. Place arms behind back. Drink shot using mouth only (a la "blowjob").

cocktail.name: Black Swedish Virgin
cocktail.instructions: Mix on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Hot Lunch
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass. Garnish with small pickle. Light contents of glass on fire. Tilt head back and have your buddy pour it into your mouth (very carefully). Have four more hot lunches and go to bed. You have no business going anywhere after the abuse you just gave yourself.

cocktail.name: Green Apple #2
cocktail.instructions: all ingredients but 7-up in shaker. splash 7-up in your glass, shake others till nice and cold and add to glass. Voila!

cocktail.name: Hairy Buffalo
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into a large cooler, punch bowl or garbage can (a new one). Cut larger fruit into pieces and add.

cocktail.name: Scooby Snack #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour all into shaker with ice. Shake until cold. Strain into highball glass.

cocktail.name: Floaty
cocktail.instructions: First pour in the pear soda. Then take the Fanta and the juice. Please use a cognac bowl when mixing and drinking the drink. Then attach the cucumber slice to the rim, as you would do with a lemon slice. Blend and serve instantly!!!!

cocktail.name: Purple Hooter #2
cocktail.instructions: Just shoot the damn thing!

cocktail.name: Smurf #2
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in cup and fill it half full with sprite. Add maui filling the glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Sydney Sunrise Sunshine Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Mix the ingredients with a mixer.

cocktail.name: Moment Brutale
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything except the liquor with ice, strain it to remove the shell and skin, blend with liquor.

cocktail.name: Caipiroska
cocktail.instructions: Crush sugar into the lime wedges with a spoon. Place the lime wedges in the bottom of an 8 oz. glass. Cover with crushed ice. Pour vodka to fill the glass. It's a great summer drink.

cocktail.name: Love-me Tender
cocktail.instructions: All the ingredients in a mixing glass. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

cocktail.name: Malibu Jello
cocktail.instructions: Boil 1 cup water and add to peach passion fruit jello until dissolved about 2 minutes. Add 1 cup Malibu rum and pour into shot glasses or 1 ounce cup found in party stores. Chill for four hours. Enjoy!!!

cocktail.name: Strawberry Shortcake
cocktail.instructions: Blend all but the whipped cream until frosty. Pour in beer mug. Top with whipped cream. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: El Bastardo
cocktail.instructions: Mix all at same time into blender. After blending for approx. 30 seconds, fill beer mug 3/4 way and start a chugin'. Oh, it'll burn like hell for about 2 minutes, but once that sauce burns through your stomach lining and virtually injects the alcohol into your blood stream, put the unfinished El Bastardo down because you're gonna hit the floor.

cocktail.name: Standard Cream
cocktail.instructions: stir & strain in a cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Winky
cocktail.instructions: Add wink to gin, stir, add ice if desired.

cocktail.name: Zambeer
cocktail.instructions: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

cocktail.name: Root Beer Float #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 3/4 with ice. Add the Root Beer Schnapps. Add the cream. Slowly fill with coke.

cocktail.name: Nuclear Waste
cocktail.instructions: blend vodka, blue curacao and bailey's in a shaker. pour into glass and top up with coke.

cocktail.name: Flip Juice
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a gallon pitcher and refrigerate. Serve chilled.

cocktail.name: Americano
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice into an collins glass. Garnish with lemon and orange twists. You may fill with some club soda.

cocktail.name: Waldorf-Astoria Eggnog
cocktail.instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Scope #2
cocktail.instructions: Place ice in a tin then pour 1/2 oz. of Midori melon liqueur and 1/2 oz. of Rumple Minze. Shake and then strain into a rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Grand-Ma in a Wheelchair
cocktail.instructions: Add ice. Shake it. Strain it. Shoot it.

cocktail.name: Lemon Drop #6
cocktail.instructions: Fill a mug half way with Bacardi, then top off with lemon Kool-Aid or lemonade.

cocktail.name: Black Forest Shake
cocktail.instructions: In a blender put ice cubes, chocolate syrup, cherry brandy, vodka, and milk. Blend very well.

cocktail.name: Yaps
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1part apple schnapps with 1 part Yukon Jack and serve in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Juicy Tiger
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and blend well. Add more Coca-cola if needed. Serve with a slice of lemon put a straw in and drink.

cocktail.name: Cherry coke from hell
cocktail.instructions: Pour alcohol into glass then add Coke. Stir if necessary.

cocktail.name: Malibu Smash
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice and serve!

cocktail.name: Headcrack
cocktail.instructions: Stir well with ice and a spoon.

cocktail.name: Horny Girlscout
cocktail.instructions: Add the coffee liqueur first since it is heavier than the schnapps. Slowly add the peppermint schnapps.

cocktail.name: Bluesberry Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Fill cocktail chimney glass with crushed ice, fill 3/4 full with club soda, add a shot of blueberry schnapps and a splash of o.j. Can garnish with an orange peel or a blueberry.

cocktail.name: Hot Spot
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and tequila. Pour in Tabasco sauce until it's realy red.

cocktail.name: Mule
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1 1/4 ounce of Smirnoff Vodka in glass, fill with ginger beer, add ice and squeeze lime.

cocktail.name: Selena Jo
cocktail.instructions: Put the crushed ice in glass first then add the Captain Morgan then add the Amaretto then top off with Coke.

cocktail.name: Flaming Nazi
cocktail.instructions: Make sure the Hot Damn and the Jgermeister are both cold before serving.

cocktail.name: Fruit Hippy
cocktail.instructions: Pour the liquor. Fill with juice to taste.

cocktail.name: Schnapp It Up
cocktail.instructions: stir all ingredients together - pour over ice - enjoy!!

cocktail.name: The Frad
cocktail.instructions: Add ice, put in Sprite, then add Pineapple Juice, followed by the Coconut Rum and Peach Schnaps. Serve very cold.

cocktail.name: Bahama Mama #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Serve in a 12 oz. glass. Garnish with a cherry and 1/2 slice orange in a tooth pick.

cocktail.name: Jaq'ed Up Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a large crushed iced filled cup and pour back into the collins glass. Use a plastic stirring utensil if so desired

cocktail.name: Electric Tea
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a pint glass, shake and serve with a lemon wedge

cocktail.name: Cherry Cola
cocktail.instructions: Combine and stir

cocktail.name: Mortini
cocktail.instructions: Chill cocktail glass. Add grenadine and amaretto to the chilled glass. Finally, add chilled vodka.

cocktail.name: Nanc's Iced-Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Pour coffee over crushed ice,or small ice cubes,in blender. Add all other ingredients and blend on high speed until desired consistency.

cocktail.name: Sunset Island
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a shaker over a few ice cubes. Shake thoroughly. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Jedi Mind Trick
cocktail.instructions: Combine all contents in blender except cherries, blend until smooth. Pour in mug, garnish with cherries.

cocktail.name: GG
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.

cocktail.name: Fuka
cocktail.instructions: Pour all contents in glass over cubed ice and mix together.

cocktail.name: Dr. Pepper #5
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Amaretto & Bacardi in one shot glass. Fill the beer mug 1/2 way with beer. Light the Bacardi & Amaretto with a match or lighter. Drop the flaming shot glass into the beer. It immediately begins to foam up. At this point gulp it down (be careful not to swallow the shot glass!).

cocktail.name: Jamaican Zombie
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a frosted zombie glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

cocktail.name: Shoot
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything and shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Serve.

cocktail.name: Russian Sarin
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and the liqueur in a (long drink) glass with one or two icecubes in it. Fill it up with Schweppes Russchian.

cocktail.name: Orange Warthog
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Kool-Aid powder, Southern Comfort and Coke. Stir well (never shake)

cocktail.name: Honey-Dew-Me
cocktail.instructions: serve as a chilled shot

cocktail.name: Purple stealth
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka in large soft drink tumbler first. Tastes more like carbonated Ribena than grape soda. Very powerful!

cocktail.name: Brush Fire
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1/3 ounce tabasco sauce into a one ounce shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with either HOT 100 or if you prefer you can use a regular cinnamon schnapps. Drink immediately after making. This drink will lose flavor quickly.

cocktail.name: Rattlesnake Shot
cocktail.instructions: Since this is basically a shot drink, mix to your own taste

cocktail.name: Long Island Iced Tea (By a Long Islander)
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into shaker and give ONE brisk shake. Pour back into glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon.

cocktail.name: Japanese Slipper #1
cocktail.instructions: Just Mix it and drink it slow!

cocktail.name: Bit of Russiaan Honey
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients shake and pour over ice

cocktail.name: Rotten Pussy
cocktail.instructions: shake all ingredients and serve as a shooter

cocktail.name: Blue Banana
cocktail.instructions: Pour creme de banana into the glass and layer blue curacao on top.

cocktail.name: Radler
cocktail.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

cocktail.name: Earthquake #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake the ingridiens together and poor over in a cocktail-glass.

cocktail.name: The Perfect Margarita #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake like crazy with about 6 ice cubes. Pour into a chilled margarita glass, rimmed with lime juice and salt. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

cocktail.name: Scarlet O'Hara
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 oz. Southern Comfort over ice in an 8 oz. glass. Fill with cranberry juice. Squeeze one wedge of lime into drink. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Paralyzer #2
cocktail.instructions: Above amounts are for an 8 oz glass. Build over ice: Kahlua, then Vodka, milk, then Coke.

cocktail.name: Mudslinger
cocktail.instructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

cocktail.name: The Finnely
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and pore over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon, lime, and orange wedge.

cocktail.name: The Black Death
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in shaker and pour over ice. Serve cold. Great on a hot day!

cocktail.name: Campari Beer
cocktail.instructions: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

cocktail.name: Coco Channel
cocktail.instructions: Shake all with ice, serve in lowball over ice, or neat in a martini glass.

cocktail.name: Pain, Pain, Go Away
cocktail.instructions: Pour tabasco sauce in first, then whiskey and cream. Mix well.

cocktail.name: Boot Blaster
cocktail.instructions: Half fill a 20oz glass (preferrably in the shape of a Cowboy Boot) with ice, regular or crushed. Pour the spirits over the ice. Add lemon-lime mix leaving room at the top for the 1/2 oz of Coca-Cola to dirty the drink.

cocktail.name: Bastardized Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Ice, then rum, then orange juice. Mix

cocktail.name: Ejhazz
cocktail.instructions: Add Vidka and peach juice. Fill glass with ice and add vanilla to taste. If the drink is too sweet, dilute it with water.

cocktail.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cooler, chill, and serve. As with most punches, it's hard to be specific about the amounts used. A general rule: pour as much of everything as tastes good, then add more vodka! To make life more interesting, throw in pieces of fruit, and add dry ice to the cooler before serving. Small plastic animals also make a nice garnish (but don't drink them)!

cocktail.name: Sex with the Captain
cocktail.instructions: Build drink in glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Foreplay
cocktail.instructions: Mix both ingredients together in a tumbler with ice. Strain into a shot glass! Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Extremely Drunk
cocktail.instructions: Mix all together.

cocktail.name: Cool Cucumber
cocktail.instructions: Put a few ice-cubes in a longdrink glass, and put a little lemon juice in it. Then cut a cucumber in two half and cut off a part. Get the seeds out and put it in the glass as well. Shake in a well cooled down bottle of champagne in and let the glass stand in the refrigerator for a while. Then it's ready to drink.

cocktail.name: Tiffany's Wet and Ready
cocktail.instructions: Fill Mason jar with crushed ice. Add pineapple juice and Malibu rum. Mix well. Add splash of greanadine and 151 proof rum. Garnish with cherry, pineapple, or other fruit slice.

cocktail.name: David Caradine
cocktail.instructions: Mix in the order: cacao, menthe, whiskey, milk. Try to keep the layers separate. Float on the back of a spoon, tilt the glass and pour very gently, etc. I suggest tilting the glass. When you tilt the glass you can, when pouring the cream/milk, rotate the glass causing the cream to swirl down through the other layers which looks good. Serve in an apertif glass.

cocktail.name: Leatherneck
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1/4 inch to one inch Tabasco into shot glass. Pour Rum over Tabasco and shoot it.

cocktail.name: Tropical dream
cocktail.instructions: Shake the three ingredients together and poor in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Jihad
cocktail.instructions: Just pour all the contents together, and mix.

cocktail.name: Jay's Rootbeer Dream
cocktail.instructions: Add all , except the cola, into a flash cup, Flash for 10 sec. or till foamy. Served in beer mug over half mug of ice. Splash of cola top. If you have a chilled mug it's a plus.

cocktail.name: Purple Devil
cocktail.instructions: Shake alcohol with ice. Strain and pour over ice in a tall glass. Add cranberry juice to fill most of the way. Add a splash of 7-up if you want it fizzy!

cocktail.name: Almond Chocolate Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

cocktail.name: Tropical Teaser
cocktail.instructions: Place in a cold shaker with ice. Shake for one minute and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Greek Lightning
cocktail.instructions: Pour into mixing cup with 2 or 3 ice cubes, and chill to make shooter. Strain into shot glass or test tube...

cocktail.name: Ethnic Sugar
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingrediants together except for the Surge and stir. Fill the rest up with Surge and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Rum Aid
cocktail.instructions: Skaking Serves with ice an a Lemon

cocktail.name: Southern Chase
cocktail.instructions: Mix Together and Drink

cocktail.name: Purple Haze #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Vodka and the Orange juice together, add the Blackcurrant shnapps, add ice!

cocktail.name: Red Tequila
cocktail.instructions: This is an extended ordinary Tequila drink with a half lemon slice on the edge of the glass. Add Tabasco sauce to the drink until the colour is strongly reddish. Mix lightly.

cocktail.name: Polkagris
cocktail.instructions: Mix the fluids into the glass, add a couple ice cubes and (one or) two cherries. Use a thick, red and white striped straw.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Stone Sour #3
cocktail.instructions: Shake sour mix, tequila and amaretto with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of OJ. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Rick
cocktail.instructions: First, you must pour the Sambuca in your shot glass and then slowly pour the orange juice. You may now enjoy Rick's fruity taste!

cocktail.name: FireBall Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Schnapps, Rum and Tabasco in a Shooter Glass. Stir briefly.

cocktail.name: Neopolitan
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer, chill and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

cocktail.name: 9 1/2 Weeks
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer. Chill and strain into Cocktail glass. Garnish with sliced strawberry.

cocktail.name: Aqua Fodie
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of gin followed by 1 oz. of Blue Curaco. Fill glass with orange juice, garnish with orange and cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Butch's Pink Panties
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients thoroughly and consume. Put a pair of pink panties on and go out and mow the grass.

cocktail.name: Buckshot
cocktail.instructions: The Tequila and Whiskey are mixed in the bottom of the shot glass. The Baileys is to act like the 'wax' in a shotgun shell and is layered on top of the whiskey/tequila mix. The fresh ground pepper is your 'buckshot' that creates the spice/burning sensation.

ingredient.name: Bailey's irish cream on top of

cocktail.name: Noah
cocktail.instructions: Pour amaretto into glass filled with ice, then add equal parts orange juice and lemon-lime soda to fill glass.

cocktail.name: The Skunk Pussy
cocktail.instructions: Add alcohol to snifter, then add ice with the 7-up.

cocktail.name: Christmas Tree Water
cocktail.instructions: Place one part dry gin in Cocktail Glass. Do NOT bruise the Gin! Carefully add two parts Sprite. Do NOT bruise the Sprite. Optionally, add a dash of cayenne pepper for added flavor. Add 3 tablespoons of dry ice for that mystical, yet strangely, psycho effect.

cocktail.name: Creamsicle Dream
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in glass and stir. Served as a float drink. Can also be mixed in a blender and served as a shake.

cocktail.name: Whoop Juice
cocktail.instructions: Combine all together: if to strong, add more soda, more kick, add more Everclear.

cocktail.name: Monsoon
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients except Meyers dark rum and stir in a hurricane glass filled with ice. Add Meyers dark rum at the top, mix and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Neutron Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Butterscotch, float the Bailey's and let the Kahlua sink to the bottom of the shot glass.

cocktail.name: Jello-shot Supreme
cocktail.instructions: Bring water to a boil. Mix with a large package of Black Cherry Jello. Then add Peachtree Schnapps, mix well. Pour into small plastic shot or 2 oz. containers. Chill and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Buddy
cocktail.instructions: Pour Mad Dog and Mountain Dew into a glass (plastic beer glasses work the best). Stir. Add a couple ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Absolutly Screwed Up
cocktail.instructions: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

cocktail.name: Texas Cool-Aid
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice, shake until cooled, then pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Green Iguana
cocktail.instructions: Mix Tequila, Melon Liquor and Sweet and Sour Mix in Blender. Add ice. Serve in glass.

cocktail.name: Chicken Drop
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three in shaker with ice. Pour cold

cocktail.name: The World's Best Pina Colada
cocktail.instructions: Combine Rum, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice in a regular sized blender. Blend on low speed to mix liquid ingredients. Fill blender to top with ice. Blend on high speed until ice is grainy. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge.

cocktail.name: Grain Punch
cocktail.instructions: First and foremost, BUY A NEW GARBAGE CAN, and wash it out thoroughly!!!!! (Preferably the big ones 40-55gal). First Pour in all of the Grain (10 bottles of 1.75ml [Handle]), keep in mind that this recipie is for a Large Party, not 10 people sitting around getting loaded.....Anyway, next add the dry packets of mix. We used to get the largest industrial bags we could, don't go for quality, you're not going to remember anyway. Now this is the most critical part, the fruit. This is why I put this on here...any joker can make punch, but I figured I would distibute my years of fruit research for free....the Best friends you have in the Fruit community are the Orange and the Apple. This is because they absorb the grain better than anything else I tested. So make sure you get some of these in every glass you get, and eat them, DON'T EVER THROW THESE OUT, this is the best part of the drink. Bananas suck, they get gushy, watermellon works ok but the seeds get to be a pain in the ass when you can't see so well, pineapple is good, basically you get the point. Cut the fruit into wedges and throw it in the mix and let it sit around for a minute...Now throw in the bags of ice and fill it up to desired potency with water, mixing can be done with a canoe paddle or a 2x4 or anything else you've got lying around...a disposable camera is usually a good partner while drinking this concoction, people get really outta hand and go off the deep end.....This goes well as an iceblock shot too.

cocktail.name: Warped Thursday
cocktail.instructions: When we make it, we empty half a can of Cherry Coke, pour the vodka into the can, then pour in the Kool-aid. I'm sure it would work in a 12oz glass. Stir - a kabob stick works well in the can.

cocktail.name: The Quan
cocktail.instructions: Stir until color is even.

cocktail.name: Peppermint Patty (Northern Style)
cocktail.instructions: Served Chilled. Pour equally.

cocktail.name: Long Island Iced Tea #5
cocktail.instructions: Add ice to glass. Add Alcohol. Add Sweet and Sour mix. Fill to the top with Cola (preferably Pepsi). Squeeze and add lemon

cocktail.name: Amazon Street Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add 2 oz vodka and fill the glass with lemonade.

cocktail.name: Whitecap Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

cocktail.name: Liquid Cocaine #3
cocktail.instructions: Keep all 3 liquors in freezer till they are viscous. (Jgermeister should have a syrup quality.) Mix all three in shaker and pour in a extra tall frosted shot glass. (Should be one of those unusually tall shot glasses if possible, otherwise use small whiskey glass as this is a unusually large shot.) Serve Cold!

cocktail.name: Morning Dew
cocktail.instructions: Pour all the stuff in a punch bowl and drink. (Tastes better with Diet Dew)

cocktail.name: Torpedo
cocktail.instructions: Mix the liquers, and put the other things it it :)

cocktail.name: Smooth Pink Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Built Drink usually want a slight bit more sour than cranberry experiment to personal taste ganish with lemon wheel

cocktail.name: Lady 52
cocktail.instructions: This a kind of a Pousse Cafe. Float Irish cream over the Kahlua. Shake Cream with Cointreau. Float on the Irish cream. Garnish with choclate.

cocktail.name: Fourth of July
cocktail.instructions: Layer in Shot Glass, Banded Red/White/Blue shot is perfect for the fourth of July

cocktail.name: On the Deck
cocktail.instructions: For best results mix all ingredients into a frosted Mug.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Qualude
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a small or regular size rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Bellini Martini
cocktail.instructions: Add ice cubes to shaker. Add vodka. Add peach schnapps. Add peach nectar. Shake. Strain into glass. Add lemon twist.(peel)

cocktail.name: Jitterbug
cocktail.instructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

cocktail.name: Good Morning!
cocktail.instructions: Combine Vanilla Ice-Cream, Sugar, Ice, and Espresso in a blender and blend until smooth. Add Bailey's Irish Cream and Tia Maria then stir. Pour into coffee mug and serve.

cocktail.name: The Fucking Shit
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka over ice, add cranberry juice, add frozen pink lemonade concentrate, mix.

cocktail.name: Mexican Flag
cocktail.instructions: Layer Drink: Using spoon, pour shot over spoon over glass. Fill with Grenadine first, then Creme de Menthe, and last but not least Tequila. The layers form the mexican flag enjoy.

cocktail.name: Mark and Coke
cocktail.instructions: Fill cocktail glass to the top with clean ice. Straight pour about 4 oz of Makers Mark over ice. Add Coca-Cola to taste.

cocktail.name: Mudslide #3
cocktail.instructions: Just get a high-ball glass and add your 1 or 2 shot(s) of Bailey's, then your 1 or 2 shots of Tia Maria, then just simply slowly top the glass with the coca-cola. It will fizz alot so watch out! Due to the fizz a straw is a definate recommindation.

cocktail.name: Shark Tank
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and lemonade in a large glass. Drop in grenadine last, but do not stir. Best served over ice, through a straw.

cocktail.name: Monkey Spanker
cocktail.instructions: Pour around 2-3 oz. of Whiskey into a glass, then fill the rest up with Vernors.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Kamakazie
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Pour into lowball or other shot glass.

cocktail.name: Moranguito
cocktail.instructions: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

cocktail.name: Pedra (stone)
cocktail.instructions: First put the tequila, then the vodka, then the black rum, then the Bailey's Irish Cream, then the Granadine syrup and then mix this five elements for that the drink become pink, to finish put the Absinthe with the help of a spoon. Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.

cocktail.name: Kryptonite kooler
cocktail.instructions: Mix the rum, Maui,and pineapple juice together. Add ice,and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour
cocktail.instructions: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1" of pineapple juice, 1/2" of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4" of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner.

cocktail.name: Liquid Courage
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into a blender, then liquify until it becomes a shake. Pour into the beer mugs, and you're set.

cocktail.name: Agua de Valencia
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in a pitcher. The Cava can be very cold.

cocktail.name: Psycho Citrus
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in a Tom Collins glass the vodka, tequila, schnapps, Grand Marnier and lime juice over ice. Fill with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Fucked up Float
cocktail.instructions: Mix together Kahlua, schnapps, vodka, ice-cream and cola until blended. Fill with milk.

cocktail.name: Johnny Cat
cocktail.instructions: Place gin or vodka, triple sec, vermouth, grenadine and ice in shaker. Shake well and pour into glass. Fill with tonic water or club soda.

cocktail.name: Green Zone
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients with an ice cube into a shaker.

cocktail.name: Robert says: MASS
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Vodka with Rose's Lime then stir. Fill up with Tonic Water.

cocktail.name: Milk of Amnesia
cocktail.instructions: Add ice cold champagne to glass, slowly add chilled Chambord untill desired raspberry flavor is achieved, give it a gentle stir to mix.

cocktail.name: Jack Frost
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice in a glass.

cocktail.name: Born on the 4th of July
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins Glass with ice Pour in Blue Curacao first Next pour in Sloe Gin but be careful, the appearance of the drink is very important. Pour gently onto the ice so as to layer it. Next fill it with cream also layering it. The result should be a blue and red drink with tendrils of white shooting through the colors.

cocktail.name: Toblerone #1
cocktail.instructions: Blend with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes and optionally chocolate topping drizzled down the inside of the glass.

cocktail.name: Sunburn
cocktail.instructions: Pour eveything in a big punch bowl or cooler with a big block of ice. Throw in some cherries and a half bottle of 151 for good measure. Have a good time!

cocktail.name: Snake in the grass
cocktail.instructions: Shake with lots of ice, strain into glass

cocktail.name: Bigger better Blue Lagoon
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in glass. Shake or stir, add cherry and if you would like an additional splash of color, add a few drops of cherry grenadine.

cocktail.name: French Toast
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients, the shot should taste like a piece of French Toast.

cocktail.name: The Icelandic way
cocktail.instructions: Mix a normal glass of vodka and fanta lemon, drink down to half and fill up with beer and coke.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Stupid
cocktail.instructions: Mix Well. Drink. Repeat until stupid.

cocktail.name: Flaming Goat
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec and curacao. Add sour mix. Add Curacao until it's dark purple. Fill glass with ice cubes and fload Bacardi 151 rum on top. Have the flame blown out before drinking add a straw.

cocktail.name: Spring
cocktail.instructions: Mix gentle, and add ice cubes. Serve whith Straw.

cocktail.name: The Graveyard
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1 oz of Tobasco Sauce over ice. Add 1 oz. of Tequila and fill glass with lemon-lime soda. Shake or stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Toblerone #2
cocktail.instructions: Blend ingrediants with ice until a creamy consistancy is reached (don't add too much ice, this will make the drink too thick). Pour into a *HONEY LINED GLASS*. Garnish with chocolate flakes and an open strawberry.

cocktail.name: Screwdriver (modified)
cocktail.instructions: add orange juice first, then add vodka, and finally add apple juice and stir lightly. The pooring should do most of the stirring.

cocktail.name: Roadrunner Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1 part of each type of alcohol (1 shot or less of each) in a large glass. Top off with Fruit Punch. Serve with ice.

ingredient.name: Fruit punch, berry flavour is best

cocktail.name: Rum Runner
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

cocktail.name: Ginelico
cocktail.instructions: Stir Gin and Frangelico with ice, strain into cold cocktail glass. Garnish with frshly grated nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Blitz
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain or with ice.

cocktail.name: Orgasm a la Denmark
cocktail.instructions: Stir it together until it just looks like Bailey's.

cocktail.name: More Orgasms
cocktail.instructions: Stirr it together until it just looks like dark Bailey's.

cocktail.name: Horse's Ass
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice.

cocktail.name: H.D.
cocktail.instructions: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

cocktail.name: Horse Jizz
cocktail.instructions: Get a big mug. Pour in one ingredient then the other.

cocktail.name: Long Island Iced Tea #6
cocktail.instructions: First, have all the ingridients cold. Mix the liquor in a glass and then add the iced tea, coca-cola and lemon. Be sure to stir or shake. Serve chilled in a big (beer?) glass.

cocktail.name: Cowboy Cocksucker #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass

cocktail.name: Blow Job #3
cocktail.instructions: Add Kahlua and Bailey's to shot glass, garnish with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: The Evil Blue Thing
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more "fun".

cocktail.name: Shark Attack
cocktail.instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

cocktail.name: Jack's Vanilla Coke
cocktail.instructions: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.

cocktail.name: Viscous Robert
cocktail.instructions: Pour Bitters over rocks, and swirl in a dash of Southern Comfort. Garnish with lemon peel and and an umbrella (or the most frou-frou accoutrement you have on hand)

cocktail.name: The Pink Drink
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka, Galliano, Cointreau, Grenadine and Milk into a cocktail shaker, shake and pour into a cocktail glass and finish off with a dollop of whipped cream on top.

cocktail.name: Sid's Special
cocktail.instructions: Place cubes in glass, add gin, frozen lime juice, and 7-up then stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Tripwire
cocktail.instructions: In 5 gal. jug mix thoroughly all of vodka with all of lemons, lemonade, and water, which should be previously combined. Make sure water is ice cold, if not ice or refridgeration may be required.

cocktail.name: Ambijaxtrious
cocktail.instructions: Pour mixture into a cup filled with crushed and stir briskly.

cocktail.name: Mutated Mothers Milk
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Let stand for 3-5 minutes to chill. Pour into shot glass and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Apple Grande
cocktail.instructions: Chill both ingredients!! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Amer Picon Punch
cocktail.instructions: Fill old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in grenadine and Amer Picon. Fill glass with soda, leaving room for brandy. Float brandy on top of drink.

cocktail.name: Tequila Press
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the boiling water and chill in the fridge. This step is best done before the party/drinking session. Put the tequila and lemon juice in the pitcher and fill with soda water and ice. Then mix sugar syrup to taste.

cocktail.name: Bleeding Surgeon
cocktail.instructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

cocktail.name: Kansas City Ice Water
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients over ice.

cocktail.name: Jen's Mountain Gin
cocktail.instructions: Rub lime peel around rim of glass. Dip glass upside-down into sugar. Mix lemon gin and Mountain Dew together. Pour into glass over ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Suicide Stop Light
cocktail.instructions: Line three 1 1/2 oz shot glasses up on the bar. pour each of the liquors into its own glass. Splash the orange juice into the vodka for color. Then shoot (RED YELLOW GREEN)

cocktail.name: Spikey Hedgehog
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Epidural
cocktail.instructions: Chill all ingredients well. Mix equal parts and serve in a cordial glass. Or, if you have a test tube or beaker handy, go for it!

cocktail.name: Magic's Tornado
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice, decoration: just a slice of green lemon,

cocktail.name: Cayman Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Half fill a highball glass with crushed ice. Next pour in 1.5oz. of your favorite brand of Light Rum. Now pour in .5oz. of liqiud pina colada mix, and then fill to the top of the glass with pineapple juice. After stirring ingrediences, pour in .5oz. of grenadine and alow to settle on the bottom of the glass (do not stir after adding grenadine),garnish the glass with an orange wedge, and then serve "Mon"!

cocktail.name: Applejack
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain into cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Hazelnut Martini
cocktail.instructions: add ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain

cocktail.name: Algae
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients over ice and pour into highball glass. No garnish.

cocktail.name: Island Girl
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients. Roll.

cocktail.name: Sensei on the Rocks
cocktail.instructions: With ice cubes in the the glass, add the Kahlua and Malibu and stir them together. Add the splash of Jack and fill the rest up with milk. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Sweet Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender cup with 15 ounces of small ice cubes, add rum, passion fruit syrup and sweet and sour and blend until smooth, in a hurricane glass pour the blended strawberries, then add the blended mixture, the strawberries will ooze up the sides of the glass and it will look like a beautiful sunset. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Suicide The Shot
cocktail.instructions: Float Tabasco a top of rum.

cocktail.name: The Power of Milk
cocktail.instructions: Stir sugar and vodka together. Add milk. Serve cold with a straw.

cocktail.name: Pedro Collins
cocktail.instructions: Full collins glass with ice, pour in Limon, add sweet and sour, fill with equal parts club soda and 7-up

cocktail.name: Bitchin' Apple Cider
cocktail.instructions: Add Apple Juice to Goldschlager and Stir.

cocktail.name: Apple Cider Slider
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice. Shake and strain into shooter glass.

cocktail.name: Adam Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruite juice depending on personal prefference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.

cocktail.name: Three Wise Men (on a farm)
cocktail.instructions: Line up four shot glasses with a shot of each drink.

cocktail.name: Royal Scandal
cocktail.instructions: Add liquors and mixers into shaker with a few cubes of ice. Shake vehemently and strain out ice. Serve as a shooter.

cocktail.name: Purple Motherfucker
cocktail.instructions: Combine first five ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Shake. Pour into a Collins glass and top with 7-Up.

cocktail.name: Harry Denton Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shaken then strained into a Cocktail Glass (Garnish not specified)

cocktail.name: Sizz Snot
cocktail.instructions: Pour the two measures of Schnapps into the cocktail glass. With a cocktail stick stir the liquid whilst adding the two or three dashes of Creme de Menthe. DO NOT mix to hard. Once the Creme de Menthe has started to be added, stop stirring. Finally, gently pour in the lemonade until the glass is topped up. Add maybe a cocktail cherry for decoration.

cocktail.name: MVP's Strawberry Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Makes 3 shots.Shake ingredients with ice and strain into shot glasses. Savor the scent for a moment and SLAM

cocktail.name: The 5th Element
cocktail.instructions: Chill mug, add ice, pour Sprite and juice into mug. Then add rum and Southern Comfort. Finally add the 5th element: Everclear!

cocktail.name: Jo Jo
cocktail.instructions: Stir with a butter knife

cocktail.name: Duck Fart #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour Crown in first...Then the Kahlua, and Float the Baileys on top. Then Slam!

cocktail.name: Arizona Antifreeze
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!

cocktail.name: Purple Elastic Thunder Fuck
cocktail.instructions: Chill, shake, and strain into shooter glass.

cocktail.name: Perfect Flaming Dr. Pepper
cocktail.instructions: In the shot glass, pour amaretto, then kahlua, then root beer schnapps. Finally float rum on top. Fill a beer mug (with something like bud or coors) half way. Light shot on fire, drop into beer mug and slam as fast as you can! By the way, the faster its slamed, the more it tastes like Dr. Pepper

cocktail.name: Extreme Valentine
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into glass. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Dirty Oatmeal
cocktail.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

cocktail.name: Venom
cocktail.instructions: Put gin into a Malt Shaker or something close to that. Stir in the cocoa and sugar. Mix together and shake. Pour into a Champagne Glass.

cocktail.name: Lay Down and Shut Up!
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice, Strain and pour.

cocktail.name: Sax with T.
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice in shaker and strain.

cocktail.name: Tropical Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Start with 3/4 of a pitcher with pink lemonade. Then add the vodka. Mix till you can barely taste the vodka, then add the strawberry daiquiri mix, then a splash of rum. (Just a bit, do not add too much) Stir and then chill.

cocktail.name: Be Sweet
cocktail.instructions: Add a few ice cubes and fill the glass with ginger ale

cocktail.name: Bazooka Joe
cocktail.instructions: Fill tin with ice. Mix all three ingredients with ice. Shake and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Stormcloud
cocktail.instructions: Build in shot glass. Float Bailey's in amaretto and top with 151. The Bailey's should float in the middle.

cocktail.name: Velvet Presley
cocktail.instructions: Pour bourbon over ice (optional). Add chocolate milk until creamy. The drink of Kings!

cocktail.name: Gin-Dew-It
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1 shot of your favorite Gin into a highball glass half filled with ice. Add Mountain Dew till glass is almost filled, then give it a splash of Sprite. Stir well, and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktail.name: DewRunRum
cocktail.instructions: Use "Green Plastic" Dixie cups 16oz. 2 Ice cubes. Place one shot of 151 into glass Pour Mountain Dew over 151 and ice.

cocktail.name: Sunny Sex
cocktail.instructions: First off, mix the orange juice with the malibu in a seperate glass, pour the firewater in the martini glass, the orange mix over it and when it's settled, pour the vodka slowly over the mixture. If you want you can stir now (in that case the above directions are void) - but i prefer not to. Now's the time for the red wine. It doesn't have to be anything special: I tend to use a Lambrusco because of the pearliness, also the amount of wine you use will affect the taste of the drink immensely. I use between 1/2 cl to 1 cl, not more, other wise the tatse of the wine will dominate too much. To get your optimal taste you'll just have to experiment a little back and forth.

cocktail.name: Tattooed Love Goddess
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add all liquers, top off with cream and shake well.

cocktail.name: Mind over Marny
cocktail.instructions: Fill to the top of glass with ice cubes or crushed ice. Pour two parts (to taste, of course) vodka, then add mango, orange juice. Add Club Soda to give it a fizz.

cocktail.name: Pisang cold
cocktail.instructions: Put the milk into a glass and put the Pisang ambong into it also. Shake and serve it cold with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Latin Love
cocktail.instructions: Blend until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass rimmed with grenadine and coconut shavings.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #9
cocktail.instructions: Use a shaker: first put in the ice, then add the orange juice ( you should always add the fruit juices before the alcohol! ). Put both the Passoa and the Malibu in and give it a good shake. Poor in a glass and add a cube of ice. The poor a bit of cream on top of the ice cubes ( preferably using a teaspoon or so to keep the cream from mixing with the other stuff ). Put a cherry on top and voila, there's your Sex on the Beach.

cocktail.name: Murder in the Forest
