cocktail.instructions: Use a shaker: put in cracked ice and orange juice, then put in Vodka, Pisang Ambon and Pina Colada and give it all a good shake. Poor in glass ( if you like you can put in a cube of ice or two ). Poor a dash of grenadine in ( slowly ). Serve with cherry and straw. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Rootbeer Floatie
cocktail.instructions: In a shot glass, float .5oz. lt. cream on top of .5oz. rootbeer schnapps.

cocktail.name: Real Romulan Ale
cocktail.instructions: Select a bottle (preferably decorative, but not too ornate) that will hold just over 1 liter of liquid. Combine 375ml of each ingredient in the bottle. Marvel at the entrancing color and exquisite character that is The Ale. -- Put the bottle in your freezer and wait 2 hours. -- Pour a shot and hold on to your hat!

cocktail.name: Kamikaze #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour all 3 into a shot glass and away you go.

cocktail.name: Black and Brown
cocktail.instructions: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness.

cocktail.name: A Piece of Ass
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in shots. Fill with Sour Mix.

cocktail.name: Green Eyes
cocktail.instructions: Pour over crushed ice and stir or can be blended.

cocktail.name: Three-Legged Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain, into rocks glass.

cocktail.name: The Shiwala
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice and pour into Hurricane glass. Add a floater of Myer's dark rum for an additional KICK!

cocktail.name: Sex With An Alligator
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain Jgermeister, Melon, and Pineapple juice with ice and strain into rocks glass. Float Raspberry liqueur into mixture in rocks glass, like little alligator footprints.

cocktail.name: Southern Dew
cocktail.instructions: basically put ice in glass, add 1 oz. southern comfort, then fill glass with mountain dew and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Highlander
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain, pour into collins glass with ice. Garnish with flag.

cocktail.name: Avalanche
cocktail.instructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

cocktail.name: Root Beer Float #3
cocktail.instructions: Mix Galiano, Coca-Cola and ice. Float cream on top by pouring over the back of a spoon which is just touching the top of the Coke mixture.

cocktail.name: Rosebud
cocktail.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice and add grapefruit juice Shake vodka, lime juice, and triple sec in shaker 1/2-full of ice. Strain on top of grapefruit juice

cocktail.name: Golden Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Measurements made for 1.5 oz. shot glass

cocktail.name: Painter's Delight
cocktail.instructions: Pour Gin, Curacao, Pernod and the Juice from 1/2 Lemon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill up with soda, stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Salem Witch
cocktail.instructions: In a collins glass with ice, pour vodka, midori, and raspberry schnapps. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill 2/3 with sour mix and the rest with soda water (or seltzer). Stir gently, and finally top with a splash of grenadine.

cocktail.name: Boom box
cocktail.instructions: Vodka and White first the coffee. The coffee must still be hot

cocktail.name: Spudgun
cocktail.instructions: mix it together and hurl it down

cocktail.name: Jake-Knife
cocktail.instructions: Pour Jgermeister in shaker over ice. Fill with coke and shake til your arms are sore. Pour into glass and top with a smidgen of Bacrdi 151. If your feeling mean, feel free to light it!

cocktail.name: FuzzB@ll
cocktail.instructions: Fill cup 2/3rds with Sprite, fill other 1/3 of cup with Peach Schnapps, add ice.

cocktail.name: Golden Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together and shake!!!!

cocktail.name: Winegum
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Vodka with the other ingredients after taste.

cocktail.name: B-52 #6
cocktail.instructions: First add the Amaretto, then the Bailey's, and then carefully the Rum. Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.

cocktail.name: Romona Banana
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients and serve in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float
cocktail.instructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Mosstrooper
cocktail.instructions: Start with half a glass of ice. Fill almost full with root beer and add a little 7-Up. Just stir with a straw or other convenient item. Drink before the ice melts, otherwise it tastes bitter.

cocktail.name: Triplesex
cocktail.instructions: Fill a glass with ice. Pour first 3 three ingredients then adjust pineapple juice to taste. Suck it down:)

cocktail.name: SkyLab
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker, then strain into chilled glass.

cocktail.name: Eben's Magic Juice (Orange)
cocktail.instructions: Add the Vodka to orange soda and add Kool Aid mix (make sure it is the kind of Kool Aid mix with no sugar added). Pour a small amount of sugar into the mixture and stir (carefully. it IS carbonated!). Taste and add sugar if needed. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #10
cocktail.instructions: shake like hell whith some ice

cocktail.name: Rikkertje
cocktail.instructions: Add some ICE Put in the shaker Shake your ass off

cocktail.name: Malibu Tequichi
cocktail.instructions: Add some ice. Twist and shake that thing. Serve at once.

cocktail.name: Tequila BoomBoom
cocktail.instructions: Throw everything in a glass. Put a towel over the glass slam it on the bar. Before the foam hits the edge off the glass you must have finished it .

cocktail.name: Blow Job #2
cocktail.instructions: Layer the butterscotch schnapps and Irish Cream by pouring the Irish Cream over the back of a spoon. Spray the Whipped cream on top, pile it about 1-2 inches high. This shot must be taken without using your hands. Pick up the shot glass between your lips and tilt back.

cocktail.name: Gorilla Snot #2
cocktail.instructions: Layer the creme de banane over the melon liqueur. Then drop the Advocaat into the middle of the creme de banane. The Advocaat should hang in the middle if poured correctly.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Almond
cocktail.instructions: Layer the ingredients in the order listed.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Shock
cocktail.instructions: Add 1 shot of After Shock to 8 oz cup of hot chocolate and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Apertif d'Absinthe
cocktail.instructions: Add wormwood to shot of pernod add sugar and water serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Diablo's Blood
cocktail.instructions: Pour both ingredients together and mix well. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Dragon's Breath
cocktail.instructions: pour in fire water float bacardi 151 rum on top ignite

cocktail.name: Green Milkshake
cocktail.instructions: Pour Grenadine on the edge of the glass and then sugar to create a red edge on the glass. Then pour all three ingredienses in a shaker and shake it well with crushed ice. Finally pour it in the glass.

cocktail.name: Schnapp Pop
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add schnapps and fill with club soda. Turn over once to mix. Serve with straw.

cocktail.name: Eliminator
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in tall glass. Add more orange soda if it is unpalitable

cocktail.name: Flaming Lamborghini
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

cocktail.name: Death Wish
cocktail.instructions: Pour in cup and stir.

cocktail.name: Shandy
cocktail.instructions: Fill a glass half full of beer (lighter beer works better). Fill the rest with Ginger Ale or 7-up (preference)

cocktail.name: Otter Pop
cocktail.instructions: mix all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice, then strain out drink into shot glass

cocktail.name: Fruit Fly
cocktail.instructions: Drain syrup from the fruit cocktail. Mix fruit, cinnamon, and ice in a blender. Add whisky to whisky according to taste. Let blend for about 2 1/2 minuets at high setting.

cocktail.name: Pink Banana
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of creme de banane and then 5 oz. of pink lemonade.

cocktail.name: Golden Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients hard with crushed ice. Serve over crushed ice in a lightly salted margarita glass with two cocktail straws. Garnish with a twist of lime.

cocktail.name: Dolt Bolt
cocktail.instructions: pour into shot glass

cocktail.name: Richie 50
cocktail.instructions: Fill one 16oz glass half full of vodka, add orange juice, stir, and add a cherry.

cocktail.name: Lube Job
cocktail.instructions: It is best to use a "tall" shot glass. Fill it halfway with the irish cream: fill it the rest of the way with vodka and shoot it.

cocktail.name: Iceberg in Radioactive water
cocktail.instructions: Place all drinks into glass and add ice-cream at the end.

cocktail.name: Southern Peach
cocktail.instructions: add all with ice shack and strain

cocktail.name: Zipperhead
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

cocktail.name: A Gilligan's Island
cocktail.instructions: Shaken, not stirred!

cocktail.name: Danger
cocktail.instructions: Put all the indgrediens into a glass and serve it cold.

cocktail.name: Terror From the Deep
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in glass. Drink if you can.

cocktail.name: Purple Margarita
cocktail.instructions: You can either drink this one the rocks or frozen. Salt to taste.

cocktail.name: Grapefruit Teaser
cocktail.instructions: Combine & stir.

cocktail.name: Berrynice
cocktail.instructions: shake with ice garnish with with strawberry on glass,with another summer berry held on with toothpick

cocktail.name: Volvo
cocktail.instructions: Mix in the order mentioned. You can use what ever kind of cognac, and vodka you prefer.

cocktail.name: The Nog
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori, triple sec, and rum into a 12 ounce highball glass filled with ice. Fill the rest of the glass with pineapple juice. Stir. Drink.

cocktail.name: Kioki Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

cocktail.name: The Pineapple Drink
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum over pineapple chunk in a tall glass. Add pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Top with Sprite. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Pure Ecstacy
cocktail.instructions: In a blender add the Bailey's and Kahlua do not fill past 1/3. Add enough ice to "fill" the blender. Blend on a low speed continually adding ice until a milkshake texture is achieved. Add, the vodka, more for strong less for weak. Mix in. Serve.

cocktail.name: Sake Bomb
cocktail.instructions: It's real easy. Drop the shot of Sake into a glass of beer and the just SLAM IT !!!!!!!!!!

cocktail.name: Tiger Woods
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball with ice, add the vodka, lemon juice and cran. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

cocktail.name: Umbrella Man Special
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Serve with straw and ice cubes, put a cocktail umbrella beside the straw in the glass.

cocktail.name: Irish Mint
cocktail.instructions: Pour the milk first and then the Irish Cream - the parts are only guesses, I tend to go by color. You want a creamy beige that has only a slight hint of alcohol. Add just enough Creme de Menthe so as to turn the drink slightly green. Stir it up and serve cold.

cocktail.name: Apple Pie with A Crust
cocktail.instructions: Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the cinnamon. Serve either cold or heated.

cocktail.name: The Peg
cocktail.instructions: Put ice cubes in glass. Add bourbon, coke and lime juice. Garnish with slice of lime (optional)

cocktail.name: Cold Fire
cocktail.instructions: Stir together Milk and Schnapps, pour into highball glass, and serve

cocktail.name: Flaming Moz
cocktail.instructions: Place a short rock (wide mouthed spirit glass) on bar. Pour the blue curacao, white sambuca and chatreuse into a brandy balloon (snifter). Place the brandy balloon horizontally, balancing on the mouth of the short rock. -- Ignite the alcohol in the brandy balloon. Rotate the brandy balloon (like a cement mixer). Pour mixture from brandy balloon to short rock while it is alight. The stream of alcohol falling between the glasses should form a waterfall of fire cascading into the short rock. (I am a poet also) Use the upside down brandy balloon to suffocate the drink in the short rock. Be sure the flames are out. -- Remove the brandy balloon and inhale the fumes. Shoot the drink. -- Hold on to the bar very tightly!

cocktail.name: Cajun Martini
cocktail.instructions: Garnish with jalapeno pepper.

cocktail.name: Zorbatini
cocktail.instructions: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

cocktail.name: Pear Martini
cocktail.instructions: Garnish with a slice of pear.

cocktail.name: Black-Eyed Susan
cocktail.instructions: Chill all ingredients. Just before serving combine in a punch bowl. Unmold ice ring and float in bowl. Serve in tall glasses. Makes 10 large servings.

ingredient.name: Ice ring with fruits (pineapple, lemon, grapes)

cocktail.name: Mexican three wise men
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in any order, under any conditions, at any place. Drink.

cocktail.name: Vodka Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

cocktail.name: Mexican Cappuccino
cocktail.instructions: In coffee mug (a large one, if you have one) pour Kahlua and Tequila into the bottom. Brew cappuccino per the instructions for your machine. Fill cup with espresso and top with the frothed milk. Enjoy

cocktail.name: Killer Kool-Aid #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain, pour into collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a flag, or a flag and a pineapple wedge, if carried by your bar.

cocktail.name: Gorilla Fart #4
cocktail.instructions: Shake and Strain, pour into rocks glass, straight up.

cocktail.name: Bloated Bag of Monkey Spunk
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into collins glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Big Dumb Russian
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice. I like to use a standard beer glass. Add about 2 shots of vodka. Then fill the glass about 3/4th of the way with Sprite. Then add just a splash of pineapple juice. Finally, add the Blue Maui until you get a faint (almost skyblue) blue color. Stir.

cocktail.name: Dewing the Captain
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1oz Morgan over crushed Ice Add Mountain Dew

cocktail.name: Sit On My Face Mary Jane
cocktail.instructions: Pour all three ingredients into the shot glass and shake until mixed together

cocktail.name: Snapple sensation
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Snapple and whiskey in a pewter martini shaker. (preferably pewter because it keeps the drink so cold). Next step put crushed ice in very last so you do not water down the drink. Serve in a martini glass or a huricane glass with 4 lemon drops.

cocktail.name: Electric Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: dump the shots in glass then fill with oj to taste

cocktail.name: Wicked Tasty Treat
cocktail.instructions: Dip the rim of cocktail glass in Amaretto and then into powdered sugar. Shake all alcohol and cream with ice and strain into rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with Cinnamon stick and whipped cream (optional)

cocktail.name: The Fran
cocktail.instructions: Slap it in, stir it around and take it down.

ingredient.name: Pepper sauce, Frank's Orig. Red Hot

cocktail.name: Witch's Clit
cocktail.instructions: Pour out 1/4 gallon gatorade, pour in 1/4 gallon vodka. Cap and shake.

cocktail.name: Easy does it
cocktail.instructions: Bailey's first. Pour Kahlua. Float Everlear. Bottoms up!

cocktail.name: Skip And Go Naked #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour beer into mug. Add lemonade. Float SoCo on top.

cocktail.name: Satan's Piss
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum into shot glass. Add tabasco to the top. Serve room temperature.

cocktail.name: P.M.F.
cocktail.instructions: Fill shaker with ice, add ingreidients to taste. Don't want rum to overpower. Shake well, pour into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

cocktail.name: Shot-gun
cocktail.instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

cocktail.name: Bible Belt
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Irish Curdling Cow
cocktail.instructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

cocktail.name: Creamsicle #2
cocktail.instructions: stir with a straw

cocktail.name: Fuck in the Graveyard
cocktail.instructions: Shake well, serve cold

cocktail.name: Sweet Tooth
cocktail.instructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

cocktail.name: Downshift
cocktail.instructions: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.

cocktail.name: Pink Penocha
cocktail.instructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

cocktail.name: Angel's Tit
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass in order given, carefully so each layer floats on top of the previous one with mixing. Chill for 1/2 hour before serving.

cocktail.name: Kosmo
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Served over ice - very chilled!

cocktail.name: Orange Whip
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Bitter lime
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 oz. Gin (seagrams lemon lime, best), over Ice cubes. Then pour 4 oz. of Lemon lime Gatorade. To finish pour 2 tbspn of lime juice and mix.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Slam
cocktail.instructions: First add the chocolate syrup smoothly on the bottom of the glass. Then mix Vodka in followed by Coca-cola

cocktail.name: Bruised Heart
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass

cocktail.name: Fireball #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Schnapps, Southern Comfort, and Tabasco. Pour into cocktail glass. A cherry may be added.

cocktail.name: Electric Lemonade #1
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in Collins glass filled with ice.

cocktail.name: Stan's Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Pick a highball glass and add som ice. Pour 2 cl of vodka. Add 1 cl of Rose's lime juice. Fill up with equal amounts of grape tonic and orange juice. Add a straw, stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Gideon's Green Dinosaur
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Sit on my face
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order.

cocktail.name: Rearbuster
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila and Kahlua into glass. Add ice. Fill with cranberry juice and stir with straw. A lemon wedge and umbrella are a nice touch.

cocktail.name: A True Amaretto Sour
cocktail.instructions: Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake a jigger of Amaretto with the juice of 1/2 a lemon. Strain into glass and add ice. Garnish with a Marachino Cherry.

cocktail.name: Kool First Aid
cocktail.instructions: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

cocktail.name: Tickle me Elmo
cocktail.instructions: Mix and stir and pour over ice

cocktail.name: Cookie Monster #1
cocktail.instructions: Mix and stir and pour over ice

cocktail.name: Hop, Skip, and Go Naked
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in blender with ice, to the consistency of a margarita.

cocktail.name: Kool-Aid (Boulder style)
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients on ice and strain.

cocktail.name: Super Sprite
cocktail.instructions: First drink 1/4 of the Sprite and fill up the 1/2l bottle with Hammer Lime vodka and drink!

cocktail.name: Tootsy Pop
cocktail.instructions: Pour orange juice in first, then the peach schnaps. Then pour the shot of midori down the side of the glass, so that the midori forms a layer at the bottom of the glass.

cocktail.name: Rumka
cocktail.instructions: Mix it half and half and serve chilled. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Aqua
cocktail.instructions: Shake Vodka, Bailey's and Blue Curacao with ice. Pour into glass and fill up with 7-UP.

cocktail.name: Irish Russian
cocktail.instructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.

cocktail.name: Tequila and Tonic
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 1/2 ounces Cuervo Gold over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with tonic. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Wolfsbane
cocktail.instructions: Rub inside of glass with lemon juice, then sprinkle with sugar. Freeze glass to achieve a frosted affect. Shake together the other ingrediants. Pour into frosted glass and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Chocolate Covered Banana
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice. Garnish with slice of banana.

cocktail.name: Smooth Black Russian
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka in glass followed by the Kahlua. Add the dash of coke (to taste) and stir. Top up the glass with guinness and serve.

cocktail.name: Auburn Headbanger
cocktail.instructions: Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. ENJOY!!

cocktail.name: Paisano
cocktail.instructions: Ice Glass. Add Vodka and Frangelico just like any other drink. Fill with milk. Shake because it is a milk drink.

cocktail.name: Kamikaze Version
cocktail.instructions: Ice Cocktail glass. Add Vodka and mixers. Fill with sour mix and shake because of sour mix.

cocktail.name: Body Shot
cocktail.instructions: Using a partner of the opposite sex, lick their kneck to moisten. Pour packet of sugar onto their kneck. Place wedge of lemon in their mouth with the skin pointed inward. You first lick the sugar from their kneck, then shoot the vodka, then suck the lemon from their mouth (while gently holding back of their kneck.

cocktail.name: Green Froggy
cocktail.instructions: just pour and stur

cocktail.name: Mexican H'ors d'oeuvre
cocktail.instructions: Place the jalapeo on the bottom of a shot glass and fill the glass with tequila. Next cover the surface with Tabasco sauce or Red Hot and shoot it. Be sure to catch the jalapeno in your mouth while swallowing the rest. Chew the jalapeno separately, truly savoring the flavor, and swallow it. Ol!

cocktail.name: Pink Panty Pulldowns #2
cocktail.instructions: In a 2 gallon jug pour in 9oz of marciano cherries and the juice. Then pour in fifth of vodka over cherries and let soak for a few minutes. Then pour in lemon juice and fill jug with sprite. Pour mixture into serving container and strain out cherries. When serving drinks over ice drop cherries in.

cocktail.name: Zima Blaster
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Colorado Pitbull
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker mix Spiced Rum, Kahlua, and Cream. Pur into a Mason Jar filled with ice and add a splach of Coca-Cola. Garnish with a couple of Filberts.

cocktail.name: Rockin' Killer Koolaid
cocktail.instructions: Put alcohol in shaker with ice, shake. Put in hurricane glass over Grenadine to taste. Add in orange juice, pineapple juice and sprite to taste. Garnish with candied cherry.

cocktail.name: Cherry Cheesecake
cocktail.instructions: Add 3/4 jigger of Schnapps then layer cranberry juice on top. May take a few "practice" shots to find the right amounts of each.

cocktail.name: Unabomber
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, place in shot glass. Introduce to mouth.

cocktail.name: Mortuary Mix
cocktail.instructions: Take pitcher. Fill pitcher with bottle of Tom Collins mix. Add everclear to "taste" or 8 oz. if you are a stickler for recipes. Add ice. Get drunk.

cocktail.name: Dirty Martini
cocktail.instructions: Put an ice cube and a small amount of water in cocktail glass. Place in freezer for 2-3 minutes. Fill mixer with all ingredients including garnish. cover and shake hard 3 or 4 times. it is ok to bruise the gin on this one. Remove cocktail glass from freezer, empty, strain drink into cocktail glass add olive from mixer. Serve with a mysterious smile...

cocktail.name: Jet Pilot
cocktail.instructions: Add ice cubes to a mason jar glass. Pour 1 oz of each type of rum over ice. Pour 2 oz's of each juice over ice. Add 1 tsp of grenadine. Top with double shot of southern comfort. More juice could be used to mask liquor. Drink can be stirred if preffered.

cocktail.name: Buccaneer
cocktail.instructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently

cocktail.name: Frozen Rum Runner
cocktail.instructions: Blend at high speed until smooth. Garnish with a lime wheel and cherry. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Gin Bucket
cocktail.instructions: For the full effect you should use a large Folgers coffee can or a metal bucket. First, fill the can half full with ice and add the gin(the whole bottle). Next, add the concentrates and cherries. Finally, shake the can until its ready to drink.

cocktail.name: The Moby
cocktail.instructions: pour surge then vodka, enjoy!

cocktail.name: Bushwacker #1
cocktail.instructions: Combine in blender, blend until smooth, serves two in 12oz cups.

cocktail.name: Coco's Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a shaker and serve with a slice of lime

cocktail.name: Miami Ice
cocktail.instructions: Just add "EVERYTHING" except the Peach Schnapps into the MUG, Lightly stir and then add as much ice (smallest cubes possible) you can fit in. NOTE: Leave just enough room at the top for the 1/4 oz. of Peach Schnapps.

cocktail.name: Popper
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila into shot glass. Fill the rest of glass with 7-up. Cover top of glass with hand and slam hard onto counter or bar. This causes shot to fizz, so drink quickly!

cocktail.name: Electric Lemonade #2
cocktail.instructions: fill collins glass with ice pour in rum and blue curacao pour in sweet & sour mix splash cola lemon twist garnish

cocktail.name: Homemade Kahlua
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.

cocktail.name: Coconut Frappe
cocktail.instructions: Shake or blend until frothy, then pour over ice and garnish with toasted coconut.

cocktail.name: Blow Job #4
cocktail.instructions: Layer each ingredient into a Sherry Glass in order as listed. Indulge in this creamy minty flavour!

cocktail.name: Orgasm #3
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberry or cherry.

cocktail.name: Multiple Orgasm #1
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberries or cherries.

cocktail.name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice. Granish with strawberries or cherries.

cocktail.name: Twains Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order.

cocktail.name: Dirty Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order.

cocktail.name: Vibrator
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order.

cocktail.name: Chastity Belt
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order.

cocktail.name: Martian Hard On
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order.

cocktail.name: Suitor
cocktail.instructions: Pour in order.

cocktail.name: Prarie Fire
cocktail.instructions: Pour one shot of tequila into the glass. Add Tabasco to taste

cocktail.name: Screwdriver with Color
cocktail.instructions: Start with a shot or two (depending on your preference) of vodka in the glass. Add organge juice until its almost full. Then add a shot or two of Kahlua , just until its has a bit of color. Then some ice, and stirr

cocktail.name: Purple Cow #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve in highball glass filled with ice.

cocktail.name: Witch's Brew
cocktail.instructions: Shake all the ingrediants together and serve in a chilled glass.

cocktail.name: 24k nightmare
cocktail.instructions: Add over ice,shake and pour.

cocktail.name: Yellow Parakeet
cocktail.instructions: fill glass with ice and build drink top with splash of sour

cocktail.name: Red Royal
cocktail.instructions: build in a glass with ice and drink. you can also make it as a shot!!

cocktail.name: Eerie Witch's Brew
cocktail.instructions: In a 1 to 2 quart pan, bring 1 cup of cranberry juice and candied ginger to a boil over high heat. Boil, uncovered, about 2 minutes, set aside. With a vegetable peeler, pare peel (colored part only) from oranges: cut peel into thin 2 in long worms: or use an Oriental shredder to make long shreds. Add orange peel to cranberry mixture. Cover and chill at least 4 hours or as long as overnight. Juice oranges: put juice in a 6 to 8 quart pan or heavy bowl. Stir in cranberry-ginger mixture, the 3 cups cranberry juice, apple concentrate, limeade, grapes and water. If made ahead, cover and chill up to 2 hours. Add ginger ale and about a 1 pound piece of dry ice (DO NOT put small pieces in punch or cups): ice should smolder at least 30 minutes. Ladle into cups. Add any remaining ice when bubbling ceases.

cocktail.name: Warm Witch's Blood
cocktail.instructions: Bring to a boil in a saucepan and reduce heat to simmer. Simmer gently for 15 minutes, stirring and muttering appropriate incantations. Serve in ghoulish glasses, garnish with an orange slice if desired.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Boilermaker
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.

cocktail.name: Army special
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka, Gin and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.

cocktail.name: Sweetie
cocktail.instructions: Pour cream soda last: this gives a foam similar to that on an ice cream float.

cocktail.name: Swift kick in the Ass
cocktail.instructions: Just fuckin' mix it

cocktail.name: Frog in a blender
cocktail.instructions: Blend OJ, Blue Maui, and Vodka, put in glass. Splash grenadine on top, but do not stir in . Drink

cocktail.name: French Monkey
cocktail.instructions: It's simple just add the 2 together and you've got "French Monkey Madness!!"

cocktail.name: Black Russian #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour Stoli, Kaluha into highball over ice. Top with Coke and serve.

cocktail.name: Heilig
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and then blueberry schnapps into shot glass. Top off with the cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #11
cocktail.instructions: No mixing, just pour in in any order.

cocktail.name: Arizona Twister
cocktail.instructions: Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

cocktail.name: Green-eyed Bi
cocktail.instructions: Pour the 1/4 shot kiwi liqueur in to the shot glass. Then add the 3/4 shot vodka. Drop in a green gummi fish candy, and serve.

cocktail.name: Lucky Lindeman
cocktail.instructions: Empty one can of Tropicana strawberry/orange/banana into a blender and 1/4 gallon vodka. Mix well. Pour half of this into a pitcher and set aside for later use, leaving the other half in the blender. Fill the blender with ice and blend until it resembles a slurpy. Drink up and start mixing the other half.

cocktail.name: Boswandeling (A walk in the woods)
cocktail.instructions: Just add all ingredients and add quite a lot of Angostura and try to make sure that the Angostura is mixed through the drink.

cocktail.name: Tequila Slammer
cocktail.instructions: When the two ingredients are in the shot glass, take a folded paper towel and put over the top. Slam the shot glass on the table, bar, etc. Make sure the drink fizzes. Turn up and drink while its still fizzing.

cocktail.name: Baby Guinness
cocktail.instructions: Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the "Guinness" its "head".

cocktail.name: Nelson special
cocktail.instructions: Pour all into any kind of glass, mix with small stick and add a slice of orange and a cherry in glass.

cocktail.name: Rye & Pepper
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1 to 2 oz. of Canadian Club or other whiskey into a glass with ice. Add 1/2 can Dr. Pepper. Stir.

cocktail.name: Delilah
cocktail.instructions: Add gin, cointrean and lemon juice to a shaker filled with ice shake hard (30 seconds) and serve up in a cocktail glass with lemon twist as garnish

cocktail.name: Rum and Coke
cocktail.instructions: For an extra kick, use Bacardi 151. If you want a lime taste, use Bacardi Limon.

cocktail.name: G. T. O.
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in tin over ice. Strain into shot glasses and enjoy!!!!

cocktail.name: Smurf-o-tonic
cocktail.instructions: Pour the gin, blue curacao and the tonic water into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge. If you want, you can add the blue curacao after stiring the drink.

cocktail.name: Jesus is Here
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and then the russian. Stir gently. Drink.

cocktail.name: Russian Qualude #3
cocktail.instructions: Layer drink by pouring each shot slowly over the back side of a teaspoon held just above the liquid level.

cocktail.name: The Italian Job
cocktail.instructions: Whisk with a fork, untill all mixed in. Add cream after mixing.

ingredient.name: Blackcurrant squash (can use orange or apple)

cocktail.name: Texas Prairie Fire
cocktail.instructions: Pour 3/4 shot of Tequila in shot glass, top off with lime juice, splash in tabasco sauce, and shoot.

cocktail.name: Citron my face
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice and strain

cocktail.name: Elmer Fudpucker
cocktail.instructions: Mix Beer, Soda, and frozen lemonade into a large pitcher. Then fill empty lemon aid container with vodka and add to mixture. Stir.

cocktail.name: Peach Fuzz
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender 1/2 full with ice cubes. Add 6 oz. can of frozen limeade. Add 6 oz. vodka (use limeade can to measure). Add 2 ripe peaches (remove pit and slice). Whip it!

cocktail.name: Geneva Convention
cocktail.instructions: Fill half a shaker with ice. Add the ingredients. Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Alice in Wonderland
cocktail.instructions: Just mix the three ingredients one to one to one

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Cooter
cocktail.instructions: 2 shots of vodka, 2 shots of Peach Schnapps. Fill the rest with Ginger Ale, Lemonade, and OJ to taste

cocktail.name: Flying Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Layer each ingredient starting with Kahlua, then Bailey's and finish with the Banana liqueur. If you have difficulty layering the shooter (shot) use a tea spoon held upside down and poor over slowly.

cocktail.name: Antifreeze #2
cocktail.instructions: Add vodka to glass over ice. Then add water and lemon lime mix. Stir until all is dissolved.

cocktail.name: Blue Dog
cocktail.instructions: Combine both while cold.

cocktail.name: Columbia Gold
cocktail.instructions: Blend well with large scoop of ice.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Ass
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients into a large strainer/mixer. Add a handful of ice. Shake for a few seconds. Strain into a mason jar....

cocktail.name: Bushwacker #4
cocktail.instructions: First place three or four ice cubes in a rock glass. The Bailey's is placed in the glass first otherwise the cream will curdle. Then the Bushmill's whiskey is added slowly and stirred until thoroughly mixed.

cocktail.name: Root Canal
cocktail.instructions: Combine 1/4 oz. peppermint schnapps with 2 oz. rootbeer schnapps. Fill with Dr.Pepper or rootbeer and stir. Garnish with a cherry over ice and serve.

cocktail.name: Summer Mind Eraser
cocktail.instructions: First, fill the champagne flute with heaps of ice. Next, pour in your Schnapps and Midori. Now fill the flute to the top with Champagne. Let the drink settle for a minute (especially if you've been pouring behind a busy, bumpy nightclub!). Use a long bar straw to drink the shot from the bottom up (push the straw right to the bottom of the flute before starting), all at once! Very Important - Don't stop in the middle of the drink!

cocktail.name: 501 Blue
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Airhead
cocktail.instructions: Pour peach Schnapps into shot glass. Add chilled cranberry juice to fill.

cocktail.name: Dolphin's Foam
cocktail.instructions: Shake VERY,VERY,VERY well in a shaker with lots of ice. leave the ice in the shaker, not in the drink. can be served with a red cherry in it.

cocktail.name: Coke and Drops
cocktail.instructions: Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Walk Me Down
cocktail.instructions: Add the shots, 1/2 shots for the ladies. Over ice is best.Mix well.

cocktail.name: Flying Squadron
cocktail.instructions: First, add some ice. Then, pour in your Jack Daniels. Finally add Pepsi and slosh around to mix. Enjoy your victory drink.

cocktail.name: I.V. (Italian Valium)
cocktail.instructions: Mix thoroughly.

cocktail.name: Juicy Lucy #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all above, pour over ice, and enjoy!!!

cocktail.name: Separator
cocktail.instructions: Fill dbl rocks glass with ice, add brandy, Kahlua,and milk. Shake well , return to glass.

cocktail.name: Ruby Tuesday
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

cocktail.name: Purple Hooter Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Peppermint Pattie
cocktail.instructions: fill glass with ice pour creme de cacao and the creme de menthe over ice. stir and enjoy. Is best after dinner but can be enjoyed anytime.

cocktail.name: Sweet Tart - Loyalist Rez
cocktail.instructions: mix all ingrediants together in container. poor into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Arctic Mouthwash
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

cocktail.name: No Problem!
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and pour

cocktail.name: Brain Fart
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.

cocktail.name: Black Martini #2
cocktail.instructions: combine in shaker. shake vigorously. strain into cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Royal Bitch
cocktail.instructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

cocktail.name: Psycho
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into glass Decorate with slice of Orange, Pineapple and a red Cocktial cherry.

cocktail.name: Purple Motherfucker #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into mixing cup 1/4 full ice. Stir then pour into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Iceberg in Radioactive water #2
cocktail.instructions: Add Ice-cream last. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Lina
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything together in a hightumbler glass. Then drink it and get a "ragg"! (Swedish for Pickin up babes)

cocktail.name: Big Apple
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka into a collins glass over three or four ice cubes and fill with apple juice. Pour creme de menthe, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Small Bomb #2
cocktail.instructions: Begin by filling the glass halfway with Amaretto, add shots of melon, add shots of everclear, add rest of glass with pineapple juice, stir, then pour into glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Nan's special
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Vodka, 7-up & Soda in that order. Add lemon juice. Add salt gradually until the sweet taste of 7-up just disappears.

cocktail.name: Wet Snatch
cocktail.instructions: Add blue raspberry to ice, add vanilla, pinapple, and coconut, then blend. Add tequila, blend again. Whipped cream on top optional.

cocktail.name: Dogs Bollocks
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the vodka first and then proceed to pour the beer on top.

cocktail.name: Purple Shroud
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a mixing glass, shake, add more Sloe Gin or Blue Curacao to achieve the desired hue of purple. Strain into an old fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Hairball
cocktail.instructions: Fill 1/3 of the collins glass with cider, then float the Guinness ontop, to bring the volume to 2/3 full. Pour Bushmill's in a separate shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the collins glass and slam it!

cocktail.name: Duck Shit Inn
cocktail.instructions: Layer in cordial glass.

cocktail.name: Citrus Coke
cocktail.instructions: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!

cocktail.name: Off your ass in a glass
cocktail.instructions: No organized mixing require. Put all ingredients in a glass, stir, and drink straight. Then you had better lie down.

cocktail.name: Dakota
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a double shot glass and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Snow Blinder
cocktail.instructions: Pour vidka in blender and add ice crem. Blend. Top with lemonade.

cocktail.name: Skylab Fallout
cocktail.instructions: Put plenty of ice in glass pour rum and everclear first refill with ice - put your tequila, gin, vodka and your blue curraco in. put your pinapple juice in and shake serve with a lemon slice and cherry

cocktail.name: Ethiopian Camel Basher
cocktail.instructions: Grenadine will sink to the bottom of the glass. The dash should be just enough to give a thin layer. Mix thoroghly. The correct mix will give a drink which is between pink & orange in color, but exactly NOT one or the other.

cocktail.name: Smut
cocktail.instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

cocktail.name: Brown Cow #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with the amount of Tia Maria you would like and put an equal amount, or a little more, of milk. Add two ice cubes and down.

cocktail.name: Silk Panties
cocktail.instructions: Combine over ice, strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Slippery Box
cocktail.instructions: In a glass, put in all liquor and then fill the remaining glass with the kool-aid

cocktail.name: The Feckin Bolox
cocktail.instructions: take the galliano and fill one third of the glass. then using a table spoon measure out the bayleys and pour onto the galliano, so that they are seperated. finally, clean the spoon, and measure out the coinraux pour onto the bayleys again so that they are seperated. take a match or lighter and light the cointraux, take a straw and place at bottom of glass and drink.

cocktail.name: Titty Excreation
cocktail.instructions: Pour in a big glass. Mix. It's best when it's cold and on the rocks.

cocktail.name: The Angry German
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into shot glasses. Yell your favorite swear word and drink.

cocktail.name: Dirty Mexican Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: First add vodka to lemaonade, sprite goes in last. Stir.

cocktail.name: Hot Apple Pie #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shot glass half full with the Bailey's and the rest of the way with the Goldschlager. Mix with toothpick. Then sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on the top and light it with a match (it may take a couple of tries to get it to stay lit). Let it burn for a few seconds and gently blow out the flame being careful not to splash the drink out of the glass. Then, drink!

cocktail.name: Skull
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingrediants.

cocktail.name: Bend Me Over
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice if desired.

cocktail.name: Apple Slut
cocktail.instructions: Pour shots in glass and add Sprite to your taste.

cocktail.name: Fulminator
cocktail.instructions: Cut lemons into wedges and mix into large container.

cocktail.name: Scotty Boy
cocktail.instructions: Pour a lot of kurant into ice filled glass. Fill with sour mix. Shake, always shake and add a splash of soda. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Lemon Lightning
cocktail.instructions: Add equal parts of Everclear and lemon juice to a shot glass. Place the shot into the freezer for 30 minutes to completely chill it. Drink it ice cold.

cocktail.name: The Party Girl
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker, mix all ingredients, shake well. Serve over ice, garnish with a lime wedge (optional)

cocktail.name: The Three Wise Men
cocktail.instructions: My experience shows that pouring in any order has no bearing on the overall taste of the drink.

cocktail.name: Death of a Virgin
cocktail.instructions: Pour first three ingredients. Then pour orange juice until cup is little more than half filled. Then fill the rest of the way with 7-up and stir until well mixed.

cocktail.name: Dirtiest Ernie
cocktail.instructions: Mix the three ingredients in a shot glass and slam

cocktail.name: Gangbuster Punch
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Pixie Stick
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin, then midori, then 7-up (to fill) over ice in a Tom Collins glass. Shake in cocktail shaker, add straw, cherry. Tastes like candy.

cocktail.name: Red Lion
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain. Before serving, moisten the edge of the highball glass and dip in castor sugar.

cocktail.name: Black Orchid
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve

cocktail.name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
cocktail.instructions: Equal parts. All ingredients are measured equally in no particular order.

cocktail.name: Bjorns Moscow Mule
cocktail.instructions: mix lemonjuice with vodka, fill with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Field of Green
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Sloe Gin and Amaretto into a glass. Fill the Glass 1/2 way with 7-up (Optional), and the other 1/2 with Orange Juice

cocktail.name: Raspberry Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes. Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Crantini
cocktail.instructions: Add all the ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Then shake,pour into martini glass and add a few cranberries to complete the drink.(Soak the cranberries in vodka first)

cocktail.name: Jamaican Screw
cocktail.instructions: Mix rum and orange juice together (stirring) then pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Sex on my face
cocktail.instructions: Mix in tall glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Pumpkin Eater
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and ingredients into blender and blend well. Serve in a house glass and garnish with a orange wedge and cherry.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Martini
cocktail.instructions: Combine Vodka and Schnapps over lots of ice. Stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with fresh slice of peach.

cocktail.name: Apple Judy
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Serve without garnish in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bleeding Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Cut the pineapple into small chunks and soak them in the vodka and rum for 20-30 minutes. Add the rest of the ingredients and you're all good.

cocktail.name: Love Potion #159
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker with ice, shake and serve on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Wet Crotch
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker with ice, shake and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Deep-7
cocktail.instructions: Pour in amaretto and rum on the rocks then add 7-up. stir and serve

cocktail.name: Halfway Special
cocktail.instructions: Combine with ice. Strain. serve in hollowed out pineapple.

cocktail.name: Bitches Tit
cocktail.instructions: Pour the chamborde into a shaker, add cream or milk and shake well. Pour into an Irish Cream mug filled with ice. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Bloody Smurf
cocktail.instructions: Pour schnapps into glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice and stir.

cocktail.name: Jgermonster
cocktail.instructions: Shake with plenty of ice and strain.

cocktail.name: Flamming Gorrilla Titties
cocktail.instructions: Add the 1 oz of Kahlua and then add the 1 oz of Bacardi 151 rum to the shot glass. Place a small sipping straw in the mixture and then light on fire. The straw is so you do not burn your eyebrows off. Once lit suck the shot through the straw till empty. Tastes like chocolate milk. I have made this drink quite often at parties and it goes over very well with everyone. Try it a few times it does take a little practice to get it right.

cocktail.name: Soda Cracker
cocktail.instructions: Fill old fashioned glass with ice,add alcohol and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Bacardi Stinger
cocktail.instructions: Add Amaretto and rum, fill with coke, and stir.

cocktail.name: BearCat Special
cocktail.instructions: Put both in shot glass, mix, and down.

cocktail.name: Dead Lizard
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka into glass. Add cordial until colour becomes light red. Add coke until definite colour change occurs. Drink.

cocktail.name: Jilly
cocktail.instructions: In a rocks glass, pour 1 oz. vodka over ice. Fill 3/4 with tonic. Add a splash of cranberry juice, then squeeze the lime wedge in.

cocktail.name: The Bozek
cocktail.instructions: Add ingrediants in following order: ice, vodka, lime, and then pineapple. Stir vigurously.

cocktail.name: Killer Sniff
cocktail.instructions: First, pour the Blue curacoa in the glass followed by the Sambucca. Then light this mixture. Let it burn for a few seconds and then put your hand on top of the glass (keep it on the glass) as soon as flames go out, bring the glass to your nose and sniff the alcohol. Then drink it. After this: relight the glass and sniff again. cheers!

cocktail.name: Phreaker Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Fill a fifth bottle half vodka, half water.Leaving enough water out to add the egg white.Shake well until egg is thoroughly mixed. Add into punch bowl with the Triple Sec,pineapple juice, and lemon juice.Add sugar. (more or less for taste).

cocktail.name: Cherry Comfort
cocktail.instructions: Pour about 4 oz of your favorite Cherry Cola into a cup. Add about 1 shot (1 oz) of Southern Comfort 100 (or 2 depending on how your college football team is doing). Ice is optional.

cocktail.name: Fruity Pebbles
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients to taste in any kind of container.

cocktail.name: Smartie
cocktail.instructions: Put 1/2 oz. of Grape Schnapps, and 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Black Dragon
cocktail.instructions: First add the mint schnapps, then add the kahlua and finally add the scotch. If done correctly you should have three different layers.

cocktail.name: Brown Hen
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, then vodka, then bitters. Stir.

cocktail.name: Magic Dew
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1/2 part Blue Maui with 1/2 part Mountain Dew to taste.

cocktail.name: Hilde's Special
cocktail.instructions: Use a blender. Fill it with ice. Pour in the ingrediences. And blend it all together. Serve in a hurricane glass with a piece of orange on the glass.

cocktail.name: Blonde's Death
cocktail.instructions: Mix in the glass. Serve cool!

cocktail.name: June Bug
cocktail.instructions: Mix Midori, Malibu Rum, and Pineapple Juice equally over ice. Add Banana liqueur if desired but it's better without it.

cocktail.name: The Mad Hungarian
cocktail.instructions: An easy mix of rum and root beer, on the rocks, or without. The rum is a definite 2 shot minimum, as that it blends seamlessly with the root beer. The Captains can be substituted with Malibu rum for a more island flare.

cocktail.name: Rock-and-Rye Toddy
cocktail.instructions: Pour rock and rye and bitters into coffee mug. Add lemon slice. Add boiling water and cinnamon stick. Stir. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Frisky Steve
cocktail.instructions: Start with ice. Add vodka to prefered level. Next add wanted amount of Champagne and finish off the glass with ginger ale. Mix and drink.

cocktail.name: Mir
cocktail.instructions: Pour both shots over rocks into a highball glass. Fill with coke, or soda of your choice.

cocktail.name: Russian seven
cocktail.instructions: In a tall glass with ice add 1.5 oz of vodka, fill to top with seven-up. Garnish with lime peel.

cocktail.name: Trashcan Punch
cocktail.instructions: Slice the fruit. I recommend strawberries, oranges, lemons, and limes. Then mix the punch and everclear together in a a CLEAN trashcan with ice. Hawaiin punch is my preference, but you can use any sort of fruit punch. Make sure you use ice and have a blast.

cocktail.name: Green K
cocktail.instructions: Shake with Ice. Fill in 4 glasses. Serve with sugar crusta.

cocktail.name: Southern Dream
cocktail.instructions: Fill an Old Fashioned Glass half full with ice cubes. Next pour the Southern comfort in, than add the schnapps, being carefull not to mix the drinks too much.

cocktail.name: ODWITS
cocktail.instructions: Mix Tequila, vodka and southern comfort. Add a few rocks of ice and top up with fresh orange juice. Add just a dash of Galliano and stir. Serve with a large slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: True Alabama Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Pour in a bowl.

cocktail.name: Monkey C*m
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass about 3/4 full with Bailey's Irish Cream. Perfection is not necessary with this drink. Fill rest of way with Butterscotch Schnapps.

cocktail.name: Tiki Torch
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass halfway with Tang. Add Vodka until you can begin to taste the Vodka. Mix drink to taste.

cocktail.name: Limonaide
cocktail.instructions: Take a tall or short glass fill with ice. Then mix the bacardi and the lemonade in an equal 50-50 share.

cocktail.name: Jogeir
cocktail.instructions: Mix lime vodka, absolut citron and juice together and put it in a shot glas, then add galliano right before serving. Shoot it.

cocktail.name: Golddigger
cocktail.instructions: Pour in shot glass,and pray for the best.

cocktail.name: Kahlua #6
cocktail.instructions: Mix 3 cups water with 4 cups sugar, bring to boil and boil for 20 minutes. Set aside, add 1 whole vanilla bean split. Let mixture cool. Add 2 oz instant coffee to 1 cup boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Set aside & cool. When above are cool (important) put into a half gallon container and add the vodka. Let age for at least 3 weeks.

cocktail.name: Incredible Hulk
cocktail.instructions: pour ingredients over ice in normal glass

cocktail.name: Flaming Citrus Action
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in an ordinary glass

cocktail.name: Electric Jam
cocktail.instructions: The instructions were given in order of adding.

cocktail.name: Krypto Kami
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice. Strain into a higball glass.

cocktail.name: Flatliner
cocktail.instructions: Sayer the tequila over sambuca Add tabasco.

cocktail.name: Moninger's Madness
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient into the glass (the bigger the better) and stir it up. You can pour it over ice, too. You can vary the cranberry juice a little bit.

cocktail.name: Flying Masturbator
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and amaretto into the cup first. Then, add OJ until the cup is about half full and add cranberry juice until the glass is about 3/4 full. Add ice to fill the cup, then shake the drink vigorously for a few seconds. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Blue Edisonian
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Emerald Isle #2
cocktail.instructions: Stir and add some ice and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Sex Appeal
cocktail.instructions: Mix two rums, melon, peach and blue curacao in a mixing tin with the sour mix. Pour into a collins glass with ice and add a dash of lemonade. Garnish with lemon squeeze.

cocktail.name: Panty Dropper
cocktail.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice: add 1 oz Kahlua: add 1 oz Sloe Gin: fill glass to top with half and half

cocktail.name: Adios Mother
cocktail.instructions: Fill Hurricane glass with ice: add 1 oz Vodka: add 1 oz Gin: add 1 oz White Rum: add 1 oz Blue Curacao: Fill glass with equal parts sour mix and Seven Up: Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Martini
cocktail.instructions: Rub rim of chilled martini glass with a cut strawberry. Dip rim into a bowl of sugar until evenly coated. Pour Gin/Vodka, vermouth, and grenadine into a mixing glass with plenty of ice, and stir briskly. Strain into martini glass and drop in a strawberry.

cocktail.name: Flaming Cornholio
cocktail.instructions: Mix the o.j. and J.D. in a beer mug and drop the shot glass of Firewater in it.

cocktail.name: Nay-Nay Strohmeyer
cocktail.instructions: Just pour all three in a big container. Order is not important.

cocktail.name: Rubbermeister
cocktail.instructions: Put the Coke in the glass first, then pour the Jager. It's as simple as that.

cocktail.name: Mahwah Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Put the whiskey and SoCo in your glass. Pour in some Iced Tea of any variety. Then add the ice cubes. Adjust the dosages of alcohol if your glass differs in size or you've had a bad day.

cocktail.name: Bernardete
cocktail.instructions: Pour peach and lime liqueurs over 3-4 ice cubes in a tall glass. Fill with peach juice.

cocktail.name: Black Samurai
cocktail.instructions: Add the one oz. of Sake to a shot glass, followed by the 1/2 oz. of Soy Sauce...Let settle for 30sec...

cocktail.name: Long Beach Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: In a tall glass, pour shots over ice and top off with cranberry juice and lemon wedge (squeeze if you like). Give the drink a little shake (if you like) and drink up!

cocktail.name: Black Widow
cocktail.instructions: Pour both over ice & shake. Strain into a martini glass and add a lemon twist for garnish.

cocktail.name: Rum Punch #2
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve honey in warm water. Put liquid honey, lemon juice and rum together in tall jug. Add mint leaves and leave to stand while brewing tea. Pour boiling water in a jug and steeped tea bag for 5 minutes. Remove tea bag and chill tea. Pour chilled tea and dry ginger ale into rum mixture. Stir well. To serve: pour over one ice cube in each glass.

ingredient.name: Mint leaves, roughly chopped or torn

cocktail.name: Apple Pie Shooter
cocktail.instructions: This drink requires at least 2 people. Drinker sits in a chair, head back, mouth open. Person 2 pours the apple juice, then the vodka in the drinker's mouth (drinker must be VERY careful to keep his/her throat closed). Then person 2 sprays some in whipped cream and tops with a SMALL amount of cinnamon (too much will make drinker sneeze and possible other not-so-fun things). Drinker sits up, swishes all ingredients together and swallows.

cocktail.name: H2O
cocktail.instructions: Pour in vodka, pineapple, orange, lemonade, and fresca - MIX!!

cocktail.name: Pina Colada #2
cocktail.instructions: Add some crumbled ice, mix it well and pour it into a tall glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh pineapple.

cocktail.name: Boomerang Shot
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shot glass 1/2 way with the yukon jack. top it off with the Jgermeister.

cocktail.name: Long Beach Ice Tea
cocktail.instructions: garnish with fresh lime cuts.

cocktail.name: Red Velvet
cocktail.instructions: Build. Top with grenadine. Lime boat garnish.

cocktail.name: Carl Johan
cocktail.instructions: Mix. Top with Schweppes. Garnish with lime slice.

cocktail.name: Mother Pucker
cocktail.instructions: Pour in appropriate amounts in mixing container to your liking. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Bald Pussy
cocktail.instructions: Start at the top and venture your way to the bottom. Pour over ice and shake it on home! Pour in a highball glass and give 2 or 3 big gulps.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Blue Gobbler
cocktail.instructions: Start at top and work your way down.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Bullet
cocktail.instructions: Just mix it and drink it!

cocktail.name: Power Drill
cocktail.instructions: fill equal parts of orange juice and vodka almost to the top of a shot glass. splash some beer into the glass to fill the glass.

cocktail.name: Red Baron #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice, and pour!

cocktail.name: Nuclear Rainbow
cocktail.instructions: In order layered over spoon.

cocktail.name: The Captain's Martini
cocktail.instructions: Combine the gin, vermouth, and creme de menthe in a shaker with ice, shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Pocima
cocktail.instructions: Pour the six beer cans, the liter of Vodka and the two gallons of orange juice along with the ice cubes in to the punch bowl. Stir, and serve cold.

cocktail.name: Calimocho Torreon Special
cocktail.instructions: Fill the highball glass with ice, then half fill it with red wine, and half fill it with coca-cola. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Booda's Black Brew
cocktail.instructions: Hurricane Glass Fill with Ice 1oz. Malibu Rum or Parrots Bay Coocnut Rum 3/4oz. Blue Curacao 3/4oz. Chambord 1/2oz. Grenadine Fill with Cranberry Top and Shake

cocktail.name: Upper Cut
cocktail.instructions: Just like an irish coffey. Wait till it has cooled a bit. Drink all in one move.

cocktail.name: Lemon Twister
cocktail.instructions: Shake together, stirring bruises the vodka.

cocktail.name: Bram Stoker's Dracula
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in a double shot glass (alcohol first!) then float the pepper on top.

cocktail.name: Absolut Mixer
cocktail.instructions: Shake together over ice, strain into highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Zombie #4
cocktail.instructions: Strain ingredients into collins glass filled with ice. Top with 151-proof Rum.

cocktail.name: Grumpy Old Man
cocktail.instructions: Pack old-fashioned or rocks glass with ice. Add Old Grand Dad, add Lime Juice, top with Ginger Ale. Serve with sip stick, no garnish.

cocktail.name: Grumpier Old Man
cocktail.instructions: Pack old-fashioned or rocks glass with ice. Add Old Grand Dad (high proof bourbon, similar to Wild Turkey), add Lime Juice, top with Sour Mix. Serve with sip stick, no garnish.

cocktail.name: Danini
cocktail.instructions: First two shots of Vodka, then the lime juice. Add ice. Top up the glass with Coke.

cocktail.name: The Phantom
cocktail.instructions: Take a longdrink glass and fill it with ice. Mix Licor 43 and Absolut vodka, fill up with milk. In the summer you can mix the drink with icecream and make a very nice milkshake.

cocktail.name: Milk Shake 43
cocktail.instructions: Pour Licor 43 over ice, shake and strain into glass. Vary ingredients to taste.

cocktail.name: Richards family
cocktail.instructions: Use a big beer-glass, pour the spirits into it, then fill it up with hot coffee.

cocktail.name: Malibu Massage
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into an old fashion glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

cocktail.name: UFO
cocktail.instructions: You pour the Genever in a glass fill it up with bitter lemon add some ice cubes and you are ready.

cocktail.name: Nummer 10
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass up to 1/3 with raspberry vodka. Scatter a few drops of Kalha into the raspberry vodka and mix it. Be careful, it?s important not to get to much Kalha. Fill up the glass with Schweppes Russchian and the Nummer 10 is complete. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Flaming Kevin
cocktail.instructions: Just mix and stir

cocktail.name: Long Iver Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquor over ice. Fill 3/4 full with sour mix. Shake. Top with cola and add lemmon wedge.

cocktail.name: Hawiian Tidal Wave
cocktail.instructions: Blend Malibu, peach schnapps, blue curacao, and sweet and sour. Pour into ice filled glass. Top off with lemon-lime soda.

cocktail.name: Aftershock
cocktail.instructions: Pour the ingredients into the glass and stir.

cocktail.name: Fireball #3
cocktail.instructions: First add 1 part tequila to the shot glass. Then add the sambuca and a few drops of tabasco sauce. Instead of tabasco sauce you can add 2 to 3 coffee beans instead (try one of each and see what you like better). Pour some sambuca all over the glass and light it on fire. Let it burn for approx. 10 to 20 seconds. You can now leave it burn and sip through straw or blow out (carefully) and take it down like a normal shot. Don't forget to eat the beans. Have fun!

cocktail.name: Snakebite #3
cocktail.instructions: Add 1 part Jack Daniels whiskey and 1 part tequila to your shot glass. Then add a few(5 to 10) drops of tabasco sauce. Take it down like a shot.

cocktail.name: Boston Burn-out
cocktail.instructions: In a LARGE shot glass (or small juice glass), add Rootbeer Schnapps, Amaretto, Butterscotch Schnapps and Bacardi 151 dark. Top off with Bailey's Irish Cream. Add 4 to 6 drops (or more for the daring) of Tabasco on top. Slam, do not sip!

cocktail.name: The Player
cocktail.instructions: Start with cold, preferrably frosted beer mug. Fill with 4 shots of Tequila, and pour orange juice in. Next add strawberry daiquiri mix on top. Wait two minutes and always serve cold, with ice if necessary.

cocktail.name: North Dakota Special
cocktail.instructions: Use a glass that this will fit in. add one at a time.

cocktail.name: Matisse
cocktail.instructions: Chill glass. Shake Stoli Oranj over ice. Glaze glass with Chambord. Pour Stoli and garnish with twist of lime.

cocktail.name: Captains Saddle
cocktail.instructions: Mix rootbeer schnaps with spiced rum and chill with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass and enjoy

cocktail.name: Dirty Martini #2
cocktail.instructions: Use mixing glass with ice pour gin and splash of olive juice from the jar or fruit tray. Shake or stir does not matter. Strain into Martini glass. Garnish with at least 3 olives.

cocktail.name: Casey Special
cocktail.instructions: Mix and Drink. Slam and Jam.

cocktail.name: Dumbfuck
cocktail.instructions: Put in shot glass and stir

cocktail.name: Pure Exstacy
cocktail.instructions: Fill Blender to the top with Ice cubes. Add remaining ingredients. Blend until ice is crushed adding more until texture is that of a milkshake. Serve as many as you can, then make more.

cocktail.name: Bailey's Cup of Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Mix the hot coffee with Bailey's. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Dew
cocktail.instructions: You mix the two ingredients and you have your drink!

cocktail.name: Strawberry Mojito
cocktail.instructions: Muddle strawberries, mint, lime and Creme de Fraise des Boise hard in a shaker tin. Add Havana Club 3-year Old rum and fill shaker with ice. Shake well. Double strain (through sieve) into Collins Glass filled with cracked ice. Top with a splash of soda water and garnish with spring of mint.

cocktail.name: Nickler
cocktail.instructions: Fill a tall shot glass with the cheapest brandy that you can find. Take your round slice of lemon and place it over the top of the pony glass. Pour sugar over one half of the lemon leaving the other half bare. Pour instant coffee over the other half of the lemon (next to the sugar). Fold the lemon slice in half and put in mouth biting off the rind. Chew and swallow the lemon combination and chase immediately with the brandy in the shot glass.

cocktail.name: Red Headed Slut
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shot glass. Shoot.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Banana
cocktail.instructions: Fill Glass with ice. Add Creme de Banane to glass. Add Creme de Cacao to glass. Fill glass with milk.

cocktail.name: Weekend On The Beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Crown Royal, apple & peach schnapps, and sweet and sour mix with ice cubes in shaker and shake till well blended. Strain into a shot glass. One serving.

cocktail.name: Bavarian Alps
cocktail.instructions: Shake together all ingrediants and serve in a frosted glass.

cocktail.name: Coffee 43
cocktail.instructions: Put liquer and coffee into mug. Pour cream gently over the coffee, don't let them mix.

cocktail.name: Canadian Rum Punch
cocktail.instructions: Bring water to a boil, then add sugar. stir until sugar is dissolved. remove from heat and add rum and lemon juice. Serve with Ice.

cocktail.name: Sparkplug
cocktail.instructions: Pour Bacardi 151 in the shot glass first, then pour Rumplminze on top, do not mix.

cocktail.name: Russian Shamrock
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka into the shot glass and add the creme de menthe on top. Stir lightly with a swizle stick to give the shot a swirl look.

cocktail.name: Golden Blizzard
cocktail.instructions: add the shots of goldschlager and Peppermint Schnapps, then fill jar with eggnog

cocktail.name: Rum Snapp
cocktail.instructions: Shaken, not stirred!

cocktail.name: Green Russian
cocktail.instructions: Mix two together. Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Banana Slush Punch
cocktail.instructions: In blender, blend bananas and 2 cups water. Set aside. In large bowl, put remaining water, kool-aid, sugar and fruit juices (all except for the ginger ale). Freeze at least 24 hours. Take out to thaw when you will be ready to drink it in 1 to 3 hours. Pour ginger ale in and chip away until it's slushy.

cocktail.name: Citrus Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Stir in glass.

cocktail.name: Canecutter
cocktail.instructions: Ice first, then add Bundaberg Rum, Kalua and fill with Coca Cola.

cocktail.name: Jump Starter
cocktail.instructions: Mix in chilled glass.

cocktail.name: Crimson Death
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka over ice, then add raspberry and fill with Jolt cola.

cocktail.name: Crimson Coma
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka over ice, then add raspberry and fill with Coca Cola.

cocktail.name: Gunfire
cocktail.instructions: Pour one cup of strong black tea, add rum and stir.

cocktail.name: Rocket Fuel #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all together in a 10 litre punch bowl.

cocktail.name: Black Forest
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients together and pour into glass. Add a little more cream as a floater, then add a cherry.

cocktail.name: Tequila Body Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Put salt on some part of somebody else's body. Hold shot glass in left hand and lemon in right hand. Lick salt, slam the tequila, then suck lemon.

cocktail.name: Shrub
cocktail.instructions: Begin with gentle fruit juices. Put a little less than 1 pint orange juice and the juice of 2 or 3 lemons into a half-gallon or gallon jar. Before squeezing the lemons, peel the rinds very thinly and add them as well. -- Add 2 quarts rum. Cover and let stand for three days. -- Put 2 pounds sugar into 1 quart water and bring to boil. Add the sugared water to the rum and fruit juice, cover, and let stand for two weeks. Then strain and bottle.

cocktail.name: Almond Shrub
cocktail.instructions: Put into gallon or half-gallon jar the spirits, thin lemon peel, orange juice, and sugar. Now take the essence of bitter almonds (you can use any amount you please) and add it to the glass of milk. Mix thoroughly and pour into the jar. Cover, put in a warm place (65-70 degrees fahrenheit), and keep it there until the milk has curdled. This takes from one to three hours. Then filter through filter paper and bottle. Rest it for two weeks before drinking it.

cocktail.name: Rum Shrub
cocktail.instructions: Pare 6 oranges very thinlyand put the rinds into a gallon jar. Add the juice of the fruit. Add 1 pint cold water, close the jar, and let the liquid stand for three days, stirring it now and then. train into an enamel dish, add 2 to 3 pounds sugar, and bring to a boil. Add a full pint of orange juice and strain it again. Finally, add about 2 quarts rum and bottle.

cocktail.name: Boston Ice Tea
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice. Stir. Garnish with lemon slice and a straw.

cocktail.name: Picasso "1"
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into collins glass with ice. Top with Schweppes Russain. Garnish with a slice of lime, a minth leave and a straw.

cocktail.name: Tyson Punch
cocktail.instructions: Pour all 8 liters of soda in cooler/bowl over 1 bag of ice. Add 2 quarts of Orage Juice. Add 1 bottle of Everclear. Add 4 big scoops of Kool-Aid (preferably Tropical Punch) Stir

cocktail.name: Pick Me Up Jose
cocktail.instructions: Lay shot glass in a CLEAN ash tray right side up, and start to pour the drinks into te glass till they overflow into the ash tray. then light the liquer on fire, blow it out, take the shot from the shot glass, then drink out of the ash tray. ENJOY

cocktail.name: Taco-Mancer
cocktail.instructions: Put ingredients in jar (make sure it's a quart one!), espresso first, then schnapps, finally Dr. Pepper. Swirl, smell, enjoy!

cocktail.name: Nuts & Berries
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and the amaretto into the glass (exact measurements are not vital here), and then cearfully top it off with the Bailey's according to your own taste. And remember that it is a shot!

cocktail.name: Caribbean Blues
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingrediants gradually. Best results if poured over the crushed ice and then stirred.

cocktail.name: Notre Dame Pick-Me-Up
cocktail.instructions: Put all items in glass, (you can use any size 8 oz. glass) put all items in glass and mix well with spoon.

cocktail.name: Redneck
cocktail.instructions: Fill a mason jar 1/4 to 1/2 full with Southern Comfort, depending on how strong you want the drink. Fill the jar the rest of the way with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy! Add some ice if you plan on drinking this over a period of time.

cocktail.name: Dirty Bastard
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Vodka, Brandy and Cranberry. Squeeze Lime.

cocktail.name: The A-Rock
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient one at a time. Rum first, then JD, and finally SoCo.

cocktail.name: Poop Shoot
cocktail.instructions: Fill your shot glass 2/3 full with sambuca. Then layer the fruit punch on top by dribbling it over a spoon.

cocktail.name: Tight Snatch
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Serve in ice-filled glass.

cocktail.name: The Lowee
cocktail.instructions: Just stir it up!

cocktail.name: Silver Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender half full with ice. Add all ingredents and mix.

cocktail.name: Deer Killer
cocktail.instructions: Mix all drinks in a blender, You can add 8 cubes of ice to chill the drink and give it more of a body. Add the Hot melting butter(or the schapps right before you drink). Makes enough for at least 10 people.

ingredient.name: Jack Daniels (or other premium sourmash Whiskey)

cocktail.name: The Chalise
cocktail.instructions: Throw all ingredients into a blender, and blend to your hearts delight. After, pour into an iced punch bowl and drink immediately!

cocktail.name: Multiple Orgasm Cajun Style
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Apple and Cinnamon Joy
cocktail.instructions: Pour schnapps into shot glass. Dribble Goldschlager into schnapps. Stir twice.

cocktail.name: Golden Coke
cocktail.instructions: Pour the cola into a tumbler. Add the Goldschlager and stir gently. Consume.

cocktail.name: Kamakazie #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour Absolut and Cointreau over ice in glass. Squezze and drop in lime to taste.

cocktail.name: Baby Aspirin
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal parts into cup, mix and pour into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Candy Apple
cocktail.instructions: Take a glass of sparkling cider, and add the butterscotch schnapps to taste.

cocktail.name: Jolly Rancher #2
cocktail.instructions: Just mix and serve chilled.

cocktail.name: Star Wars
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts of all.

cocktail.name: Dog House Dew
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka into any cup or glass. Fill with Mountain Dew. Add a few splashes of lemon juice. Add a few ice cubes (optional, but recommended). Stir. Enjoy!!

cocktail.name: Esirnus
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori and Chambord over ice in a glass and stir. Then partially fill the glass with Sprite. Stir in Vodka and add the Maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: NyQuil
cocktail.instructions: Mix and serve to cure the common cold.

cocktail.name: Dirty Dog
cocktail.instructions: Put ingredients into a mixing cup or blender, shake, then pour into the Mason Jar. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Flaming Cocaine
cocktail.instructions: Chill the shot glass until a frost has developed on it. All ingredients should be chilled. Add the Aftershock and several small crystals, then add the Vodka, and finally the Cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Bootlegger Tea
cocktail.instructions: Order of pour: Pint glass iced, 3/4 oz Vodka, 3/4 oz Rum, 3/4 oz Triple Sec. 1/2 fill sweet and sour, 1/2 fill seven-up, splash grenadine to get a slight pink color

cocktail.name: Butterbee
cocktail.instructions: Pour the butterscotch shnapps in first, then slowly, pour the baileys down the inside, so that it rests on top of the butterscotch.

cocktail.name: Orgasmic Fantasy
cocktail.instructions: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Add vanilla extract. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Turbo
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Strain into ice filled glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a straw.

cocktail.name: Ice bolts
cocktail.instructions: Mix Kahlua with tonic water with crushed ice, strain into glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach #12
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in order in ordinary glass. Add cranberry and orange juice to your liking.

cocktail.name: Red Hot
cocktail.instructions: Mix, and you have a drink that tastes like a red hot.

cocktail.name: King Kong
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Mix for 45 seconds on medium power. Serve with a cute umbrella and straw.

cocktail.name: Latin Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into ice-filled mixing glass and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail or martini glass, add the lemon and serve.

cocktail.name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
cocktail.instructions: Stir or shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into sour glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange or a Maraschino Cherry.

cocktail.name: Tropiflipano
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into a large mixing bowl (or simmer pot whenever possible). Mix well! This drink serves 2-3 quite well.

cocktail.name: Topher Special
cocktail.instructions: Fill bottom of glass with tang then add Vodka, Stir till most of the tang is disolved. Fill to 3/4 full with Mountain Dew, Stir again. Fill rest of way. Voilia!

cocktail.name: Shotgun Lou
cocktail.instructions: Mix brandy, milk and brown sugar on ice. Top with ginger ale

cocktail.name: Big Time
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a shot glass and enjoy.

cocktail.name: The Drunken Elf
cocktail.instructions: Thoroughly blend all ingrediants in an electric blender and serve in a frosted glass.

cocktail.name: Burn
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass half full of Vodka then add several drops of tabasco sauce. Add a half dash of Salt and pepper then stir.
