cocktail.name: Aviation
cocktail.instructions: Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Juice the lemon and add to the shaker. Add a little sugar, if desired. Pour in gin and maraschino, and shake. Serve straight up in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Green Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Combine melon liqueur, gin, lime juice, and sweet vermouth into a shot glass. Drop the shot into a pint of beer. Drink both the shot and the beer at the same time.

cocktail.name: Betsy Clear
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Stir. Garnish with an orange wedge. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Snapple and Schnapps
cocktail.instructions: Fill shaker (or glass) with crushed ice. Pour schnapps in first and top with Snapple. Shake like hell and pour into a frosted (preferably) highball glass.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Put ice cubes in the glass. Shake vodka, orange juice and cranberry juice in shaker. Poor into glass. Top off with soda water. Garnish with cherry and pinapple slice (optional).

cocktail.name: Funnel Cloud #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour beer, ginger ale, vodka, light rum, and ameretto in a funnel. Turn the funnel while you drink it.

cocktail.name: Closed Casket
cocktail.instructions: Pour 151 last and light.

cocktail.name: Player's Passion
cocktail.instructions: You pour the cognac in first. Next pour the Aliz. Last pour in the Champagne and stir.

cocktail.name: Stock Market Crash
cocktail.instructions: Ice first, next is the liquor and then the pop.

cocktail.name: Red, White and Blue
cocktail.instructions: Layer. Aftershock, then Goldschlager and peppermint schnapps on top.

cocktail.name: Bart Simpson
cocktail.instructions: Chill and serve in large shot glass

cocktail.name: Shitface
cocktail.instructions: Add rum, grenadine, and sugar syrup in glass. Fill with orange juice. Add ice and shake, strain into glass and garnish with marachino cherry.

cocktail.name: Mallis 97
cocktail.instructions: Shake all! in glass with 3 ice cubes

cocktail.name: This-n-That
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Joe Blow
cocktail.instructions: Add Vodka to Fresca in a glass.

cocktail.name: Luftschlange
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients. Strain.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Queen
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with handful of ice and add ingredients. Then mix.

cocktail.name: Che Guevara
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Jose Cuervo Gold, then Jgermeister. Top off with Goldschlager.

cocktail.name: Jell-o Jiggler Shots
cocktail.instructions: Mix Jell-o and unflavored gellatin in bowl. Add 1 1/4 cup of boiling water. Wait a few minutes to cool and add vodka. Pour into pan and refrigerate until solidified. Cut into squares and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Blue Whale
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and mix in a shaker

cocktail.name: Jen's Red
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka and Triple Sec simultaneously. Add sour mix, grenadine, sprite. Shake and serve

cocktail.name: Wet Pussy
cocktail.instructions: Put the Chambord, Irish Cream, and Milk or Creamer in a shaker with ice. Shake, Strain and pour into glass.

cocktail.name: The N8er T8er
cocktail.instructions: Combine cream soda and gin. Stir well

cocktail.name: Chilton
cocktail.instructions: Fill a salt rimmed cocktail glass with ice. Pour in vodka and add lemon juice. Fill with soda. Insert straw and stir slightly. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Chulitro
cocktail.instructions: First goes Pisco, then the ice cubes, fill with coke, little bit of beer (any kind), and the lemon juice

cocktail.name: Witch's Brew #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour Grenadine into glass. Mix orange, Bols Blue, Cointreau and Midori melon seperately in shaker. Pour slowly into glass disturbing grenadine as little as possible. Garnish with spray cream, cherries etc.

cocktail.name: Citronade
cocktail.instructions: Mix Lemonade and Citron into a Collins glass....shake or stir, add ice, and drink.

cocktail.name: Mounds
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice add rum add creme de cacao fill with cream

cocktail.name: Smith and Wesson
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, kahlua, and cream into glass filled with ice, then top off with Pepsi.

cocktail.name: Razberi Sunsplash
cocktail.instructions: Put liquor in first than add juice and grenadine. Shake well .Garnish with a flag.

cocktail.name: Rubber Chicken
cocktail.instructions: Fill mason jar with ice. Pour in Rye Whiskey. Then top up with a 50/50 mix of limeade and ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Mark n' Club
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with hard ice, pour 2 oz. of Maker's Mark over ice, fill with club soda and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Bon Voyage
cocktail.instructions: Add the shot of tequila and shot of gin over ice in a cocktail glass. Then mix a dash of lemon juice and dash of blue curacao over gin and tequila. Stir lightly. Best when drank with a straw.

cocktail.name: Riddler's Shot
cocktail.instructions: Put 2 oz of tequila in a shot glass and then add 13 drops of Tabasco sauce. Then enjoy and be prepared to overheat !

cocktail.name: Butt Naked Kiwi
cocktail.instructions: Fill a resealable 32. oz container with one can of Mountain dew. Add the 2 shots of everclear then the second can of Mountain Dew. Add the sprees and shake until they turn white. Strain the mixture into the serving pitcher. Keep the sprees and eat them later.

cocktail.name: Harlem World Seven
cocktail.instructions: Just drink it as soon as you mix it, and it might taste funny because of the prune juice but you should get an effect out of it.

cocktail.name: Pimp Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix and pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Sombrero
cocktail.instructions: Add Khaluha to a glass then the milk and finally add the syrup and stir with a spoon.

cocktail.name: Artic Red
cocktail.instructions: First smash the limes and sugar to bottom of the glass. Then add vodka and soda. Mix the drink with a spoon. Add ice cubes and lemon.

cocktail.name: Screwdriver Boricua
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice.

cocktail.name: The Abba
cocktail.instructions: mix absolute citron together with the sprite, and add a twist of lime, and stir. That's it.

cocktail.name: Pimp Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Just pour them in and stir it up.

cocktail.name: Limoncillo
cocktail.instructions: Get a empty gallon container. Then put in the 3/4 gallons of water. Put the two cases of cristal light and add the rum. Mix and start patying!!!

cocktail.name: Sour Apple
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice and garnish with an orange half and a cherry. Drink can be made without lime juice for those with who prefer sweeter.

cocktail.name: Submarine (Mexican)
cocktail.instructions: Fill a Shot with the Tequila and put the shot upside down inside the Beer Mug (make sure the Tequila stays inside the shot). Fill the Beer Mug with Beer. If you like salt on the edge of the Beer Mug you can add it. Also lemon can be added depending on you.

cocktail.name: Jufu Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Serve on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Alley Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and mix together. Strain into a glass and shoot it.

cocktail.name: Kick me in the Jimmy
cocktail.instructions: Combine in mixing tin with ice, shake and strain.

cocktail.name: Voodoo Doll
cocktail.instructions: Shake, serve with ice.

cocktail.name: Short Island Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except Coke, over ice. Fill with Coca-cola and stir.

cocktail.name: My Busted Cherry
cocktail.instructions: Drain cherry juice out of jar and fill with rum. Let set overnight in refridgerator. -- In blender mix six (your choice) cherries, ice cream, milk, rum, and chocolate syrup (to taste). Blend until smooth. Add more milk or ice cream as needed.

cocktail.name: Crapachino
cocktail.instructions: Combine all the ingredients together, leaving out the chocolate ice-cream. Leave in fridge until cold. Add in the chocolate ice-cream, blend. Serve.

cocktail.name: Deep Blue
cocktail.instructions: Vodka and Blue Curacao are stirred on ice and then topped with champagne. Place a blue cocktail cherry in the bottom of the glass.

cocktail.name: Black Tooth
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shot glass with a shot of crown royal. Add just enough Coca-Cola to give the shot a black appearance.

cocktail.name: Carmel Apple
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts of freezer cold schnapps.

cocktail.name: Dominican Goddess
cocktail.instructions: Mix Ruby red grapefruit juice and lemon-lime vintage seltzer water. Add the rum (as much as desired) and shake.

cocktail.name: Rum Runner Island Style
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender with one and a half cups of ice, add all the liqours in the blender and mix until the consistentsy has thickend. Pour into glass and add a cherry on top.

cocktail.name: Sleigh Ride
cocktail.instructions: Float the ingredients in order by pouring over the bottom of a spoon.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Rum Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in blender or punch bowl. Pour creation over ice cubes in any type of glass.

cocktail.name: Gorilla Fart #5
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1oz of Yukon Jack into shot glass. Pour 1oz of Bacardi 151 into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Skittle
cocktail.instructions: Add Absolut Vodka and Banana liqueur to Collins glass. Fill glass 3/4 full with Kool-Aid. Add crushed ice, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Cookie Monster #2
cocktail.instructions: Use a spoon to layer the alcohol and float 151 on the top. Lite on fire, let it burn for about 5 seconds, then blow it out and suck it up through a straw.

cocktail.name: Southern Raspberry Tart
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquors, fill with sour mix and shake. Then top with 7-UP or Sprite and garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Shocking Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Heat the hot chocolate and add the cinnamon schnapps

cocktail.name: Evil Tea
cocktail.instructions: Mix well. Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Buzz
cocktail.instructions: Start with the chocolate milk, next stir in 2 shots of Kahula and 2 shots of Irish Cream. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Poison Milk
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shot glass. Close your eyes and shoot it real fast.

cocktail.name: Teal Squeal
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend well. Serve in highball glass. Garnish with pineapple.

cocktail.name: Red Rooster
cocktail.instructions: Build drink in a collins glass.

cocktail.name: Portland Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Put sugar in a plate. Put 1 splash of Triple Sec in a bowl. First dip the rim of coffee cup in the bowl of Triple Sec, then in sugar. Add 1 shot each of Rum and Kahlua, & 1 splash of Triple Sec. Light with a match (this crystalizes the sugar on rim). Add cinnamon and nutmeg. Add coffee (this should put the fire out) till cup in 3/4 full. Top with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Paris Paradise
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in a blender, mix them together, and serve in a beer pilsner.

cocktail.name: Midori Hack
cocktail.instructions: Shake Midori, vodka, and sweet & sour with ice. Prepare large rocks glass by juicing lime garnish into glass half filled with ice. Strain in the chilled cocktail, add splash of Pineapple Juice, enjoy.

cocktail.name: X
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in mixing glass and shake with ice. Strain into glass and shoot.

cocktail.name: Kir Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a mixing glass full of ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with twist of lemon.

cocktail.name: Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer
cocktail.instructions: Mix the light rum, lemon juice, and grenadine. Add the ice cubes and fill to your own taste with Cranberry juice. Add a wedge of lemon on your glass and voila! Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster (Zaphod's)
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass, mug or whatever about 3/4 with ice. Then, add the J.D., Schnapps and Curacao. Fill up the rest of the glass with orange juice, and stir.

cocktail.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #4
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients. Can be either: 1. muddled with lime -- 2. served on crushed ice but preferably in hurricane or pint glass with 5-7 regular icecubes (no need to water it down, only to make cold)

cocktail.name: Millionare's Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Place Bailey's Irish Cream, Frangelico and Kahlua in Irish coffee mug and add coffee. Top with whip cream and allspice(cinnamon and nutmeg)(optional)

cocktail.name: Super Qell
cocktail.instructions: Just fill a big glass with all the ingridients

cocktail.name: Blue Peach
cocktail.instructions: Mix the two in shaker with ice. Shake. Pour in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Slippery Nipple #3
cocktail.instructions: Put the Irish cream in first. Then slowly pour the Kahlua down the side of the glass so it doesn't mix. Then add the Butterscoth Schnapps on top nice and slow.

cocktail.name: Bisp
cocktail.instructions: Let sugar, water, vanilla and other spices simmer for two hours. Strain. Add wine and alcohol. Serve.

cocktail.name: Maiden Head
cocktail.instructions: All sodas and alcohol should be chilled an mixed with a stirring stick before topped with whipped cream and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Friday Freeze
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredents in blender at highest speed. Consistancy of the mix should be "semi - thick:" not so thick that a spoon would stand by itself in the mix, but not as thin as juice. If the mix is too thin, add sherbet, if too thick , add equal amount of juice and alcohol. Pour into glass and place in freezer for 15 minutes.

cocktail.name: Peppermint Aztec
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquids together in the order listed, then stand peppermint stick or cane inside of cup.

cocktail.name: Banana Cream Pie #2
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Malibu Punch
cocktail.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add malibu and fill with pineapple juice. Add grenadine and splash of 7-up.

cocktail.name: Pooh Bear
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice.

cocktail.name: White Trash
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with lime wedge. Ingredients can be varied to taste.

cocktail.name: Jen's Hot Chocolate Butterscotch
cocktail.instructions: Add one shot of butterscotch Schnapps to the hot chocolate. Top off with Bailey's.

cocktail.name: Green Monster Party Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients(in any order) in a large tub, which can hold several gallons. Stir so that the Sherbert is completely dissolved. With the exception of the kool-aid and sherbert, as much or little of the other ingredients may be used.

cocktail.name: Bailey's Comet #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake and Strain the Butterscotch, Bailey's, and Goldschlager into a cocktail glass. Float the Sambuca, then sprinkle Cinnamon or Nutmeg into drink (Before you flame the drink). Just before presentation, flame the drink. As the Sambuca burns, the cinnamon will sparkle. A dazzling effect if the bartender or server is walking with the drink while it's burning (give the comet a tail).

cocktail.name: Dreamsicle #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake and Strain contents into a highball glass filled with ice. Tastes just like the popsicle

cocktail.name: Imagination
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Rye whiskey into the glass. Add desired amount of ice. Fill to top with ginger ale and add a splash of lime. Stir until well mixed.

cocktail.name: Harakiri shot
cocktail.instructions: Mix the ingreediants in a shot glass, serve with a pint of beer on the side.

cocktail.name: Crockpot Mulled Cider
cocktail.instructions: Tie orange peel, cinnamon, ginger root, and allspice in an 8-inch square of 100-percent-cotton cheesecloth. -- Combine apple cider or juice, apple brandy (if desired), and honey in a 3 1/2-, 4-, or 5-quart crockery cooker. Add spice bag. Cover and cook on low-heat setting for 5 to 6 hours or on high-heat setting for 2 1/2 to 3 hours. Remove and discard spice bag. Ladle cider into cups. Makes 8 eight-ounce servings if you didn't use apple brandy, 9 if you did.

ingredient.name: Ginger root , 1 inch, peeled and thinly sliced

cocktail.name: Grand Marnier
cocktail.instructions: Mix to disolve sugar.

cocktail.name: Hot Vanilla
cocktail.instructions: In a heavy saucepan, combine the ingredients and warm over low heat. When small bubbles appear around the sides of the pan, remove it from the heat and let the mixture sit at room temperature for 15 to 20 minutes. Place the pan back on the stove and rewarm the mixture, whisking it briefly to redistribute the skin that forms on the milk's surface. Remove the vanilla bean half, scrape out the seeds with a sharp knife, and return the seeds to the milk. Pour the vanilla milk into two 8-ounce mugs and top with sprinklings of cinnamon or canela. Drink hot.

cocktail.name: Cocaine Lady #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Strain over ice. Float coke on top.

cocktail.name: Melon Pousse Cafe
cocktail.instructions: Layer in cordial glass.

cocktail.name: Moosemilk
cocktail.instructions: Place ingredients in blender, mix until even consistency.

cocktail.name: Joan Mir
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass filled with ice, stir, strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry.

cocktail.name: Skier's Toddy
cocktail.instructions: Rinse out a large mug with boiling water, add steaming hot chocolate, and stir in liqueurs. Top with several marshmallows.

cocktail.name: Melberry
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori, Chambord and raspberry juice in a shaker. Add a squeeze of lemon and lime juice. Shake. Strain into highball half filled with ice. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

cocktail.name: Scrumptious Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Sweeten the coffee with brown sugar to taste. Mix coffee, liquor, and orange peel in a pan. Heat gently, but do not boil. Let infuse for a couple of minutes. Pour into pre-warmed heat-resistent glasses. Float whipped cream on top. Garnish with thin strip of peel of orange and nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Sunny D Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Pour together and serve cold.

cocktail.name: Buttmeister
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingrediants into mixing glass, swirl and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Key Largo OJ
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and then equal parts of Key Largo and Orange juice. Mix and enjoy

cocktail.name: Purple Penis
cocktail.instructions: Fill a pint glass with ice and add first three ingredients. Mix well. Fill with equal parts sweet and sour mix and cranberry juice. Stir. Fill shot glass as desired.

cocktail.name: Mountaineer on Acid
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shaker. Serve chilled.

cocktail.name: Bloody Sun
cocktail.instructions: Put ingrediment to shaker and shake well. Pour to the class filled with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Absolut Anti-freeze
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and strain into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Green Monster #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour 151 rum, lime juice, and food coloring into a glass with several ice cubes. Shake, and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Echo Hemoraging Tumor
cocktail.instructions: Pour irish cream in shot glass followed by the Blue Curacao and finally the strawberry schnapps.

cocktail.name: Rock Lobster
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Razzamatazz and Crown Royal. Fill with Cranberry Juice.

cocktail.name: Drool
cocktail.instructions: Pour aftershock into milk mix until lite pink. Drink up.

cocktail.name: Embolism
cocktail.instructions: Add Rum and Grenadine to a glass. Fill with Coke. Ice optional.

cocktail.name: C*m Scorcher
cocktail.instructions: In shot glass put butterscotch schnapps then add vodka followed by kahlua then slowly add irish cream a little extra irish cream may be used allow drink to stand and the cum to get scorched.

cocktail.name: SherryBear's Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Lemonade made from frozen concentrate works best. Don't use Kool-Aid type lemonade. For a twist, also try Pink Lemonade.

cocktail.name: Drainpipe
cocktail.instructions: Pour Bailey's and Curacao in a glass, stir. Add Coca-Cola slowly. No ice, serve with a straw. Blue Curacao may be used if you are out of green.

cocktail.name: Wolf (Howlin')
cocktail.instructions: Pour spirits in a glass. Add some ice and fill up with Sprite. Prefered served with a blue cherry.

cocktail.name: Backseat Boogie #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour Gin and Vodka over ice, followed by the cranberry juice and then the ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Gorilla's Fart
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a separate glass with Ice, then pour it into the shot glass. Drink straight up.

cocktail.name: Hornet
cocktail.instructions: Combine over ice and add cola soda, top with lime slice.

cocktail.name: Screw-Up
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes, add all ingredients, mix then drink!

cocktail.name: Riprock
cocktail.instructions: Shaken, not stirred.

cocktail.name: Ershammar Dream
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredientes in a shaker ( with ice) and shake it !! enjoy....

cocktail.name: M.V.P.
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka, midori, and malibu. Fill with pineapple juice. Stir or shake.

cocktail.name: Blue Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Put drop of lemon in first, then add Blue Caracoa, and Sambuca. Then slowly add vodka. Sit down, shoot back, and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Tree Frog
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, Maui, and grapefruit juice together, then pour over highball glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Malibu Express
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Serve on ice.

cocktail.name: Purple Rain #1
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add gin, fill with cranberry juice and add a splash of Blue Curacao, sour mix and soda. Shake gently, add more Curacao for correct color (should be Royal Purple).

cocktail.name: Miner's Lung
cocktail.instructions: Place three shots of Vodka into a pint size beer glass, and fill the rest of the glass with Guiness

cocktail.name: Choclate Banana Martini
cocktail.instructions: Fill mixing glass with ingredients, stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Add Hershey's kiss or Godiva choclate for a garnish.

cocktail.name: Brain Eraser #1
cocktail.instructions: In a sizable shot glass pour the Schlager, then Kahlua, then Vodka. Keep liquer levels seperate. Carefully slide a straw to bottom along side of the glass. Shoot from bottom thru straw. Bombs away!

cocktail.name: Royal Crown Royal
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball glass half full with ice cubes. Pour the shot of whiskey over the cubes. Add the RC Cola and stir.

cocktail.name: Rainbow Brite Blowing Sunshine Up Your Butt
cocktail.instructions: Fill a tall hurricane glass with ice. Layer ingredients by carefully and slowly adding each in order. Best garnished with a small wedge of "unpeeled" pineapple.

cocktail.name: Afganistany Whore
cocktail.instructions: Just pour to taste and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Fruity Vodka Beverage
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a large glass.

cocktail.name: Piss in the Snow
cocktail.instructions: Let the Vodka and Avalanche chill thouroughly in the freezer. Put ice cubes in large glass, pour in Mountain dew and rest of ingredients. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Sweet Old-Fashioned
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquor over ice, add other ingredients. Garhish with cherry and lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Silver Cloud
cocktail.instructions: Mix Amaretto, Kahlua, and Milk together. Fill with ice cubes and top with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Micheal's Downfall
cocktail.instructions: Take glass and add 4 ice cubes. Pour in the rum and then add grenedine, followed by equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Cary Grant
cocktail.instructions: Fill Old-Fashioned or a Tumbler glass with ice. Squeeze juice of one lime (or less, to taste), then pour equal parts Tia Maria and Vodka. Mix well, garnish with lime wedge. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Kamakazie Razzberry
cocktail.instructions: Pour Welch's concentrate into a pitcher, then add vodka and finally Raspberry Schnapps. Add crushed ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Jade Isle
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients minus the cherry of course in shaker cup strain into huricane glass 1/2 filled with chiped ice. Garnish with cherry and long straw.

cocktail.name: Monk's Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and enjoy!!

cocktail.name: Bumble Bee #3
cocktail.instructions: The crushed ice should be added first, followed by the honey. Stir the mixture ass you pur the gin on top, which should be realtively chilled. Add lemon juice to taste, and place a wedge over the rim.

cocktail.name: Green Spider
cocktail.instructions: Shot of 151 first then Creme de Menthe.

cocktail.name: Gator Wizz
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in glass, add ingredients and stir.

cocktail.name: Vaginal Secretions
cocktail.instructions: Mix vigorously, and enjoy until drunk.

cocktail.name: Absolute HB
cocktail.instructions: Pour everything in a beer mug and shake it. Then you simply drink it.

cocktail.name: Bob Dylan
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender, mix until smooth. Be careful surge is carbonated, it will foam up. Enjoy!!!!

cocktail.name: Swamp Frog
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in a large tub or cooler. (Sinks work well) Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Klondike
cocktail.instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice, pour Baileys first, Yukon Jack next, stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Liquid Cocaine #4
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into a shot glass. Shoot it all at once .

cocktail.name: Nuclear Waste #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake well and drink up!

cocktail.name: Brain Eraser #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in shotglass. (Try it in a frozen shotglass.)

cocktail.name: Mudslide #4
cocktail.instructions: Two methods of mixing: 1) straight up on the rocks - mix the 4 ingredients and pour over ice. -- 2) Frozen - mix 4 ingredients in a blender, add ice until frostly.

cocktail.name: Zoot
cocktail.instructions: Prepare a regular Gin and 7-Up with ice cubes, and the add the Jack Daniels gently on top of the ice. Then a lemmon wedge for garnish.

cocktail.name: Pat Quinn
cocktail.instructions: Pour the orange pop in and then pour the scotch whiskey in. Stir or shake

cocktail.name: Pat Quinn Float
cocktail.instructions: Pour the orange pop/soda into a mixing glass and then the scotch whiskey. Shake or stir. Scoop some ice cream into a short, wide glass. Pour the scotch and orange pop/soda into this glass.

cocktail.name: Pat Quinn Freeze
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into glass. You can either serve it like that or you can also put the drink into a freezer and serve when half-frozen.

cocktail.name: Malibu Seven
cocktail.instructions: Mix the 7-up and rum together in a cup of ice.

cocktail.name: Sun Of A Beach
cocktail.instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a tall glass over ice.

cocktail.name: Skinny Dipper
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients and serve in a tall glass over ice.

cocktail.name: Green Iguana Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Blend and pour into a salted glass.

cocktail.name: Pucker Sucker
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients and serve as a shot.

cocktail.name: Suffering Bastard
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a glass. Stir. Drink.

cocktail.name: Dying Bastard
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients into a glass, stir, and drink.

cocktail.name: Dead Bastard
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass, stir, and drink.

cocktail.name: Cosmo Katie
cocktail.instructions: Chill cocktail glass. Pour ingrediants and ice into mixer and shake well. Serve straight up with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Puckerita
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingedients and shake in a tall glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Galliano Island Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Stir vigorously until it has the consistency and appearance of iced tea.

cocktail.name: Norwegian Hunting Mixture Bowl
cocktail.instructions: Fill approx. 2 gallon with pure Alcohol and 5 gallon with lemonade in a big and clean mixing bowl. Add approx. 10 kg. with fresh fruits as lemon, grapefruit and oranges. Mix the items together in approx. 2 minutes with an 4 HP outboard-motor with cooling- and exhaust system modified to not interfere with the mixture. Can be served in all kind of glasses but preferably a jar called "Norges-glass".

cocktail.name: Aviator Fuel
cocktail.instructions: Fill a large cup or glass 1/3 full of lemonade, and same amount of Vodka, then Sprite.

cocktail.name: Brain Eraser #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour first two ingredients over ice, fill glass with club soda.

cocktail.name: Pirate's Tea
cocktail.instructions: In mason jar filled with ice, add spiced rum. Add coca-cola to the ridge of jar. Fill with orange juice. Garnish with lemon wedge and serve.

cocktail.name: Daydream
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker filled with ice, combine all ingredients. Shake or stir & strain into rocks glass or large shot glass.

cocktail.name: Midnight Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: In collins glass filled with ice, combine the berry tattoo & lemonade. Top with a splash of 7-up. Garnish with lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Damn Good!
cocktail.instructions: Layer carefully in cordial or shot glass. First ButterShots, then green creme de menthe & Bailey's Irish Cream on top. Lastly, drop the grenadine through the Bailey's. It will settle to the bottom creating a cool effect.

cocktail.name: Kris Kringle
cocktail.instructions: Combine creme de almond & root beer schnapps in shot glass. Layer the half-and-half on the top.

cocktail.name: Candy Cane
cocktail.instructions: In highball glass filled with ice, combine peppermint schnapps, white creme de cacao & grenadine. Fill glass with half-and-half. Top with 7-up. Garnish with a small candycane or filbert nuts. Great for the Holidays!

cocktail.name: Slow Cooker Cider
cocktail.instructions: Place cinnamon, cloves and allspice in a double thickness of cheesecloth: bring up corners of cloth and tie with a string to form a bag. Place cider and brown sugar in a slow cooker: stir until sugar dissolves. Add spice bag. Place orange slices on top. Cover and cook on low for 2-5 hours. Remove spice bag before serving.

cocktail.name: Dr. Peppermint
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps and 12 oz. of Dr. Pepper together.

cocktail.name: Salty Chihuahua
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with grapefruit juice and add a dash of salt.

cocktail.name: ChoozyMothers Milk
cocktail.instructions: In a large kettle (lobster pot), mix the Bacardi 151 Dark Rum, Bacardi White Rum, Kahlua, Milk and Vanilla Ice Cream (keep the ice cream in its form from the carton). Stir and mix in the cinnamon powder.

cocktail.name: A.T.B. (Ask The Barman)
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient slowly down the side of a shot glass in order, they will settle nicely layered. Shoot.

cocktail.name: Lady Godiva
cocktail.instructions: Shake sugar, triple sec, lime and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a highball glass. Fill with brandy.

cocktail.name: Purple Rain #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all contents (similar to a Long Island replacing the Coke for Chambord) in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add Chambord to taste. Garnish with lemon or lime twist.

cocktail.name: Homemade Advocaat
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for 30 seconds until they are mixed well. Pour into container, cap and refrigerate. Let it age for 1 to 2 weeks to mellow. The color will intensify as it ages, reaching a more traditional light shade of yellow.

cocktail.name: Beam Me Up
cocktail.instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice. Add Jim Beam Bourbon and Amaretto. Then add Coca-Cola and stir.

cocktail.name: Noche de Phoof
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in a shaker and add ingredients. Shake vigorously. Drink should be frothy on top. Pour into highball glass and garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Guinness Float
cocktail.instructions: Put the ice cream in first, then add the Guinness carefully. Wait for the head to go down then fill to top. Blend if you want a milkshake.

cocktail.name: 6am Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Fill high-ball glass with ice. Pour in the Mt. Dew and gin, then stir. Then add the grenadine. Do not stir in the grenadine.

cocktail.name: Backseat Boogie #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour one oz of each, vodka and gin over ice in a 14 oz glass, and fill rest with ginger ale and cranberry juice. Garnish with fruit and serve.

cocktail.name: Liquid Cocaine #5
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker, shake and strain.

cocktail.name: Watermelon Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Cut up watermelon, removing seeds. Liquify in blender until you have about 16 oz. Add remaining ingredients, top with ice and blend until smooth. Taste and add sugar if watermelon is not sweet enough. This works well with sugar on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Poor Vodka, Peach Schnapps, and Orange juice in glass and be sure to mix them well. Then add the Cranberry and let it sit at the top of the glass.

cocktail.name: Tropicetto
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass.

cocktail.name: Rob Love
cocktail.instructions: Mix the indegrients in a glass and stir. Add ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Red Zalo
cocktail.instructions: Add pisang and squash (lemon juice) and ice cubes in a mixer and mix it. Then add Sprite and the strawberry syrup.

cocktail.name: Shit on the Grass
cocktail.instructions: In a shot glass add Creme de Menthe on bottom of glass and then add baileys on top of creme de methe, thus making the effect as what the cocktail is called.

cocktail.name: Purple Rain Shot
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled shot glass.

cocktail.name: Three Musketeers
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Three Sheets to The Wind
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Clueless
cocktail.instructions: Once the Vodka and all of the extra ingredient's are added to your glass, stir. Add ice.

cocktail.name: Astral Gateway
cocktail.instructions: Put ingredients into the glass, fill with ice.

cocktail.name: Kung Fu
cocktail.instructions: Take the ice cubes and put them in the glass. Then add Jgermeister and Pisang Ambon. Then fill the glass with Cola.

cocktail.name: Turby's Amaretto
cocktail.instructions: No matter what size glass used, make sure the amount of pepsi to Amaretto is at least 2 to 1. Stir the drink lightly and add ingredients to suit your personal taste.

cocktail.name: Creamy Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Mix in order and stir.

cocktail.name: Flaming Yager
cocktail.instructions: Light the Jgermeister on fire and drop it in the glass of Guinness. Now pound it quick. There you go!

cocktail.name: Southern Raspberry Tart
cocktail.instructions: Mix the 4 equal parts and pour into short rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Blow Job #5
cocktail.instructions: First put in the Creme De Banane Then float the baileys irish cream on top Then add a small shot of cream. Give the glass a quick swirl before drinking.

cocktail.name: Iceberg
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in blender, blend, pour in frozen highball. Garnish with cinnamon stick or chocolate shavings.

cocktail.name: The Celt
cocktail.instructions: Layer the drink pouring the Tattoo in first as it is slightly heavier than the scotch.

cocktail.name: Get Laid
cocktail.instructions: Mix Raspberry liqueur, vodka, and pineapple juice in the mixer, shake, strain, pour into glass, then add splash of cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Mekong
cocktail.instructions: Mix the first ten ingredients (malibu, peach, strawberry, banana, melon, blue, orange juice, pineapple juice, pina mix, 7-up) in a shaker. Pour into a hurricane glass, then top with cream. Garnish with whatever fresh fruit you have on hand, NO limes, please for your own good. Throw some Filberts in if you feel like it.

cocktail.name: Sammy Special
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in a blender with ice cubes. (More ice = more froth.) Blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glass and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Mom's Apple Pie
cocktail.instructions: Pour apple schnapps over ice and float Hot Damn on top.

cocktail.name: A joy of Almond
cocktail.instructions: Chill rocks glass, start with Kahlua, layer Amaretto and Creme de almond.

cocktail.name: Dutch turbo
cocktail.instructions: Mix on the rocks. Pour it all over cubed ice. Put a wedge pineapple on the glass. Serve it the way they want it.

cocktail.name: Schmooze
cocktail.instructions: Add o.j. and 7-up. Stir. Add ice.

cocktail.name: Texas Apple Delight
cocktail.instructions: Nothing special, just mix.

cocktail.name: Kamikaze Kool
cocktail.instructions: Fill a glass with ice. Simultaneously pour in the Vodka and Grand Marnier. Add lime juice. Stir with a straw and serve.

cocktail.name: The "Liquerice" Dream
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients in shot glass. Mix well before drinking.

cocktail.name: Shit On Grass
cocktail.instructions: First add half a shot of Midori Melon Liquer, then pour Kaluah to top it off.

cocktail.name: Key Lime Pie
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into mixing cup filled with ice, shake and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: The Real Jungle-Juice
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the stuff togather in a big container. Start with everclear add juice and then fruit. Stir togather, don't eat fruit for a while let it soak up some of the everclear.

cocktail.name: Shannon on the Beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix the two alcohols and fill with orange and cranberry juice

cocktail.name: Bondages' No Problem
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing cup, cover cup with a lid and shake. Pour over ice and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Jack Lemmon M.D.
cocktail.instructions: Pour Jack Daniels and Lemon Juice over Ice. Top off with Dr. Pepper. Garnish with Lemon Slice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Heliuva Rootbeer
cocktail.instructions: Pour into glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Screaming Multiple Climax
cocktail.instructions: Best if built in a mixing glass with ice, shaken and poured into Hurricane glass, but can be built directly in the Hurricane glass.

cocktail.name: Protein Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Shoot ingredients into a shot glass. Shake it up good and swallow.

cocktail.name: GTV
cocktail.instructions: The ingredients are best preserved cold for this purpose. To mix, just pour the ingredients into a glass. Add the ice cube, if you like.

cocktail.name: Kalimotxo
cocktail.instructions: Best served cold, but without ice.

cocktail.name: Burning Worm
cocktail.instructions: Put into seperate shot glasses. Shoot the mezcal first then chase with goldschlager.

cocktail.name: Snowboard
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything togeather in the glass and make sure that the ice is crushed. The best is if the ice is like "slush". You can also serve the drink with a slice of kiwi.

cocktail.name: Simple but Sweet
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka in rocks glass. Half fill with apricot nectar.

cocktail.name: Gravedigger
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass half and half with bacardi 151 and Jim Beam whiskey in any order you want.

cocktail.name: Rocket Fuel #3
cocktail.instructions: Add the ingrediants in the order they are listed to a shot glass. Drink. That's about it.

cocktail.name: The Canadian Gulp
cocktail.instructions: Pour the amaretto into the jar. Follow it up by pouring a chilled beer (Canadian if possible). Then top it off with the Coke.

cocktail.name: Shot of Hell
cocktail.instructions: Pour shot of vodka into shot glass then top off with a generous portion of Tabasco.

cocktail.name: Jim's Special #1
cocktail.instructions: Put in vodka, cherry brandy, grenadine and ice. Then fill glass with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Joe's Killer Bee
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients then top with 151 Rum.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Juice
cocktail.instructions: You must mix your drink with these amounts otherwise you'll taste an extremely bitter drink or a very disgusting puke creater. Before you pour the drink, you must put the ice cubes in the mason jar.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Cabdriver
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in glass. Add orange juice and coconut rum. Add 1 to 2 oz. of cranberry juice, depending on your taste. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Purple Hardon
cocktail.instructions: Fill pilsner with ice and build. Serve in frosted glass.

cocktail.name: Bloody Tampon
cocktail.instructions: Mix Yukon Jack, tequila, and vodka (all chilled) in a cocktail glass. Add room temperature V-8 tomato juice without mixing. Strain irish cream on top and then splash with lemon juice to curdle giving drink a cotton-like texture.

cocktail.name: Water Moccasin
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice, strain into a shooter.

cocktail.name: Harry Boy
cocktail.instructions: Just mix and use ice. Served cool.

cocktail.name: Glam Trash
cocktail.instructions: Pour 3/4 glass with chilled Goldschlager then add 1/4 glass of Bud Light. Splash grenadine on top for color. Allow the beer to suspend the gold flake in the glass. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Cosmonaut
cocktail.instructions: Mix really well and Serve.

cocktail.name: Miss V
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Pixy Stick
cocktail.instructions: Add ice to glass. Add shot of Southern Comfort. Fill glass with Lemonade. leaving enough room on top to add the shot of Blackberry Brandy.

cocktail.name: Godiva Peppermint Patty
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1/2 cup Hot Cocoa into a Brandy Snifter. Add 1 shot of Peppermint Schnapps (Rumple Minze). Add 1 shot of Godiva. Stir. Top with Whip Cream.

cocktail.name: Pooky and Chooky
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into glass without ice.

cocktail.name: Russian Monster Tom Collins
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and sour mix. Use more or less sour mix to taste. Mix in grenadine to taste. Serve cold, preferably over ice.

cocktail.name: Horny Bull #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour and slug back.

cocktail.name: Horny Bull #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour and slug back

cocktail.name: Jinx
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Bailey's, blueberry scnapps, Irish cream, and then vodka, and then add grape juice, then sprite. Stir up and have fun.

cocktail.name: Navy Seal
cocktail.instructions: Combine Jgermeister and Cuervo tequila together on the rocks and hold on.

cocktail.name: The Marv Alberts
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with 3 oz of Bailey's Irish Creme, then add 1 oz of Southern Comfort, followed by mixing in 1 oz of Buterscotch Schnapps.

cocktail.name: Peach Nehi
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain over ice

cocktail.name: Southern Comfort Kamikaze
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain over ice

cocktail.name: Club Cub
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass filled with ice, stir and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish: cherry.

cocktail.name: Southern Brain Damage
cocktail.instructions: Fill 2/3 shot with Southern Comfort. Add 1/3 left Tia Maria. Do not mix. Add a couple drops of grenadine for effect (or for sweetness desired).

cocktail.name: Southern Beamy Brain Damage (SBBD)
cocktail.instructions: In shot glass, pour 1/3 Southern Comfort and 1/3 Jim Beam. Add 1/3 Tia Maria and let set and form. Do not mix. Add a couple drops of grenadine (or as sweet as desired).

cocktail.name: Shittin' Blue
cocktail.instructions: Mix in this order: blueberry schnapps, blue caracoa, vodka. Carefully drop in the blue syrup. Drink down and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Helluva Hurricane
cocktail.instructions: Pour dark rum, light rum, juices, and grenadine over ice into a pilsner/parfait glass. Add the half spoon of sugar, stir slightly, and top with high octane 151 rum and cherries/pineapple. Add the optional sugar cube & light it up!

cocktail.name: Strawberry Banana Colada
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Shake well. Garnish with a flag (orange and cherry).

cocktail.name: Cunnilingus
cocktail.instructions: Mix Bailey's, Peach Schnapps and pineapple juice with ice. Pour in shot glass Top with whipped cream

cocktail.name: Mind Game
cocktail.instructions: Shake Ricard, Blue Curacao and 2% milk with ice

cocktail.name: Ragnar #3
cocktail.instructions: Take first the vodka then fill up with ice finally add the sprite (not to much).

cocktail.name: Mangan Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients in order given.

cocktail.name: Russian Apple
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three incrediants with ice, shake, and then strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Sex at my House
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker. Shake and strain.

cocktail.name: Haacker Special
cocktail.instructions: Put vodka in glass, put in sugar and the crushed ice with the lime cubes and stir all until all sugar is dissolved

cocktail.name: Jennifer's Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker over ice, shake well and strain into shot glasses. Take entire shot in one swallow.

cocktail.name: Fluffy Dog
cocktail.instructions: Mix both ingredients with ice, strain into cocktail glass or serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Jimmy's special
cocktail.instructions: Put the cognac in a glass and after that, the champagne.

cocktail.name: Malibu Jane
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Coconut Rum. Pour in Milk. Mix in two teaspoons of cocoa powder. Add one last teaspoon of cocoa powder: called "One to grow one." Let stand for one minute.

cocktail.name: Purple Lei
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a shaker. Shake, then strain into a chilled shot glass.

cocktail.name: Four Horsemen #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour straight up.

cocktail.name: Boomer
cocktail.instructions: Blend, add ice, strain.

cocktail.name: Royal Butt
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain.

cocktail.name: Oatmeal Cookie with Raisins
cocktail.instructions: Blend, add ice, strain into rocks glass

cocktail.name: Green Jolly Rancher
cocktail.instructions: shake with ice, strain into rocks glass

cocktail.name: Chocolate Covered Cheery
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into Glass

cocktail.name: Cocaine Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain. Serve in chilled shot glass.

cocktail.name: Beam Me Up Scotty
cocktail.instructions: Layer.

cocktail.name: Virgin Whore
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, lime juice, kool-aid, food colorings, and cranberry juice in shot glass. Slowly add apple juice down the side of the glass to mix. Then, add tequila and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Blueberry Tea #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour amaretto and grand marnier in the glass Add hot tea

cocktail.name: Monte Cristo
cocktail.instructions: Moisten rim of glass with lemon juice: dip in sugar Pour Kahlua and Grand Marnier in glass Fill, almost to the top, with coffee Top with Whipped Cream and grated chocolate

cocktail.name: Zoo Station
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Sailor's Delight
cocktail.instructions: Stir together Serve together

cocktail.name: Mr. Freeze
cocktail.instructions: Take the bottle of Vodka, make room in it for the Fishermans friend. Mix together so that the Fishermans Friend dissolves in the vodka. Let stay for a couple of days (at least, gets better the older it is). Then pour the mix in a shotglass and drink!

cocktail.name: Tea Toddy
cocktail.instructions: Make tea as you usually do. Mix it with the sugar according to taste. Leave room in the cup for a dash of Baileys. Pour the baileys in according to taste, then, if you want, a dash of Whiskey if you want. Not too much though, as the drink won't taste good.

cocktail.name: DC
cocktail.instructions: Put Tequila in a double shot glass, then add the baileys Slam then repeat

cocktail.name: German Chocolate Cake
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Shake and strain over ice. Garnish with four squirts of canned whipped cream about 3/4 inches high at 12, 3, 6, and 9 O'Clock

cocktail.name: Mexican Surfer
cocktail.instructions: First, put Malibu rum into glass. Then add Tequila and pineapple juice. Last add ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Frozen Strawberry Banana Colada
cocktail.instructions: Blender until smooth. Pour. Garnish with fresh strawberry.

cocktail.name: Orange Julius
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for 30 seconds. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Colonial Rummer
cocktail.instructions: Add crushed glass halfway up glass. Add liquor ingredients. Stir with swizzle stick. Garnish with fruit. Relax and sip.

cocktail.name: Sweaty Mexican Lumber Jack
cocktail.instructions: Fill the shot glass 3/4 with Yukon Jack. Next fill the rest of the shot glass with Tequila. Last add 3 to 4 drops of tabasco sause.

cocktail.name: Kori's Saturday Night Special
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. If it gets too thick, add some cream. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Roadkill
cocktail.instructions: Pour all 3 ingredients into the glass and serve with a Coke back.

cocktail.name: Bleeding Snatch
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients together in highball glass stir with cinnamon stick, and enjoy your very own beeding snatch

ingredient.name: Tomato juice (or tabasco for the real men)

cocktail.name: Dracona
cocktail.instructions: Pour Adocaat and orange fruit juice straight into the glass, there will be a little curdling but dont worry. Add the ice cubes into the glass then Sambuca , slide creme de Menthe down the side. A yellow green yellow formation shouls occur, then add lemonade.

cocktail.name: Gin Gin
cocktail.instructions: Pour ginger ale over gin.

cocktail.name: Whiskey Orange the Jesperian Way
cocktail.instructions: Just mix them.

cocktail.name: Bayou Juice
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal parts of all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice. Chill, shake and strain!

cocktail.name: Sip and Get Funky
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients and slam it.

cocktail.name: Dirty Diaper
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal parts of all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice, and chill, shake, and strain.

cocktail.name: Passout
cocktail.instructions: Stir lightly, with or without ice

cocktail.name: The Antichrist
cocktail.instructions: Pour each of the first 3 ingredients into a shot glass and then add the Tabasco sauce on the top.

cocktail.name: Shake That Ass
cocktail.instructions: Build in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Wildfire
cocktail.instructions: You need 3 shot glasses and a beer glass (I use a schooner - 425 mL - but of course use whatever you feel necessary). Put the tabasco sauce in one shot glass. This is the firestarter. The tequila shot is the propellant which spreads the fire. The peppermint schnapps shot brings the fire under control, and finally, the beer puts out the last of the flames.

cocktail.name: The Better Fuzzy Navel
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients together, then freeze drink until slushy (usually 2 hours) serve in highball glass, and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Flaming Russian
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka in shot glass, carefully layer rum on top. Ignite rum and serve.

cocktail.name: Gila Monster
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker, top with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Miami Hurricane
cocktail.instructions: Mix in order: Ice, vodka, juices.

cocktail.name: Jagershock
cocktail.instructions: Chill the two ingredients then pour into a chilled shot glass (the order you put them in does not matter).

cocktail.name: Milpsi
cocktail.instructions: Pour milk in first then pepsi and drink before it starts to seperate.

cocktail.name: Bananaball
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Cubins Cracker
cocktail.instructions: Add Schnapps, Southern Comfort, Juice and Ice to Shaker. Shake briefly and pour unstrained into the collins glass. Gently pour Curacao down the side of the glass, to allow it to sink to the bottom. Then add raspberry cordial over a spoon, to allow it to float on top. Serve with straws and a slice of Orange.

cocktail.name: Hot Bitch
cocktail.instructions: Add all the alcholic measures into the glass without stirring, add the dash of tabasco and it's ready.

cocktail.name: Dick Hard
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three liquors then fill with Sprite. Garnish, and serve.

cocktail.name: Purple Motherfucker #3
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, blue curaco, blueberry schnapps. Add cranberry juice until the solution is purple. Pour in shot glass.

cocktail.name: McShake
cocktail.instructions: Place all of the ingredients in a blender. The chocolate syrup should be added to the liking of the drinker. Next blend until you have achieved desired thickness. Whipped cream and additional toppings are optional.

cocktail.name: Breath Freshener
cocktail.instructions: Place the mint leaf in the bottom of the glass. Add the vodka first and fill with the creme de menthe.

cocktail.name: Coffee Grinder
cocktail.instructions: Pour into glass and stir. Shoot.

cocktail.name: Etyk
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve with ice!

cocktail.name: Buzz Lightyear
cocktail.instructions: Pour over cracked ice filled in glass and stir briefly.

cocktail.name: Lucky Stiff
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Ice-T
cocktail.instructions: Shake or stir. Serve with ice.

cocktail.name: Frisky's Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in blender, mix well, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Hot Brown Lizard
cocktail.instructions: Mix Midori with cinnamon schnapps until the desired tone of brown is achieved.

cocktail.name: Funky Filly
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients and strain over ice.

cocktail.name: Shoot to the Moon
cocktail.instructions: In a tall drink glass, fill it up half way with cubed ice. Add liquor. Then add cranberry juice, grenadine and soda, and mix well.

cocktail.name: Sour Apple #2
cocktail.instructions: Place ingredients in mixing cup with ice,shake strain into glass.

cocktail.name: The End of the World
cocktail.instructions: Serve warm. Straight into the shot glass.

cocktail.name: Chameleon
cocktail.instructions: All over ice. Colour should be a lovely turquoise.

cocktail.name: Flaming Hurley
cocktail.instructions: Add one shot of Southern Comfort and a splash of Dr. Pepper in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: The Bootlegger
cocktail.instructions: Mix three shots together in a glass. Pour over ice. Sit down and drink.

cocktail.name: Tattooed Smurf
cocktail.instructions: Pour Sprite over ice, add Tattoo and Stir

cocktail.name: Bitch Slap
cocktail.instructions: Mix it together over ice and drink.

cocktail.name: Jim Kroener
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a big ol' jar and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Melon Jones
cocktail.instructions: Mix and shoot.

cocktail.name: Orchard Downs
cocktail.instructions: Mix one shot of Dry Gin (more if you like) and fill glass with Apple Cider (or Apple Juice, but the cider is really better). Add Grenadine (optional) to taste.

cocktail.name: Bullshot #4
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker or pitcher with several ice cubes and stir. Strain into glass straight up or on the rocks and garnish with a stick of celery.

cocktail.name: Eroticolada
cocktail.instructions: Blend ingredients with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: 40 Water
cocktail.instructions: Traditionally, this drink is created in an empty 20oz bottle of water. Fill the bottle 1/4 full of crushed ice. Add the 3 shots in any order. Add the dash of Grenadine. Fill with pineapple juice. Close the cap, and shake.

cocktail.name: Melonoma
cocktail.instructions: Shake ice, vodka and melon liquer. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Fruit Salad
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients and serve as a shot or mixed drink.

cocktail.name: Axe Murderer
cocktail.instructions: Mix like a long island iced tea.

cocktail.name: B-51
cocktail.instructions: This drink is best when shaken and strained, but the proper way is to layer the drink. Kahlua is poured first, then Bailey's is next, and Frangelico is layered on top.

cocktail.name: Mickey Mouse
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Funky Cold Medina
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice and top off with cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Campari Orange
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice in highball glass.

cocktail.name: Picon Biere
cocktail.instructions: Just mix Amer Picon and beer in a pilsner.

cocktail.name: Sno-Cone
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, then add schnapps & 7-Up. Add Grenadine and let settle to the bottom of the glass. Carefully float the Blue Curacao over the top of the drink.

cocktail.name: Tie Me To The Bedpost #1
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into sour glass.

cocktail.name: Kiwi Colada
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into blender and blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Glaucoma
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake well. Strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Malibu Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Pour malibu rum in a highball glass, and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink.

cocktail.name: Cancun Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Moisten rim of coffee mug with lime and dip rim in sugar. Pour liqueurs into mug and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Flaming Blue Jesus
cocktail.instructions: Layer with 151 rum on top. Light on fire - Burn for 5 seconds - Blow it out and drink.

cocktail.name: Jeremiah
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients except Milk in mixing glass. Add ice. Fill with milk. Shake vigourously. Pour into glass. Serve.

cocktail.name: Manchurian Candidate
cocktail.instructions: First pour vodka, then soy sauce, into the shot glass.

cocktail.name: Cran-Collins
cocktail.instructions: Put three cubes of ice in a glass. Pour in Vodka, Cranberry Juice, and Collins Mix. Stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Tie Me To The Bedpost, Baby
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice in a hurricane glass.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients with ice in mixing glass. Shake and strain.

cocktail.name: Melon Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Serve on the rocks or blend with ice to make a Frozen Melon Margarita.

cocktail.name: Sammy Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Combine and drink

cocktail.name: Vanilla Coke
cocktail.instructions: Put some ice in a glass. Add Southern Comfort, add Vanilla Liqueur, fill glass with coke.

cocktail.name: Peachy Comfort
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass Half full of ice. Add Southern Comfort and peach schnapps. Fill glass with ginger ale. stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Bonsai Pipeline
cocktail.instructions: In a shot glass add Wild Turkey and melon liqeur. Float Bacardi 151 on top. Light drink, and squeeze lime in drink. Blow out and shoot.

cocktail.name: Fuck Me Up
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, shake and strain into shooter glass. Shoot drink!

cocktail.name: Hot Butterscotch Cocoa
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in coffee mug, top with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Cornholio's Revenge
cocktail.instructions: Pour the malibu rum, banana liqueur, and cherry brandy. Add the ice and sprite. Add lime wedge and serve.

cocktail.name: Five in the Morning
cocktail.instructions: Place ice in glass and pour in the five liquors. Next pour in the the orage juice and the sour mix. Finally shake and garnish with an orange slice.

cocktail.name: Mazerati
cocktail.instructions: Pour 3/4 oz Absolut Citron in a highball glass, balance with cranberry juice, top with 7-up, and garnish with lime.

cocktail.name: Coast-Line
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1/2 oz. of Blue Curacao and a 1/2 oz. of vodka in a highball glass. Top with Pineapple juice and a splash of 7-up. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Purple Fantasy
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka and a 1/2 oz. rum in a highball glass. Top with grape soda. Splash 7-up on top.

cocktail.name: 607 Special
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Blue-Woo
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka and a 1/2 oz. blueberry schnapps in a tall glass. Balance with cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Kahlua Madness
cocktail.instructions: Put Kahlua in the glass. Put vodka in the (same) glass. Put tonic in the (same) glass. Suck from the bottom up with two straws.

cocktail.name: Lion Tamer
cocktail.instructions: Mix Southern Comfort and Lime Juice in the Martini Glass. Top off with a pinch of Powdered Sugar. Add One Large Ice Cube. Serve.

cocktail.name: Tie Me To The Bedpost #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Green Widow
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 parts of blue curacao to a cocktail glass. Pour over it 3 parts orange juice. Stir and serve cold.

cocktail.name: Long Summer Night
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in glass, stir and serve.

cocktail.name: El Nino
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker, mix ingredients with ice and shake vigorously. Strain over ice in a Hurricane glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

cocktail.name: Wild Berry Pop-Tart
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients into shot glass, slam it on the table and shoot it, followed promptly with a beer.

cocktail.name: Oreo Cookie
cocktail.instructions: Layer Kahlua, Creme de Cacao, and Bailey's (on top), then top with a splash of vodka.

cocktail.name: 8 Seconds
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingrediants with ice and strain. Serve chilled.

cocktail.name: 187 URge
cocktail.instructions: Mix together and stir it is good

cocktail.name: Vodka Ricki
cocktail.instructions: First add 3 shots of vodka into a tall glass of ice and then add 16 oz. of sprite or 7up, then squeeze three lime wedges in to the the drink mix.

cocktail.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #5
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins glass with ice. Add 2 oz. of vodka and 1 oz. triple sec. Fill glass almost to the top with pineapple juice, add Grenadine for color, and top off the glass with 7-Up or Slice. Shake or stir until the drink turns a light orange-pink color.

cocktail.name: Malibu Pink Panther
cocktail.instructions: In a blender, crush a hand full or two of ice. Then add the frozen pink lemonade and Malibu Rum. Blend until it becomes somewhat smooth (usually less than 30 seconds). Then add the whipped cream while leaving the blender running. This will add the consistency to your drink and therefore the amount of whipped cream is to your discression. Blend until smooth and serve.

cocktail.name: 357 Magnum
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and rum over ice. Add 7-up and stir. Add Amaretto (without stirring) and enjoy.

cocktail.name: L.A.P.D. Nightshift
cocktail.instructions: Layer in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Green Sneaker
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Southern Santa
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball half full with ice. Add coconut rum. Fill with eggnog. Stir in grenadine to desired red (no more than 1 oz).

cocktail.name: Smooth Sailing
cocktail.instructions: Serve over ice. Drizzle cherry brandy over the top of other ingredients. Garnish with lime and cherry.

cocktail.name: Jim Beam's Redneck Friend
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in bowl and mix well.

cocktail.name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fuck
cocktail.instructions: Mix blue curacao and melon liqueur (cold strain for best results) and top off with 2 splashes of Canadian Club Rye.

cocktail.name: Mandy Sea
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquor and juices in mixing cup and blend. Pour over ice in collins glass top with grenadine and splash of 7-up. Garnish with a flag or two cherries.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Jambaylaya
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum over ice. Fill to top with fruit punch.

cocktail.name: Bloody Pearl Harbor
cocktail.instructions: stir well with ice. Adding a few drops of hot sauce for flavor is optional.

cocktail.name: Red Dragons Breath
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1 shot of Hot Damn 100 with 1 shot of your favorite 100 proof Whiskey. Shoot it.

cocktail.name: Fat Box
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingrediants in mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Hershey Squirts
cocktail.instructions: Make Cocoa in the traditional method, add Whiskey liberally

cocktail.name: Purple Helmeted Warrior
cocktail.instructions: Mix all spirits in together with Rose's lime juice, then add the 7-up to taste, and finally the grenadine to traffic light.

cocktail.name: Flaming Asshole
cocktail.instructions: Layer in this order: Grenadine, creme de menthe, banana liqueur, white rum. Light rum before serving. Server with a straw.

cocktail.name: Killer Bee
cocktail.instructions: Pour both liquors in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Sweaty Mexican
cocktail.instructions: Fill mug half way with beer. Splash Rum on Tequila in shot glass, then light with match. Drop flaming shot glass in mug. Drop in a lime slice. Chug it.

cocktail.name: Dark and Stormy #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum into glass over ice. Pour ginger beer over it. Squeeze in lime and drop slice in. Drink it down.

cocktail.name: Schlag-n-nog
cocktail.instructions: Add the egg nog and Goldschlager together in a bowl. Add nutmeg if desired.

cocktail.name: Depressed Goalie
cocktail.instructions: Fill the jar with ice. Pour over the 3 1/2 oz of whiskey (Jim Beam). Then add the Pepsi and Mountain Dew. Mix if desired.

cocktail.name: Aggie Punch
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients and stir. Best served over ice and in a clear glass.

cocktail.name: Tropical Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Half fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum, triple sec, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Stir. Add Grenadine and top with cherry and other fruit.

cocktail.name: Pisco-rita
cocktail.instructions: Add limeade concentrate, Pisco, and triple sec in blender. Add ice until blender is full. Blend on high speed adding water until blender is full while blending. Serve in margarita glass rimmed with salt if desired.

cocktail.name: Green Ocean
cocktail.instructions: Blend quickly and serve.

cocktail.name: Westwood Ice Tea
cocktail.instructions: In a Beer mug full of ice, pour in the tequila, gin, light rum and stir. Now Stir in the cinnamon schnapps, then stir in the vanilla vodka. Finally splash the high proof rum on top

cocktail.name: Santa Monica Pier
cocktail.instructions: In a tall glass with ice, pour the Alize and Triple Sec, stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch
cocktail.instructions: In a moderlately sized glass (about 8 to 12 oz or so) pour in finely crushed ice, followed by the cinnamon schnapps and vanilla vodka.

cocktail.name: 49er Gold Rush
cocktail.instructions: Pour in tequila, and cinnamon schnapps in a shot glass (chilled, to your advantage).

cocktail.name: Wild Wendy
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient in a shaker. Shake well. Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Afterlanche
cocktail.instructions: Layer liquors in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Uncle Sam
cocktail.instructions: Pour three liquors in a shot glass. Better if chilled, prettier if layered.

cocktail.name: Rieber Red Margarita
cocktail.instructions: In a blender, put in ice, Strawberry Margarita Mix, Tequila, and triple sec, blend, and serve in a chilled glass or mug, with a straw.

cocktail.name: Gayley Avenue Margarita
cocktail.instructions: In a blender, pour in ice first, then the sweet and sour mix, followed by the Strawberry Margarita Mix, followed by the tequila and triple sec. Blend until you have a nice mix, pour into chilled glass or mug, top with the cherry.

cocktail.name: 3rd Street Promanade
cocktail.instructions: In a blender, put in ice, orange juice, vodka, cinnamon schnapps, gin, tequila, and triple sec. Blend well, pour in a tall chilled glass. Sip through a straw.

cocktail.name: Jim Morrison
cocktail.instructions: In chilled double-shot glass (or any chilled glass big enough to hold 2 shots) mix in the Jack D, Jim B, Seagram 7, and Wild Turkey.

cocktail.name: Death From Above
cocktail.instructions: In a freezingly chilled glass pour in Bacardi 151 and Gin. Now light the drink on fire (Be careful!) After a few seconds of burning the drink, pour in the coke.

cocktail.name: Klingon Blood Wine
cocktail.instructions: Start with ice filled beer mug. Add tabasco first. Shake twice, a bad blend is terrible!

cocktail.name: Ice Cappuccino
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into Poco grande glass.

cocktail.name: Insomniac
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into Poco grande glass.

cocktail.name: Dark Indulgence
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients. Pour into Poco grande glass.

cocktail.name: Cyber Smoke
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into champagne flute. Add a small piece of edible dry ice.

cocktail.name: Forbidden Smoke
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into cocktail glass. Add a piece of edilbe dry ice.

cocktail.name: 360 degress
cocktail.instructions: Pour two of each ingredients in a shot glass then use a coaster to put one shot glass over the top of one another.

cocktail.name: Diva
cocktail.instructions: Pour and build in a tall glass or collins glass. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cherry and lime.

cocktail.name: Bananas and Cream
cocktail.instructions: stir until ingredients are mixed well.

cocktail.name: Flaming Fruit Trees
cocktail.instructions: light on fire for five seconds blow out and suck through a straw.

cocktail.name: Absolutely Fruity
cocktail.instructions: mix banana and watermelon liqueur in shot glass top with vodka.

cocktail.name: Fiery Blue Mustang
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients and light on fire. Blow out flame, saddle up, and enjoy the ride!

cocktail.name: Chocolate Covered Cherry Shot
cocktail.instructions: add in the order written and mix then add the grenadine

cocktail.name: Indian Summer
cocktail.instructions: Mix all together and take all at once as a shot.

cocktail.name: Dr. Kevorkian
cocktail.instructions: Stir well and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Blonde Bombshell
cocktail.instructions: Add ice, rum, and frozen lemonade concentrate to a blender. Blend at high speed. Pour into a margarita glass.

cocktail.name: Lennart
cocktail.instructions: Pour pear brandy and lime juice over ice in glass. Fill with sprite.

cocktail.name: Schnappster
cocktail.instructions: Mix together and have a good time.

cocktail.name: Orange Surfboard
cocktail.instructions: Combine all alocohol in a tall glass with ice. Fill with orange juice and a splash of cranberry juice. Shake to mix and serve.

cocktail.name: Lime Vodka Collins
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 3/4 ths full with cubed ice. Add Vodka, Lemon Juice, Sugar and top off glass with Club Soda.

cocktail.name: Flaming Anus
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in mug. Let stand until room temperature. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Cherry Bomb #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add 1 1/2 oz. of vodka. Fill with unsweetened cherry juice.

cocktail.name: Door County Cherry Cheesecake
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into shot glasses. (Optional garnish of Whipped cream and a Teddy-Graham on top.) Yields 3 or 4 shots depending on shot glass size and ice melt.

cocktail.name: Smirnoff Snapple Spikage
cocktail.instructions: Add half of glass with ice cubes. Add Vodka. Fill with Snapple. Mix and serve.

ingredient.amount: Fill with Kiwi Strawberry or Grapeade
ingredient.name: Snapple

cocktail.name: Kordulas Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the ingredients - Then put a dash of Angostura on the cube - put it in the champagne by using a tong.

cocktail.name: Naked Girl Scout
cocktail.instructions: Mix and serve.

cocktail.name: Little Black Devil
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass. Serve.

cocktail.name: The Other Half
cocktail.instructions: Use a spoon to layer tripple sec, amaretto, and the rum. Turn off the lights, light the rum on fire to warm up the rim of glass, carefully blow out the flame, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Yellow Motherfuckers
cocktail.instructions: It is best to use a large cooler with a spout. The amount of Vodka and Gin you use depends on the size of your cooler. Add the ingredients to your prefered taste.

cocktail.name: Russian Candy
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot with vodka then peach schnapps. Add a dash of grenadine (do not stir). Allow grenadine to settle at the bottom of the glass. Shoot.

cocktail.name: The Ringo
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add ingrediants in order listed.

cocktail.name: Ebola
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in pitcher and to add a cooler edge throw in some crushed ice and a touch of cinammon.

cocktail.name: Atomic Watermelon
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in glass over ice and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Snow Cap Columbian Monk
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 1/2 oz. frangelico into a tall glass and fill with strong coffee. Top with a scoop of ice-cream.

cocktail.name: KoolShock
cocktail.instructions: Place a few ice cubes into the glass, add the Aftershock, then the Kool-Aid. Stir to mix. Enjoy

cocktail.name: Bacci Ball
cocktail.instructions: Serve with ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Hot Nun
cocktail.instructions: Pour Frangelico into glass, then honey, next lemon peel and cloves and fill snifter with hot water.

cocktail.name: Captain's and Creme
cocktail.instructions: Pour Captain Morgan's over ice, and add cream soda.

cocktail.name: Dive Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass with 1/3 oz Amaretto and 2/3 oz root beer schnapps, next drop shot glass into mug of beer and drink before it fizzes over the mug.

cocktail.name: Evil Tongue
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker over ice. Shake ans strain.

cocktail.name: Igloo Sue
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice or snow. Pour in lemonade. Add Vodka. Splash in grenadine (it should seep to the bottom).

cocktail.name: Aperol Schuhmann
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Serve in a longdrink glass.

cocktail.name: Zombie #5
cocktail.instructions: Mixed in a shaker on ice. Serve in a Tumbler on crushed ice

cocktail.name: Hiroshima Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Fill your shot glass 3/4 way full with Triple Sec. Then carefully layer the Bailey's on top of the Triple Sec. Finaly add some drops of Grenadine into the center of the shot. If done correctly it will look like an atomic mushroom cloud when the drop his the bottom of the shot glass

cocktail.name: Captain Crunch
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice, shake and strain into a rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Tea-riffic
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the 6 oz. of triple sec to the sweet tea and add the juice of 2 lemon wedges to it. Leave lemon wedges in drink then add 5 ice cubes. Stir gently.

cocktail.name: Winter Tropic
cocktail.instructions: Pour the shot of vodka first. Then add the juices simultaneously.

cocktail.name: Carman's Dance
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka and gin simultaneously. Add strawberry and cranberry together. Fill the rest with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Blow Blue Bubbles
cocktail.instructions: Pour blueberry schnapps into champagne flute. Fill with champagne.

cocktail.name: Shark's Mai Tai
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingedients in a blender except for the 151 rum. Pour into a cocktail glass with ice to about 1 inch below the rim. Add the shot of 151 but do not mix. Let settle for about 1 minute before serving.

cocktail.name: Siberian Dutchman
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients, and pour over ice into highball glass

cocktail.name: Rocky Mountain Motherfucker #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice, strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: April's Apple
cocktail.instructions: Pour apple pucker into glass, add granadine, then fill glass with lemonade. Can be served on ice.

cocktail.name: Polish Professor
cocktail.instructions: In an old fashioned glass filled with ice, add the Vodka, followed by the Pineapple juice, and last, the 7-Up. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Neuralizer
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into highball glass, add ice if desired.

cocktail.name: Salt and Pepper Martini
cocktail.instructions: Combine vermouth and Absolut in mixing glass over ice and stir. Strain into a cocktail glass with a salted rim.

cocktail.name: Wrightsville Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Pout all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into large white wine glasses half-filled with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Malibu Pop
cocktail.instructions: Combine Malibu Rum and Blue Curacao shake, then add juices.Serve over ice in highball glass.

cocktail.name: Peach Punch
cocktail.instructions: Get a big bowl (40 litres) and put everything in. Mix until all the sugar is dissolved, then let it rest for not less than 12 hours. Before drinking you can add some more sugar or brandy depending on your taste.

cocktail.name: Tropical Peach Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Red Rudolph
cocktail.instructions: Serve hot. Top with whipped cream, garnish with a tall cinnamon stick

cocktail.name: Snowflake
cocktail.instructions: Blend Pear Liqueur, Milk and Ice Add 7-up to taste

cocktail.name: Jello Shot
cocktail.instructions: Mix hot water and jello. Add rum. Pour into 2 ounce cups. Serve after the jello has set.

cocktail.name: Lava
cocktail.instructions: Add all three ingredients to shotglass and consume.

cocktail.name: Aperol '86
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with strawberry.

cocktail.name: Shaft
cocktail.instructions: Pour Apoerol and gin over ice in a highball glass. Stir. Fill with sparkling white wine.

cocktail.name: Ortensia
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Leprechaun's Gold
cocktail.instructions: Pour half a shot of Irish Cream in a shot glass and then fill remaining part with Goldschlager.

cocktail.name: Lawn Boy
cocktail.instructions: Put the ice in a blender, pour the vodka over it, toss in the mint, and fill with limeade. Blend until smooth, adding sugar little by little until it's just right. More vodka may be added during blending as well.

cocktail.name: Lewie
cocktail.instructions: Fill the pilsner glass with Ice. Add rum, amaretto and orange juice. Shake. Top with a splash of grenadine.

cocktail.name: Thunder and Lighting
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shaker and serve.

cocktail.name: Screaming Nazi #2
cocktail.instructions: Just mix it up.

cocktail.name: Screaming Epsilon
cocktail.instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a blender set on high speed for 15-30 seconds.

cocktail.name: Green Summer
cocktail.instructions: Take an ordinary glass, and put in the two shots of coconut rum. Malibu or Coco Ribe will work nicely. Then pour in Mountain Dew. Make sure the Dew is chilled, or at least cold, and serve stirred, not shaken or strained. Adjust ingredient quantities to taste.

cocktail.name: C-MOB
cocktail.instructions: Two ice cubes , 2oz of crown, 1 shot of vodka, and fill the rest with coca cola
