cocktail.name: Bleacher Creature
cocktail.instructions: Pour butterscotch over rum. Do not stir.

cocktail.name: Asthma Attack
cocktail.instructions: Shake.

cocktail.name: Generation X
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquors in first then add Zima.

cocktail.name: Donkey Semmen
cocktail.instructions: Put 4 ice cubes in shaker. Add ingredients. shake well and serve in a margarita glass. Garnish with lime.

cocktail.name: Naked Shake
cocktail.instructions: Fill cocktail mixer with ice. Add the vanilla schnapps, Swiss Mocha Cream Liquor & a few ounces of half-and-half. Stir or shake and strain into ice filled highball glass. Top it off with a splash of coca-cola. Garnish with filbert nuts or cherries & serve!

cocktail.name: Mullens Mai Tai
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in an empty shaker. Shake vigorously then pour contents into a tall cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, a wedge of pineapple or a cherry (or all three).

cocktail.name: Mistletoe
cocktail.instructions: In highball glass filled with ice, comibine creme de almond, white creme de cacao, swiss mocha cream & grenadine. Fill glass with half-and-half. Top with coca-cola. Garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

cocktail.name: Vicious Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Stir gently and sip slowly.

cocktail.name: Quick's Killaritas
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredient together in a pitcher then serve on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Shake all of the ingredients over ice and strain into a 4 oz. shooter glass.

cocktail.name: A Fuzzy Thing
cocktail.instructions: Pour alcohol first, then add the juice. A little sour mix is needed, but not enough to overpower the juice. Shake before serving, and make sure there isn't too much ice in the drink.

cocktail.name: Funky Chicken
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shot glass. Serve.

cocktail.name: Italian Screw
cocktail.instructions: Add 3 ice cubes or 2-3 oz. crushed ice to highball glass. Add 1 1/2 oz. Vodka. Add 1 oz. Galliano. Fill with pulpless orange juice.

cocktail.name: Naked Surfer
cocktail.instructions: Fill beer mug with ice. Then pour in vodka until it is half-filled. Add approximately a shot of grenadine. Then fill glass with orange juice and stir.

cocktail.name: Laura's Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Add banana, strawberry, pinapple, ice, and captain morgan, into blender, and mix into slush. Pour into glass, top with cherry and orange slice on side.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Banana
cocktail.instructions: Mix all parts together in a glass, or pitcher, depending on the amount of people you wish to serve.

cocktail.name: Fluxuation Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Pour Mountain dew and banana liqueur into a glass, Stir. Slowly add the Blue Curacao so it takes on a type of swirling effect due to the bubbles, this is as fun too look at as it is tasty to drink.

cocktail.name: Bull Breaker
cocktail.instructions: Use a large glass, add ice, add JD, add tequila, add water, then insert straw and serve.

cocktail.name: Rooster Tail
cocktail.instructions: Lick hand and put a dash of salt on hand, then lick salt and drink Cuervo first, then orange juice, then tomatoe juice.

cocktail.name: Dick Wells
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass 2/3 full with Bailey's and then top it off with Crown Royal.

cocktail.name: Betonimylly
cocktail.instructions: Frst you take Vodka but don't swallow it and then you take Cream in you mouth and mix then in your mouth and swallow.

cocktail.name: Quagmyre
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients as shown in any order. Shake until drink becomes clear.

cocktail.name: Green Cookie Monster
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in shot glass in order listed.

cocktail.name: Dutchie
cocktail.instructions: Pour creme de banane, apricot brandy and cherry brandy into the beer mug. Drop in a few ice cubes, and fill mug 3/4 with milk. Slowly pour the ounce of advocaat over the top of the milk covering the surface. Now watch as the advocaat drips around the ice and through the milk. This affect is best when the advocaat has been chilled.

cocktail.name: Jack the Ripper
cocktail.instructions: Level ice to top in shaker, pour Crown Royal and Buttershots. Shake. Strain into brandy snifter.

cocktail.name: Cough Syrup
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Clara
cocktail.instructions: The beer is first. The 7-Up is second. The ice is last, but it is only needed if the other ingredients aren't cold.

cocktail.name: Flaming Rasta
cocktail.instructions: If you can use a tall shot glass you will also need a straw and a lighter. When the drink is poured make sure your 151 is on top. then get your starw like it so it is wet light the drink (run the lighter over top or a match). Put your starw in a drink it fast.

cocktail.name: Fire on Ice
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka in a highball glass. Fill balance of glass with cider, stir, and serve. Add ice cubes if you like.

cocktail.name: Tweetie Bird
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in mixer with ice and shake. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: A Sunny Delight
cocktail.instructions: Using shot glasses in a cannery style Mason jar, pour the vodka and the triple sec together. Then sqeeze the lemon lightly, and place it on the rim. Fill the glass with Sunny Delight, then add a shot of Club Soda.

cocktail.name: Electric Lemonade #3
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients except 7-up in a shaker filled with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass. Top with 7-up. Garnish with lemon slice.

cocktail.name: Blue Moon Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

cocktail.name: Vodka Sonic
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka over ice. Add 1/2 club soda and 1/2 tonic to taste. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

cocktail.name: Royal Peach
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice and pour into shot glass

cocktail.name: Fernet con Coca
cocktail.instructions: Put some ice in a cocktail glass. Pour the Fernet and then fill with coke. No mixing required.

cocktail.name: Two-by-Four
cocktail.instructions: First put the ice in the glass. Then pore the whiskey and the Southern Comfort into the glass. Drip with the Angostora. Stir it together.

cocktail.name: Flash Gordon
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything into a glass, add ice and lime on top.

cocktail.name: Rocha-Gil
cocktail.instructions: Pour straight in glass.

cocktail.name: Manhattan Dry
cocktail.instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and granish with a lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Manhattan Sweet
cocktail.instructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and granish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Volcano
cocktail.instructions: Pour liqueurs into a champagne flute. Fill with ice-cold champagne. Twist orange peel over drink.

cocktail.name: Carlitos
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in a tall glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Gingerbread Man #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix the ingredients with ice in a shaker and pour in glass.

cocktail.name: Period in a Pitcher
cocktail.instructions: Mix the three cans (Punch, Pink Grapefruit Juice, and Orange Juice) in a pitcher. Add six shots of Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum. Add crushed ice to fill pitcher. Keep chilled in refrigerator.

cocktail.name: Sexual Harrasement
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain.

cocktail.name: Chris Crush
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients except soda with lots of ice in a shaker. Fill a highball glass with crushed ice and add the mixed ingredients. Fill up with soda.

cocktail.name: Black Tartan
cocktail.instructions: Straight: Float all ingredients. -- On the Rocks: Shake with ice and strain over ice

cocktail.name: Fuzzyberry
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients together and top with ice

cocktail.name: Pond water
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1/2 bottle beer into mug. Fill rest with 1/2 can of Coke.

cocktail.name: Little Brother
cocktail.instructions: Pour all the ingredients in blender. If preferred add an ice cube. Mix thoroughly. Pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Mountain Sex
cocktail.instructions: Pour Mountain Dew in glass then add Triple Sec and stir.

cocktail.name: Cassis Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, orange juice, and lemon/lime juice into a shaker half-filled with ice. Shake. Strain into a collins glass with several ice cubes. Add a splash of creme de cassis and of grenadine. Garnish with a lemon/lime wedge and a straw.

cocktail.name: Pumpkin Pie (Trafford Style)
cocktail.instructions: Add bailey's and kahlua together in shaker and shake. Pour into shot glasses and add required amount of bacardi to each and then sprinkle with cinnamon. Light on fire. Slam!

cocktail.name: Flaming Spanish Fly
cocktail.instructions: Moisten rim of glass with cherry juice or water. Dip rim into coarse sugar to coat heavily. Pour tequila and coffee liquor into glass. Gently float 151 proof rum on top. Carefully ignite rum and swirl glass to lightly melt sugar with flame. Immediately pour in coffee to extinguish flames and fill cup. Top with whipped cream and cherry.

cocktail.name: Sprawling Dubinsky
cocktail.instructions: First, add one part of Johnnie Walker Red. Next add one part Johnnie Walker Black, followed by another part of Absolut Citron. Finally, throw in a touch of amaretto, for flavor.

cocktail.name: Brent's Tequila Head Slam
cocktail.instructions: Build the three ingredients in a shot glass in the order listed. Fold a paper bar napkin and place firmly over the top. Slam the shot glass on the table, bar, etc. Make sure the drink fizzes. Turn the drink up and 'Slam It Into Your Head' before the fizzing subsides or try to be the first to re-slam the empty shot glass to the bar in a 'Group Head Slam'.

cocktail.name: Mongolian Motherfucker
cocktail.instructions: Add ingriedients over ice. shake and enjoy

cocktail.name: Pink Flamingo
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and serve in tall glass.

cocktail.name: The Lucky Stud
cocktail.instructions: These ingredients can be mixed in a glass with ice before you put into a shot glass, or poured right into the shot glass.

cocktail.name: Velvet Tongue
cocktail.instructions: Add Southern Comfort, Canadian Club and fill with ginger ale over ice to a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Red Drink
cocktail.instructions: Thaw strawberries. Put all in blender, top with ice and blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Tiger Tail
cocktail.instructions: Layer in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Beach Bettsy Style
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a Highball glass. Stir until mixture is pink. Add a bit of cranberry juice if you want to make it Bettsy Style.

cocktail.name: French 75 (Cognac)
cocktail.instructions: Combine cognac, sugar and lemon juice in shaker. Add ice and shake till chilled. Pour into champagne flute. Pour champagne over cognac concotion. Garnish with lemon curl.

cocktail.name: Heavy "G"
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredientsa in a mug or glass with a salted rim like a Margarita, fill with ice and 7-up or Sprite.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Alexander
cocktail.instructions: Combine liquers in shaker along with cream and ice. Shake and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Cherry Over The Edge
cocktail.instructions: Mix with chrushed ice.

cocktail.name: Nuclear Ice Tea
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all of the ingredients. Top with 7-up.

cocktail.name: Cryonic Shock
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Blue Curacao, Whisky, Rum, Brandy, Ouzo, Lemon and Lime juices in a blender. Pulse mixture for 2-3 seconds. Add the 8 ice cubes. Pulse for about 20-30 seconds or until desired consistency of ice is achieved.

cocktail.name: Crispy Crunch
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Purple Haze #3
cocktail.instructions: Add the Amaretto and root beer schnapps, then slowly add the milk. Next add the grape soda to change the color of the milk to purple.

cocktail.name: Electric Popsicle
cocktail.instructions: Pour both the melon liqueur and blue curacao in the collins glass and fill with 7-up. Place the slice of lime on the top of the glass.

cocktail.name: Virgin Pussy
cocktail.instructions: Just pour in both of the schnapps and add the pinch of sugar.

cocktail.name: The Milky Way
cocktail.instructions: Pour the root beer schnapps first in the shot glass then add the irish cream and then the Goldschlager on top.

cocktail.name: Cookies 'n' Cream
cocktail.instructions: Add the creme de cacao and vanilla schnapps and then fill with milk.

cocktail.name: Sugar High
cocktail.instructions: Add all of the liquors first in no particular order, then mix the sugar in until it's all dissolved then fill with 7-up.

cocktail.name: 5-Ball
cocktail.instructions: Make Kool-Aid as normal, except add double the amount of sugar. After Kool-Aid is made add Triple sec. Serve Chilled.

cocktail.name: Tropical Itching
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, a cherry and a sprig of mint.

cocktail.name: Kir
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in a large wineglass. Twist the lemon peel to release the oil and drop it into the glass.

cocktail.name: Vermouth Cassis #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vermouth and crme de cassis into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes and fill with club soda.

cocktail.name: Pink California Sunshine
cocktail.instructions: Pour the champagne into a cocktail glass. Add the orange juice and creme de cassis.

cocktail.name: Summer Punch
cocktail.instructions: Put a block of ice in a punch bowl. Pour in wine and creme de cassis, and stir. Float orange slices and strawberries on top. Serve in 4-ounce punch glasses.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Kir Royale
cocktail.instructions: Mix strawberries and sugar in a bowl and let stand for 5-10 minutes. Stir occasionally. Divide into two white wine glasses, add champagne and creme de cassis.

cocktail.name: El Diablo
cocktail.instructions: Stir tequila and creme de cassis over ice in a chilled collins glass. Fill with ginger ale, squeeze lime wedge over drink and drop it into the glass.

cocktail.name: Campton Place Cafe Sonia
cocktail.instructions: Lightly beat cream with few drops vanilla. Reserve. To warmed 7-oz. mug, add Metaxa, amaretto, and Tia Maria. Pour in coffee. Taste for sweetness: add sugar if desired. Top with beaten cream.

cocktail.name: Rum Sazerac
cocktail.instructions: Soak sugar cube in Angostura bitters. Crush it with a pestle in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes, pour in rum, add a few dashed of Pernod and fill with water.

cocktail.name: Perroquet
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cold water and stir well.

cocktail.name: Colibri
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice in a shaker. Strain oover crushed ice in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Yellow Parrot
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Ladies Sidecar
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Easter Bunny
cocktail.instructions: Shake creme de cacao and vodka with ice. Strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Float chocolate syrup and cherry brandy.

cocktail.name: Sweet Tarts
cocktail.instructions: Add all into Shot glass. Slam the shot glass down as to mix up the ingrediants and give it a fizz. Then just drink it down and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Pixie Stix
cocktail.instructions: Pour SoCo and Amaretto over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix and top off with a splash of sprite. Float grenadine on top. Garnish with maraschino cherries.

cocktail.name: Hollywood
cocktail.instructions: mix all ingrediants in a shaker and then strain.

cocktail.name: Green Motherfucker
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Nutty Irish Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Fill mug 2/3 full with coffee. Add liquers, chocolate syrup, and stir. Top it off with a mound of whipped cream, sprinkle it with cinnamon or nutmeg if desired.

cocktail.name: BFD (Bad F****** Drink)
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add vodka, triple sec, & Everclear. Top off with grapefruit juice.

cocktail.name: Flaming Blue
cocktail.instructions: Mix into a shot glass, and splash the Bacardi on the very top. Be careful not to mix it into the rest of the drink. Then carefully light the rum on fire with a match. Blow out the flame and drink it fast before the rim gets too hot.

cocktail.name: Falling star
cocktail.instructions: Pour white sambuca into shot glass as if you were pouring a normal shot only filling 3/4 of the shot glass. Slowly pour a little Jack Daniels on top almost dripping it into glass. This will cause the Jack to slowly fall to the bottom of the glass, giving the appearance of a "Falling Star".

cocktail.name: B-53 #2
cocktail.instructions: Layer each ingredient in the order listed.

cocktail.name: Stanley Steamer
cocktail.instructions: Take a warm beer mug with handle. Put in the liquor. Fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream dashing a little Orange liqueur on top. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Shark Bite #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine Myers's rum, Orange Juice, Sour Mix, and Ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into Hurricane Glass, and add Grenadine. Serve with a straw, but do not stir before serving.

cocktail.name: Kurant Shot
cocktail.instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant in a glass and fill up with sprite and ice

cocktail.name: Sweet Tits
cocktail.instructions: Add all the ingredients into a shaker over ice. Shake gently and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Cotton Candy
cocktail.instructions: Add Butterscotch Schanapps and Mountain Dew to ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Tropical Hooter
cocktail.instructions: Mix and pour into shotglass.

cocktail.name: Vixen
cocktail.instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Grenadine and Frangelico and shake till frothy. Strain into chilled Martini glass. Slowly add the Kahlua and garnish with cherry or Hershey's Kiss.

cocktail.name: Gorilla Sweat
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients (except cinnamon stick) and heat gently until butter is melted. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

cocktail.name: Irish Whip
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a pint glass, fill with one part 7-Up and one part orange juice, stir and add a few ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Iguana #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and tequila over ice in shaker. Add Kahlua. Shake and pour into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add amaretto and Southern Comfort. Fill rest of glass (at least 1/3 of volume) with pineapple juice.

cocktail.name: Stubbly Beaver
cocktail.instructions: Add each ingredient over ice and stir. Garnish with a Hersheys Kiss attached to a toothpick, with a butterscotch lifesaver on top.

cocktail.name: Big Daddy
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice & stir

cocktail.name: Hurricane, New Orleans Style
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients, mix well (shake or stir). Pour over crushed ice in Hurricane glass. Best enjoyed through small straw. Garnish with fruit wedge if desired.

cocktail.name: Sweet Tommy
cocktail.instructions: Shake schnapps, vodka and cranberry juice. Pour into hurricane glass filled with ice. Add Sprite/7-Up, and pour 1 count cherry juice on the top. Garnish with 3 cherries.

cocktail.name: Talbot's Dream
cocktail.instructions: Add Godiva and the Bailey's in a blender. Add ice to desired thickness. Blend well.

cocktail.name: Belize Rum Punch
cocktail.instructions: Fill tall glass with ice, add first 5 ingredients then top off with pineapple juice. Shake thoroughly. Add a dash or two of grenadine, stir gently and then listen to the sound of the warm Carribean breezes flowing through the palm trees.

cocktail.name: Fruity Screaming Fuzzy Navel
cocktail.instructions: Pour Orange juice and Peach schnapps in a punch bowl. Add the vodka. Pour the bottles of strawberry daiquiri in after. Stir a little. Serve.

cocktail.name: Screaming Purple Jesus
cocktail.instructions: Mix together and serve over ice

cocktail.name: Milwaukee Stop Light
cocktail.instructions: All you need to do is line em' up, and toss em' in!

cocktail.name: Sandbar Sleeper
cocktail.instructions: Fill shaker with ice, add ingredients, chill, strain

cocktail.name: Hot Toddy
cocktail.instructions: Brew tea and fill tall glass 3/4 full. Mix in honey. Mix in Brandy shots. Add lemon slice and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Hot Scotch
cocktail.instructions: Pour Buttershots Schnapps into an 8 oz. mug and fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Rum Punch #3
cocktail.instructions: Stir or Shake. Grenadine can be adjusted for your own taste.

cocktail.name: Villa Park
cocktail.instructions: Mix bourbon, orange juice and pineapple juice in mixer. Shake well. Pour into highball glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Jungle Juice
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything except orange juice Shake well and add with Orange Juice Enjoy

cocktail.name: Cool Hot Damn
cocktail.instructions: Pour a shot each (in different glasses). Down Hot Damn, chase with Schnapps.

cocktail.name: The Real Windex
cocktail.instructions: Shake vodka and liqueur with ice, strain into chilled glass, garnish with orange peel

cocktail.name: Vampire Juice
cocktail.instructions: Empty all three shots into glass. Fill with Orange Juice and add ice to chill. If possible, combine ingredients in tall shaker and strain ice.

cocktail.name: Rolling Green Elixer
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker, strain ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Legspreader #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients on ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Green Quencher
cocktail.instructions: In tall glass, mix Midori, lime juice, sweet and sour, and vodka. Top off with tonic water and stir well.

cocktail.name: Depth Charge
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Vodka, Pernod, Malibu & Tia Maria into a one pint beer glass, add the lemonade and pineapple juice, and top up with coke.

cocktail.name: The Big-V
cocktail.instructions: Try to layer in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Grapeschlager
cocktail.instructions: Pour Goldschlager over ice, then add the Grape Soda. Stir slightly, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Asphalt
cocktail.instructions: Pour brandy over ice the glass. Fill with Coke. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Snake Venom
cocktail.instructions: Pour the ingredients in a tall pint glass and let it swim.

cocktail.name: Out of Africa
cocktail.instructions: Blend with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cocktail cherry.

cocktail.name: Anti Freeze
cocktail.instructions: Pour the hot chocolate mix into a 9 ounce glass mug. Add the schnapps and boiling water. Stir Well. Top with a swirl of whipped cream. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and a peppermint stick.

cocktail.name: Oil Slick
cocktail.instructions: Mix both ingredients together in a shaker and serve in a chilled shot glass.

cocktail.name: Parappa the Drunk Rappa
cocktail.instructions: Pour shots over ice, add coke and strain into glass

cocktail.name: Satan's Spawn
cocktail.instructions: Add the Tabasco first, then the Firewater

cocktail.name: Chi Phi
cocktail.instructions: This is a shot. Just combine the 2 ingredients and enjoy

cocktail.name: Bailey's Shake #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into blender. Puree for several seconds, or until smooth. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Axelrod's Sweet Concoction
cocktail.instructions: Serve iced, stirred, not shaken

cocktail.name: Cinnamon Stick
cocktail.instructions: Pour one shot of Goldshlager into glass. Measure 1 cup of apple juice and pour into glass with Goldschlager. Mix and drink!

cocktail.name: Banana Dream
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir well. Much better if mixed with a blender, but a stir stick will do.

cocktail.name: Shark's Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum in over the ice, fill approximately to halfway with Mt. Dew, fill with cranberry juice, then mix again.

cocktail.name: M&M
cocktail.instructions: Pour straight up into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Attitude Adjustment
cocktail.instructions: Layer.

cocktail.name: Milky Way Martini
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients, mix, serve without ice.

cocktail.name: Si Kami Ki
cocktail.instructions: mix vodka and cinnamon schnapps in cocktail glass, add corbonated water, serve with ice

cocktail.name: Kinky Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Just pour all into a higball glass. For the real funky look you can add some strawberries or even have some vanilla icecream in it

cocktail.name: Supersonic Sunshine
cocktail.instructions: Put everything in a big glass. Garnish with a slice of orange on the edge of the glass.

cocktail.name: Surgedriver
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients and pour into highball glass over ice

cocktail.name: The Nomad
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, lemonade and fresca and serve over ice, add dash of grenadine

cocktail.name: Broken Down Golf Cart #2
cocktail.instructions: Place amaretto, melon liqueur, cranberry juice, and ice in a shaker. Then strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Occhi Blu
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingridients in a mixing glass. Serve in a cocktail glass. garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktail.name: After Eight
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass

cocktail.name: Adios Motherfucker #2
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass

cocktail.name: Loopy Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass (preferably a pint glass) with ice. Add 2 oz. Absolut Citron. Squeeze two lemon wedges and add three packages of sugar. Fill remainder of glass with 7-Up and sweet and sour mix.

cocktail.name: Alaska
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Srtrain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bannister
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Ster well. Strain into a cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Red Dwarf
cocktail.instructions: Mix rum, lemon juice, orange juice and peach schnapps together with plenty of ice in a shaker. Pour in to a chilled glass. Then pour the Creme de Cassis in to the glass allowing the red liquor to form a layer at the bottom of the glass. Garnish with cherries, orange or lemon to taste

cocktail.name: High Voltage
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Serve in a chilled glass.

cocktail.name: Purple Rain #3
cocktail.instructions: Shake the 1st 4 ingredients. Strain it to a cocktail glass. Top up with Sprite/7-up.

cocktail.name: Blue Chili
cocktail.instructions: Shake the first 5 ingredient in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail class. Add a dash of sprite. Garnish with cherry and lemon reel.

cocktail.name: Purple Love
cocktail.instructions: Combine the first 9 ingredient into a cocktail shaker. Shake well for about 25 seconds. Strain the cocktail into a high-ball glass. The piece of melted chocolate is for garnish purposes. -- How to use the melted chocolate: First spread the melted chocolate evenly over a plastic board and leave it to cool and harden.Using a sharp knife, draw the blade across the chocolate to create curls. Add the curls to the top of the cocktail and serve.

cocktail.name: Singapore Sling #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine Gin, Cherry brandy, Pineapple juice, grenadine into the collin glass. Stir well. top up with club soda and garnish with the cherry.

cocktail.name: Frozen Blue Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Put all the ingredient into a blender. Blend at medium speed for about 20 seconds. pour into a old-fashioned glass

cocktail.name: Cherry Lover
cocktail.instructions: Combine the first 5 ingredient into a cocktail shaker. Shake well for 20 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top with club Soda.

cocktail.name: Blue Ice Mountain
cocktail.instructions: Combine the first three ingredient into a high-ball glass. Stir well. Top with club soda

cocktail.name: Afterbirth
cocktail.instructions: Mix schnapps and grenadine. Add Bailey's last. Wait until the Bailey's curdles then shoot .
Pour the spirits over some ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill it up with Ginger Ale. Place a slice of lime in the drink and serve.

cocktail.name: Raging Bull
cocktail.instructions: Layer in listed order.

cocktail.name: Tropical Binalada
cocktail.instructions: Combine first 5 ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour the content unstrain into a collin glass and top up with club soda.

cocktail.name: Hurricane flint
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Venezia
cocktail.instructions: Mix. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest.

cocktail.name: Orange Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Mix the peachtree, vodka and sour mix in a shaker and shake it. Pour this into a higball glass fille with icecubes. Fill up with Orange Fanta and garnish it with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Bloody Chicken
cocktail.instructions: Pour Wild Turkey into shot glass. Fill the rest up with the Tequila. Finally, add the drop of Tabasco Sauce.

cocktail.name: Gulyuz
cocktail.instructions: Put everything in a shaker which is half-filled with cracked ice and shake for 1 minute. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bailey's Shake #2
cocktail.instructions: Put it all in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve.

cocktail.name: Leah's Last Hope
cocktail.instructions: Add Ice, Mix And Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Chambord sour
cocktail.instructions: Blend with ice. Serve up or on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Purple Haze
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass and strain into shotglass.

cocktail.name: Purple Passion
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Toxic Waste
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain.

cocktail.name: Death in the afternoon
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Pernod into the champagne flute and top off with the champagne.

cocktail.name: Orange Safari
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice in highball glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Galway Gray
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients, except for the cream, together. Pour into cocktail glass and float cream on top. Sprinkle some grated orange peel on top.

cocktail.name: ZaZa
cocktail.instructions: Pour a dash of angostura bitters into the bottom of the glass. Add gin and Dubonnet. Stir.

cocktail.name: Pimm's Cup
cocktail.instructions: In a highball glass add Pimm's No. 1 and twist of lemon. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cucumber slice.

cocktail.name: North Mymms Mirage
cocktail.instructions: Mix the black current and the lemonade together. Add the gin and Pimms together stirring well but do not shake. Garnish with fruit pieces. Mix a batch and serve liberally.

cocktail.name: Bitter Pill
cocktail.instructions: Mix JD & vodka together, add dash of lemon juice and top up glass with coke!

cocktail.name: Black Russian #3
cocktail.instructions: Stir briefly or until spoon disentegrates.

cocktail.name: Hurts You Right Here!
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in double shot glass. Shoot!

cocktail.name: Well Greased Dwarf
cocktail.instructions: Layer the ingrediants in the order they are listed in a pony glass. The Sambuca should be chilled first to layer more easily.

cocktail.name: Ludvika Walker
cocktail.instructions: Just mix and add some ice.

cocktail.name: Kim Special
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice in sling glass. Serve.

cocktail.name: Southern Death Cult
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in a highball glass and the add the liquors. Top the glass off with Coke and 7-up and a lemon twist. Stir.

cocktail.name: Pearl Harbour Revisited
cocktail.instructions: Just make a scotch and coke to your own specification and add a splash of vanilla essence - it really does add a new twist!

cocktail.name: Red Vodkatini
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, vermouth, and creme de cassis. Pour over crushed ice, and garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Pimm's Rangoon
cocktail.instructions: Pour Pimm's over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and garnish with lemon and cucumber peel.

cocktail.name: Pimm's Royal
cocktail.instructions: Pour Pimm's over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with champagne and garnish with lemon and cucumber peel.

cocktail.name: Cheat's Pimm's
cocktail.instructions: Mix. Pour into tall glass. Add ice-cold 7-Up or ginger ale. Garnish with one slice each of orange, lemon and cucumber. Serve.

cocktail.name: Mocha Mudslide Milkshake
cocktail.instructions: Place first 4 ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Freeze in blender container for 1 hour or until slightly frozen. Loosen frozen mixture from the sides of blender container, add yoghurt and blend until smooth. Garnish with banana slices. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Iced Lemonade Tea
cocktail.instructions: Use a big bowl and mix the sugar and lemonade together. Pour the tea over the top while it is still boiling. That way the sugar and lemonade mix properly. Let it cool before serving.

cocktail.name: Orange Bitters
cocktail.instructions: Chop the orange peel finely and mix it with the herbs and alcohol. Let it stand for 15-20 days in a sealed jar, agitating it every day. Pour off spirits through a cloth, and seal again. Put the strained off seeds and peel in a saucepan, crush it, cover with boiling water and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour into another jar, cover and let stand for 2 days. Strain this off and add it to the spirits. Add caramel coloring, filter again and let it rest until it settles perfectly clear.

cocktail.name: Devastating Body Rocker
cocktail.instructions: Pour in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Liquid Desert
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori, water, Mello yello and vodka. Stir. Serve over the rocks.

cocktail.name: Very Berry Tonic
cocktail.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add the vodka & the chambord. Fill with tonic water. Garnish with a couple of fresh raspberries.

cocktail.name: Banana Split
cocktail.instructions: Combine and shake. Serve over ice. Garnish with cherries.

cocktail.name: Erin's Sweater
cocktail.instructions: Shake.

cocktail.name: Joey F's Grape Ape
cocktail.instructions: Shake two parts Vodka with one part of raspberry liqueur and one part Cranberry Juice. Chill and serve as shots.

cocktail.name: Grand Gold Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Pour the the margarita mix, tequila, Cointreau, Grand Marnier, and beer into the blender. For frozen margaritas, fill the blender with ice cubes and blend until the ice is crushed. (For margaritas on the rocks, use less ice and blend until the ingredients are thoroughly mixed.) The beer will create a frothy texture for the margarita. Dip the rim of the margarita glass in lime juice and then salt the rim with margarita salt.

cocktail.name: Cowboy Killer
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila, Bailey's Irish Creme, and butterscotch schnapps into glass add ice and Half-and-Half. Pour into shaker, shake to mix and pour back into glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Lara's Russian Qualude
cocktail.instructions: Combine the three liquors over ice, then top with vodka. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Electric Fuzzy
cocktail.instructions: Combine. Add ice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Blue Heaven
cocktail.instructions: Pour the blue curacao in the glass. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake amaretto, rum, and pineapple juice. Pour it in the glass and stir. Garnish with pineapple slice.

cocktail.name: Squirrel
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Just Peachy
cocktail.instructions: Mix together the Peach schnapps and the Iced Tea and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Dirty Irish Whiskey
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a mixing cup with ice and shake. Pour through a strainer, and drink

cocktail.name: The Red and Black
cocktail.instructions: Layer with grenadine on top.

cocktail.name: Yellow Sock
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Ogre Drink
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingred. in a bleander and blend untill smooth. Pour into a beer mug and enjoy

cocktail.name: Tootsie Roll Float
cocktail.instructions: Pour all over ice, mix and strain off ice..

cocktail.name: Merete
cocktail.instructions: Stir all with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the cherry, and serve.

cocktail.name: Light Green Panties
cocktail.instructions: Shake the vodka, green menthe, and Baileys over ice in a mixing tin. Strain into a sherry glass. Carefully pour a tiny bit of Grenadine down the inside of the glass.

cocktail.name: Seadoo
cocktail.instructions: Add the vodka to a tall glass with lots of ice.Throw in a splash or two of cranberry juice and then fill with the soda.

cocktail.name: Spooky Juice
cocktail.instructions: Stir together with ice.

cocktail.name: Green Meanie
cocktail.instructions: Fill bottom with shot of Pucker and fill with soda.

cocktail.name: Nutz 'n Berries
cocktail.instructions: Mix like most shots: Chill in a mixing tin and strain in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Gumby Dammit
cocktail.instructions: Half-fill a pint beer mug with ice cubes. Add vodka and Midori. Fill with cider. Sip.

cocktail.name: Black Fog
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Chambord in to a mug of Guinness. Swirl slightly to mix.

cocktail.name: Sexoholic
cocktail.instructions: First 5 droplets tabasco sauce in the shot glass. Make sure the inside are covered with sauce. Top it up with drambuie.

cocktail.name: Captain with a Skirt
cocktail.instructions: Mix Captain Morgan and white wine in a glass. Add Coke and ice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

cocktail.name: Scurvy
cocktail.instructions: Pour the banana liqueur into a glass. Add vodka and last the orange juice to taste.

cocktail.name: Fruit Pastille
cocktail.instructions: Place ice cubes into the glass. Pour over measure of Gin, followed by the dry Vermouth. Then fill up to desired level with Orange Juice. Gently pour in dashes of Blue Curacao so that about 2/3rds of the orange goes green. Then pour in the dashes of Grenadine so the bottom of the drink turns red. Serve with straw.

cocktail.name: Circus Peanut Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Mix well in a blender with ice and serve in a highball glass that has been rimmed with jimmies. Garnish with a day-glo orange circus peanut.

cocktail.name: Jagnog
cocktail.instructions: Mix in punchbowl or make individual drinks.

cocktail.name: Nutty Ginger
cocktail.instructions: Put the amaretto and frangelico in the glass. Fill with ginger ale. Add a few ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Caribbean
cocktail.instructions: fill glass with ice add rum and triple sec add juice and stir

cocktail.name: Wadliegh
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients over Ice.

cocktail.name: Tully's Nuts & Berries
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into chiller and pour into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Mocha Martini
cocktail.instructions: mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass

cocktail.name: Whisky Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in cocktail glass with chipped ice.

cocktail.name: Champagne & Mango
cocktail.instructions: Mix Champagne and Mango juice together, add cubed Mango and ice.

cocktail.name: Blonde Moment
cocktail.instructions: Mix over Ice and garnish with a cherry

cocktail.name: Triple Sec Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: First Fill glass 3/4 full with Orange Juice. Next add 1/4 Triple Sec. Finaly add Grenadine and mix thoroughly! Garnish with a slice of Orange.

cocktail.name: Serena
cocktail.instructions: First of all put in the mixing glass absolut vodka then strawberry vodka, dry vermouth, pineapple juice, blue curacao and lemon juice. Now shake with ice and fill up the glass.

cocktail.name: Double Intention
cocktail.instructions: Blend all the ingredients apart from the Grenadine. Pour that on top of the drink when its in the glass.

cocktail.name: Sinlet
cocktail.instructions: Mix the ingredients with a great deal of ice and garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Bee
cocktail.instructions: Add couple of ice cubes to a highball glass. Measure vodka and banana liqueur. Fill with ginger ale, and stirr couple of times. Garnish with a red cherry. Add a straw and serve.

cocktail.name: Fong Juice
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Malibu. Add pineapple juixce. Stir.

cocktail.name: Dreamsicle #3
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps, then orange juice and at last milk. Stir like a mofo until mixed.

cocktail.name: Spice and Ice
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Florida Rum Runner
cocktail.instructions: Mix in blender until ice is crushed into slushy form. Serve while frozen.

cocktail.name: Patel's Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour shots out in glass. Add cranberry, pineapple and lemon juice, and fill the rest of the glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Seizure
cocktail.instructions: Put crushed ice in glass. Pour in ingredients. Mix through a couple times and serve.

cocktail.name: Pink Pillow
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Vodka in first and add Grenadine till it is nice and pink. Then add equal parts of Sour Mix and Ginger Ale until the glass is full.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Comfort
cocktail.instructions: Carefully pour the rum or vodka, then other ingredients. Stir.

cocktail.name: Captains Pie
cocktail.instructions: Pour the ginger ale and the cranapple juice togther and then add the rum.

cocktail.name: Piedra Putamadre
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients

cocktail.name: Watermelon Slice
cocktail.instructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add grenadine, then vodka, rum, gin and triple sec. Fill with half OJ and half cranberry juice. Float with Midori. Drink should be pesented as is but stirred before drinking.

cocktail.name: Three Wise Men (go hunting)
cocktail.instructions: Pour in that order.

cocktail.name: Attitude Adjustment #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredents into a mixing tin with ice, and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: All Jacked up
cocktail.instructions: Chill in a mixing tin and pour.

cocktail.name: Dreamsicle #4
cocktail.instructions: Pour the schnapps into the orange juice and stir.

cocktail.name: Spooge
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing tin, shake like a wild man, and strain into a martini glass.

cocktail.name: Nadal furia
cocktail.instructions: Mix all wiht pasion

cocktail.name: Glow-Worm
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order. Do not mix! Float Blue Curacao on top.

cocktail.name: Blue Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice and serve.

cocktail.name: Chilly Willy
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shaker. Fill with orange and pineapple juice. shake well.

cocktail.name: BMW
cocktail.instructions: Just follow the name... ...BMW

cocktail.name: Springbok
cocktail.instructions: Layer the Amarula gently onto the Creme de menthe and then add a thin layer of cream.

cocktail.name: Pearl Diver #1
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients shake and strain over ice

cocktail.name: EDO Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Blend with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of melon and a green cocktail cherry.

cocktail.name: Born to be Wild
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add the Tequila, Vodka, Pisang Ambon, Sprite and lime. Stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cocktail cerry.

cocktail.name: Elephant Shake
cocktail.instructions: Blend on high until smooth. Pour into a tall glass.

cocktail.name: Caramel Apple
cocktail.instructions: Chill in shaker.

cocktail.name: Russchian Comfort
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in the glass, pour the SoCo in, fill with Schweppes Russchian and add a splash of lime.

cocktail.name: Green Puma
cocktail.instructions: Mix it all together in the glass.

cocktail.name: Cadalac Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Combine first 3 ingredient into a shaker with ice. Shake well. Pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Bocci Ball
cocktail.instructions: Shake amaretto and orange juice first then top with soda.

cocktail.name: Carbomb
cocktail.instructions: Combine the Bailey's and Whiskey in a shot glass. Drop shot glass into beer. Should be finished immediately.

cocktail.name: Rum Coke Float
cocktail.instructions: Place two scoops of rum flavored ice-cream in a hurricane glass, add rum and fill with Coke. Garnish with a cerry and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Ginger Spice
cocktail.instructions: Pour spiced rum over ice in highball glass. Fill with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Bionic Beaver
cocktail.instructions: Put a little crushed ice in the bottom of the pitcher, then the beer, and then the shots. Then top off the pitcher with equal amounts of Orange Juice and 7-Up. Stir.

cocktail.name: Black Cherry
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add ingredients, shake, and serve. Top with a cherry.

cocktail.name: South African Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients on high until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and garnish with chocolate shavings and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Organ Grinder
cocktail.instructions: Blend. Pour over crushed ice. Sprinke coconut shavings on top.

cocktail.name: Tropical Nat
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum and vodka over ice, and add juices one by one, letting the juices swirl together, rather than mix. Garnish with a slice of lime, orange, or pineapple.

cocktail.name: The Nick
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a shaker and shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Inverted Pyramid Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled Martini glass and garnish with a orange twist.

cocktail.name: Pink Clyt
cocktail.instructions: Shake drink in a regular shaker. Garnish with a cherry. The drink should have that soft glowing quality characteristic of the triple sec.

cocktail.name: Simon Sez Seazar
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve in a hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a celery stalk.

cocktail.name: Sucker punch
cocktail.instructions: Put crushed ice in glass about a quarter of the way up. Pour in vodka, peach schnapps and the three juices (apple, orange, and cranberry.) Stir through a couple of times.

cocktail.name: Pink Fix
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker 1/2 full of ice. Shake vigorously. Pour into lowball glass. Garnish to taste.

cocktail.name: Sharpshooter #1
cocktail.instructions: Pour and stir.

cocktail.name: Dan's Dewberry Martini
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker cup. Add ice last. Stir ingredients (do not shake unless asked to). Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Butter Cream
cocktail.instructions: Mix butterscotch shnapps with Bailey's irish cream then pour milk over the mixture. Add crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Red Rasputin
cocktail.instructions: Stir, add ice, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Apple Jack
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass. Serve on the rocks in cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Brain Destroyer
cocktail.instructions: Add the Bailey's, Kahlua, and Amaretto together in the shot glass. Then add a dash of Bacardi 151.

cocktail.name: Black Bitch
cocktail.instructions: Layer Bailey's irish cream over black sambuca. Top with bacardi 151 rum.

cocktail.name: Monte-Sano
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients together and stir in sugar, pour over ice. Drink up.

cocktail.name: Nutty Banana
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain over ice.

cocktail.name: Flaming Jesus
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka, lime juice, and grenadine into shot glass. Then layer 151 on top from the back of a spoon. Light the 151 and shoot it while lit if you dare. If you are worried about shooting a lit drink, just blow out the flame and then shoot the drink.

cocktail.name: G Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Chill both ingredients by placing the bottles in the freezer for at least 1 hour. You should also chill the shot glasses you will be using the same way. Pour both ingredients into a chilled shot glass and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Riedinger
cocktail.instructions: Mix rum, Midori, and lime juice in highball glass with crushed ice. Fill glass to top with cola. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Nudge
cocktail.instructions: Put alcohol in mug first, fill with coffee. This allows sufficient mixing of ingredients.

cocktail.name: Voodoo
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: The Jolly Rancher
cocktail.instructions: shake and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Roll Me Over
cocktail.instructions: Add the ingredients to a glass with ice in the order they are listed.

cocktail.name: Kavorkien
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain. Can be served over ice or up.

cocktail.name: The MacAttack
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker with ice, add all ingredients. Shake so that all parts mix together. Serve on ice.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Raspberry Brownie
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour in the liqueurs and then top with cream. Garnish with chocolate shavings on the top.

cocktail.name: End of the Road
cocktail.instructions: Put all the ingridiants in the shaker (except the nuts), add ice, and shake well. Pour in the glass, and add the nuts on-top.

cocktail.name: Baseball Pleasure
cocktail.instructions: Begin by making a standard Screwdriver (OJ and Vodka) and then add the Whiskey and the Amaretto. Mix and serve.

cocktail.name: Zhivago's Revenge
cocktail.instructions: Add in this order: Cinnamon Schnapps, Absolut Pepper, Tabasco

cocktail.name: Turlock Bulldog
cocktail.instructions: Mix Kahlua and Bailey's in glass. Fill with rootbeer.

cocktail.name: YIP!
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with Tequila, then club soda, then squeze a slice of lemon, toss in and add one ice cube, stir, drink, enjoy.

cocktail.name: Bloody Brit
cocktail.instructions: Pour together in an old-fashioned glass. Stir as required.

cocktail.name: Hudson
cocktail.instructions: Pour together and stir as required.

cocktail.name: Red Rock
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and schnapps in the bottom of a glass. Add ice and Dr. Pepper.

cocktail.name: Lassi - Sweet #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix them all together in a blender. The measurements are not precise because you oughtta just throw everything in to taste. This is mainly here to help out those, like myself, who tried making the Sweet Lassi with the other Sweet Lassi recipe, and found out that it was pretty bad - watery, not sweet, et cetera. Ice is the key.

cocktail.name: Tachyon
cocktail.instructions: Stir over ice. Either strain in a cocktail glass or on the rocks in a highball glass. Serve with curl of lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Tennessee Tea
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients and poor over ice in a mason jar

cocktail.name: USD Sunset
cocktail.instructions: This drink can be made with ice, but it looks a lot better without it. I recommend just using chilled soda. Add rum first, then soda, then a few dashes of grenadine. Don't stir.

cocktail.name: Lunch Box #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix the beer and OJ in a mug, drop the shot of Amaretto in, and down it.

cocktail.name: Mocha Maria
cocktail.instructions: Half fill a shaker with ice. Add ingredients, shake, and pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Shiny Nail
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice. Pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Capital Punishment
cocktail.instructions: Pour. Shoot.

cocktail.name: Sazerac #2
cocktail.instructions: In a spare glass, mix the bourbon, the sugar syrup, and the two kinds of bitters. Make a twist of lemon peel by peeling it from a lemon with a sharp vegetable peeler. Rub firmly around the rim of a well-iced Old Fashioned glass. Put the Pernod in the glass and swirl it around to coat the bottom. Add the contents of the other glass along with one ice cube. Serve.

cocktail.name: Fubar Kool-Aid
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shaker over cracked ice, pour into highball glass with ice and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Peaches and Cream
cocktail.instructions: Pour Kahlua and peach schnapps, fill rest with milk. Shake.

cocktail.name: Atheist's Best
cocktail.instructions: Take two glasses. Fill one with champagne and mix the other glass with the specified amounts of the other ingredients. Mix the contents of both glasses. You end up with two glasses of the drink

cocktail.name: Rummple
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, including ice, and pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Cindy's Cycle
cocktail.instructions: Mix Tequila, Melon Liqueur, Sweet and Sour, and Grenadine. Blend with Ice. Serve in glass.

cocktail.name: Soapy Tits
cocktail.instructions: Pour Goldshlager, Rumple Minze and Aftershock into mug. Fill with sprite.

cocktail.name: Duck Fuck
cocktail.instructions: Find a large shot glass (1 1/2 - 2 oz. is appropriate). Fill 80% of the way with Tanqueray gin. Fill another 15% with Stoli or Absolut vodka. Fill to the rim with cheap "Ice" beer (best results with Busch Ice).

cocktail.name: Green Whale
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well.

cocktail.name: Skid Marks
cocktail.instructions: Add Chocolate syrup at bottom of shot glass Add Kahlua and stir with a small spoon Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Is That a Banana in Your Pocket
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins glass with ice. Mix ingredients and top off glass with 7-up. Stir and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Limelon
cocktail.instructions: Mix all liquids then fill with ice. Finally cap with powdered sugar.

cocktail.name: I Love Rosa
cocktail.instructions: Put into glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Hologram
cocktail.instructions: place ingredients into shaker with ice. shake and strain into shot glass

cocktail.name: Atlas
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shaker with ice. Strain and serve!

cocktail.name: Watermelon Shooter #5
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in any order into a sifting glass filled with ice. Shake for 5 seconds and pour the chilled contents into your cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Thunder Quake
cocktail.instructions: Swill the Congac around the glass then add the cider and float the brandy over the top.

cocktail.name: 351 Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour Gordon's Gin and Kronenbourg beer (it MUST be Kronenbourg) into a coffee cup or a glass. Add Coca-Cola until it acquires the right taste.

cocktail.name: Malibu Screw
cocktail.instructions: Add chilled orange juice to the vodka and Malibu. Ice is optional.

cocktail.name: Thorazine
cocktail.instructions: Add all three ingredients in order to a shot glass. Best served with top layer on fire. (For effect only)

cocktail.name: Sex in the Shower
cocktail.instructions: Shake and Strain into Champagne Flute.

cocktail.name: Limon Delight
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add one shot Bacardi Limon, fill with Sunny Delight or orange juice

cocktail.name: T2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Jack-Hammer II
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass and slam it.

cocktail.name: Hop, Skip, and Go Naked #2
cocktail.instructions: First dump in bag of ice. Next add the cans of limeade and lemonade. Now add 2 liter bottle of sprite. Next add 1/2 gallon of vodka. Then add 20-24 cans of beer.

cocktail.name: Sex in the Red Zone
cocktail.instructions: Put vodka and sloe gin into glass. Add lemonade.

cocktail.name: Kelly's Buttery Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Mix the three together in a big glass and pour into shot glasses. Top each shot off with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Golden Comfort
cocktail.instructions: Mix, then pour into shot glass

cocktail.name: Pink Heart
cocktail.instructions: In rocks glass filled with ice, add 1/2 shot of Chambord and 1/2 shot of Creme De Cacao. Fill with cream or milk.

cocktail.name: Romulan Ale #2
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to mug, Zima last. Pour once hard into shaker, gently back into mug. Use more tabasco if less sweetness is desired.

cocktail.name: Dreaming in Antalya
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a mixing glass with ice cubes and pour into chilled cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Minttini
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with cubed ice, then pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

cocktail.name: Retribution
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Swimming Pool
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients with some ice in a shaker. Strain into a glass over some ice.

cocktail.name: Peppermint Crisp
cocktail.instructions: Blend the creme de menthe and the kahlua together, then top up the rest of the glass with ice cold milk. Also nice with ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Spicy Buttery Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Mix Hot Damn and Butterscotch Schnapps in shot glass first, then carefully add the irish cream without mixing.

cocktail.name: Zimaretto
cocktail.instructions: Pour about 2 ounces of Amaretto into a 16 oz. glass and fill with Zima.

cocktail.name: April Rain
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka, Vermouth and lime cordial into shaker over ice. Shake with care not to bruise. Strain into chilled cocktail (martini) glass. Garnish with lime peel (zest).

cocktail.name: Mojo
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in large container. Keep stirred.

cocktail.name: Valentine
cocktail.instructions: Shake banana liqueur, vodka, and cranberry juice with ice and strain into a red wine glass.

cocktail.name: Royal Caribbean Fuck
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in shaker over ice. shake well and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Attitude
cocktail.instructions: Stir. Garnish with a lemon & lime slice.

cocktail.name: Glaciermeister
cocktail.instructions: Mix in blender by adding the ice cream first, followed by the milk, then the Jgermeister. Blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Kahlua and Iced Cream
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a blender by adding the ice cream first, followed by the milk, then add the Kahlua. Blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Hennyville Slugger
cocktail.instructions: Fill hiball glass with 5-7 ounces of cognac. Next, fill remainder of glass with lemon-lime soda. Finally, squeeze 1/2 of medium size lemon and garnish with 1/4 inch lemon wedges.

cocktail.name: Affirmative Action
cocktail.instructions: fill glass about 1/4 with chilled orange juice. add vodka at a 2:1 ratio with cognac and add to highball glass with orange juice. optional squeeze of lemon.

cocktail.name: Ironlung
cocktail.instructions: Pour a 1oz. shot of Yukon Jack. Top with a small float of Bacardi 151 rum. Add a small topping of whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Summer Martini
cocktail.instructions: Make sure all ingredients are cold! Serve shaken, straight up with a twist.

cocktail.name: Red Lobster
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain.

cocktail.name: Burning Sun
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in highball glass, stir. Garnish with a fresh strawberry

cocktail.name: Malibu Mocha Milkshake
cocktail.instructions: Mix Malibu Rum, sugar, and enough milk to fill glass to 3/4 full. Whip or use blender. Add Cream de cacao and stir, add 3 or 4 ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Dead Hitler
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shot glass equally in parts with Rumple Minze, Jgermeister, and Goldschlager.

cocktail.name: Sweaty Goat's Ass
cocktail.instructions: Pour in tequila first and top off with milk or cream. Then, add 6 drops tabasco.

cocktail.name: Sky Blue Fallout
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients except 7-Up in a mixing glass. Pour into a hurricane glass and add the 7-Up. Stir lightly with a straw and serve.

cocktail.name: Green Hell #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker. Fill with ice and add orange juice. Pour into hurricane glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Carmel Candy Apple
cocktail.instructions: All ingrediants should be freezer cold. Pour equal parts of the schnapps and stir in the triple sec.

cocktail.name: Southern Bubbles
cocktail.instructions: No mixing required.

cocktail.name: Good 'n Plenty
cocktail.instructions: Cocktail can be served on the rocks or blended until smooth.

cocktail.name: American Dream
cocktail.instructions: Chill with ice. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Cognac Flip
cocktail.instructions: Shake well all ingredients in a shaker. Strain into cocktail glass and grate some nutmeg on top.

cocktail.name: Block and Fall
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Woot's Butter Cream Shot
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with cream and pour the schnapps on top.

cocktail.name: Greek Tycoon
cocktail.instructions: First add the Tanqueray "Malacca" Gin, then the Metaxa Brandy to finish. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Pajama Jackhammer
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and serve with shaved ice.

cocktail.name: Cry Baby Blues
cocktail.instructions: Serve with Shaved Ice.

cocktail.name: Traffic Light
cocktail.instructions: Layer Grenadine, Galliano, and Midori.

cocktail.name: Quick Fuck
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass, Baileys first and Midori last.

cocktail.name: Malibu Dew
cocktail.instructions: Mix slightly and serve.

cocktail.name: VooDoo Tea
cocktail.instructions: Stir until it turns black or dark and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Robicheaux
cocktail.instructions: Fill tall glass with crushed ice. Add bourbon, Rose's lime juice, and cherry juice. Fill with cola. Stir gently and garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Kentucky Mule
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add bourbon, fill with ginger beer and a splash of lime juice. Stir and drink!

cocktail.name: Red Frog
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into glass with light ice, can also be served as a shooter

cocktail.name: Sexual Trance
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice and strain over ice cherry garnish

cocktail.name: Spiced Cherry
cocktail.instructions: Put the Spiced Rum in the glass. Fill with cherry coke. Stir.

cocktail.name: Spiced Cherry Jello
cocktail.instructions: Boil one cup water. Add the package of cherry jello. Stir for 2 minutes. Then pour in the cup of spiced rum. Stir until mixed. Pour into a pan and refrigerate.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Punch
cocktail.instructions: Pour pink grapefruit juice and ginger ale into punch bowl. Pour raspberry juice or 12 oz frozen raspberries into punch bowl (if using frozen raspberries, be sure to stir to un-thaw after adding to punch bowl). Add sherbet into punch and stir until majority of it is melted.

cocktail.name: Cocoboodo
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice chips.

cocktail.name: Crystal Virgin
cocktail.instructions: Chill with ice & strain into shot glasses. Add Cranberry Juice to taste. Tastes just like fruit punch.

cocktail.name: Baked Apple
cocktail.instructions: Pour the liqueur into the glass first, then add the Cider. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Green Apple Cider
cocktail.instructions: Add the Cider to the liqueur. Serve Cold

cocktail.name: Black Bird Cider
cocktail.instructions: Add the Cider to the liqueur. Serve Cold

cocktail.name: The Bionic Drink
cocktail.instructions: First pour the Vodka then fill up with the Grapefruit soda or juice. Then add the lemon juice.

cocktail.name: Martian Martini
cocktail.instructions: Combine Gin and Midori in Shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a martini glass. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Tainted Heart
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glasses half full with Aftershock. Tip glass to the side and slowly pour chocolate liqueur down the side. This is a layered shot.

cocktail.name: Poison Ivy
cocktail.instructions: Pour chilled ingredients into a shot glass. Can be made layered or mixed. If layered pour the Aftershock in first, then slowly layer the Kahlua on top.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Paradise
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice. Shake and serve.

cocktail.name: '57 Chevy
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Fat Cat
cocktail.instructions: Fill mixing cup 1/4 full of ice. Add all three ingredents. Shake and strain into a shot glass. It can also be served on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Pimp & Hoe
cocktail.instructions: Pour the liquor first, then the OJ and then the lemon juice. Stir the drink a little bit and then drink.

cocktail.name: Orange Demon
cocktail.instructions: Pour the OJ first, then mix in the Everclear and the Cointreau.

cocktail.name: Mudslide #5
cocktail.instructions: Combine over Ice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Frooty Biznitch
cocktail.instructions: Mix in all ingredients in a shaker, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

cocktail.name: Cooter Cork
cocktail.instructions: Layer ingredients in a tall shot glass: Grenadine, Chambord, Aftershock and Absolut Kurant. Drink should have varying layers of red.

cocktail.name: Tini Rita
cocktail.instructions: Chill martini glass with ice and water. Fill cocktail shaker with ice, vodka, Cointreau, Grand Marnier, lime juice, and sour mix. Shake vigorously until shaker is frosty. Empty martini glass and rim with salt and sugar mix. Pour contents into glass and garnish with lime wedge. Serve.

cocktail.name: Boardwalk Breeze
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain ingredients into a Hurricane or large glass.

cocktail.name: Belinda's Fuzzy Melon
cocktail.instructions: Shake and Strain into Highball Glass

cocktail.name: Elmo
cocktail.instructions: Shake and Strain or Roll. No Garnish.

cocktail.name: Peach Tequila
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into collins glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir and drop lime slice into drink.

cocktail.name: Cowboy's Comet
cocktail.instructions: Pour rye whiskey over ice, then add cola, southern comfort, and lime.

cocktail.name: Smoothe Operator
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients, except 7-Up, in blender. Divide into 2 jars. Top with 7-Up, stir well.

cocktail.name: Loch Ness Monster
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order shown, Midori, Bailey's, Jager.

cocktail.name: Pink Lemonade #2
cocktail.instructions: Add ice, vodka, sour mix, cranberry and lime juice. Shake and serve with a garnish of lemon

cocktail.name: Fruitloops
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry

cocktail.name: Red Death
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients, Stir and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: D.R.F.O.
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with ice. Stir, and strain into an chilled old-fasioned glass over ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Emerald Martini
cocktail.instructions: Stir with cracked ice in a shaker and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon zest over the drink and float the zest on top.

cocktail.name: Emerald Vodka Martini
cocktail.instructions: Stir with cracked ice in a shaker and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon zest over the drink and float the zest on top.

cocktail.name: Mango Bellini
cocktail.instructions: Fill champagne flute one-third full with mango juice. Top with champagne. Stir gently and garnish with a slice of mango.

cocktail.name: Cerebral Hemorage
cocktail.instructions: Put the Strawberry Schnapps into a double shot or other small glass (this can all be performed in a single glass), then add the Bailey's. It will lump together (Bailey's, that is) to look like a brain in a red fluid (SS). Finally, add Grenadine until it "oozes" from the brain, and you're set.

cocktail.name: Brown Eye Opener
cocktail.instructions: Mix all five together then chill.

cocktail.name: Split Beaver
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large glass with lots of ice and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Super Bloody Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the Everclear. Add the Sunny D and then the tropical fruit schnapps. Best if served chilled.

cocktail.name: Splender Blenders
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients in blender, blend till slushy, add sugar to taste.

cocktail.name: Stinger #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice, strain, serve in cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Hairy Happy Trail
cocktail.instructions: Mix with whatever is available

cocktail.name: Sexual Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Shake well and serve on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Thanksgiving Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins glass one-half full of ice, add ingredients and stir. Garnish with a lime wedge, if desired.

cocktail.name: Fire Ant Torture
cocktail.instructions: Pour all the contents into a shot glass at once.

cocktail.name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm On The Beach
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all liquers and speed shake. Top with club soda.

cocktail.name: Livingston
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients over ice and stir, add an optional lime.

cocktail.name: Black Death
cocktail.instructions: In a layering glass, layer the ingredients in the following order: Kahlua, Romana Sambvca, Bailey's, and half and half.

cocktail.name: McTavish
cocktail.instructions: Serve in a shot glass or on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Scorpion's Tail
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice, shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Jager Tonic
cocktail.instructions: Add Jgermeister to a highball glass whith three ice cubes. Fill with tonic Water and garnish whith orange slice.

cocktail.name: Southern Bell
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice and pour in Southern Comfort. fill with Abita root beer.

cocktail.name: Cherry Blossom
cocktail.instructions: Garnish with a cherry on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Southern Bondage
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into mixing/cheater tin over ice, shake and pour.

cocktail.name: Low Lattitude Lust
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing tin, combine the vodka, Southern Comfort, and Pineapple juice. then add cherry juice from your jar of marachino cherries. Shake well and pour over crushed or cubed ice.

ingredient.name: Cherry juice or 1 tblsp of Grenadine

cocktail.name: Hot Shot #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and peppermint schnapps and add a dash of Tobasco.

cocktail.name: Backfire
cocktail.instructions: Layer the Kalua on the bottom, then the Baileys, then the Vodka.

cocktail.name: Special Tequini
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker, combine tequila and Cointreau with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

cocktail.name: Wooholly Fuck
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in a glass, add the rest in order. Drink through a straw.

cocktail.name: Tsunami #1
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add Capt. Morgan and malibu. Fill with the pineapple juice. Float 1/2 oz of grenadine and then add 1/2 oz of a dark rum (meyers) for color. Found this to a very popular drink at my bar.

cocktail.name: Ice Cream Genius
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients together in a blender

cocktail.name: Green Scorpion
cocktail.instructions: Mix Jack Daniels, vodka, blue curacao and ice cubes in cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into glass and top up to desired level with 7-up.

cocktail.name: Frozen Bird
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Norwegian Iceberg
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Put in shots of Vodka, Sprite, and finally (blue) Maui to make it the color of an Iceberg. Make sure all the ingredients are icy cold.

cocktail.name: Joyful Bull
cocktail.instructions: Fill mug 2/3 full with coffee. Add Tequila, Kahlue and Tia Maria. Stir. You may stir in Half 'n Half instead of topping with whipped cream. Garnish with cherry or mint.

cocktail.name: Pentecostal
cocktail.instructions: Add Bourbon, Vodka, then 7-Up in Wiskey Sour glass and stir.

cocktail.name: Tangaz
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka with Alize and Tang. Stir then serve with shaved ice.

cocktail.name: Inverted Traffic Light
cocktail.instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice. Pour in the 1oz. of Peach Schnapps, then add orange juice 3/4 to the top and shake. Slowly add the 1/2oz. of Grenadine (watch it sink to the bottom of the glass). In a mixer, mix the 1/2oz. of Blue Curacao with the 1/2oz. of Vodka then, slowly strain into the cocktail glass (filled with oj and Grenadine). Voila! Your inverted Traffic Light. Note: The drink is consumed in layers and therefore, not stirred.

cocktail.name: Jen's Creamy Sighs
cocktail.instructions: In Irish Coffee mug, combine Amaretto and Bailey's. Fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream. Float Grand Marnier over whipped cream. After Serving, consumer may stir for a full flavor combination.

cocktail.name: Ultimate Blue Frozen Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredient into a blender, over the ice, in order listed. Blend on "high" for a few seconds until drink has a consistancy a bit icier than a slurpee. Take lime wedge and run it over the edges of the margarita glass, then, upturned, place the wetted rims into course salt. Pour the now ready margarita into the now salted glasses and serve.

cocktail.name: Turkey Trot
cocktail.instructions: Mix with a stirrer in a pitcher then pour over ice into glasses. A Thanksgiving tradition for the truly disfunctional family!

cocktail.name: Rumple Shock
cocktail.instructions: First add the Aftershock then poor the Rumple Minze ontop and let the good times roll.

cocktail.name: Electric Storm
cocktail.instructions: Combine all 4 ingredients into a shot glass and slam it.

cocktail.name: Horny Bull #3
cocktail.instructions: Just pour into shot glass,or test tube and down it!

cocktail.name: Shark Attack Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a large container like a Coleman cooler.

cocktail.name: Poison
cocktail.instructions: mix the Vodka and the Parfait d'Amour in the glass and fill of with Bitter Lemon

cocktail.name: Irish Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Irish Mist into shot glass. Add a splash of Creme de Menthe (green).

cocktail.name: Scooley Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Triple Sec and Peachtree into glass. Add Sour mix and Sprite. Stir gently and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Ultimate June Bug
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Cow
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Cucacaracha
cocktail.instructions: Using a jigger glass (3oz shot glass) mix 1/3 of each part then top with club soda. Cover and shake lightly.

cocktail.name: The Real June Bug
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Fresca over the SoCo.

cocktail.name: Acapulco Zombie
cocktail.instructions: Pour the alcohol in first, then finish off the glass with the two juices. Also, remember, just a little Creme de Menthe, not too much!

cocktail.name: Nasty Bitch
cocktail.instructions: Chill the tequila and the Cointreau and serve in a shot glass straight up.

cocktail.name: Los Cabos Clout
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in a bender and blend for 10 seconds.Pour into glass.Do not strain!

cocktail.name: Aqualung
cocktail.instructions: Brew espresso, mix in shots of kaluha and syrup

cocktail.name: Storm Trooper
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingrediants together.

cocktail.name: The Chocolate Martini
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into chilled martini glass.

cocktail.name: Stoner On Acid
cocktail.instructions: Shake Malibu Rum and Aliz on ice. Strain into glass. Stir in Jgermeister.

cocktail.name: Original Terminator
cocktail.instructions: Spin shot glass in some ice to cool for a few seconds. Half-fill glass with Rumple Minze first, then top off with black sambuca.

cocktail.name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass starting with Tequila, followed by J.D., then by Southern. Top with drops of Tabasco, and shoot.

cocktail.name: Feel This
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Next add Absolut, Sloe gin, Pineapple juice, Southern Comfort, and last Midori. Last add pineapple and cherry garnish.

cocktail.name: Beam Scream
cocktail.instructions: Mix shots in 3-4oz glass, stir, then drain it.

cocktail.name: Magnum
cocktail.instructions: Add all of the ingredients in a blender, add ice and blend.

cocktail.name: Tequila Bom-Bom
cocktail.instructions: Place a coaster on top, pound on table twice, guzzle it!

cocktail.name: Italian Stallion
cocktail.instructions: Place the ingredients in the order mentioned in the receipe, in a 2oz. shot glass and just shoot it!

cocktail.name: Bolduc On The Beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix in glass. Serve on the rocks (optional).

cocktail.name: Purple Peril
cocktail.instructions: Build into a tall ice filled glass, vodka, Pernod, dash of blackcurrant cordial, top up with lemonade

cocktail.name: Almond Joy #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill mixing glass with ice, add Malibu, amaretto, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

cocktail.name: Rusty Mist
cocktail.instructions: Place ice cubes in glass, pour in about one ounce of Drambuie and one ounce of Irish Mist.

cocktail.name: Vermont Maple Blaster
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add vodka and add Vermont maple syrup.

cocktail.name: Sonoma
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Neon-Geek
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three ingredients in a mixing glass, along with 1 cup crushed ice. Strain into margirita glass and serve immediately!

cocktail.name: K.G.B. #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient in shot glass floating each time. Make sure Galliano is on top.

cocktail.name: After Dark
cocktail.instructions: Layer, in order.

cocktail.name: 8th Birthday
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into a martini glass.

cocktail.name: American Flag
cocktail.instructions: When properly prepared this shot will look red, white and blue. First poor in 1/3 grenadine. Then the White Cream de cacao should be poured in over a bar spoon. Finally the Blue curacao can be poured in the same way.

cocktail.name: Passion Beach
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingridients with ice, strain into ice filled highball glass, add some nice fresh fruit on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Mafia's Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Amaretto, Southern Comfort, and Sour Mix into glass. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Oil Spill
cocktail.instructions: Layer Jgermeister on top of the Goldschlager.

cocktail.name: Nitro
cocktail.instructions: Mix all 3 ingredients in a shot glass. (no order)

cocktail.name: French Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, chill and strain in a Martini glass or cocktail class. You may also add sugar to the rim if you like.

cocktail.name: Cuban Crime of Passion (CCP)
cocktail.instructions: Pour all the ingredients into a mixer glass, shake violently, and then pour the mixture into a 12 oz. glass with ice.

ingredient.name: Coconut rum (Coco Ribe or Parrot Bay)

cocktail.name: Fruit Loop #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: South Padre Island
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order listed above. Allow Cranberry to float. Do not stir this drink. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Sweet Italian Bastard
cocktail.instructions: Simply mix all the ingredients together in a cocktail mixer full of ice cubes. Shake well, strain and serve. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Small Sand
cocktail.instructions: Mix the 4 first ingredients with ice. Fill with lemonade. Garnish with carambole and strawberry on the edge of glass.

cocktail.name: Lime Lizard
