cocktail.instructions: Pour in Vodka first, then mix in the rest. Count to three and drink!

cocktail.name: Pepe's Flame of Love Martini
cocktail.instructions: As explained from the great bartender Pepe Ruiz of Beverly Hills Chasen's Restauraunt: "You swirl a few drops of La Ina Sherry in a chilled stem glass and pour it out. Than squeeze a strip of Orange peel into the glass and flambe' it with a with match. Throw away the peel. Now fill the glass with Ice to chill again, then throw that out. Add vodka, than flambe' another orange peel around the rim. Now throw out the second burnt peel. Then just stir it gently. And drink, drink."

cocktail.name: Sweaty Belly
cocktail.instructions: This is a "built" drink, meaning it gets made directly into the glass, no mixing glass or shaker is needed. Put the cubes in first, then the amaretto, then half fill with OJ and half fill with Cran. juice.

cocktail.name: Butt Fucks
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake for approximately 1 minute, till really cold. Pour into shot glasses. Makes approximately 16 shots.

cocktail.name: Cookie Dough
cocktail.instructions: Layer Amaretto above Bailey's Irish Cream, then add various pinches of Cinnamon. Serve once cinnamon clumps begin to settle into the liquor.

cocktail.name: Whitney
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients chilled for better flavor. Avoid ice cubes to prevent watered down taste. Mix rum first (must be a white rum), add a dark type of wine (blush or red is fine), and finally a touch of lemon juice. Get ready to have fun!

cocktail.name: Kermit
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and shake. Top up with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Mother Moo
cocktail.instructions: Put a couple of ice cubes in the glass ad the Licor 43 and fill up with milk. If you don't have Licor 43 use a vanilla liqueur with a splash of orange. Since this drink separates itself you need to add a stiring pin so the guest can have something to mix the drink with.

cocktail.name: Midori Sour #2
cocktail.instructions: In a Highball glass, add Midori, fill to 3/4 with sweet and sour, finish by filling to brim with Sprite. Stir.

cocktail.name: Maryville Sweet
cocktail.instructions: pour soouthern comfort and lime juice over ice, stir, enjoy

cocktail.name: Caribbean Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Mix the melon and malibu together. Slowly pour the cranberry juice on top untill it fills half the remaining space. The orange juice is then floated on top.

cocktail.name: Sweet Burning Eruption
cocktail.instructions: Pour half shot of Triple Sec into shot glass. Add half shot of butterscotch schnapps. Float irish cream gently on top until you have a thin layer. Drip grenadine onto irish cream layer to produce "eruption" effect.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Sunrise Crush
cocktail.instructions: Blend orange juice, amaretto, grenadine and ice cubes in blender until smooth. Pour into glass and add lemon juice.

cocktail.name: Rebel Russian
cocktail.instructions: Mix all 3 well and serve over ice cubes- enjoy!

cocktail.name: Carnegie Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Everything goes in a blender. Mix in tomato juice, orange juice, and strawberries together. Add vodka and tequila.

cocktail.name: Nitro Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice, combine vodka, whiskey, and juices. The amount of orange and cranberry juice should be about equal. Strain into a collins glass nearly filled with ice. Add a dash of grenadine.

cocktail.name: Scarlett O'Hara
cocktail.instructions: Combine all three ingredients in a glass with ice. Stir and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Greven
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, passoa and orange juice over ice in the glass. Add the blue curacao and the lime. Do not stir.

cocktail.name: Tropical Orgasm #2
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients. Shake and pour into glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Purple VW
cocktail.instructions: Fill two thirds of a shot glass with Blue Curacao, fill with Grenadine and stir rapidly

cocktail.name: The Rollercoaster
cocktail.instructions: Pour into glass with ice and shake vigourously.

cocktail.name: Irish Gold
cocktail.instructions: Mix half an ounce of Goldshlager with half an ounce of Bailey's Irish Cream in a regular shot glass and stir.

cocktail.name: Russian Bloody Mary
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka into glass, the carefully add the tomato juice so that it falls to the bottom of the glass. Last, add a couple of drops of tabasco sauce.

cocktail.name: Pio's Beating Stick
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients in order, JD first, then pineapple juice, and finally the orange juice. Don't sip, shoot the whole shot at once.

cocktail.name: The Jaw
cocktail.instructions: Mix them all together.

cocktail.name: Shazam Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Shake to chill. Strain out ice and pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Monyca
cocktail.instructions: Just stir it a little!

cocktail.name: Banana Tropical
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in a blender and blend for 3 minutes. If the mix isn't liquid enough (depends on the banana), add another shot of pineapple juice. Decorate with a piece of the banana and a piece of a pineapple.

cocktail.name: Green Cow #2
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Kahlua Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Mix all of the ingredients well.

cocktail.name: Lolita
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and add one or two ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Safari Juice
cocktail.instructions: Add Cointreau and Midori Melon Liqueur to stirring glass and top up with orange juice. Stir threee or four times rapidly and pour drink into cocktail glass. Add grenadine one drop at a time and garnish with tropical fruits.

cocktail.name: Peach Passion
cocktail.instructions: Fill mixer/glass half full of ice. Pour liquor in next (highest proof first). Pour pink lemonade in next. Stir and pour into highball glass.

cocktail.name: Tsunami #2
cocktail.instructions: Place kiwi slice in the bottom of the glass. Add alcohols. Fill with Mountain Dew

cocktail.name: Crooked Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Fill beer mug with ice. Add all ingredients and stir.

cocktail.name: Almost Heaven
cocktail.instructions: Build in a collins glass over ice.

cocktail.name: Irish Lady
cocktail.instructions: Pour a near full glass of champagne, add Midori and orange juice.

cocktail.name: Purple Problem Solver
cocktail.instructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add vodka, rum, midori, curacao, schnapps, and sweet and sour. Fill with pineapple juice and add grenadine to turn it purple.

cocktail.name: Fruit of the Loom
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Windy Beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Makes 2 servings.

cocktail.name: Bourbon Slush
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients a day ahead and place in freezer. When ready to serve, take out of freezer and put desired amount in blender for a second or put in a bowl and mix till it is semi-liquified. Serve in old fashioned glasses.

cocktail.name: Siberian Slider
cocktail.instructions: mix equal parts into a tumber filled with cracked ice. Stir liberally and sip slowly.

cocktail.name: Baby Doll
cocktail.instructions: Stir liquors and juice over ice gently. Sugar rim of chilled cocktail glass and strain.

cocktail.name: 44D
cocktail.instructions: Pour each into shot glass and top with Grenadine.

cocktail.name: Cement Kicker
cocktail.instructions: Fill one shot glass with Bailey's. Fill second shot glass with Lime and 151. To Drink: Pour Bailey's into mouth, do not swallow. Pour Lime and 151 into mouth. Shake head back and fourth, the shot will turn solid.

cocktail.name: Windjammer
cocktail.instructions: Stir first three ingredients together and pour over ice. Top with a marischino cherry.

cocktail.name: Limelight
cocktail.instructions: Stir well with ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Fruit Sensation
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice add all the ingredients- mix well add straw and garnish if required.

cocktail.name: Dong
cocktail.instructions: Chill and strain together into shot glass

cocktail.name: Quikster's Delight
cocktail.instructions: Start off by totally filling hurricane glass with ice. Next pour rum. Fill glass with equally parts orange juice and pineapple juice. Top with grenadine.

cocktail.name: Red nail
cocktail.instructions: Mix the vodka and the Campari in a cocktailglass. Put in 4 ordinary icecubes. Let the drink "rest" seven minutes before served.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Melonberry
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice

cocktail.name: Leah's Last Hope #2
cocktail.instructions: Add Ice, Mix, and Enjoy.

cocktail.name: The Miki
cocktail.instructions: Put the ice on the glass first and then pour the Campari. The grapefruit juice is next. The soda is the last ingredient to add. Stir only once.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Zima
cocktail.instructions: Pour Zima in any glass in which it fits, add strawberry syrup and stir.

cocktail.name: Kahlodster
cocktail.instructions: Pour each shot in cup filled with ice. Shake three times and serve.

cocktail.name: Liquid Sword
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquors in tall glass with ice, fill with Orange Juice

cocktail.name: Shamrock #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Bogomip
cocktail.instructions: Pour sake and coconut milk into the glass. Fill with pink lemonade. Fill the glass with ice first if desired.

cocktail.name: Lani
cocktail.instructions: Pour Passoa and grapefruit juice into a glass over ice cubes and fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Stockholm "75"
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the vodka, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a cocktail glass. Top with Champagne and garnish with an organce twist.

cocktail.name: Orange Flamingo
cocktail.instructions: First fill glass 4/5 of the way up with orange soda. Then add your grenadine. Finally add the whipped cream to the top.

cocktail.name: The Naked Lady
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: The Irresistible Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Combine the ingredients in a small pitcher and add 1 tsp of juice from your jar of maraschino cherries. Pour over crushed ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry or slice of orange.

cocktail.name: P.S.U. Victory Dance
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in blender. Fill beer mug with cracked ice and pour contents of blender into mug. For a Frozen Victory Dance, just add cracked ice to blender when mixing until drink appears to be slushey. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Irishman
cocktail.instructions: Pour Raspberry first, Butterscotch next and Irish cream last. Need not be layered but pour in order given. Top 'O the Mornin' to you!

cocktail.name: Tequila Gimlet
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Franziska
cocktail.instructions: Heat and stir until the honey is dissolved.

cocktail.name: Cranberry Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients into blender with ice. Blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Electric Banana
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredigents in glass then shake vigourisly

cocktail.name: Slime
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: The Swamp Water
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice, shake and strain!

cocktail.name: Watermelon Shot
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain and pour into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Frenchie
cocktail.instructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail or rocks glass and stir.

cocktail.name: Mexican Rose
cocktail.instructions: Shake & strain into glass or blend.

cocktail.name: Belgian Brownie
cocktail.instructions: Pour the gin, cognac and chocolate liqueur over the ice cubes. Fill with heavy cream. Stir gently.

cocktail.name: Mint Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Mix in shot glass

cocktail.name: Grand Mimosa
cocktail.instructions: Pour Grand Marnier into a Champagne Flute. Fill almost to the top with Champagne and top off with fresh Orange Juice.

cocktail.name: '57 Chevy #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Butterball
cocktail.instructions: Add Amaretto first and then layer Butterscotch schnapps on top, don't mix. Add whipped cream if desired.

cocktail.name: Tropical Lust
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add gin and vodka. Almost fill with pineapple juice, then add SoCo and melon liqueur. The drink can also be made frozen by adding 1 1/2 scoops of ice and blending.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Screw Shot
cocktail.instructions: Pour a double shot glass half full of vodka. Pour the peach schnapps into the next quarter. Pour the triple sec in the reamaining quarter. Stir and shoot.

cocktail.name: Southern Salutation
cocktail.instructions: Add 2 oz. of Sothern Comfort and 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps to a highball glass. Next add ice and top off with lemonade.

cocktail.name: Frisky
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Fresca and the whisky and drink fast.

cocktail.name: Fig
cocktail.instructions: shake well, pour into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Drunk Watermelon
cocktail.instructions: Cut a hole in the top of the watermelon and pour all of the vodka in the watermelon. Put the watermelon (hole upwards) in the fridge for one day before eating.

cocktail.name: Venus on the Rocks
cocktail.instructions: The finished drink should be the golden color of perfectly tanned skin. Use this as a guide and don't get hung up on volume measurements.

cocktail.name: Nina's Special
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients together for an even blending.

cocktail.name: Widow Maker
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add first three ingredients into glass and shake to mix them together. Add the 2 drops of grenadine for the red hourglass on the bottom of the Widow Maker spider.

cocktail.name: Celebration
cocktail.instructions: In a cocktail shaker add ingredients and fill with ice. Shake with gusto for half a minute, and pour/strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel, or lime peel if you use fresh lime juice.

cocktail.name: Irish Dawg
cocktail.instructions: Put vodka in first. then add the Baley's and cream. lightly stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Special K
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Banderas
cocktail.instructions: Align the shot glasses in the following order: Tomato (red), Tequila (white) and Lemon (green), resembling the Mexican Flag. Quickly gulp one after another: Tomato, Tequila and finally finish with the Lemon.

cocktail.name: Orange Mule
cocktail.instructions: Add into glass over ice and mix well. Garnish with slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: China White
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake, strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Perfect Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Swirl with ice to chill and pour.

cocktail.name: Moose Piss
cocktail.instructions: Get a clean five gallon pail and mix all the ingredients together with a ladle. Serve with or without a little ice.

cocktail.name: Jim's Nuts
cocktail.instructions: Equal parts Jim Beam and Amaretto over rocks. Stir.

cocktail.name: Stevie Wonder
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the order given and enjoy

cocktail.name: Voodoo Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Add 1 shot of white rum and 1 shot of Vodka too a tall glass. Tilt the glass and add 1-2 ounces of Grenadine while pouring down the inside of the glass. Fill with cold orange juice

cocktail.name: Hairy Armpit
cocktail.instructions: Place three ice cubes in glass. Pour in ouzo and fill with fresh grapefruit juice. Stir well and serve.

cocktail.name: Apple Blossom
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass nearly filled with ice. Stir. Strain into an old fassion glass over ice. Garnish with fruit.

cocktail.name: Pine Cone
cocktail.instructions: In a tall glass, on the rocks, add Southern Comfort and Amaretto. Fill glass with Pineapple juice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Adam's Apple
cocktail.instructions: Mix the ingredients in a tall glass.

cocktail.name: Kiss From Rudy
cocktail.instructions: Pour alchol first, add juices, then grenadine and cream, garnish with cherry or pineaple wedge.

cocktail.name: Red Devil
cocktail.instructions: First add ice, then mix in the alcohols, then the juice and grenadine. Shake when all ingredients are mixed. Serve in a 10-12 oz. glass.

cocktail.name: Mutual Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes. Alternately pour to another glass 3 or 4 times until chilled.

cocktail.name: Lanette
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, ice, and cranberry juice. Fill with OJ.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Ice Tea
cocktail.instructions: Mix all of the ingredients together and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange.

cocktail.name: Burnso Tropical
cocktail.instructions: Fill high ball glass with ice cubes. Add one ounce each of vodka and peach schnapps. Then add 3 oz of pineapple juice and 1 oz of cranberry juice. Shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Thunder Peel
cocktail.instructions: Shake it all chill and serve

cocktail.name: The Captains Silver Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice: Capt. Morgan Silver - Parrot Bay - orange juice - cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Grog #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour beer, vodka, and orange juice in pitcher. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Aladdin Sane
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Shake, allow to chill for 5 minutes, re-shake, and pour into a martini glass.

cocktail.name: Spanish Coffee #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix congac, kaluha, and espresso in a parfait glass and stir gently. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

cocktail.name: White Lady 1910
cocktail.instructions: Shake vigourously with plenty of ice

cocktail.name: Seelbach Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Add bourbon, bitters, and triple sec first. Fill rest of glass with champagne. Depending on the size up your flute, you might need to put less bourbon in. Garnish with orange twist.

cocktail.name: Crystal Cranberry
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half full with ice and add the vodka.Put in the cranberry and orange juice next, then float the other liquors. Add grenadine to color, mix and garnish with a straw and a lemon.

cocktail.name: Charro Negro
cocktail.instructions: Rub rim of glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Put 4 ice cubes into the glass, add Tequila and juice of half a lemon. Add some more salt if you like and fill the glass with Coca-COla. Stir gently.

cocktail.name: Lui Lui
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Espresso Martini
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass. It should be somewhat frothy.

cocktail.name: Anton's Ecto Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

cocktail.name: Purple People Eater
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

cocktail.name: Ruby Slipper
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass 3/4 full of whiskey and then top off the shot with Grenadine. Fill any large glass with 7-up. Drop the shot glass into the 7-up and then chug the ehtire mixture.

cocktail.name: Surfer On Acid #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake with ice, strain.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Brain
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, insert a straw and then add the first three ingredients (Vodka, Midori, Schnapps) then layer the juices using a barspoon to get a separation of alcohol and mixers. Leave a little room at top of glass to float the Sloe gin on top. Garnish with a cherry and orange wedge. The drink should look like a Stop Light. Green at the bottom, yellow in the middle and red on top.

cocktail.name: Pine-Sol Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass nearly filled with ice. Stir, and strain into a shot glass

cocktail.name: Jose Flame-O
cocktail.instructions: First put Tequila in shot glass, then add Firewater

cocktail.name: Nipple on Fire
cocktail.instructions: First put in ButterScotch, then Firewater, and float the Irish Cream

cocktail.name: Holy Water
cocktail.instructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add only a dash of Grenadine. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

cocktail.name: Catfish
cocktail.instructions: Serve it chilled up.

cocktail.name: The Gold, The Bad, and The Ugly
cocktail.instructions: When you're filling with milk, make sure you leave enough room for the Goldschlager. Pour the Goldschlager over the back of a spoon.

cocktail.name: Southern Blast
cocktail.instructions: Just pour it all in a glass. Stir it if you really feel the need to. I usually just pour in the alcohol and let the fruit juice do the mixing for me. For the best results, try and use that Minute Maid Fruit Punch. That stuff works very well. I advise against using any sort of "all-citrus" fruit juice, even OJ.

cocktail.name: Black Hole
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 2/3 with ice, add Sambuca and fill with soda.

cocktail.name: R-Float
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in a frosted mug over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Summer Dreams
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice in shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass Garnish with lemon and pinapple pieces

cocktail.name: Norling Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori and Bacardi Limon in a highball glass and fill 1/2 the glass with cruched ice. Fill with in 1 part 7-up and 1 part cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Class Act
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shker of ice, shake, then strain into a rocks glass full of ice. Drinker will have to constantly mix the drink in his glass as the Advocaat will settle.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Faser
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a huge bowl or an empty water bottle that holds several gallons. Stir or shake until mixed and serve either on ice or as a shot.

cocktail.name: Citrus Smack
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add rum, triple sec, and sour mix. Fill remainder of glass with grapefruit juice. Stir and garnish with orange and lemon wedges.

cocktail.name: Steamboat
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredience, strain into glass, and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Novebuche
cocktail.instructions: Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Angry Chameleon
cocktail.instructions: Disolve kool-Aid in rum. Add Mountain Dew.

cocktail.name: Misty Loch
cocktail.instructions: Pour the 3 first ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake, strain into a brandy snifter and add the 2 little dashes of Kahlua.

cocktail.name: Mage's Fire
cocktail.instructions: Start with the vodka in a bottle. Mix in the schnapps, then add the curacao. Mix well. This mixture should be chilled at least 24 hours before serving, and is best served cold.

cocktail.name: Frozen Grasshopper
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three ingredients together in a blender and blend until drink has the consistency of a good milk shake.

cocktail.name: San Juan Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice Add rum and dry vermouth Fill with pineapple juice and serve

cocktail.name: The Texas Mudslide
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in a shaker and pour all three ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously and then strain into a glass. This is intended to be more like a shot than a sipping drink.

cocktail.name: Arkansas Razorback
cocktail.instructions: Add all together in a mixing tin with ice, Shake to a froth, and strain off the ice into the glass.

cocktail.name: Gooseberry Jam
cocktail.instructions: Take all of the above ingredients, place in a cocktail shaker or blender with plenty of crushed ice. mix untill slightly frothy, then pour into a tall glass and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Green Tree Frog
cocktail.instructions: Mix together first three ingredients and then slice fresh limes and place in drink, then allow to sit for at least one hour. This drink is to be made in a large quantity, so the limes may "take effect."

cocktail.name: Cristianne
cocktail.instructions: Pour Blue Curacao in a champagne flute, followed by Vodka and White Wine. Then pour Grenadine. Don't shake it!

cocktail.name: Sunny Mexico
cocktail.instructions: Simple! Fill half the shot with (white) tequila and top it up with Galliano

cocktail.name: Viagra Shot
cocktail.instructions: Blend, add ice and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Pink Passion
cocktail.instructions: Build drink in a higball glass as listed. Use lots of ice cubes. Garnish with lime wedges.

cocktail.name: Sweet Passoa
cocktail.instructions: Fill half of the glass with ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Banshee Berry
cocktail.instructions: pour each of the three ingredients into a shot glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Razzleberry
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and serve.

cocktail.name: Southern Comfort Sour
cocktail.instructions: Can be made 'up' or 'on the rocks' Prepare sour glass. Add Southern Comfort and sour mix to mixing glass. Shake well (8-10 times) and strain into glass providing lots of foam. Add flag or butterfly (orange and cherry on a pick) as garnish.

cocktail.name: Santorini Sundown
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain the drink into a well chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a red cherry.

cocktail.name: Firecracker
cocktail.instructions: Fill the shot glass close to the top with Wild Turkey and add 4 dashes of tabasco sauce.

cocktail.name: San Diego Silver Bullet
cocktail.instructions: Shake the ingredients over ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve. Down it in one.

cocktail.name: Wu Wu
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka over ice. Add equal amounts of orange and cranberry juices and serve.

cocktail.name: Jersey Shore Cherry Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Add sugar, vodka, and sour mix over ice and shake. Then fill with sprite/7up. Top with grenadne or cherry juice. Garnish with cherry and lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Nasty Pablo
cocktail.instructions: Use a pint glass filled with ice. First add the vodka, then the blackberry brandy. Fill with orange juice and top with blue curacao.

cocktail.name: Colorado Cider
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in small snifter. Sip slowly or take as a shot.

cocktail.name: Blue Blazer #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a saucepan and heat until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour in Old-fashioned glasses with a spoon in it (to prevent the glass from breaking if the drink is too hot).

cocktail.name: Gloom Raiser
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain in a cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Green Tea
cocktail.instructions: Mix Chartreuse and Sour Mix on top of ice in Collins glass. Fill with coca-cola and, if you like, garnish with lemon or lime slice.

cocktail.name: Chartreuse and Tonic
cocktail.instructions: In glass filled with ice, mix Chartreuse and Tonic water. Garnish with lime slice.

cocktail.name: Papaya Milk Splash
cocktail.instructions: Make sure to clean out the seeds and deskin the papaya. Put the papaya along with all other ingredients in a blender, mix at medium to high speed for about one to two minutes. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Long Slow Comfortable Screw Against the Wall
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass.

cocktail.name: Kahlua Sour
cocktail.instructions: Mix Kahlua and lemon juice, add sugar and enjoy.

cocktail.name: The Kristy
cocktail.instructions: Put all together in a glass and stir. May put ice cubes in after mixed, or put in blender to make frozen drink.

cocktail.name: The Kristy #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass. Add ice. If frozen drink is preferred, use more ice and mix in blender.

cocktail.name: Full Moon
cocktail.instructions: Tilt snifter and pour amaretto. While still tilting snifter, pour Grand Marnier. Gently "roll" snifter in the tilted position, set upright, and enjoy sipping!

cocktail.name: Drunk on Christmas
cocktail.instructions: Mix and shake Irish whiskey, Midori, and Apple Schnapps with ice. Fill whiskey sour glass with ice. Strain mixture over ice in glass. Fill with sweet and sour. Garnish with several free floating Maraschino cherries

cocktail.name: Pia Rita
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice. Serve in sugar rimmed glass with shaved ice in it . Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

cocktail.name: Sailor Venus
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain to pousse cafe glass. Garnish with a peel of lemon.

cocktail.name: Sailor Moon
cocktail.instructions: Shake white rum, Charleston Follies and lemon juice with ice. Strain over ice in an old fashioned glass. Fill glass with champagne. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Sailor Mercury
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a brandy snifter.

cocktail.name: Ramos Fizz #1
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients except soda and orange slice in a blender until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Ramos Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Add the ingredients except club soda to a chilled mixer and shake for at least one minute. Strain into a thin goblet and top off with chilled club soda, to taste.

cocktail.name: Fruit A la la
cocktail.instructions: Put all together in blender, and blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Moose Fart
cocktail.instructions: Add with ice in a blender, and blend to a thick consistency.

cocktail.name: Milky Nooky
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve

cocktail.name: Homecoming
cocktail.instructions: Fill rocks glass with ice, add Amaretto and Baileys and serve with a stirrer.

cocktail.name: Greasy Swede
cocktail.instructions: Mix together and serve - Do not chill or add ice.

cocktail.name: The Classic
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain in a cooled cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry on a stick.

cocktail.name: Zool
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps in the shot glass first. Then pour 1 oz. of Absolut Vodka on top. Last pour Amaretto on top of Vodka until the Vodka changes in to a light brown.

cocktail.name: Delta Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Swamp Water #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake or blend with ice, strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Oklahoma Tropical Twister
cocktail.instructions: Place both cans of Cream of Coconut (unopened) in hot water for 10 minutes. Then pour the Pineapple Juice, Orange Juice, Cream of Coconut, and Grenadine in a large punch bowl. Stir for 3 minutes to ensure proper mixture. You can add the liqour in with the mix or add it to each drink as it is poured. 1.5 oz per 12 oz drink. By leaving out the Spiced Rum the kids can drink this as well. It is a great NAB drink. Serve over crushed ice. Place the Pineapple Wedge, Orange Wedge, and the Cherry on a tooth pick and drop in drink. For a Oklahoma Frozen Twister place all the ingredients in a blender with a 12 oz cup of ice and blend til smooth. Then add garnish.

cocktail.name: Kahlua Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with crushed ice. Fill half the glass with Kahlua. Add a dash of Creme de Noyaux. Top with Cream.

cocktail.name: White Splash
cocktail.instructions: Add the cola slowly to the Pina Colada.

cocktail.name: Green Thing
cocktail.instructions: Shake well till it is a cream color and is frothing.

cocktail.name: The Green Wave
cocktail.instructions: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Chill and strain into glass. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Liberty Blue Champagne
cocktail.instructions: Shake first 4 ingredients over ice and strain in sugar rimed champagne flute. Fill with champagne.

cocktail.name: London Fog
cocktail.instructions: Shake Gin and Pernod with cracked ice. Strain into a red wine glass packed with shaved ice.

cocktail.name: Quick Fox
cocktail.instructions: Layer each ingredients onto one another

cocktail.name: Rugmuncher
cocktail.instructions: Shake both ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: The Velvet Kilt
cocktail.instructions: Chill cocktail glass and pour ingredients into mixer. Shake until cold and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry or small butterscotch candy.

cocktail.name: Chocalate Covered Martini
cocktail.instructions: Chill cocktail glass. Mix Vodka, Godiva, and Vanilla Schnapps. Stir, do not shake. Place single cherry with stem in chilled cocktail glass. Strain over cherry.

cocktail.name: Quantum Theory
cocktail.instructions: Pour Rum, Strega, and Grand Marnier into collins glass. Add Pineapple and Sweet and Sour until full. Garnish with a Lemon Cherry Flag.

cocktail.name: Mystery Date
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain. Garnish with 1/4 of a strawberry.

cocktail.name: Lewinsky
cocktail.instructions: Pour together in shot glass and serve. Very easy to do.

cocktail.name: Tiger Paw
cocktail.instructions: Add vodka, lemon juice, ice, and sugar in a mixing glass and shake. Pour into a cup and add orange soda. Stir.

cocktail.name: Hawaii Five-O
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients on top of ice in the highball glass.

cocktail.name: Blue in the Face
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add liquors. Add sugar and tonic to taste. Stir.

cocktail.name: Pisang Pistace
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with 5-6 icecubes and serve in a cocktailglass with 2 icecubes.

cocktail.name: Desiree
cocktail.instructions: Serve on the rocks. Optional garnish: lemon or lime twist.

cocktail.name: Lady L
cocktail.instructions: Shake with 4 oz. 7-Up and a splash of pineapple juice. Pour into tall glass over crushed ice. Color top with a splash of cherry syrup, add cherry for garnish.

cocktail.name: Black Fruit Tree
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to glass with ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Braindead
cocktail.instructions: Fill the shaker half with ice cubes, and add the incredients. Shake well. Serve in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Warm and Fuzzy
cocktail.instructions: Pour southern comfort, triple sec, and then cherry brandy

cocktail.name: Bag of Filth
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Pour pernod and Tia Maria into glass. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker and give shaker a rapid 3 second shake. Pour contents back into glass.

cocktail.name: Bob's Special Punch
cocktail.instructions: Add them all together in any order you wish, just make sure you stir it all together well.

cocktail.name: Slapshot
cocktail.instructions: Stir well before adding whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Flori's Hot Tub Heaven
cocktail.instructions: Please add in order from light to heavy finishing with coffee. No mixing required.

cocktail.name: Buttered Toffee
cocktail.instructions: Pour amaretto, irish cream, and Kahlua over ice cubes. Add half-and-half, and stir well.

cocktail.name: Porky Bone
cocktail.instructions: Let all the maple syrup collect at the bottom of the glass, then lightly mix the other ingredients over it. A few ice cubes can be added when it's done.

cocktail.name: Fire And Ice
cocktail.instructions: Layer the Rumple Minze on top of the Firewater (as best as possible)

cocktail.name: D-Roy
cocktail.instructions: Put sugar in glass. Squeeze limes into glass. Stir slightly. Add rum. Add lemonade. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Super Allez
cocktail.instructions: Begin by pouring in the fruit punch. Then add the gin. Next, pour the orange juice in followed by the Sprite.

cocktail.name: Santa Maria
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients except orange in shaker with ice. Shake gently, and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange slice.

cocktail.name: Alien Urine
cocktail.instructions: This drink is ideally made in a 16 ounce glass, but can also be made in a Collins glass. The drink is served on the rocks. Add the Midori, Malibo, and Schnaps. Add juices. Shake in a tin. Garnish with either two cherries or with a kiwi wheel.

cocktail.name: Slushy
cocktail.instructions: Mix drink with crushed ice or blend with 2 1/2 scoops of ice. For added enjoyment stick a straw in the middle and drink for a slushy rush.

cocktail.name: Log Cabin
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients but the soda with ice. Strain into highball glass. Fill the glass to the top with the orange soda.

cocktail.name: Dirty Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Mix in order listed. Do not stir. Serve in Brandy Snifter.

cocktail.name: Barbie Shot
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain.

cocktail.name: Applecake
cocktail.instructions: Shake well and use it as a shot

cocktail.name: Italian Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice. Pour the Amaretto over the ice then slowly add the orange juice and top with club soda to form layers. Add a dash of grenadine and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

cocktail.name: Cherry Spitfire
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients and top with 151. If too strong add 7-UP or Sprite.

cocktail.name: Curtain Call
cocktail.instructions: Add equal parts of Jack Daniels, Midori, and Jgermeister into a shot glass. Prechill the alcohol if so desired.

cocktail.name: Deerslayer
cocktail.instructions: Put a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add the Jgermeister and Windsor, stir, then fill the glass with the 7-Up and give it a small stir.

cocktail.name: Mundo Fine
cocktail.instructions: Shake or mix all ingredients, and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass, (or any glass large enough,) Garnish with an orange slice, a lemon slice, and a cherry if so desired.

cocktail.name: Black River Boogie
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a glass and mix well

cocktail.name: Shattered Dreams
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients except the 7-Up and pour over ice into the glass. Add a splash of 7-up and stir carefully: don't kill the carbonation.

cocktail.name: Michelada Regular
cocktail.instructions: Add lemon juice to the ice cubes in beer mug. Add salt and stir to blend. Add tequila and stir to blend. Fill with Corona, Sol or Dos Equis.

cocktail.name: Tequila Colagallo
cocktail.instructions: Pour lemon juice into glass. Add ice cubes. Add salt. Pour tequila and stir to blend. Fill with Coke

cocktail.name: Double Omega
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the alcohol, then lime. Cola on the top.

cocktail.name: Maple Lake Irish Shock
cocktail.instructions: Bring Hot 100, apple cider, Aftershock to a boil then add Cinnamon sticks stirring frequently. Add apple slices and then let cool for 2 min and add puckers. Serve.

cocktail.name: Black Christmas
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1-1/2 ounces of Black Sambuca into a glass filled with 6 ounces of Eggnog, Stir.

cocktail.name: Apple Martini
cocktail.instructions: Poor all ingredients into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass.

cocktail.name: Cajun Comforter
cocktail.instructions: Pour Sothern Comfort and Bourbon over rocks in a 12-ounce glass. Add a dash of tobasco, or any non-habeero pepper sauce (dont go overboard). To really impress, garnish with a jumbo shrimp.

cocktail.name: Hoo Doo
cocktail.instructions: Mix Southern Comfort, Finlandia, orange juice, and lime juice over ice. Top with splash of Schnapps and Sprite.

cocktail.name: Rocky Mountain Bumpsucker
cocktail.instructions: Pour Southern Comfort over rocks in a short glass. Fill with ginger ale. Top with splash of dry vermouth.

cocktail.name: Scarlett Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Summer Sucker
cocktail.instructions: Cut a small, circular hole in the watermelon. Save the piece cut out. Turn the watermelon with the hole facing the ground so any juices drip out. Mix the vodka, grenadine and 7-Up in a seperate bowl. Slowly pour the mix into the watermelon (use a funnel if you have one). If you put the liquid too fast into the watermelon, it wont absorb properly. Pop the piece you cut out back into the hole. Shake the melon. Throw it in the fridge for an afternoon. When the family is over, cut slices out of the watermelon and enjoy.

cocktail.name: 77 Sunset Strip
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, gin, rum, triple sec, pineapple juice and grenadine together in a highball glass over ice. Top it with a splash of Sprite. Garnish with a strawberry and an orange slice.

cocktail.name: Godiva Polar Bear
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal parts Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur and Peppermint Schnapps. Serve on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Snowshot
cocktail.instructions: Throw all ingredients into blender. Add sugar to taste, sweet lemons dont need more than one cube. Blend until the consistancy resembles a daiquiri.

cocktail.name: Bot
cocktail.instructions: The easy way to make this drink is to add all listed ingredients with ice into shaker and strain into glass. However, the really slick way is much more impressive: Add cranberry juice, lime juice, tripple sec and only one ounce vodka into shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Then, mix 1 once orange juice with one ounce vodka in a seperate glass. Fill a turkey baister with the vodka/OJ mix, and slowly inject it into the cranberry glass on the bottom. This produces a sort of reverse-layering effect, and also ensures both cranberry and OJ will have the same amount of vodka.

cocktail.name: Bittersweet Jack
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktail.name: International Jack
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktail.name: Southern Sparkler
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass, or serve on the rocks into an ordinary glass. Garnish with a flag (confederate).

cocktail.name: Southern Suicide
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Bad Habit
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a shot glass, vodka first.

cocktail.name: Lucky Seven
cocktail.instructions: Combine the seven liquors, straight, in a tall glass. Top it with three splashes of cranberry, lime, and orange juices.

cocktail.name: Sweaty Irish Whiskey
cocktail.instructions: Pour whiskey and cinnamon schnapps into shot glass. Add dash of tobasco.

cocktail.name: Almond Delight
cocktail.instructions: Pour Sambuca first, then Amaretto.

cocktail.name: Bairn
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice and shake. Strain into an old fashioned glass on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Harbor Lights
cocktail.instructions: Add 1/2 shot bailey's irish cream to 1/2 shot butterscotch schnapps, then float yukon jack on top. Ignite the yukon jack and sip quickly through a straw.

cocktail.name: Goldschlager Lemondrop
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice, serve straight up.

cocktail.name: Mad Hatter
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain, straight up.

cocktail.name: The Jersey Cherry
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Granish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Pegu
cocktail.instructions: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktail.name: Jasmine
cocktail.instructions: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Black Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Just pour, stir, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: SigTau Scorpion
cocktail.instructions: mix ingredients, stir, and add ice to bring level to top of glass

cocktail.name: Red Royal Shot
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass with half Amarreto and then the rest with Crown Royal. This will make one shot.

cocktail.name: Blue Caboose
cocktail.instructions: Pour each measure in to the shot glass(Do not mix!!!) and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Bavorak
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with tonic, pour Fernet over spoon at the and add a straw.

cocktail.name: The Fat Albert
cocktail.instructions: In a blender mix the Chocolate Milk, Ice, and Maple Syrup for about 5 seconds. Then add the Chocolate liquior and Kahlua and blend for another 2 seconds. Pour and top with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Strawgasm
cocktail.instructions: Simple Enough. Mix the Irish Cream and the Strawberry Liqueur in a shot glass, stirring or shaking it.

cocktail.name: Toocan Sam
cocktail.instructions: in a shaker half filled with ice, add first 5 ingredients. shake well. strain into hurricane glass filled with ice. lace with grenadine.

cocktail.name: Patriotic Blow
cocktail.instructions: Layer

cocktail.name: Stained Blue Dress
cocktail.instructions: Layer

cocktail.name: Lewd Lewinsky
cocktail.instructions: Layer

cocktail.name: Harvest Moon
cocktail.instructions: Pour first 4 ingredients over ice, slowly add grenadine as you stir.

cocktail.name: Purple Yummy
cocktail.instructions: Mix in cocktail shaker with ice cubes to chill. Strain into glass, adorn with cherries.

cocktail.name: Beautiful
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient into the snifter and serve.

cocktail.name: China White #2
cocktail.instructions: Layer creme de cacao on bottom, followed by the Irish Cream. Lastly, sprinkle cinnamon over top.

cocktail.name: Frizzy Punch
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients in a trash can or large cooler. Stir until completely mixed.

cocktail.name: Soylent Green
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice, strain over ice in a medium sized hurricaneglass.

cocktail.name: Absolut Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Mix alcohol, sweet and sour. Add Ice and top off with Sprite.

cocktail.name: Bloody Passion
cocktail.instructions: Build.

cocktail.name: Southern Fruity Passion
cocktail.instructions: Add first the Southern Comfort. Then add the Triple Sec. Finish the shot with some Grenadine. Tip your head back and enjoy this smoothest shot in the south.

cocktail.name: Canada Dream
cocktail.instructions: Shake all liquid ingrediens with ice and strain over ice cubes. Serve with straw.

cocktail.name: Russian Iceberg
cocktail.instructions: Fill tumbler with ice. Lean to 45 degree angle and pour creme de menthe down the side of the glass to fill bottom. Repeat pour with Rumple Minze and Vodka. Do not stir. The intent is to make layers with the liquors (so that it looks like an iceberg.) Stick a straw in the middle of the drink and drink the whole drink at once through the straw.

cocktail.name: Washington Apple
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled shot glass.

cocktail.name: Lava Lamp
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice. Grenadine first, then Absolute Citron, fill to top with Apple Juice.

cocktail.name: Celebration #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake vigorously over ice, pour into cocktail glass and garnish with either lemon or orange peel.

cocktail.name: The Double Team
cocktail.instructions: Pour the rum first, then the Amaretto. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Generic Kamikaze
cocktail.instructions: Pour Vodka and lime juice over ice. Fill with Sprite.

cocktail.name: Three Day Weekend
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with plenty of ice. Add Jgermeister and rum first. Top off with pineapple juice and grenadine. Shake well.

cocktail.name: Red Eisentrout
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquors into glass over ice. Fill with surge soda and top off with cherry juice. Shake and enjoy! Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Thumb Press
cocktail.instructions: Add the vodka, 151, and Midori forming a nice green shooter. Then tilt in some grenadine to give it some red flare at the bottom -- burn it down!

cocktail.name: After Party
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients! More or less vodka and sugar can be used. Mix to your taste!

cocktail.name: Woo Woo #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Moana Sands
cocktail.instructions: Pour Chambord and Peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Fill up to half with coconut syrup and fill the other half with orange juice and stir. After a few minutes the juice and syrup separate from the alchohol and it looks like sand but tastes MUCH better. Garnish with paper umbrella through a marachino cherry and orange wedge.

cocktail.name: Electric Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Moisten rim of cocktail glass with lime wedge, and salt rim of glass. In a shaker half filled with ice, combine tequila, blue curacao, and rose's lime juice. Shake well. Strain into glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Royal Flush #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix together the Crown and Peachtree schnapps, then add the juices. Mix and sling it back!

cocktail.name: Donna Reed
cocktail.instructions: Start by crushing the ice in a blender. Add the cranberry juice (more or less to taste) and sour mix, blend a few more seconds. Add the Vodka and blend again. If done properly, this drink should be frothy for a bit, and then separate as it sits. Serve in cocktail or margarita glasses. It won't hurt to put it in the freezer for a short time (enough to slush it some).

cocktail.name: Pamoyo
cocktail.instructions: In a large container, mix the same amount of Gin, Sprite, and Grape Juice. Mix well and cool. Serve in shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Monk on Coke
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients in glass, stir, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Big Unit
cocktail.instructions: With tequila already in glass, pour Blue Curacao down the side so that it underlays the tequila. Do not mix!

cocktail.name: Pinglan
cocktail.instructions: Shake milk, Bailey's irish cream and Pisang ambon. Pour it into a cocktailglass filled with crushed ice, and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Thug Passion #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Texas Tea
cocktail.instructions: Fill a 1 gallon pitcher with ice. Add all the ingredients except the coca-cola. Stir, then add the coca-cola and stir again. Pour into your favorite glass with ice and enjoy.

cocktail.name: G4
cocktail.instructions: Layer Irish Cream on top of Amaretto.

cocktail.name: White Bull
cocktail.instructions: Pour ice into glass, add tequila and kahlua, fill with cream, shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Thug Passion #1
cocktail.instructions: Just pour one on top of the other!

cocktail.name: Mexican Mountie
cocktail.instructions: Pour each part into a Old-fashioned glass over ice. Top with a wedge of Lime.

cocktail.name: Bonfire
cocktail.instructions: Layer this drink! Grenadine first, Amaretto next, and 151 on top. Light the 151 and let it warm for about 3 seconds. Blow (lightly) to put the flame out and take the shot.

cocktail.name: Zimartini
cocktail.instructions: Pour together over 2-3 icecubes and serve

cocktail.name: 57 T-Bird with Hawaiian License Plates
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in cocktail mixer, shake well, pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Astoria
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice: strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with twist of orange or lemon.

cocktail.name: White Witch
cocktail.instructions: Shake & strain

cocktail.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Against The Wall With Satin Pillows The Hard Way
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: 220 BTU
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice and strain into shot glass. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: 81 Camaro
cocktail.instructions: Blend.

cocktail.name: Flaming Blow Job
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into large punchbowl. Spray all 5 cans of whipped Cream on top of the bowl-set on fire and let burn. After the flames go out, serve in mason jars.

cocktail.name: Tom and Jerry
cocktail.instructions: Beat egg whites stiff with electric beator, Add sugar gradually, add cinnamon, nutmeg and vanille, add in half of the eggs yolks blend until smooth. In Large mug fill with 1/2 batter 2 shots of 60% rum and 40% brandy (mixture) balance with boiling hot water. Stir well and sprinkle with nutmeg.

cocktail.name: Patton Martini
cocktail.instructions: mix gin, vermouth and olive juice in cocktail shaker with ice. shake, then immediately remove from ice into cocktail glass. garnish with onions and olives alternating on a toothpick.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Navel #2
cocktail.instructions: Orange juice last, stir, and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Golden Dream
cocktail.instructions: Shake vigorously until creamy in a shaker filled one third full of ice cubes. Strain into a champagne flute. Or use a blender and blend until creamy, pour into hurricane glass and garnish with slice of orange.

cocktail.name: The Two
cocktail.instructions: Just simply pour into a shot glass or any glass of small size will work. Pour the ingredients in any order that you wish.

cocktail.name: Lesbian Lover
cocktail.instructions: Pour Zima into a frozen pilsner. Add shot of coconut rum and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Snowplow
cocktail.instructions: Mix hot chocolate to taste, add booze, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

cocktail.name: Metromelt
cocktail.instructions: Mix hot chocolate to taste in a large enough mug to accommodate booze. Add booze, top with whipped cream, sprinkle with cinnamon, enjoy.

cocktail.name: Pink Beaner
cocktail.instructions: Fill 3/4 glass with crushed ice. Add tequila, juice/nectar and grenadine. Stir until pink.

cocktail.name: Gin Balalajka
cocktail.instructions: Mix the gim and juice and fill up with russian. The gin and juice may be shaken for better taste.

cocktail.name: Black and Blue Shark
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingrediants into a small glass shot and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Topaz
cocktail.instructions: Cobine ingredients in a shaker 2/3 filled with ice. Shake well, and then strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Dreamy Winter Night
cocktail.instructions: Add Amarretto to Hot Chocolate to your taste.

cocktail.name: Dreamy Winter Delight
cocktail.instructions: Add Irish Cram to the Hot Chocolate and add Amaretto to your taste. Stir.

cocktail.name: Dreamy Winter
cocktail.instructions: Add Irish Cream to Hot Chocolate to your taste.

cocktail.name: Dreamy Chocolate Winter
cocktail.instructions: Add Kahlua and Irish Cream to Hot Chocolate. Then add Amaretto to your taste. Stir.

cocktail.name: Orlando Amethyst
cocktail.instructions: Add Gin and Chambord Raspberry Liqueur together and stir. Next, pour in the pineapple juice. Shake well. Pour over ice. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Kristi GreenEye
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well. Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Tongue Tangler
cocktail.instructions: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream and Brandy into glass. Add Heavy Cream. Stir well and serve.

cocktail.name: Beer Top
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with Beer and top it off with some 7-up. You can add more or less 7-up to suit your taste. If you make it 50/50 it is known as a Shandy. Great on a hot Summer day or the night after a lot of drinking.

cocktail.name: Girl Scout Thin Mint Cookie
cocktail.instructions: Fill a Mug with Hot Chocolate, add a shot of Creme de menthe, Stir in and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Flat Tire
cocktail.instructions: Shake tequila and Sambuca over ice. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Wild Squirrel Sex
cocktail.instructions: Fill 16oz. cup with ice. Add shots, sour mix, and cranberry juice. Top with splash of grenadine.

cocktail.name: Fruit Tingles
cocktail.instructions: Place ice cubes in shaker , add all oter ingredients and shake. Pour into shot glasses to drink

cocktail.name: Blue Meanie
cocktail.instructions: Combine Blue Curacao, Vodka and Sour mix in a shaker with ice, shake and strain into a shot glass. Could also be made on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Irish Flag
cocktail.instructions: Layer: creme de menthe, irish cream and brandy

cocktail.name: Double Gold
cocktail.instructions: Keep goldschlager in freezer. Mix in jigger shot glass. Shot it down and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Lava Lamp #2
cocktail.instructions: In a shot glass, pour Kahlua, strawberry liqueur and Frangelico. Then float Bailey's Irish Cream on top of the other spirits and dribble 2-3 drops of Advocaat on top.

cocktail.name: Foreplay on the Neutral Ground
cocktail.instructions: Fill glasses with ice. Mix Absolut, Midori, pineapple juice and cranberry juice in a decanter. Pour over ice and serve. Makes Several.

cocktail.name: Red Eye a la Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Pour refrigerated tomato juice into large frosted mug. Over tomato juice, pour cold beer. Do not stir. Crack egg, drop contents into mug. Do not stir. Discard eggshell. Serve.

cocktail.name: White Jamaican
cocktail.instructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice and pour in with all ingredients. Speed shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Trojan Horse
cocktail.instructions: Mix coke and guinness in a pint glass.

cocktail.name: Guinness Shandy
cocktail.instructions: Mix lemonade with Guinness in a pint glass.

cocktail.name: Mint Tea
cocktail.instructions: Pour Creme de Menthe over ice and add Iced Tea to taste. Homemade Iced Tea is best, but Nestea and Lipton work just fine.

cocktail.name: Astropop
cocktail.instructions: Layer all three liqours into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Southern Ireland
cocktail.instructions: Mix together and shoot or double amount and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Pink Gin Tonic
cocktail.instructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with Campari to add more colour and taste. Garnish with the lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Passoa Recovery
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Fuzzless Navel
cocktail.instructions: Pour peach nectar and orange juice into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Vampire's Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain over ice in an old fashined glass.

cocktail.name: PMS Special
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a martini glass.

cocktail.name: Fox Trot
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Blue Fox Trot
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Cranberry Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice and fill with cola. Stir and add honey. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Evil Princess
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice. Stir and garnish with a lime slice.

cocktail.name: Time of the month
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a big old fashion. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Mix all 5 shots in a chilled glass. CHUG!

cocktail.name: Water your melon
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Mt. Dew in any kind of ordinary glass. Then, add the Watermelon Schnapps and stir.

cocktail.name: Jack your melon
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Mt. Dew in any kind of ordinary glass. Then, pour the shots of Watermelon Schnapps and Jack Daniels in the glass and stir.

cocktail.name: The Cherry Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Put the cherry into the shot glass. Add the cinnamon Schnapps (be careful it is real strong). Then add the Rum and top of with the vodka. More vodka can be used. Slam it

cocktail.name: Back Shot
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients over ice

cocktail.name: Fruit Lush
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in order, stir, enjoy.

cocktail.name: Transmission Overhaul
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a large container. Shake or Stir Well. Server Chilled or over Ice. This will sneak up on you :)

cocktail.name: Wedding Anniversary
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Gator Piss
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori and Rum over ice, and top off with sweet and sour mix.

cocktail.name: King of Poland
cocktail.instructions: First the scotch goes in, then the lemon juice, then the crushed ice, then topped off with the vodka.

cocktail.name: The Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice in shaker cup, strain and shoot,

cocktail.name: Tumbleweed
cocktail.instructions: Combine over ice in a blender. Mix until smooth and frothy. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Drum Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Put ingredients in a blender with 2-3 ice cubes. Blend for aprox. 10 seconds. Serve in a highball glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Decorate with an orange slice and two maraschino cherries.

cocktail.name: Start Me Up
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything in a container (bottle, glass etc.), then it is ready for consumtion...

cocktail.name: Anestesia
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice for 10 seconds. Serve it in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Wookie
cocktail.instructions: Mix Schnapps and Amaretto and float cream into mixture.

cocktail.name: Blue Motorcycle
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass. Fill with sour mix and add a splash of 7-Up.

cocktail.name: Purple Russian Gonzo
cocktail.instructions: Put everything in a shaker and give it a whirl. Once shaker is well chilled, strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Little Green Frog
cocktail.instructions: Prepare Lemon-Lime mix in a large pitcher or punch bowl and add the other ingredients and pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Dead Little Green Frog
cocktail.instructions: Mix Lemon-Lime mix in a large pitcher or punch bowl and add the other ingredients and pour over ice, top each drink off with 1/2 oz of Cherry liqueur.

cocktail.name: The Sheedy
cocktail.instructions: Add, grab glass shoot back.

cocktail.name: Lucky Lemon
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingrediants into a glass, stir and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Raw Sewage
cocktail.instructions: Mix together, shake, and serve.

cocktail.name: Dirty Bloody Martini
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker, except olives, and shake until shaker is frosted. Pour into cocktail glass, add olives and serve.

cocktail.name: California Gold Rush
cocktail.instructions: Pour 7-up into a glass. Add vodka and Goldschlager. Stir to mix gold flakes evenly through the drink. Serve in a clear glass without ice.

cocktail.name: Blue Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Layer first 2 ingredients in shot glass. Set aside. Pour 7-Up and soda water in a foot glass, then drop the shot glass in the foot glass and drink.

cocktail.name: Karla's Creation (KC)
cocktail.instructions: Fill metal shaker with ice. Add liquor and sour mix. Shake, strain, and serve.

cocktail.name: Snake Bite Black (UK)
cocktail.instructions: Pour 1/2 pint Lager, and 1/2 pint Cider into a pint glass, then add Black Currant until drink is purple in color.

cocktail.name: Arkansas Buttermilk
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients one at a time, preferably in a "new" plastic gas can that has been cleaned and serve from gas can

cocktail.name: Muff Diver
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the alcohol in a shaker with ice, strain into a shot glass. Place shot glass into a wide-mouth rocks glass or similar container, fill rest of glass with whipped cream and add cherry (optional).

cocktail.name: Spice Cake
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice, strain, and serve in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Big Pine Puss
cocktail.instructions: Make shot in mixing glass with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Tootsie Pop
cocktail.instructions: Layer grenadine, amaretto, and lemon juice, then stir. Add 2 drops of chocolate syrup, let sink, and serve.

cocktail.name: Irish Pride
cocktail.instructions: Layer and mix.

cocktail.name: Spear Chugger
cocktail.instructions: Simply add in order vodka, ice, orange juice, lemon, and vinegar. Ice can be crushed.

cocktail.name: AJ's Bubbling Brew
cocktail.instructions: Carefully pour the Rum, Tequila, Southern Comfort, and Peppermint Schnapps into the glass, light on fire, and quickly add the beer. After adding the beer, stir the mixture and watch it bubble forth.

cocktail.name: Dragon's Blood
cocktail.instructions: In a twelve ounce glass, mix all ingredients and serve.

cocktail.name: Cricket
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker filled with ice, combine ingredients and shake well, strain into old fashioned glass

cocktail.name: Yummy Bidnis
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in highball glass and stir

cocktail.name: Blue Motorcycle #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add the ingrediants, shake and serve.

cocktail.name: The Perfect Ten
cocktail.instructions: First add the alcohol, then the rest is 50/50 of the lemon juice and the sprite. Don't put any ice in it!!!

cocktail.name: White Dove
cocktail.instructions: Pour Amaretto and Cream de Coke into a blender cup with the ice cream. Blend til smooth like a shake. Line the inside of snifter glass with chocolate syrup. Pour drink into cup and top with wipped cream. Add cherry to top.

cocktail.name: Japaneese slipper
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with lot's of ice. Pour into cocktailglass.

cocktail.name: Purple Lobster
cocktail.instructions: Fill shaker with ice, add all ingredients, strain into a rocks/shooter glass.

cocktail.name: White Carnation
cocktail.instructions: Stir and pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with orange slice.

cocktail.name: Champibble
cocktail.instructions: Stir or shake well.

cocktail.name: Jo Jo Original
cocktail.instructions: Fill old fashioned glass with ice. Add Dark Rum and Amaretto. Fill with Coke. Add splash of High Proof Rum to taste.

cocktail.name: Leap Year
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

cocktail.name: Nicky Finn
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Combine lemon juice and sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Add water and stir. Serve in a tall glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Forza FCK
cocktail.instructions: Mix the tequila, vodka, banana liqueur and coconut milk together. Shake it well together with crushed ice, and put it in an glass. Last, pour the creme de menthe into the glass so that it sink to bottom of the glass.

cocktail.name: Liberace
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the Kahlua. Layer the milk on top of it. Then float the Bacardi 151 on top of the milk. Light the top of the shot. Let it burn for about 10 seconds, blow it out and shoot it.

cocktail.name: The Kuoyamuli
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients swiftly with a spork in either a irish coffee mug, or cappuchino mug. Serve hot/warm.

cocktail.name: Thames Water
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Orange Juice in first. Top up with Cola, the fizzier, the better. Stir.

cocktail.name: Grappa Gimlet
cocktail.instructions: Shake and pour over ice-cubes.

cocktail.name: Torombolo
cocktail.instructions: Put the chocolate milk in the big glass, and add the Licor 43 and mix will. Serve it very cold.

cocktail.name: Haywire
cocktail.instructions: Serve over ice. Regular 7-up and Amaretto can be used if cherry 7-Up is not available. Garnish with orange slice and cherry. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Will Willy Wander
cocktail.instructions: In shaker, add Southern Comfort, Rock and Rye, Creme de Fraise, Amaretto and Sour Mix. Fill with orange juice. Pour into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Caramilk
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients (in order) into a shot glass, then it's bottoms up!

cocktail.name: Irish Cream #2
cocktail.instructions: Put everything in a blender and mix. Makes about three small mason jars.

cocktail.name: Cable Car
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake. Strain into a chilled, sugar and cinnomon rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange spiral twist.

cocktail.name: Fria Cafe Italiano
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with ground espresso.

cocktail.name: Hard Eight
cocktail.instructions: Add rum, lime juice and bitters to an ice-filled Collins glass. Fill with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wheel and a lemon spiral.

cocktail.name: Blue Moon
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktail.name: Champagne Celebration
cocktail.instructions: Add Cointreau, Brandy and Sugar cube aturated with Peychaud bitters to champagne flute. Fill with your favorite champagne. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktail.name: Cielo
cocktail.instructions: Build in an ice-filled collins glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

cocktail.name: Sex in the Desert
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Sex on Ice
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice and blend until the drink has reached the desired consistency. Pour unstrained into cocktail glass and garnish with whiped cream and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Electric Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktail.name: Flamingo Punch
cocktail.instructions: Build into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with and orange slice and a lemon wheel.

cocktail.name: Funky Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a Hurricane Glass and garnish with coconut flakes.

cocktail.name: Good Fortune
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktail.name: Hurlyburly
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with dried cranberries.

cocktail.name: Indigo Blues
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain this drink into and ice-filled Hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktail.name: Italian Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain this drink into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral.

cocktail.name: Joy Ride
cocktail.instructions: Muddle lemon and sugar in a mixing glass. Add ice, Absolut Citron, Campari and Sweet and Sour. Shake well and dump into a Hurricane glass. Spritz with soda.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain this drink into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Float Meyers rum and Garnish with a Pineapple/Orange/Cherry pinwheel.

cocktail.name: Jockey's Choice Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Manhattan Bella
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a brandied cherry.

cocktail.name: Pink Limon
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled, sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktail.name: Palmetto
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Float Meyers Rum on top and garnish with a pineapple spear.

cocktail.name: Sunsplash
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Third Rail
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled, sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktail.name: Golden Apple
cocktail.instructions: Mix the two ingredients in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Thug Heaven
cocktail.instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice and mix the two ingredients.

cocktail.name: Fruit Salad Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender 1/2 to 3/4 with ice and add strawberries, pieces of watermelon, and slices of star fruit. Last add rum and mix. Blend until smooth and garnish with a slice of star fruit and an umbrella.

cocktail.name: Moo Moo
cocktail.instructions: Pour both liquors into glass with ice. Add cream and shake well. Serve with large straw.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Balls
cocktail.instructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients one part each - and add 7-up. Eight shots of each requires a 2L bottle of 7-up.

cocktail.name: Nikki Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Ssing a coffee mug, pour Bailey's and butterscotch into mug. Fill with coffee and stir.

cocktail.name: The Dash
cocktail.instructions: Pop a couple of ice cubes in the glass. Pour the advocaat slowly over the ice. Then wait for a moment before adding the creme de fraise. Serve it as soon as it's poured as it starts to curdle.

cocktail.name: Jimtini
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and serve up in a chilled cocktail glass with a cocoa rim.

cocktail.name: FU2
cocktail.instructions: Layer from top to bottom....

cocktail.name: Brimstone
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice.

cocktail.name: Crazy Monkey
cocktail.instructions: combine all ingredients in a blender or Island Oasis machine. Blend and serve in a hurricane. Top with whip cream and garnish with a strawberry and orange.

cocktail.name: Cokahlualicious
cocktail.instructions: Mix the kahlua and coconut liqueur, poor over crushed ice, and sprinkle a pinch of cinnamon on the top. Voila! You can also put this in a blender if you so desire.

cocktail.name: Pearl Necklace
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts tequila rose and bailey's in shot glass, shoot! Also try chilled.

cocktail.name: Sunset (Night Club)
cocktail.instructions: Splash of Grenadine to flavor, chill/strain shot or can be a drink over ice.

cocktail.name: Carabinieri
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice, serve in high glass half filled with ice.

cocktail.name: Rhino
cocktail.instructions: Layer the three ingredients in that order.

cocktail.name: Granny Apple Blossom
cocktail.instructions: Mix apple schnapps, tequila, daiquiri mix in a collins glass filled with ice. Fill to top with 7-up.

cocktail.name: Toasted Fisherman
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice stir and serve with a cherry

cocktail.name: Scurvy #2
cocktail.instructions: Layer the ingredients in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: 8 iron
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal parts of each in the the shot glass

cocktail.name: TLA
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass with the tequila on the bottom, amaretto in the middle, and a splash of lime juice on top.

cocktail.name: Mexican Iceberg
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Tequila and the Yukon Jack together with ice in a large tumbler glass. Add the Triple Sec and then add the lime juice to taste. You can garnish with slice of lime of lemon.

cocktail.name: Cerebellum
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass 3/4 full with vodka. Add the grenadine for color. Finally pour in a little Bailey's. The bailey's will sit in the drink and look like a brain, stem and all.

cocktail.name: Mogadon
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes then add 1oz of Absolut Citron. Fill with 7-Up then splash with fruit juice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients (except ice) in the order shown. Stir well. Add ice cubes and serve.

cocktail.name: Just Shoot Me
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice and then pour into a shooter glass

cocktail.name: Panther Sweat
cocktail.instructions: Shake the ingredients together with crushed ice. Strain into glass. Good with crushed salt on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Feliz Natal
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients together in the glass with a couple of ice cubes and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Mountain Dang
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 3/4ths full of Mountain Dew -- No fuller as it will fizz a lot! -- Add Tang to taste. Ice is completely optional

cocktail.name: Pink Floyd
cocktail.instructions: Pour Amaretto and Southern Comfort into shaker over ice. Top off glass with equal parts OJ and pinapple juice. Add one splash of grenadine. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Papa Doble
cocktail.instructions: Shake rum, grapefruit juice, and lime juice with ice and pour or strain into glass. Add a splash of grenedine.

cocktail.name: Seaweed
cocktail.instructions: Ingredients can be mixed in any order over ice.

cocktail.name: Thal on the rocks
cocktail.instructions: Take the highball, put in 3 to 4 ice cubes, add 1 cl of creme de cassis (not cooled), then 4 cl of preferably Absolut Vodka along with 2 cl of Gordon's Dry. Fill in the glass with equal parts of bitter lemon and tonic water, pour and squeeze in one fourth of a lime. Garnish with a pair of cherrys, one in, one outside the glass.

cocktail.name: Hot Jose
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker #3
cocktail.instructions: This drink should be shaken lightly and strained into a 2oz shot glass.

cocktail.name: Molotov Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Pour a shot of vokda (preferably Russian), float the 151, light, blow out, and take the shot down.

cocktail.name: Tequila Bay Breeze
cocktail.instructions: Blend.

cocktail.name: Wet Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Layer the 3 ingredients in the order listed in a shot glass. It is also good over ice in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Jack-Off
cocktail.instructions: Pour in one shot of Jack Daniel's on ice, more if you like your drinks strong. Then pour about a half of a can of Coca-Cola on top, leaving room for the iced tea. Finally, fill to the top with very strong iced tea (try three times the amount of powder).

cocktail.name: Suddenly Daylight
cocktail.instructions: Pour Iced Tea in glass first, then top with the Sweet and Sour, and then add Triple Sec to taste. Stir once and serve.

cocktail.name: Cucci
cocktail.instructions: Add ice to glass, drizzle Southern Comfort over the ice. Add lemonade, orange juice and a dash of Cointreau and mix.

cocktail.name: Extra Fuzzy Navel
cocktail.instructions: Mix Peach Brandy, Peach Schnapps, and Triple Sec in highball. Fill with Orange Juice and Ice to taste.

cocktail.name: Brooklyn Zoo
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Mix rum vodka, and gin. Add splash of pinepple juice, Razzmatazz, and sourmix. Drinker or assistant pours beer.

cocktail.name: Branded Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Float each ingredient over the previous, set on fire, and shoot it!

cocktail.name: PB&J
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake and strain into shot glass. Serve.

cocktail.name: Sigma Nu Ball Buster
cocktail.instructions: Chill both then mix together!! Can be served over ice or in smaller doses. Experiment, have fun, let us know what you come up with!

cocktail.name: Baywatch
cocktail.instructions: Shake the vodka, the galliano and the juice in a shaker. Then add ice and finally put cream on top. A little bit of chocolate makes it look really great. Should be served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

cocktail.name: Gumball Hummer
cocktail.instructions: Combine equal parts over ice in cocktail shaker. Shake, strain, serve!!

cocktail.name: Calypso
cocktail.instructions: Pour directly in the shot glass and mix the ingridients. No need to chill. Serve.

cocktail.name: Tree Smacker
cocktail.instructions: Add liqurs, then add juices. Color red with grenidene. Float the 151.

cocktail.name: Dr Jack
cocktail.instructions: Mix in glass over ice.

cocktail.name: Penthouse
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in the glas. Shoot it down. Have a limewedge afterwards.

cocktail.name: Kickstand
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Amaretto and Sothern Comfort, layer Kahlua and Irish cream.

cocktail.name: Baileyfloat
cocktail.instructions: fill glass with ice..add Bailey's and root beer. Stir. Serve in frosted beer mug

cocktail.name: Purple Wind
cocktail.instructions: Pour Chambord into shot glass. Warm sake on stove then pour into chambord. Drink immediately.

cocktail.name: Tropical Passion
