cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass(es).

cocktail.name: Slow Comfortable Screw on a Dogbox
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in mason jar, add ice and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Snow Snake
cocktail.instructions: Larger Glass can be used if more cream or milk is needed to soften the impact of the drink.

cocktail.name: Sweet Casa Noble
cocktail.instructions: In Collins glass put ice, pour the tequila and fill with peach juice, finish with a splash of grenadine and a slice of lime.

cocktail.name: Razberi Kicker
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Stolichnaya Razberi vodka, cranberry juice, a splash of Sprite. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

cocktail.name: Peach Tea Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Mix and serve on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Geisha
cocktail.instructions: mix first two ingredients: fill with pineapple juice.

cocktail.name: Canadian Zombie
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins glass halfway up with ice. Add white and dark rum. Fill up with half orange- half lemonjuice. Pour grenadine and curacao along rim of glass. Top with 151 proof rum.

cocktail.name: The BV
cocktail.instructions: Add ice first, then vodka, OJ and tomato juice. Give a light stir. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Ooo
cocktail.instructions: Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: The Wedge
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: The Lynchmob
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the sweet and sour, then the amaretto and then Orange soda, and stir

cocktail.name: Phi Psycho Psycho
cocktail.instructions: Mix in large punch bowl to your liking.

cocktail.name: Wile E Coyote
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall glass

cocktail.name: Oxymoron
cocktail.instructions: Keep the Vodka and Juice at room temperature. Mix them in the glass, and then add the honey. The honey will sink to the bottom. Swirl the drink more or less to vary the amount of honey dissolved.

cocktail.name: Sex On The Beach - Jersey Style
cocktail.instructions: Makes 1 gallon of punch -- mix all 4 liquers in 1 parts and fill rest with pineapple and cranberry juice

cocktail.name: Coo Coo
cocktail.instructions: In a blender, combine ingredients with ice and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Barbarian
cocktail.instructions: Pour root beer into mug. Add a shot of Blackberry Brandy.

cocktail.name: Eenytini
cocktail.instructions: Pour blue curacao, gin and 7-Up into a shaker tin filled with ice. Swirl until tin is frosty. Pour into Martini (Cocktail) Glass. Repeat with the cranberry juice and add to glass so that an electric-purple colour is achieved. Garnish with a cherry on a sparkler stick.

cocktail.name: Longaberger Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in collins glass filled with ice.

cocktail.name: Four Fine Friends
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in a shot glass and slam it down.

cocktail.name: Lorraine's Delight
cocktail.instructions: Add everything to a blender with 6-10 ice cubes and blend until it is thick and frosty. Pour into a frozen margarita glass.

cocktail.name: Georgia Peach
cocktail.instructions: Build on ice.

cocktail.name: Comfort Dry Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Combine vermouth, Southern Comfort, and ice in a glass and stir well. strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: The King Of Denmark
cocktail.instructions: Just mix the two things together and serve. It is possible, but not necessary, to set the drink on fire as it is usually done with Sambuca. In any case don't add any ice.

cocktail.name: Letitia's Penisbutter Cup
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients, pour over ice, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Titia's Tushie
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass, and shake

cocktail.name: Fridays Frozen Mudslide
cocktail.instructions: Begin by crushing the 8 ice cubes in a blender. When ice is finely crushed, add the remaining ingredients and blend for 45 seconds on blender's highest setting. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Bottlecap
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients. May be served on the rocks or chilled and strained as a shot.

cocktail.name: Phoenix Paradise
cocktail.instructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender and blend for about 20 - 30 seconds. Then pour into a hi-ball glass or a Gibralter 14 oz glass.

cocktail.name: Eagle Eye
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Monaco
cocktail.instructions: Start with the grenadine, then beer, then 7up. Stir well on the rocks, and you're good to go.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Bliss
cocktail.instructions: Use chilled orange juice, but no ice.

cocktail.name: Brittle Fracture
cocktail.instructions: Mix in no particular order. Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Put Equal amounts of Kahlua and coconut run in a common 12oz glass. Fill the glass with chocolate milk.

cocktail.name: Carolina Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Add alcohol and stir lightly. Pour in iced tea. Stir a few more times and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Black Lodge
cocktail.instructions: Start with glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add Triple Sec, Malibu, and Citrus Vodka. Add splash of Rose's lime juice. Fill glass with cola. Stir.

cocktail.name: Yukon Dew Me
cocktail.instructions: Just mix and drink.

cocktail.name: Campari Milkshake
cocktail.instructions: Pour cold milk in a pot. Slowly add orange juice. Finally add campari. Stir really well. Put ice cubes in glass and pour in milk-shake. Garnish with slice of orange. Serve with straw.

cocktail.name: Disco Ball
cocktail.instructions: Mix together over ice, strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Dublin Driver
cocktail.instructions: Pour Irish Mist and Orange Juice over rocks. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Fruit Tingle #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Blue Curacao and Vodka over the ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and at the same time add the dash of cordial. Be sure not to go overboard with the cordial otherwise it overpowers the fruit tingle effect.

cocktail.name: Centipede
cocktail.instructions: Combine vodka and rum in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass with ice. Top off with grapefruit soda and stir gently.

cocktail.name: The Whole Maryann
cocktail.instructions: layer over ice, Taste before serving

cocktail.name: Platinum Grand Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Salt the rim of your margarita glass and add freshly squeezed lime juice to your glass. Add margarita mix, tequila, grand marnier, cointreau, triple sec, irish mist, and 5 ice cubes in a shaker. Shake vigorously until thoroughly mixed and cold. Pour into margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel. Adding a maraschino cherry is an interesting touch.

cocktail.name: Sour Death
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice and pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Tinyee's Orange Smoothie
cocktail.instructions: Put crushed ice into blender, about 2 cups. Add Cointreau. Add fruits, lemon juice and orange juice. Blend. With machine on, pour one half of the soda and reserve for serving. Once blended, pour into glass three-quarters of the way and add remaining soda.

cocktail.name: Mirage
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and stir in chilled glasses. Garnish with a strawberry.

cocktail.name: Arizona PowWow
cocktail.instructions: Mix the three alcohols together and pour into shot glasses leaving enough room to add a little club soda.

cocktail.name: Sunset Sour
cocktail.instructions: Mix whiskey and sour mix and pour over ice-filled whiskeysour glass. Slowly add grenadine which will sink to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with orange slices and cherries.

cocktail.name: Sex on an Arizona Beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients and add some ice.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Breeze
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients except juice with ice and pour into collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with pineapple wedge and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Apocolypse
cocktail.instructions: Combine alcohol in a coffee mug. Fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Magic Woman
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingridients and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Snakebite Jack
cocktail.instructions: Fill a pint glass half way with cider, add a dash of blackcurrant cordial, top it up with lager, drink it down a bit (or pour it off) and add a shot of Jack Daniels.

cocktail.name: Kenny
cocktail.instructions: Mix the peach vodka with the sprite and some ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Perfect Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Put the crushed ice in the glass. Add spirits and top with Sprite. Gently place one half strawberry underneath the layer of crushed ice. Serve.

cocktail.name: Telegraph
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker with ice, combine rum and vodka. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled almost to the top with ice. Top off with ginger ale and stir gently.

cocktail.name: Amor de Cosmos
cocktail.instructions: Shake rye, grenadine and cranberry juice with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add a splash each of ginger ale and club soda. Add a maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Soviet Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, triple sec and lime juice over ice. Fill to top with club soda. Stir.

cocktail.name: Absolut Royal Fuck
cocktail.instructions: Chill in tumbler, shake, and serve up in a rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Apple Jolly Rancher
cocktail.instructions: Chill in tumbler, shake. Serve up in rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Barney on Acid
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Alligator Piss
cocktail.instructions: Shake, strain into glass

cocktail.name: Green Beret
cocktail.instructions: pour both ingredients into a shaker, over ice. Shake well. Pour into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Tweaked
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 3/4 way full with ice, add Vodka and Southern Comfort, then fill to the top with Root Beer, stir then drink.

cocktail.name: Twin Sisters
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Stubborn Italian
cocktail.instructions: Pour one shot Sambuca, add a splash of Galliano on top. Light on fire and drink it.

cocktail.name: Ladder
cocktail.instructions: Just pour it in your glass

cocktail.name: Dallas Stars
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Toronto Maple Leafs
cocktail.instructions: Layer in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Wayne's World
cocktail.instructions: Fill the shot glass about 2/3rd's full of Jager, and then top it off with the Sambuca.

cocktail.name: Lager & Lime
cocktail.instructions: Pour the beer in first, then add the lime juice. Because the lime juice is heavier than the beer, don't let it sit for a long time. For best results, use "bar lime" (out of the nozzle) instead of real lime juice.

cocktail.name: Toro
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into an ice filled shaker and shake. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Slaughtering the Slothman
cocktail.instructions: Shake the Grand Marnier, orange Curacao, freshly squeezed lemon juice and a dash of grenadine with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Rye & Ginger
cocktail.instructions: Mix together.

cocktail.name: China Village Mai Tai
cocktail.instructions: In a metal shaker add a fair amount of ice cubes. Add dark rum and light rum, then grenadine, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Finally add Triple Sec and shake vigoursly. Pour in a thick tall ribbed glass. Top with a cherry or a dash of Triple Sec.

cocktail.name: Tiger Jack
cocktail.instructions: Pour a measure (depending on sweetness required 1/2 to 1 shot is average) of grenadine into a tall, cool glass. In a cocktail shaker, add ice, 2 shots of Jack, 1 shot of Triple Sec then top up with enough orange juice to fill the glass. Give it a good shake and pour slowly into the glass.

cocktail.name: Hot Summer Breeze
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and mix all together.

cocktail.name: Sever St. Special
cocktail.instructions: Fill a Collins glass most of the way with ice. Pour in the Yukon Jack. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

cocktail.name: Candied Sever St. Special
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins glass most of the way with ice. Add Yukon Jack and Midori. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

cocktail.name: Screwed Banana
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in highball glass, about 1/2 full, then pour in the banana liqueur and the Peach Schnapps. Fill with orange juice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Spicy Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake the Gin and Vermouth with ice in a shaker. Pour into a large Martini glass. Pour the tabasco into the finished drink. Stir very lightly.

cocktail.name: Coffee Coolata
cocktail.instructions: Mix coffee, sugar, and milk in a blender and add more of either to taste, then add the ice and crush it until no large chunks are present. Add the Kahlua, and mix if you'd like that.

cocktail.name: Penalty Shot
cocktail.instructions: Pour all 3 into shot glass and mix.

cocktail.name: Mint Condition
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice, and pour the ingredients into the glass, stirring with a straw.

cocktail.name: All Puckered Out
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and a shot of pucker to the highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Squeeze a wedge of lime and toss it in the glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Bent Bum
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins Glass with a heaping of ice. Pour in Vodka, Gin, 1/2 of remaining glass with O.J., then rest with Grapefruit. Skake, don't stir. Then add a healthy splah of Coca-cola.

cocktail.name: Shot of Respect
cocktail.instructions: Add the tequila and 151 proof rum in a shot glass.Then pour in the tabasco.

cocktail.name: Coconut Cream Pie
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients into a shaker with ice shake & strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Barracuda
cocktail.instructions: Put the liquor in the shot glass equally

cocktail.name: Paddy's Caffeine
cocktail.instructions: Make sure you put in Tia Maria first (Before Guinness has settled and before you "head" it) as otherwise you will mess-up a perfectly well-settled pint

cocktail.name: Purple Mexican
cocktail.instructions: Pour all 3 ingredients into mixing glass with ice. Shake and strain into highball glass. Drink like a shooter

cocktail.name: P.D.C.
cocktail.instructions: Start with Creme de Menthe, then layer in order, with Baileys last.

cocktail.name: Liquid Valium
cocktail.instructions: Fill Glass with Ice, pour liquers, then pour to fill with equal parts Orange and cranberry juice. Shake and serve with Orange and cherry garnish.

cocktail.name: Mountain Fuck
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a beer mug.

cocktail.name: Pierced Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice, strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Ten Speed
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain over ice.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Sunset #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine the vodka and the coconut rum. Fill with Orange Juice and add a splash of Grenadine. Shake or stir.

cocktail.name: Crazy Janie
cocktail.instructions: Pour ice into a deep stem glass and pour in Orange vodka. Fill with grapefruit juice, and add a splash of Sprite or Champagne. Stir gently and then comes the "crazy part". Spin the glass and drizzle a few drops of grenadine into the drink to make a spiral effect. Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim of the glass.

cocktail.name: Tuaca Nutter
cocktail.instructions: Mix in cocktail shaker with ice. Serve on the rocks. Garnish with chocolate shavings & chopped roast nuts.

cocktail.name: Mother
cocktail.instructions: Mix Gin, Vodka, Grenadine, Sour Mix together in shaker and pour into a collins glass with ice. Try to fill to about 1/2 to 3/4 quarters full with the liquor mix. Then top with beer to personal flavor.

cocktail.name: Alternate Root
cocktail.instructions: Mix Schnapps and juice in glass of ice. Place in blender. Blend until smooth. Serve in chilled glass.

cocktail.name: Less Than Jake on The Rocks
cocktail.instructions: just put one on top of the other in order shown... then stir

cocktail.name: The Dukes Of Hazzard Tonic
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Creamy Snatch
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass 1/2 with ice. Pour in the Buttershots first, followed slowly by the Kahlua until you're halfway up the glass. (You can allow yourself to be a little more generous with the Buttershots than with the Kahlua). Pour in the half-and-half last, and stir until mixed completely. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Deidru
cocktail.instructions: Add Brandy to glass and fill with Lemonade. Add ice if desired. Stir.

cocktail.name: Satin Sheet
cocktail.instructions: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and pour into a collins glass half filled with ice cubes. For those with a sweet tooth, use a sugar frosted rim.

cocktail.name: Kokopa
cocktail.instructions: Layer. Peppermint schnapps first, then the kahlua on top.

cocktail.name: A Southern Screw
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice, stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Zipper
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and stir to chill. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Dr. Raspberry
cocktail.instructions: Pour Dr. Pepper into glass and add chambord. Stir to mix, and serve chilled.

cocktail.name: Bittersweet with a twist
cocktail.instructions: Add all liquid ingrediants to mason jar and add ice to taste. Stir well and add slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Madeleine
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with 4 ice cubes. And enjoy that drink.

cocktail.name: Keoke Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Mix alcohols, add coffee, top with whipped cream, Enjoy. Good on a cold winters night!

cocktail.name: The Hurtado
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass with a lot of ice, shake well and serve.

cocktail.name: Dizzy Damage
cocktail.instructions: Chill ingrediants in mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

cocktail.name: Tropical Kermit Piss
cocktail.instructions: Just pour into a glass and add the softdrink and ice.

cocktail.name: Indiana Jones
cocktail.instructions: Add the Whisky and Tequila together, one shot worth combined, then add the same amount of Champagne/Sparkling Wine. Put your hand or a beer mat over the glass, slam it down onto table and then down it in one.

cocktail.name: Limon and Ginger
cocktail.instructions: This drink will taste best neat if both the Limon and the ginger ale are chilled, but will also work fine on the rocks.

cocktail.name: C3PO
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in mixer. Garnish with 2 orange slices to give impression of C3PO's eyes.

cocktail.name: Whippersnapper
cocktail.instructions: Add Rum, Fresca, and 1 or 2 ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Beth's Own
cocktail.instructions: Mix alcohol first, then add cola.

cocktail.name: Carribean Dream
cocktail.instructions: Mix and Add Ice

cocktail.name: Ironman
cocktail.instructions: Mix Seagrem 7 and vodka. Stir. Add a few ice cubes, fill with soda and stir gently.

cocktail.name: Genuine Singapore Sling
cocktail.instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker, fill with ice and shake until the shaker is well frosted. Strain into a tall glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and cherry.

cocktail.name: Purple Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake well. Strain into shot glass and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Californian Hurricane
cocktail.instructions: You can mix in either a punch bowl, or a pitcher. Mix all ingredients (alcohol first) together, then add only enough grenadine to turn it red. Add ice and serve in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Dr. Shocker
cocktail.instructions: Poor Dr. Pepper into glass, add Aftershock. Stir once.

cocktail.name: Tanyahtoo
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.

cocktail.name: Pat
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour over ice and stir with a straw.

cocktail.name: The Eclipse
cocktail.instructions: Just shake it well with ice and strain.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Screw
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half with ice, add vodka, peach Schnapps, and then orange juice. Stir.

cocktail.name: PB&J #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Frangelico 1st. Then add the grenadine.

cocktail.name: Carbomb #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine (proportions of 50/50) Bailiey's Irish Cream and irish wiskey into one shot glass. Drop the shot into a mug of guinness and chugg until empty.

cocktail.name: Zimamazing
cocktail.instructions: Shake the first six ingredients without ice until frothy. Fill glass with ice and pour Zima and the contents of the shaker in a one-to-one ratio. Stir and serve. Makes about four drinks.

cocktail.name: Martinet
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker full of ice. Stir or shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Queen Soda
cocktail.instructions: Just stir

cocktail.name: Eyes Wide Shut
cocktail.instructions: Place ice in shaker and add all ingredients. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

cocktail.name: Candy Bar
cocktail.instructions: Blend Kahlua, creme de cacao, and Frangelico. Add cream. Serve with ice cubes in highball glass.

cocktail.name: Cherry Lifesaver Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Bouzo
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the bourbon, then pour in the ouzo.

cocktail.name: Blonde Ron
cocktail.instructions: Just fill ice, then pour rum, 7up, and slash of pineapple.

cocktail.name: Double Pucker
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ounce in same shot glass. Slam or sip and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Waborita
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker over ice combine the ingridients, and then pour into a salt rimmed martini glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

cocktail.name: Irish Monk
cocktail.instructions: Pour liqueurs into a irish coffe cup. Fill with good quality hot chocolate. Add plenty of whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Picon Whiskey
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

cocktail.name: Riley
cocktail.instructions: Shake first six ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Ass a dash of raspberry syrup. Garnish with a lime squeeze.

cocktail.name: XYZ
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

cocktail.name: Sir Knight
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

cocktail.name: Saurian Brandy
cocktail.instructions: Put orange rind in a half-pint jar with 1/4 cup vodka. Seal it and shake occasionally. Let it steep overnight. -- Pour sugar and 1 2/3 cups vodka into a 28 ounce bottle. Seal it and shake until all the sugar is dissolved, then add the maple syrup. -- Filter the orange extract through a fine handkerchief or coffee filter until it becomes clear. -- Add a tablespoon of the final extract to the vodka syrup mixture and mix well. If your orange peels are much more or less aromatic than average, adjust the quantity so that you have enough to hide the maple flavor, without having enough to make the liqueur bitter or recognizably orange flavored.

cocktail.name: Mulled Madeira
cocktail.instructions: Combine first 6 ingredients in a large saucepan and bring almost to simmer over medium heat. Reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes (do not simmer). Add Cointreau and stir until hot. Serve warm in heat proof glasses or mugs, leaving peel and spices in pan.

cocktail.name: Lemonade #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour lemon and lime juice into a pitcher and add sugar. Stir until the sugar is dissolved. Add water and ice cubes. Stir.

cocktail.name: Rock and Rye Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Shake vodka, Rock and Rye, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a ice filled collins glass. Top with lemon soda and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime.

cocktail.name: Italian Limoncello
cocktail.instructions: Wash the lemons with a vegetable brush and hot water to remove any reside of pesticides or wax. Carefully zest the lemons with a zester or vegetable peeler so there is no white pith on the peel. -- In a 1-gallon glass jar, add one fifth vodka and the lemon zest. Cover the jar and let sit at room temperature for at least 10 days, and up to 40 days in a cool dark place. -- In a large saucepan, combine the sugar and water and cook until thickened, appx. 5 to 7 minutes. Let the syrup cool before adding it to the limoncello mixture. Add the additional fifth of vodka. Allow to rest for another 10 to 40 days. -- After the rest period, strain and bottle, discarding the lemon zest. Keep in the freezer until ready to serve.

cocktail.name: Lemon Lift
cocktail.instructions: Serve chilled straight or on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Sorrento Caf
cocktail.instructions: Pour Limoncello and Grand Marinier into coffee cup or glass. Fill with coffee and top with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Lemon Highlander
cocktail.instructions: Pour into scotch glass over ice. Stir. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Pink Cello
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a tall glass over ice. Fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with wedge of lemon.

cocktail.name: Lady Cello
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a sugar and Limoncello rimmed highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Cokello
cocktail.instructions: Pour into tall glass over ice, fill with Coca-Cola and add a wedge of lemon.

cocktail.name: Bloody Biker
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake until well blended. Pour over ice in an old fashion glass.

cocktail.name: V's With Sauce
cocktail.instructions: Pour V8 into glass. Add Vodka and stir. Add Worcestershire sauce and stir. Drink!

cocktail.name: Real Pisser
cocktail.instructions: In shot glass, pour 1/2 shot of Tequila, then 1/2 shot of Mountain Dew. Next, lick back of hand & sprinkle Sugar lightly onto it. Have Cherry ready on fork, laying on table. Lastly: lick sugar on hand, cover drink & slam on table, drink it fast, & eat cherry.

cocktail.name: Caucasian
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes. Add desired amount of Half-and-Half (usually 1 oz. to 3 oz.)

cocktail.name: Club Tropix
cocktail.instructions: Fill Hurricane with ice, add malibu and blue curacao, and a splash triple sec. Fill remaining room with equal parts of pineapple juice and 7-up. Add a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and an umbrella.

cocktail.name: Bloody Mary Jolly style
cocktail.instructions: Add together in a glass, and stir. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge, chunk of cheese and an olive.

cocktail.name: Rainbow Brew
cocktail.instructions: Pour slowly in the order shown.

cocktail.name: Kentucky Wildcat
cocktail.instructions: Mix drink just like a Long Island iced tea. Lemon to garnish

cocktail.name: Neon Voodoo
cocktail.instructions: Combine the vodka, apple juice, and mountain dew in a blender with about 6-8 ice cubes. Blend on high for about 10 seconds. Feel free to add more vodka if you want to get messed up really fast.

cocktail.name: Presidential Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredent into a large glass. Add ice and let sit while preparing drinking glass. Rim glass with lime and salt. Fill glass with ice and add a lime slice (for looks). Carefully pour contents of large glass into salted glass (careful not to disturb salt).

cocktail.name: Blue Thrill
cocktail.instructions: Fill one shot glass with the Blue Curacao. Fill another shot glass with the lemon juice, and serve. To drink, first put lemon shot in mouth, then put curacao shot in mouth, swish around then swallow. Remember, yellow before blue!!

cocktail.name: Apple Pie Shot #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in order listed into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Avocado Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Crush ice in blender. Add rum, lime juice, and 1/4 medium avocado in blender. Blend until thoroughly mixed and smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Winter Parker
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients in a shaker. Shake with ice and strain into glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Blue Light Special
cocktail.instructions: Shake.

cocktail.name: Lchler
cocktail.instructions: Southern Comfort, then Lemon, Cola last

cocktail.name: Bloody Coochie
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half full of ice Pour in vodka, triple sec, sour mix, OJ, and fruit punch Stir, or shake

cocktail.name: Choad
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient into shot glass. Do not attempt to layer drink, as this is pointless. Mix.

cocktail.name: Cockroach
cocktail.instructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass and mix. Sing a verse of La Cucaracha, or sing la-la-la-la-laaa lots. Bonus points if you can sing it in Spanish. Continue until you can no longer sing la-la-la-la-laaaaa.

cocktail.name: Reality Twist
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass mostly full of Amaretto, then carefully pour Blue Curacao into the middle of the shot glass to create the blue "twist" down the middle. Looks very cool if done right.

cocktail.name: Guillotine
cocktail.instructions: Very easy. Fill shot glass about 4/5 of the way with Butterscotch schnapps. Float a layer of Bailey's Irish Cream on schnapps. Float a layer of Aftershock on the Bailey's.

cocktail.name: Royal Peaches and Cream
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend until smooth and no chunks of ice are present. Pour into Mason Jar and garnish with a fresh slice of peach, if desired.

cocktail.name: Cioccolato e cocco
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly and pour in glass.

cocktail.name: Roffsing
cocktail.instructions: Fill half a glass with ice cubes, add Passoa, vodka, lime and pear soft drink. Stir and top with cream. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Cinnamon Caramel Apple
cocktail.instructions: Pour shot of Goldschlager in a cocktail glass, fill with 1/2 glass of chilled apple cider, add 1 shot of caramel liqeuer. Stir to mix.

cocktail.name: Taste of Winter
cocktail.instructions: Build in in the glass. Plenty of ice cubes

cocktail.name: Holy Doodle
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Creamsicle #3
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice, give it a few good shakes and strain into a cocktail glass with a sugar rim. More potent than the original. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Kameleon
cocktail.instructions: Firstly, build ingredients in the order given in a collins glass over ice. Layer the Pimms on top.

cocktail.name: Multi-coloured Smurf
cocktail.instructions: First shake the orange juice, vodka, and Mango Syrup with the ice in a shaker. Float the apricot liquer, and blueberry schnapps in cocktail glass. Then float the shaken vodka and juices.

cocktail.name: Side Kick
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with lot's of ice.

cocktail.name: Flgel
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour over a single cube of ice in a small glass. Drink like a shot and throw the ice away!

cocktail.name: Swamp Juice
cocktail.instructions: In a normal glass, add everclear and then vodka. Nearly fill with orange juice, and then add blue curacao until the entire drink turns a nice shade of green.

cocktail.name: Negroni - Zimbabwe Style
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Coat rim of glass with sugar. Pour over plenty of ice.

cocktail.name: Linfield's Spare Part Punch
cocktail.instructions: Select a large container (at least 5 gallons) that can dispense the drink. Simply mix at will, add the ice on top, and go.

cocktail.name: John Daly
cocktail.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add absolute citron and triple sec. Fill glass with half lemonade/half iced tea. Garnish with lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Y2K shot
cocktail.instructions: Chilled glass

cocktail.name: Southern Harmony
cocktail.instructions: build over ice and serve with a smile

cocktail.name: Kumoniwannalaya
cocktail.instructions: Add all three liquiors together, shake till mixed, then pour into cocktail galss.

cocktail.name: Maurizio's Dream
cocktail.instructions: Chop the Lime, stir in with Cane Sugar and Ginger. Add the Crushed Ice and fill up with Apple Juice. Enjoy!

cocktail.name: Chambrite
cocktail.instructions: Pour Chambord and vodka into glass. Fill with sprite.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Truffle
cocktail.instructions: Add liquers to glass. Fill with milk.

cocktail.name: Red Eyed Hell
cocktail.instructions: Mix together and serve.

cocktail.name: A Goodnight Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Put one drop of Angostura Bitter on sugar cube and drop in flute. Add champagne and splash of Campari.

cocktail.name: Coffee Nudge
cocktail.instructions: Combine all with coffee and top with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Yellow Bellied Sap Sucker
cocktail.instructions: Put in the Lime Juice then add three drops of angostrua bitters. Shake it up, and add the tonic.

cocktail.name: Jackbull
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingrediants together and serve in the glass with the ice.

cocktail.name: Doucet devil
cocktail.instructions: Put amaretto first, then the southern comfort and top this with the creme de banane.

cocktail.name: Shellshock
cocktail.instructions: Pour clamato juice over salt, pepper and lemon. Then add beer slowly as it will fizz up.

cocktail.name: Blue Bohemian
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with an orange twist and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Starburst
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps and lemonade. Shake or stir. Garnish with a sugared strawberry if desired.

cocktail.name: Tom's Rum Runner
cocktail.instructions: Pour all liquids except dark rum into glass. Fill with ice and stir. Float dark rum on top and stir gently.

cocktail.name: Absolut Tooch
cocktail.instructions: Chill with ice and strain into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Clousseau
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and kahlua in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Passionate Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice, strain into glass. Garnish with flag.

cocktail.name: Abe's Tropical Night in Hell
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together and stir. Add ice. Then enjoy your night in Hell!

cocktail.name: Dudley's Damnation
cocktail.instructions: Take a Good size cooler, any with a drain plug will do, and pour in a 12 pack of Zima. Then pour in your 6 liters of sprite along with the 2 cans of limeade. Then pour the 1/2 gallon of vodka in with the rest of it. Stir until the limeade has dissolved totaly, and there you go. Makes roughly 5 gallons.

cocktail.name: Unicorn
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake & strain into martini glass or champagne cup. Garnish with red straws & tacky plastic animals (preferably horses or mermaids) Add parasols & slice of orange if available.

cocktail.name: Pouce Coupe Puddle
cocktail.instructions: Pour in order into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Jealous Queen
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in glass.

cocktail.name: Dungeon Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix Fruit Punch Flavored Kool-Aid with schnapps, vodka, and orange juice. Once stirred, garnish with cherries.

cocktail.name: Green Gulf
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Add creme de mente.

cocktail.name: Dog Biscuit
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients on the rocks. Stir.

cocktail.name: The Postman
cocktail.instructions: Chill, shake, and pour over ice!

cocktail.name: Berry Buster
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously for 20 sec. Strain and serve with one fresh ice cube.

cocktail.name: Keith Jackson
cocktail.instructions: Mix, Chill, Strain, and Shoot!

cocktail.name: Captain's Spiced Cider
cocktail.instructions: Pour (over ice is best, but not necessary) spiced rum into glass, fill with apple cider, stir.

cocktail.name: Electric Marcucci
cocktail.instructions: Mix in this order. The blue curacao self-mixing with the Sprite helps for show. Also not so keen in anything other than a clear container of course.

cocktail.name: Milk Tooth
cocktail.instructions: Build in a shaker with cubed ice. Pour in Jack Daniels, Creme de Cacao, Blackcurrant and the sweet and sour. Shake well and strain into iced collins glass. Pour over the pineapple juice and then place shaker over glass and shake hard once up and down. Remove shaker and enjoy the froth on top!

cocktail.name: Soul Taker
cocktail.instructions: Mix the the parts together and stir briefly.

cocktail.name: Croc Punch
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors, fill nearly with Sprite and top off with lime juice.

cocktail.name: Liquid Nitrogen
cocktail.instructions: Put equal measures of ingredients in a glass with ice. Stir if preferred

cocktail.name: Pascal
cocktail.instructions: Pour licor 43 and Midori in a glass and fill with milk and ice

cocktail.name: Teresa's Dream Shake
cocktail.instructions: In shacker mix Kahlua, Tequila Rose, ice and milk. Shake and pour into frosted beer mug.

cocktail.name: Brain Damage
cocktail.instructions: Pour all the ingredients over an ice-cube and stirr gently

cocktail.name: Salty Balls
cocktail.instructions: Salt the rim of a Collins glass. Fill with ice, pour vodka along with the OJ. Fill the rest of the glass with grapefruit juice, and float midori melon liqueur on top.

cocktail.name: Cafe' Joy
cocktail.instructions: Add the three liquors and then add the coffee. Top with whip cream and toasted coconut.

cocktail.name: Tubboocki
cocktail.instructions: Just pour and serve.

cocktail.name: Smurf on the Rag
cocktail.instructions: Mix Peach Schnaps and Blue Curacao in a shot glass and top with whipped cream and four or five drops of grenadine.

cocktail.name: Canteloupe Dizzy
cocktail.instructions: Pour club soda into a parfait glass with ice. Pour vodka, melon liquer, and peach schnapps into a shaker and shake well. Strain into the club soda and stir. Garnish with cherry/orange/pineapple.

cocktail.name: Pillow Mint
cocktail.instructions: Add the whiskey fist, then Kahlua. Finally, add a splash of the mint for flavor. Stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Apricot Brandy Sour
cocktail.instructions: Pour apricot brandy. Add lemon juice. Fill in with orange juice and add ice cubes. Shake.

cocktail.name: Blue Ed
cocktail.instructions: Fill 16oz glass with Ice. Add liquor. Fill with sour.

cocktail.name: Alien Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Add Butterscotch first, layer Irish cream on top, and pour in melon liqueur.

cocktail.name: Italian Nut
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Swirl
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, amaretto and ice cream in blender. Pour into glass, and gently pour in jigger of chambord, being careful to swirl the chambord with straw or stirring stick to produce the desired effect.

cocktail.name: Italian Stinger
cocktail.instructions: Fill Old-fashioned glass with ice. Add Brandy and Galliano. Stir and garnish with wedge of lime.

cocktail.name: Mountain Cider High
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add the Vodka, then the cider and finaly add the Mountain Dew to taste.

cocktail.name: Stinky Weasel
cocktail.instructions: Put Tequila into shot glass. Add 151 rum and Lemon Juice. Add sugar and stir slightly.

cocktail.name: T-52
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Green Alien
cocktail.instructions: Shake midori, lemon juice and lime juice with ice, pour in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill up with sprite and soda according your taste. Garnish with lime wedge, add straw.

cocktail.name: Alabama Slammer #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with a few ice cubes and pour into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Girlie Martini
cocktail.instructions: Coat the inside of a chilled cocktail glass with dry vermouth. In a mixing glass filled half way with crushed ice, combine vodka, champagne and maraschino liqueur. Stir and strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and a maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer.

cocktail.name: Amarita
cocktail.instructions: Pour Amaretto and margarita mix over ice. Stir well and serve.

cocktail.name: Patagonian Black Bush
cocktail.instructions: Pour genever add Fernet Branca. Add a dash of sour mix.

cocktail.name: Gangreen
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Irish Highball
cocktail.instructions: Pour whiskey over ice. Fill with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Summer Fling
cocktail.instructions: Layer Blue Curacao and Bailey's in a shot glass over crushed ice. Mix to drink.

cocktail.name: Green Coconut
cocktail.instructions: Combine in shaker with ice and pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Green Eyed Blonde
cocktail.instructions: Layer carefully in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Beach Bum
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Yoda
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Sour Mix and Blue Curacao together in a shaker, or if you don't have a shaker, two identical glasses will work if you are careful. Use more or less Blue Curacao depending on how green your Sour mix was to begin with. Once those are mixed into a nice green color, add the Midori and then the Pucker. Finally add the splash of Vodka, and mix a couple more times, then pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Jackson 5
cocktail.instructions: Mix the shots of Rum, Vodka, Amaretto over ice, add a dash of Sour Mix, then fill the rest with Cranberry Juice.

cocktail.name: Watermelon Crawl #2
cocktail.instructions: Half fill glass with ice cubes. Add liquor and fill with Mountain Dew.

cocktail.name: Kinda Tasty
cocktail.instructions: Put in highball glass with ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Army Green
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a shot glass. A chaser may be needed.

cocktail.name: Bye Bye Bahamas
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum and punch. Stir. Float banana liqueur. Garnish with pineapple, orange slice and maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Red Hurricane
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Betty Paige
cocktail.instructions: Mix the gin and vermouth like you would a normal martini. Pour into cocktail glass and add cherry liqueur. Garnish with cherry.

cocktail.name: The Big Robowski
cocktail.instructions: Throw the five shots into a glass, and add the coke or pepsi. Some ice may be necessary.

cocktail.name: Slammin' Sammy
cocktail.instructions: Add amaretto and triple sec to ice-filled glass. Pour in orange juice and top off with apple-cranberry juice to taste. Stir.

cocktail.name: Pink Russian
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquor in a glass with ice. Fill with milk or cream. Shake.

cocktail.name: Nagel Nectar
cocktail.instructions: Combine butterscotch schnapps and milk in glass of ice.

cocktail.name: The Colombian
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass, or just pour straight into glass.

cocktail.name: Alpine Sprite
cocktail.instructions: Pour and stir. Add ice if desired.

cocktail.name: The Bartman
cocktail.instructions: Add rum and Mountain Dew to glass. Then add enough Maui to make the drink bright green.

cocktail.name: The Jumpin' Black Jack
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour in both liquors, a quick stir, serve it up.

cocktail.name: The Dangerous Dave
cocktail.instructions: Combine Tequila, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice in a blender. A quick blast to blend ingredients. Fill blender to top with ice. Blend on high speed until it's like a slurpy. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Stripper
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass half full of ice. Add Schnapps and Juice. Add the Cream and stir.

cocktail.name: Grapes of Wrath
cocktail.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour blue curacao and vodka into glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with 1/2 cranberry juice and 1/2 grape juice. Then fill the rest of the glass with coke. Add a splash of pineapple at the top and then shake thourghly.

cocktail.name: Blue Dragon
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and blue curacao with crushed ice, shake or stir, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with orange slice and cherries.

cocktail.name: Meiner
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and fill with orange juice, leaving room for the Campari. Stir a little bit. Add a slice of orange, then pour the Campari gently on the slice.

cocktail.name: Voodoo Lady
cocktail.instructions: Pour triple sec, cognac, and lemon juice over ice. Shake and strain. Pour into cocktail glass. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Slugger's Delight
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Rock & Rye into a glass with ice. While the Rock & Rye is still fizzing, quickly add the 151 proof rum. Stir thouroughly before drinking. (Heavy concentrations of 151 have been known to cause a few sore throats.) Enjoy!!!

cocktail.name: Gailwarning
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add Sprite and top with lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktail.name: Chambord Kamikaze
cocktail.instructions: Muddle lime in a shaker. Add ice and all other ingredients. Shake vigorously. Strain into a glass.

cocktail.name: Vesper #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour Gin, Vodka, and Vermouth over crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake gently until ice cold. Strain mixture over a martini glass. Run outside of lemon twist around the inside of the martini glass.

cocktail.name: Mandarin Crush
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add Absolut Mandarin, then fill with Orange Crush or some other orange soda.

cocktail.name: Sabra
cocktail.instructions: Chill together in the shaker and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Scotch Toddy
cocktail.instructions: In a standard coffee mug put the scotch, honey and tea bag. Pour boiling hot water to fill mug. Steep for about one or two minutes. Then remove and dispose of tea bag.

cocktail.name: Irish Cream, Home Made #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until well stirred. Great in your favorite drink recipes or straight as a dessert. Drink contents within two weeks. Some ingredients are perishable. Store in an airtight container so you can shake it before each use. The chocolate settles at the bottom.

cocktail.name: Crushed Orange
cocktail.instructions: Pour Cointreau, sweetened lime juice, and Absolut Mandarin vodka over 8 ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. If available, garnish with a slice of fresh orange on glass rim. Serve immediately while it is still extremely cold.

cocktail.name: Flying Squirrel
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with crushed ice. Pour tequila and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix and lime juice. Fill the rest with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Flying Teetsie Fly
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with ice. Pour gin and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix. Pour to top with tonic water. Mix lightly.

cocktail.name: Half & Half
cocktail.instructions: Fill a pint glass half full with Harp. Slowly fill the remainder of the glass with Guiness, pouring slowly over the back side of a spoon. It should layer nicely.

cocktail.name: Slippery Eggs
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingrediants well so the drink is the original color of the eggnog.

cocktail.name: Liquid Rocher
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cordial glass. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Dream
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until drink is smooth. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Florida Pina Colada
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend 1 minute or until smooth. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Trogg's Nog
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquor over ice, fill with eggnog, and stir.

cocktail.name: Mojambo Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix all in a big tub. Chill with bags of ice. Add sugar to taste if desired.

cocktail.name: B-69
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients to shaker with cubed ice, stir till shaker frosts, strain into rocks glass.

cocktail.name: Brian Sinnott Family Punch - Leaded
cocktail.instructions: Mix Kool-Aid, juice, lemonaid, sugar, and water. Add booze and ice cubes and let cool. Add champange and ginger ale before serving. Adjust punch to party mood with more vodka.

cocktail.name: Brian Sinnott Family Punch - Unleaded
cocktail.instructions: Mix Kool-Aid, juice, lemonaid, sugar, and water. Add ice cubes and let cool. Add ginger ale before serving.

cocktail.name: Vaughn Purple Haze
cocktail.instructions: Add vodka, and Razzmatazz liquor. Fill rest of glass with cranberry juice. Mix it!

cocktail.name: Dirk Diggler
cocktail.instructions: Add Jgermeister, and fill rest of glass with Thomas Kemper Root beer. Mix and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Hakkespett
cocktail.instructions: Layer Cointreau and Chartreuse in the glass. Ignite with a match, lick the palm of your hand and cover the glass with it. Shake it a little bit after the glass has fastened itself. Remove your hand slowly while inhaling the air inside, shot the entire contents, put two fingers in your mouth, inhale sharply and deeply, and then try to say: "Hakkespett!" (In English: "Woodpecker!") Good luck!

cocktail.name: Conga Line
cocktail.instructions: Shake.

cocktail.name: Orange Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles.

cocktail.name: La Cafe
cocktail.instructions: Blend. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

cocktail.name: Czech Collaborator
cocktail.instructions: Mix both liquors well, and pour into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Blonde
cocktail.instructions: Stir gently with a swizzle stick before serving.

cocktail.name: Chill Out Shock (C.O.S)
cocktail.instructions: First pour the chilled schnapps and than carefully layer the hot espresso on top of it. Insert a straw into the glass and place it on the connection point between the two layers and drink it from there.

cocktail.name: Red Melon
cocktail.instructions: Ppour vodka, melon and peach schnapps over ice. Top with the sprite, stir well, add 1 dash of the grenadine and serve. Garnish with a slice of lemon (or lime), or a piece of melon.

cocktail.name: Sweet Solution
cocktail.instructions: Fill a tall glass or cup with ice cubes, about 1/3 of the way full. Add the shots of tequila, adding more or less depending on the size of the cup. Then fill up most of the cup with raspberry lemonade, and add the frozen orange juice concentrate. Mix it well with a spoon until everything is well blended.

cocktail.name: Rip Griffin
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in glass, add peppermint schapps, fill with orange juice, stir, add cherry.

cocktail.name: Whistling Gypsy
cocktail.instructions: Layer Tia Maria, Bailey's Irish Cream, Vodka (Stolichnaya) in that order in a doubleshot glass(3oz).

cocktail.name: Sweet Surrender
cocktail.instructions: Start by rubbing an orange slice over the top of your champagne flute and dip it in sugar. Then, shake the peach brandy and orange juice with ice and strain. Pour into the sugar rimmed flute and fill with chilled champagne.

cocktail.name: Baltic Murder Mystery
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and creme de cassis in cocktail glass and fill with 7-up. If it is too sweet, try soda water. A slice of lemon compliments the drink quite nicely.

cocktail.name: Jack Voigt
cocktail.instructions: Put in any order in shot glass, preferably Captain first.

cocktail.name: Tequila Twilight
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass 1/3 full of tequila and then the rest with the cranberry juice, leaving enough room for the shot of grape juice.

cocktail.name: Patats
cocktail.instructions: Blend Amaretto, Rum and Curacao then pour in a glass with ice. Add orange juice, then splash with grenadine.

cocktail.name: Beakers Blue
cocktail.instructions: Add ice cubes, stir, and garnish with cheery.

cocktail.name: Irish Cup O' Joe
cocktail.instructions: Pour Baileys and chocolate syrup in coffee mug. Fill with hot coffee, stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Duke's Nightmare
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice and pour into shot glasses. The colder the shot the smoother it goes down. A dash of 7-up or sprite may be added to extend the shot for more than three.

cocktail.name: Lemonade Lush
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in a glass filled with ice and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Hyper-Active Apple
cocktail.instructions: In Irish coffee mug pour chilled caramel, then slowly pour one shot of chilled apple shnapps over caramel. Slowly add steamed milk, pour espresso through steamed milk exceedingly slowly, top with whip cream or foam. It should come out to be a 4 layer happily alcoholic Latte.

cocktail.name: Crooked Golf Cart
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass to top with ice. Pour Cranberry juice to about the halfway point. Then, pour in amaretto and continue to fill glass to top with cranberry juice. Throw a splash of rum in at the top and stir lightly. Make sure and drink over the lime, it adds an awesome flavor!

cocktail.name: Creamy Crispy Crunch
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice (drink should be a bit foamy). Pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Green Beaver
cocktail.instructions: layer in a shotglass.

cocktail.name: Cinco de Rob-o
cocktail.instructions: Start with a pint glass filled 3/4 with ice. Add the tequila, triple sec, and sweet and sour. The glass should be about 1/2 full. Add the ginger ale, and stir well.

cocktail.name: Fox Poison
cocktail.instructions: Begin with Vodka, then Blue Curacao. After that, add the Lime liqueur. Mix in the Grenadine. Stir gently. Fill up with Sprite and put in some ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Black Rose Bacardi
cocktail.instructions: Shake or stir, pour it into a cocktail glass, add some crushed ice and serve.

cocktail.name: Passoa Sweet Dreams
cocktail.instructions: Shake.

cocktail.name: Cran-Razz
cocktail.instructions: Place ice cubes in glass. Add cranberry juice, then orange vodka.

cocktail.name: Irish Griep
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add blue curacao and sour mix. Top off with cola. Stir until a greenish/blue mixture is obtained.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Valentine
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Captain Climer
cocktail.instructions: Stir well.

cocktail.name: Mussolini
cocktail.instructions: Mix and pour into shot glass(es).
Add each ingredient one by one to shot glass, and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Raspberry Trouffle
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, add Amaretto, and balance with Cream. Shake. Serve with Straw. Garnish with Cherry

cocktail.name: Southern Frost
cocktail.instructions: Mix together over ice.

cocktail.name: Flyin' Hawaiian
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori, rum, and pineapple juice into shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice. Pour in Sprite and stir lightly.

cocktail.name: Seattle Smog
cocktail.instructions: Pour shots into mason jar filled with ice. Fill 2/3 of remaining with cranberry juice and top with orange juice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Irish Cactus
cocktail.instructions: Pour Irish Cream and Tequila over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Volcano
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Nicolalas
cocktail.instructions: Mix Absolut Mandrin with Passoa in a highball glass. Put ice in the glass and fill it up with orange juice

cocktail.name: Mexican Cherry
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Winter Breeze
cocktail.instructions: Pour the three shots of liquor, Vanilla Schnapps, Creme de Cacao, and Irish Creme, into the mug. Fill the rest of the glass with milk. Stir the milk and liquors in the glass and serve.

cocktail.name: The Graduate
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice, strain.

cocktail.name: Ash Blonde
cocktail.instructions: Shake lillet and cointreau with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Add splash of vermouth for color.

cocktail.name: Nolan
cocktail.instructions: Add the three ingredients, and mix gently.

cocktail.name: Santa Fe
cocktail.instructions: In a highball or tall glass full of ice, pour a full shot of your favorite Tequila. Fill the glass almost to the top with 7-Up Add Triple Sec, and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktail.name: Rum Runner #2
cocktail.instructions: Freeze in blender and serve in 12 Oz. glass.

cocktail.name: Captain Morgan's Steamy Applecolada Dream
cocktail.instructions: Start with hot or steamed apple cider. Add equal parts apple schnapps, spiced rum and coconut rum. Stir.

cocktail.name: Watercolour
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquors together and add pineapple juice. Garnish with a cherry or a chunk of pineapple.

cocktail.name: Mean Green Machine
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: The Original Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish: lime or lemon slice

cocktail.name: Black Cactus
cocktail.instructions: Pour Tequila and blackberry brandy together. Add club soda. Drink like a shooter.

cocktail.name: Black Wolf
cocktail.instructions: Add chartreuse first and then sambuca. Top with tabasco.

cocktail.name: Jack Rose
cocktail.instructions: Shake with crushed ice and strain.

cocktail.name: Nalgaa
cocktail.instructions: Get a glass with 4 ice cubes, pour cherry liqueur into the glass, followed by the Campari. Add 7-Up and serve.

cocktail.name: Junior Mint
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients with ice, shake, and strain into old fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Sunshine Smile
cocktail.instructions: Shake Vodka and Orange Juice. Top glass with Champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Cinnamon Cream
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Lemon Celebration
cocktail.instructions: Shake gently with ice (the Champangne will fizz). Strain into a martini glass.

cocktail.name: Chocolate-Mint Martini
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, then pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with chocolate stick and mint sprig.

cocktail.name: Georgia Peach Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Fill collins glass with ice, add Vodka, Gin, and Rum. Fill with Sweet and Sour. Pour Peach Schnapps on top.

cocktail.name: Christmas Pudding
cocktail.instructions: In a 6 2/3 Paris Goblet add Southern Comfort and then Drambuie. Top up with Draught Guinness

cocktail.name: Blue Knickers
cocktail.instructions: Shake the Vodka, Blue Curacao, Galliano and pineapple juice in a shaker. Pour into glass and add a layer of cream to the top. Serve with a straw and an orange wedge. Drink is to be sipped through the straw.

cocktail.name: Rugburn
cocktail.instructions: Stir or shake ingredients together: serve with ice in old-fashioned glass or strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: The Dark Side
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in mixer, pour into highball glass. Optional - Frost glass with chocolate syrup before pouring.

cocktail.name: Charmer
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Rod on the Rocks
cocktail.instructions: Pour peach schnapps over ice. Fill with apple cider. Stir lightly.

cocktail.name: Jagerbeer Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Pour the beer into a glass, then drop the shot of Jgermeister into it (shot glass optional)

cocktail.name: Golden Delicious
cocktail.instructions: Pour sparkling apple cider into a glass. Pour the shot of Goldschlager. Stir.

cocktail.name: Mike's Chocolate Pudding
cocktail.instructions: First add ice to 3/4 full. Add Kahlua and Irish Cream. Then add coke. Add cream. Stir together. Top off with small shot of whip cream.

cocktail.name: Mike's Eggnog Wonderful
cocktail.instructions: Pour Eggnog in glass. Stir in Amaretto. Float Kahlua on top. Add small shot of whipped cream, then sprinkle nutmeg on top.

cocktail.name: Nuts 'n Holly
cocktail.instructions: Pour over Ice in mixing glass, shake and serve straight up.

cocktail.name: Vampire
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker over ice. Serve as shots in a highball (rocks) glass.

cocktail.name: Rythym & Blues
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Creeping Death
cocktail.instructions: Shake well.

cocktail.name: Dignified Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Use Citron or other Citrus flavored vodka. Mix in highball glass and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Daylon's Bedtime
cocktail.instructions: Pour vanilla vodka into ice filled glass. Add Triple Sec. Add Soda to taste. Mix with straw.

cocktail.name: Frisky Witch
cocktail.instructions: Pour into glass, stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Irish Float
cocktail.instructions: Float irish cream on top of the cola.

cocktail.name: Kahlua Twist
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Tequila, and Kahlua. Fill the rest with chocolate milk. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Northern Europe Mongrel
cocktail.instructions: Layer vodka and irish cream in a shot glass. Pour beer to fill.

cocktail.name: Midori Jello Shots
cocktail.instructions: Warm the bottle of Midori so that it is hot to the touch, by first loosening the cap half way, then set the entire bottle in a saucepan half full of water on high heat. Meanwhile, bring 1 cup of water to a rolling boil then stir in the Jello and Gelatin until dissolved. Stir in hot Midori. Pour mixture into a flat bottom pan and slice into cubes when cooled, or place in small cups.

cocktail.name: Five Star General
cocktail.instructions: Just put all of them in a shot glass, and put it down.

cocktail.name: Kona Village Mai Tai
cocktail.instructions: Mix first 6 ingredients in pitcher. Fill glasses with ice. Pour rum mixture over. Garnish with pineapple wedges, if desired.

cocktail.name: Southern Hospitality
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients into a sauce pan. Warm mixture on stove, until all flavors have steeped together (about 5 min.). Do not let it boil! Remove cinnamon sticks. Serve while still hot.

cocktail.name: Carolina Dream
cocktail.instructions: Blend with two cups of ice, until all chunks of peach and ice are gone.

cocktail.name: 3rd Wheel
cocktail.instructions: Chill with ice and pour in glass

cocktail.name: The Head
cocktail.instructions: Place ice in glass to rim. Add alcohol followed by cranberry juice, stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Tropical Martini
cocktail.instructions: Pour Amaretto into a chilled glass, then add Malibu Rum. Stir and serve. The ingredients should be will chilled before use.

cocktail.name: Johnny K8
cocktail.instructions: Pour first 3 ingredients in shaker and shake. Pour over ice and top up with tonic. Then layer with blue curacao.

cocktail.name: Mistolin
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass half-way with ice. Pour the Vodka, add the orange juice and finally pour the cranberry juice. Stir gently.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Martini #3
cocktail.instructions: Mix vanilla vodka and chocolate liqueur in shaker filled with ice. Strain into either wine glass or martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: 5 Pm
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum and Cointreau into tea cup, fill with English hot tea and top with milk.

cocktail.name: African Lullaby
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in blender with one cup crushed ice. Pour into glass and garnish with red Cherry.

cocktail.name: Spic
cocktail.instructions: Pour in all ingredients then mix completely so that the drink turns a red color. Add more Grenadine for a sweeter, thicker taste.

cocktail.name: Dell Boy
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients except Sprite. Pour into Highball glass over ice cubes and fill with Sprite. Garnish with red Cherry and Lime wheel.

cocktail.name: Ultra-Marine
cocktail.instructions: Add Blue curacao then top up with Champagne and garnish with a grape or strawberry.

cocktail.name: Blavod Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into martini glass. Add cherry.

cocktail.name: Russian Cream
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and kahlua into old-fashioned glass over ice. Stir. Add irish cream and light cream.

cocktail.name: The Mummy
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, triple sec, and lemon juice in an old fashioned glass half filled with ice. Top off with club soda. Stir.

cocktail.name: Daiquiri #2
cocktail.instructions: Ingrediants should be shaken over shaved ice then strained into an Old Fashioned glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Neon Nightmare
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients into mixing tin full of ice. Shake vigorously and strain into glass. Garnish with an Orange flag.

cocktail.name: Cruz Azul (Blue Cross)
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Orange Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Combine tequila, triple sec, and orange juice over ice, and stir. Top it off with a splash of lime juice or sour mix.

cocktail.name: Nerds
cocktail.instructions: Put a few ice cubes in the highball glass, add Midori and Blue Curacao then fill up the rest of the glass with lemonade.

cocktail.name: Super Smoothy
cocktail.instructions: Chunk up the two bananas and put them in the bottom of a blender. Place the two large wedges of pineapple, strawberries and ice on top. Add rum if desired. Puree until smooth (a little water or fruit juice might be required). Pour into glass and serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Toby's Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Jameson and Kahlua into a coffe mug, top off with hot fresh brewed coffee, finish with a tablespoon of fresh whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Butterballs
cocktail.instructions: Use a double shot glass. Pour the Butterscotch Schnapps first, then the coffee liqueur.
Combine blue curacao, vodka, tonic water, and splash of lime juice. Stir. Fill with sprite. Stir. Add pineapple slice and ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Red Hot Lover
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients for couple of seconds. Pour into ice filled hurricane glass.

cocktail.name: Bold Gold Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Combine all in a shaker with adequate ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail.name: Creamy Grasshopper
cocktail.instructions: Blend until smooth. Drink should have a thick, shake-like consistency.

cocktail.name: Ginger Swing
cocktail.instructions: Pour curacao over ice in a highball glass, then fill the rest of the way up with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Pierced Navel
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice, stir.

cocktail.name: The Sweating Monk
cocktail.instructions: Shake it, pour it over ice, and serve.

cocktail.name: The Valentine
cocktail.instructions: Mix in all ingredients and stir

cocktail.name: Lennart #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour pear brandy over ice in glass. Fill with ginger ale. Add a slice f lime.

cocktail.name: The Berserker
cocktail.instructions: Pour shot of Amaretto into glass and fill with pineapple juice. Mixing is optional.

cocktail.name: Electric Smurf
cocktail.instructions: Put three ice cubes in glass then add Malibu and Blue Curacao. Fill glass half with sprite half with Pineapple Juice. Stir and Serve.

cocktail.name: The Bianca Pop
cocktail.instructions: Pour coconut rum first then add amaretto.

cocktail.name: Campesina
cocktail.instructions: Cut the the lime into 8 wedges and place in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with granulated white sugar and crush together. Fill with crushed ice, add tequila. Serve with two small straws.

cocktail.name: Greenland
cocktail.instructions: Shake over ice, strain into a highball glass. Top with fresh orange juice. Garnish with orange, cherry, mint leaf and straws.

cocktail.name: Cable Guide
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a pitcher or individually: Pour 1 part vodka, 1 part mango juice, and top with 2 parts Fresca. Pour over ice in a tall/large glass.

cocktail.name: Mexican Killer
cocktail.instructions: Serve chilled.

cocktail.name: Penguin
cocktail.instructions: Built, lots of ice!

cocktail.name: Frozen Girl Scout
cocktail.instructions: Blend. Add more or less milk to get a shake consistancy.

cocktail.name: LeFreak
cocktail.instructions: Fill 1/2 glass with ice, add both liquors. Fill glass with milk or half-and-half.

cocktail.name: Candy Apple #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour Amaretto and Butterscotch in a glass with ice. Fill with apple juice.

cocktail.name: Homewrecker
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients together and pour over cracked ice

cocktail.name: Orange Bliss
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Troutie
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka first, add grapefruit juice, and fill with about 6 ounces of 7-up or Sprite.

cocktail.name: Sugar Kick
cocktail.instructions: Add ice, shake well. serve with cherry, lemon (dipped in sugar), and straw.

cocktail.name: American Pie
cocktail.instructions: Pour grenadine in glass. Add straw and ice carefully. Fill 1/3 of glass with sweet and sour. Add Vodka. Fill glass almost to the rim with 7-up. Add Blue Curacao. Do not stir.

cocktail.name: Frangeilico Float
cocktail.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Buttery Nipple with a Cherry Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Layer Bailey's on top of Butterscotch. Then you take the cherry liqueur along with a cherry and place the cherry on top of the spoon, while pouring the cherry liquer into the shot.

cocktail.name: Peach Tart
cocktail.instructions: Shakem up and serve

cocktail.name: Pirate Float
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients in order listed. Stir if desired.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Fields
cocktail.instructions: Blend strawberries into 4 oz puree, add 2 oz of rum (and some sugar if you want to) and blend for a couple of second. Pour into sugar rimmed glass. Mix the orange juice and 1 oz of rum, and gently layer on top in glass.

cocktail.name: Mint Martini
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and creme de menthe. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaves.

cocktail.name: Kahlua Butterball
cocktail.instructions: Start with Kahlua, add Butherscotch Schnapps to taste, fill glass with milk

cocktail.name: Stiff Pounder
cocktail.instructions: Take a 12oz bottle of beer and drink the neck of the bottle. Pour 1 or more shots of Jgermeister into the neck. Swish it around a little bit and presto, instant drunk.

cocktail.name: Green Ferrit
cocktail.instructions: 3/4 fill the pint glass with cider. Add the Blue Curacao and fill the glass with cider.

cocktail.name: El Floridita
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

cocktail.name: Hemingway Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: White Russian #2
cocktail.instructions: Serve over ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Blueberry Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Blend with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Masala Chai #2
cocktail.instructions: Put water in a saucepan. Add the cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves and bring to a boil. Cover, turn heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the milk and sugar and bring to simmer again. Throw in the tea leaves, cover, and turn off the heat. After 2 minutes, strain the tea into two cups and serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Fish House Punch
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve sugar in some of the water. Add juice and the rest of the water, and stir. Add liquor 2-3 hours before serving, and refridgerate. Serve in a punch bowl with ice.

cocktail.name: Frisco
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktail.name: Maiden's Prayer #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a chilled wine or cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Milk Punch
cocktail.instructions: Shake liquor and milk with cracked ice and strain into a chilled highball glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top

cocktail.name: Petit Zinc
cocktail.instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Picon Limon
cocktail.instructions: Stir Amer Picon, creme de cassis and lime juice with cracked ice and strain into a large chilled wine glass (should hold 16 ounces). Fill with soda water and garnish with a twist of lemon.

cocktail.name: Far East
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain in Old-fashion glasses. Serve on the rocks with a Cocktail cherry on a stick and two straws. Decorate with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Skinhead Paramedic
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients in a collins glass. Do not stir. Garnish with a lime wedge or an ear of baby corn.

cocktail.name: The Drink Without a Name
cocktail.instructions: Stir with cracked ice ans strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

cocktail.name: Duncan MacLeod
cocktail.instructions: Mix the alcohols in a Beer mug, and add the coke to fill. Mix gently, serve cold.

cocktail.name: Boku's Blend
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in the blender and blend until slushy. Serve very cold.

cocktail.name: Blackula
cocktail.instructions: Pour Blavod Vodka in hurricane glass with ice. Pour in Bloody Mary mix. Add jalepeno pickle for spicy taste

cocktail.name: Y2K Shot #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix shot over ice in a mixing glass. Strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Lusty Lisa
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a shaker and pour!

cocktail.name: Hunter Mountain
cocktail.instructions: Combine Bailey's and Frangelico over ice and stir. Then add vodka and stir again. Then serve.

cocktail.name: Shag by the shore
cocktail.instructions: Build the midori and orange into the collins glass, filled with ice, then pour peach schnapps and cranberry into mixing tin and shake with ice. Strain into glass so it floats above orange & midori. Float Blavod vodka on top.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Covered Cherries
cocktail.instructions: Layer carefully using the back of a spoon. Grenadine first, then Kahlua and then Bailey's.

cocktail.name: Pink n' Tart
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktal glass. Can also be prepared in old fashioned glass half-full of ice and stirred very well.

cocktail.name: Bankers Doom
cocktail.instructions: Put the spirits in together then add the soda water. Stir.

cocktail.name: The Spiff
cocktail.instructions: Stir the Amaretto with the Dr. Pepper. Pour over Ice cubes and add two Cherries. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Seduction on the Rocks
cocktail.instructions: Pour Butterscotch schnapps and orange juice into glass, then add lemon-lime soda. Add one to two ice cubes before serving.

cocktail.name: Lime Chu-Hai
cocktail.instructions: Pour the shochu and lime cordial over ice. Stir, and fill the glass with soda water.

cocktail.name: A Dixon Thing
cocktail.instructions: Mix Sloe Gin and Amaretto in glass.

cocktail.name: Crackhouse
cocktail.instructions: Put both ingredients in a shaker and shake over ice.

cocktail.name: Chambord Royale
cocktail.instructions: Should be shaked over ice. Garnished with a lemon. More pineapple than cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Apricot Breeze
cocktail.instructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add Vodka and apricot nectar to glass then fill with tonic. Stir.

cocktail.name: Schwimmer
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together in mixer, chill, then serve in shot glass

cocktail.name: Splurge
cocktail.instructions: Start with glass of soda then add other ingredients and stir.

cocktail.name: Big Booty Shake
cocktail.instructions: Blend.

cocktail.name: Green Voodoo
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients and ice to mixing tin. Shake 3 to 5 times and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Banana Russian
cocktail.instructions: Fill Cocktail glass with ice. Shake Stoli Vanil, Creme de Banane, and half & half. Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Bird of Paradise
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingrediants, stir, and serve.

cocktail.name: Coconut Pie
cocktail.instructions: Serve with or without ice.

cocktail.name: Haus Special
cocktail.instructions: Ice is optional, but the drink is preferrably served cold. Garnish with Cherry.

cocktail.name: The Usual
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Guapo
cocktail.instructions: Fill coffee mug 3/4 full, add Irish cream, Kahlua and then Butterscotch Schnapps.

cocktail.name: Homemade Southern Comfort
cocktail.instructions: Peel, pit and slice peaches. Place in saucepan. Add sugar, stir well to combine. Warm over low heat until sugar is well dissolved and peaches are juicy. Place mixture into aging container. Add lemon peels and alcohol, stirring to combine. Cover container and put in a cool, dark place (or refrigerate if necessary). Stand for 1 week, stirring occasionally. Strain and filter: press out liquid from peaches with the back of a wooden spoon. Strain again. Ready for cooking now, ready for drinking in another month.

cocktail.name: Mandarine Summertime
cocktail.instructions: Pour Mandarine Napoleon and gin. Fill with orange juice and add a touch of grenadine. Add ice cubes and garnish with a slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Mandarine Passion
cocktail.instructions: Pour Mandarine Napoleon and gin. Fill with passion fruit juice. Add ice cubes and garnish with a slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Napotonic
cocktail.instructions: Pour Mandarine Napoleon and fill with tonic. Add some ice cubes and garnish with orange peels.

cocktail.name: Mandarine Bourbon
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Imperial Moka
cocktail.instructions: Shake

cocktail.name: Midori Green Russian
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Midori Sour
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain. Garnish with a slice of orange. Ice is optional.

cocktail.name: Midori Mimosa
cocktail.instructions: Pour Midori and sweet&sour. Add champagne.

cocktail.name: Delicias de la Habana
cocktail.instructions: Mix blue curacao with rum and ice. pour it into a glass and add the rest of the ingredients slowly. Granish with a pice of peach, a cherry and a piece of celery.

cocktail.name: Crocodile Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice and mix well. Garnish with a lime wheel and a straw.

cocktail.name: Orange Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and Orancio, add Sprite and garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Tropical Heat
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange spiral.

cocktail.name: Orancio Royal
cocktail.instructions: Pour Orancio into a champagne flute and fill with Brut Champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Black and Blue
cocktail.instructions: Layer in order.

cocktail.name: Asphalt Road
cocktail.instructions: Mix and shoot straight away.

cocktail.name: Ario Bomb
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice in glass. Garnish with 3 cherries.

cocktail.name: Dirty Mop
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice.

cocktail.name: Bellini
cocktail.instructions: Pour peach puree into glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a peach slice.

cocktail.name: Bombay Bellini
cocktail.instructions: Pour mango puree into glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a mango slice.

cocktail.name: Hummingbird #2
cocktail.instructions: Blend.

cocktail.name: RumBubble
cocktail.instructions: Mix alcohol over glass of ice. Stir. Add Club soda and stir gently. Serve.

cocktail.name: Tahitian Treat
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add liquor, juice, and then Sprite.

cocktail.name: The Seminole
cocktail.instructions: First pour Goldschlager into a shot glass, then add grenadine.

cocktail.name: Amaretto Stone Sweet
cocktail.instructions: Blend with ice.

cocktail.name: Kurant Collins
