cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Absolut Kurant, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda.

cocktail.name: Tampico
cocktail.instructions: Pour into glass and fill with tonic wafer. Garnish with an orange slice or peel.

cocktail.name: Pink Ranger
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker, chill, then serve in shot glass

cocktail.name: After Eighteen
cocktail.instructions: Pour Kahlua and Creme de Menthe, then fill the rest of the glass with chocolate milk.

cocktail.name: Absolute Heaven
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients and shake over ice.

cocktail.name: Swervin Mervin
cocktail.instructions: Mix rum, gin, triple sec,v odka, and midori. Fill with equal parts pineapple and orange juice, top with grenadine. Shake well and serve on ice. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag.

cocktail.name: Flaming Ale
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice, pour in vodka, midori and triple-sec. Fill to top with ginger ale and spoon in (do not mix) grenadine.

cocktail.name: Wonder Woman
cocktail.instructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add ingredients in order listed. Don't stir! Should have three layers; green, orange, and red. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Montana Tornado
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into mason jar. Stir.

cocktail.name: The Equator
cocktail.instructions: Layer ingredients in the exact order. Grenadine should sit on top for a little bit before sliding down the inside of the shot glass.

cocktail.name: Fluorescent Dream
cocktail.instructions: Pour into gass half filled with ice. Stir well.

cocktail.name: The Army John
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Southern Comfort, orange juice and triple sec into the shaker. Squeeze in lime and toss in wedge. Shake vigorously and strain into highball glass over cubed ice.

cocktail.name: Tropical Lullaby
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Could be garnished with a piece of pineapple.

cocktail.name: Kentucky Hot Tub
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker and strain into a shot glass. Voila!

cocktail.name: Hot Scott
cocktail.instructions: Pour together to ensure a good mix.

cocktail.name: Pink Fizzy
cocktail.instructions: Pour Watermelon Pucker over ice half way. Fill to top with Sprite or 7-Up. Stir.

cocktail.name: Italian Surfer
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into ice filled glass. Stir to mix.

cocktail.name: Hybris
cocktail.instructions: Build in a highball glass, on ice. Decorate with lime.

cocktail.name: Nutty Belgian
cocktail.instructions: Serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Double Chocolate
cocktail.instructions: Add both ingredients to shot glass (don't layer). Sprinkle cocoa on top (optional).

cocktail.name: Arctic Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Chill vodka over ice if it's not in your freezer. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and fill with champagne.

cocktail.name: Long Beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix as a Long Island Ice Tea

cocktail.name: French Cosmopolitan
cocktail.instructions: Put the first 5 ingredients, excluding Grenadine, into a shaker, then shake well and strain into a chilled large martini glass. Last, slowly pour a drop of Grenadine into middle of glass and let it fall to bottom and color the stem red. Garnish with Lime Wheel or a Lemon Twist.

cocktail.name: Jager Vacation
cocktail.instructions: Add all three in a shaker or blender, mix with ice.

cocktail.name: Four Twenty
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass.

cocktail.name: Mudskipper
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and ginger ale over ice in a collins glass. Add chocolate syrup and let settle in the bottom. Stir very lightly. Drink should appear dark brown on the bottom and gradate to clear on top.

cocktail.name: Liquid Bubble Gum
cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients in glass

cocktail.name: Pumpkin pie (tavern style)
cocktail.instructions: After adding the Goldschlager, set on fire. Sprinkle cinnamon on the flame to "cook" and for dramatic effect. Blow out and serve.

cocktail.name: Irish Pirate
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Southern Bound Meteor
cocktail.instructions: Use a large shot glass. Remove stem from cherry and drop in glass. Pour in Southern Comfort and Goldschlager. Carefully float in a splash of 151 Rum. With a cigarette lighter ignite 151 Rum on fire and serve. Put out fire before drinking.

cocktail.name: A Little Green Man From Mars
cocktail.instructions: Use a large shot glass. Remove stem from one Mint Green Maraschino Cherry and drop in glass. Pour Jgermeister and Rumple Minze.

cocktail.name: Buried Under An Avalanche
cocktail.instructions: In shot glass, drop in one small ice cube. Pour in Ouzo and then Rumple Minze.

cocktail.name: Equity's Darling
cocktail.instructions: Put the ingredients in the glass and mix it up!

cocktail.name: Sweet Candy Apple
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice (except for the grenadine). Pour grenadine on top.

cocktail.name: The Admiral's Passion
cocktail.instructions: Add the Passoa first, mix the Sprite & juice separately. Add 3 cubes of ice to top it off. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Black and Blue #2
cocktail.instructions: Gently shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Warsaw Waffle
cocktail.instructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass. Stir until syrup is dissolved.

cocktail.name: Liquid Snickers
cocktail.instructions: Pour Creme de cacao, Irish cream and Frangelico liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Top with light cream, stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Straight Jacket
cocktail.instructions: Add Aftershock then Passoa. Fill with orange juice and ice to taste.

cocktail.name: Up all night
cocktail.instructions: Pour Red Bull into a Collins Glass. Pour a shot of Jgermeister into a shot glass. When ready to drink, drop the shot into the collins glass and drink.

cocktail.name: Devil's Advocate
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker mix all ingredients. Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Long Island Ice Tea
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a shaker. Shake 3-4 times. Pour into glass and garnish (optional) with a Lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Sneaky Wesley
cocktail.instructions: Pour all and mix well.

cocktail.name: Butter Nut Scotch
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

cocktail.name: Scottalian
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients except the Grenadine. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice if you like. Drop the Grenadine into the center and serve.

cocktail.name: Tirade
cocktail.instructions: Takes a 2 oz shot glass. First put in the triple sec, then tequila, last the spiced rum.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Add rum, pineapple juice, grenadine and lemon juice, and then fill the rest of the glass, or to your taste,with club soda. Serve with ice.

cocktail.name: Fluffy Duck
cocktail.instructions: 1/4 fill the glass with crushed ice, making sure you glass is cold so the ice does not melt too much. Pour the Creme de Cacao over the ice, followed by the Advocaat. Slowly add the soda, but be careful, it can fizz up over the glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Monk's Butt
cocktail.instructions: Pour Frangelico, Butterscotch Schnapps, and Creme de Cacao over ice. Add milk (or cream) if desired, and stir.

cocktail.name: Johnny on the beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice. garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Monkey La La
cocktail.instructions: Blend until smooth and frothy.

cocktail.name: Russian Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, triple sec, and sour mix in shaker with ice. Strain into chilled glass. Add a dash of grenadine to the top and swirl slightly. Optional garnish of cherry and orange slice.

cocktail.name: Ultimate Mudslide
cocktail.instructions: Place all ingredients, except grated chocolate, in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into glass and sprinkle with grated chocolate

cocktail.name: Fire Fly
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into a glass with ice. Add grenadine and stir.

cocktail.name: Monkey in a tree
cocktail.instructions: Mix rum, creme de banane, grenadine and pineapple juice. Float Midori on top. Blended and served up is great too.

cocktail.name: The Event Horizon
cocktail.instructions: Blend using a high speed blender.

cocktail.name: My Johnson is Ten Inches Long
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shooter glass, (best if made in large amounts)

cocktail.name: Sloughdriver
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add 2 shots of Blavod black vodka. Fill the rest of the glass with orange juice. Sprinkle shredded orange peel on top.

cocktail.name: Whiting Sunset
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, tequila and orange juioce. Finally, add a dash of grenadine.

cocktail.name: Breath Stealer
cocktail.instructions: Add chartreuse and Yukon Jack to 151.

cocktail.name: Sid Vicious
cocktail.instructions: Pour whiskey, gin, vermouth over ice and stir. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, add bitters and worcestershire sauce. Garnish with poppy seeds.

cocktail.name: Roxy Special
cocktail.instructions: Give one good shake, add lemon slice and cherry, and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Orange Crisis
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients in shaker with ice and pour as shots. Shots should have a creamy orange color.

cocktail.name: White Ape
cocktail.instructions: Make hot chocolate, add Bailey's and ground cinnimon. Float whipped cream on top.

cocktail.name: Screaming Blue Viking
cocktail.instructions: Combine liquors in a shaker of ice and shake. Strain into shot glasses. Partakers must scream "Valhalla!!" before doing the shot. Can also be served on the rocks in a large goblet for the brave warrior.

cocktail.name: S.O.B.
cocktail.instructions: Drink this just like a shot of tequila. Mix the cognac and cointreau together in the shot glass. Lick between your thumb and forefinger and sprinkle sugar on it. Then lick the sugar, drink the shot, and suck on the lemon wedge when you're done.

cocktail.name: Blister
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into glass.

cocktail.name: Under Current
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything except Chambord in a mixing tin, and pour into glass. Layer Chambord on top with a spoon.

cocktail.name: Vernal Equinox
cocktail.instructions: Fill old fashion glass with ice. Add all ingredients and stir.

cocktail.name: Autumnal Equinox
cocktail.instructions: Fill Old Fashioned Glass with ice. Pour ingredients into glass and stir.

cocktail.name: Shamrock Juice
cocktail.instructions: In an Hurricane Glass filled with Ice pour equal amounts of all liquors. Top off with Orange Juice. Garnish with a slice of an Orange and a couple of cherries.

cocktail.name: The Emily Weir
cocktail.instructions: Whack the liquid ingredients in a glass and give it a stir, then add the ice.

cocktail.name: Johanna
cocktail.instructions: Mix and top it with some icecubes.

cocktail.name: The Sabino Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Midori, Malibu, Schnapps, and orange juice into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass and add the grenadine. Garnish with orange wedges and cherries as seen fit.

cocktail.name: Gingervitas
cocktail.instructions: Fill the shaker with ice. Pour one shot of Vodka and one shot of Vermouth. Shake and pour into the glass. Then pour the ginger ale into the glass. Very refreshing.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Honeybee
cocktail.instructions: Pour Barenjaeger in a shot glass and top with Godiva.

cocktail.name: Vanilla Creamsicle
cocktail.instructions: Add all liquers to a glass. Pour in cold milk and stir. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Simple Charm
cocktail.instructions: Stir liquors and strain in to cocktail-glass. Float cream gently on top. Garnish with cinnamon powder.

cocktail.name: Island Jack
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients, except cola, in a mixing tin. Pour over ice and then top with cola.

cocktail.name: Green Creeper
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice.

cocktail.name: Tequila Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Pour a shot of Tequila in glass, and fill with orange juice. Stir.

cocktail.name: A Little Dinghy
cocktail.instructions: Pour the shots into a glass of ice. Then fill the glass with equal parts orange juice, cranberry juice, and pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, an orange slice, and an umbrella.

cocktail.name: Alex Chi-Chi
cocktail.instructions: Shake in an ice filled shaker. Strain and serve.

cocktail.name: Alebrije
cocktail.instructions: First mix some orange juice and pinapple juice in equal parts, and color it with some grenadine (as sweet as you want). This is "conga mix". Fill the glass with ice, add the five licours and mix them, fill the glass with some conga mix and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Acapulco Twister
cocktail.instructions: Mix the lemon, tabasco sauce, clamato juice, salt and pepper. Fill the glass with some ice, add the rum and fill with Corona beer.

cocktail.name: Acapulcos malibu
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add rum and mango juice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Cheshire Cat
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass over ice.

cocktail.name: Lake George Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Shake all except cola. Pour into glass and fill with Pepsi.

cocktail.name: Aggie Banana
cocktail.instructions: Blend ice cream, milk, and frozen bananas until smooth. Add Schnapps, blend, and pour.

cocktail.name: Ball Of Fun
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in bowl and stir.

cocktail.name: Yuppidoo
cocktail.instructions: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Highballs Glass.

cocktail.name: Dea Lea
cocktail.instructions: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Cocktail Glass. Serve on the rocks

cocktail.name: Hummingbird
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

cocktail.name: Freddie's Naughty Neopolitan
cocktail.instructions: Layer in a shot glass. First Kahlua, then white creme de cacao, and finally Baja Rosa Tequila.

cocktail.name: George & Ginger
cocktail.instructions: Pour George Dickel over ice into a tall glass. Add Ginger Ale, and stir.

cocktail.name: Poire Fantastic
cocktail.instructions: Take a Highball glass, pour in the Poire au Cognac. Add Sprite. Put in some ice if you want.

cocktail.name: Irish Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Combine whiskey, sugar and coffee in mug and stir to dissolve. Float cold cream gently on top. Do not mix.

cocktail.name: Sweet Dreams
cocktail.instructions: Make hot chocolate, add malibu rum and stir. Top with marshmallows and whipped cream. Sprinkle cinnamon or nutmeg on top and garnish with chocolate shavings.

cocktail.name: Nord-Norsk Depresjon
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Royal Bill
cocktail.instructions: Pour chilled Poire William in to champagne flute, add Champagne to top. Garnish with half an orange slice.

cocktail.name: Summit County Suicide
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Love Game
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add batida de coco and then slowly add the Passoa. Now add the grenadine slowly, so is goes under the batida. You should get three layers: red, white, red. ok? Serve orange juice, but let the customer mix it, because the colors will mix.

cocktail.name: Southwest Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour the juices first, then top off with the liqueur.

cocktail.name: Romulan Ale #3
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Pink Pitch
cocktail.instructions: Mix on low speed. Serve in chilled glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Nurse
cocktail.instructions: Pour in glass. Stir. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Pearl Necklace #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour butterscotch schnapps into a shot glass then add Kahlua. Use a dropper to add rum cream drop by drop on the outside edge of the shot to form a ring or "Pearl Necklace."

cocktail.name: Red Horn
cocktail.instructions: RedRum can either be mixed with the cider, or floated on top. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Magic Punch
cocktail.instructions: fill glass with ice add ingredients then shake

cocktail.name: Flageln
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka into the glass first, then pour the Red Bull slowly into it. Add ice.

cocktail.name: Tropical Pear Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Pour first four ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake until chilled, and well blended. Pour into glass, and add 7-up. Stir to mix.

cocktail.name: The Lindy
cocktail.instructions: Put the 2 shots of Jgermeister in the bottom of a tall beer mug and pour in the surge.

cocktail.name: Cherry Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Mix all parts together and serve cold!

cocktail.name: Chocolate Orgasm
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Glitch
cocktail.instructions: Mix in order listed. The blue splash at the end makes the drink aquamarine colored, which is lovely.

cocktail.name: Jaguar
cocktail.instructions: Mix in highball glass. Ice is optional.

cocktail.name: Suburban Warhead
cocktail.instructions: Mix the Vodka, Tequila, Aftershock, Beer, and Lemonade in a blender. Blend until a smooth frothy substance is achieved. Fill beer mug with drink and prepared to be hit with a Suburban Warhead

cocktail.name: Italian Soda
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka over ice and fill with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Tijuana Carbomb
cocktail.instructions: Pour bottle of corona in a pint glass. Wait for it to settle. Then drop in shot of cuervo, and chug it down.

cocktail.name: Screaming Chocolate Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Shake well and pour over ice, top with cherry or chocolate sprinkles.

cocktail.name: Cloudy Day
cocktail.instructions: Drink the neck of the bottle of Corona. Fill in with tequila and then add lime wedge. Turn bottle over to mix the ingredients, making sure to keep your thumb on the opening, as not to spill.

cocktail.name: Sexy Blue Eyed Boy
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients into blender, blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Batman
cocktail.instructions: Mix all. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Big Bad Voodoo Kooler
cocktail.instructions: Sling Malibu, RedRum and Midori in a highball glass filled with ice. Top off with Orange, pineapple juices and a splash of soda. Mix it up with your swizzle stick and Go Daddy-O!

cocktail.name: Blue Whip
cocktail.instructions: Shake vodka, curacao and o.j. with ice. Top off with Sprite or 7-Up. Garnish with fanned slices of orange floating on top and a straw.

cocktail.name: Oasis
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Cranberry Tart
cocktail.instructions: Pour ice cold cranberry vodka, add ice (the more the better). Top with orange juice and stir gently.

cocktail.name: Double Brit
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient into a double shot glass, they will mix by themselves. Shoot.

cocktail.name: Kansas City Ice Water #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and vodka over ice. Fill with 7-Up. Garnish with lime.

cocktail.name: Dr. Dye's Revenge
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients over ice in this order: Liquors, cranberry juice, ginger ale, aour mix, orange juice, and bitters. Cover and shake well. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Dickel & Dew
cocktail.instructions: Take a large glass and fill with ice. Add 1 part George Dickel Tennessee Whiskey to 2 parts of Mountain Dew.

cocktail.name: South Beach Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into large martini glass. Garnish with twist of orange peel.

cocktail.name: Prickly Pear
cocktail.instructions: Pour cold Cactus Juice schnapps into chilled shot glass. Float Cuervo on top.

cocktail.name: Headhunter
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquors (except beer) in a tall tumbler. Stir in the juices, and shake with ice. Slowly add the beer and stir to blend. Serve in a tall glass or a 1/2 coconut shell with the meat intact.

cocktail.name: Madonna
cocktail.instructions: Stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Tangerine Dream
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Decorate with coffee beans and hearts cut from the rind of a tangerine.

cocktail.name: Evil Corona
cocktail.instructions: Pour (drink) the first 2 oz. of corona, and add 2 oz. of Absolut Citron. Cap top of bottle and turn upside down for about 5 seconds. Serve with a lime wedge.

cocktail.name: From Russia with Love
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Vesper
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with lots of ice until it is extremely cold, then pour and add a large slice of lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Beach Sunday
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and raspberry liqueur over ice. Add cranberry juice, and the freshly squeezed lime juice. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Milk
cocktail.instructions: Shake the milk with the Vanilla, add to the shaker the other ingredients and shake well.

cocktail.name: Little Beer
cocktail.instructions: Pour 43 in shot glass. Layer cream slowly on top so that it resembles the 'head' on a beer.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Sex
cocktail.instructions: Combine vodka and cranberry juice over ice in a shaker. Shake well and strain into shot glass. Top with a splash of 7-Up and serve.

cocktail.name: Sweet Summer
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour in raspberry vodka, fill almost to the top with ginger ale, add a splash of cranberry juice (for pinkish color) and squeeze the lemon. Taste best if shaken.

cocktail.name: Ginny's Slammin' Goddess
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquors over ice. Mix orange juice and grapefruit juice exactly 50/50 in a separate container. Add juice mix to liquors and stir well.

cocktail.name: Ginny's Slammin' Goddess #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquors over ice. Mix orange juice and grapefruit juice exactly 50/50 in a separate container. Fill glass with juice mix and stir well.

cocktail.name: Mexican Hillbilly
cocktail.instructions: Pour mug of Corona then drop in shot of Jack Daniels.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Raspberry Martini
cocktail.instructions: Chill vodka and creme de cacoa. Pour into chilled glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss and fresh raspberry.

cocktail.name: Hairy Jerry
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add dark rum. Fill to top with Papaya Juice.

cocktail.name: Blue Marlin
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice - The consumer of this drink should mix it before drinking.

cocktail.name: Pimp
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass half-full of ice, add Jgermeister, and fill up with Battery.

cocktail.name: Smoked Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix in large pitcher with ice, let stand for a few minutes to chill, then pour into glasses sans ice and add lemon to suit.

cocktail.name: The Vibrator
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquors into ice filled glass. Top off with cranberry and orange juice. Shake. Garnish with two cherries.

cocktail.name: Mandarin Delight
cocktail.instructions: Pour Absolut Mandarin in a glass over ice. Fill with tonic water. Squeeze and drop the wedge of lime or orange into the drink. Stir.

cocktail.name: Becky's Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodkas and fill with cranberrry juice.

cocktail.name: Adios Motherfucker #3
cocktail.instructions: Shake alcohol, then add sprite on top. Served on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Jungle Juice #3
cocktail.instructions: Mix all equal parts, shake, and strain.

cocktail.name: Papaya Driver
cocktail.instructions: Rum first, then Papaya Juice

cocktail.name: Jamaican Green Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Start with the ice cubes. Pour rum and orange juice. Carefully add blue curacao, making sure it falls to the bottom. Layer pineapple vodka on top.

cocktail.name: On My Ass
cocktail.instructions: Poor liqour equally into a shot glass. Give it a quick swirl and top with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Stoli Around the World
cocktail.instructions: Build in a pint glass (preferably), shake and serve with a lemon wedge. Or you can mix in tin and serve over ice.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Russian
cocktail.instructions: Add ice to glass. Pour equal parts raspberry vodka and Kahlua. Fill glass with milk. Shake until frothy.

cocktail.name: Liquid Sex
cocktail.instructions: Put marshmallow in glass, pour vodka over it and add three to four drops of red food coloring. Mix it together with a wire whisk.

cocktail.name: Nightboat to Brasil
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain.

cocktail.name: Jens Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour Bacardi Limn into the glass, then the sprite and the Red Bull. Stir to mix.

cocktail.name: Nightboat to Recife
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and pour into tumbler with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Walk the Plank
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum over ice. Fill with 7-Up. Stir. Garnish with cherries.

cocktail.name: Orange Lion
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Key Lime Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice, strain into 2 shot glasses.

ingredient.name: Rose's sweetened lime juice (or Nellie & Joe's)

cocktail.name: Otter Pop #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain, or or build over ice in a pint glass.

cocktail.name: The Mormon Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Add the vodka and the grape juice first in any order and then fill with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Colorado Coolaid
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with 1 skoop of ice then pour into highball glass

cocktail.name: Cherry Godet
cocktail.instructions: Add Godet to shot class, pour cherry brandy in the center and let it mix itself around.

cocktail.name: Adios Motherfucker (A.M.F.)
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients except the 7-Up into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-Up and stir gently.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Dream #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake vodka and amaretto. Fill with 7-Up.

cocktail.name: Blue Eye
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice and build ordinary with vodka, Battery, Sweet & Sour and Blue curacao at the end.

cocktail.name: S2C3
cocktail.instructions: Pour into glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Stoned
cocktail.instructions: Fill higeball glass with ice. Pour in Jgermeister and pear liqueur. Top with lemon mix and "Battery" energy drink. Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktail.name: Raw Sewage #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice.

cocktail.name: Lyndy
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and serve.

cocktail.name: The Ricky Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice until frothy. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with a jalepeno stuffed olive.

cocktail.name: BMW #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Tap that Ass
cocktail.instructions: Fill the hurricane glass with ice. Pour the Hennessy, Red Alize, and Yellow Alize. Splash in some Cranberry Juice and top it off with soda. For garnish you can add a slice of pineapple and cherries.

cocktail.name: Flaming Giraffe
cocktail.instructions: Pour Kahlua first into a double shot glass. Add one ounce of butterscotch schnapps. Float 151 proof rum on top and set on fire. Blow out before drinking.

cocktail.name: Cactus Juice
cocktail.instructions: Fill Glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order.

cocktail.name: Octapussy
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a cocktail glass. Give it a shake to the right and a shake to the left. Pour into the cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Summer Splash
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in shaker, pour into glass over ice. Lime juice can be added to taste. Makes 2 drinks.

cocktail.name: Absolutly Screwed
cocktail.instructions: Mix OJ and Mandrin then enjoy

cocktail.name: Razzberi Kazi
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Stoli Fruit Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients together in ice filled glass. Shake and pour back into glass.

cocktail.name: Green Weenie
cocktail.instructions: Take swig of Corona, then fill bottle the rest of the way with Margarita Mix.

cocktail.name: The Twister
cocktail.instructions: Mix the lemon, tabasco sauce, clamato juice, salt and pepper, fill the glass with some ice, add the rum and fill with some Corona beer.

cocktail.name: James D
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients. Stir

cocktail.name: Liqiud Mintaero
cocktail.instructions: Mix Creme de Cacoa, Creme de Menthe, Midori, Kahlua and Ice into a shaker. Give a small shake, then add milk and shake well to foam up milk.

cocktail.name: Amenie Mama
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass. Stir.

cocktail.name: Mexican Clit
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass half full with tequila. Fill to the top with lemon juice. This shit goes quick, so enjoy.

cocktail.name: Superjuice
cocktail.instructions: Shake or mix the vodka, gin, and orange juice. Pour over ice. Add tonic water and lime juice, stir slightly.

cocktail.name: Melon Tonic
cocktail.instructions: Add vodka, melon liqueur, and lemon juice over ice in cocktail shaker. Shake 3-4 times, then add tonic water or club soda and shake once. Strain into cocktail glass or pour over ice into highball glass.

cocktail.name: Tropical Waters
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Melon liqueur and the Blue curacao into a highball glass. Then add Sprite, and finally the ice cubes

cocktail.name: 915 Special
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into highball. Garnish with slice of pineapple.

cocktail.name: Midnight Oil
cocktail.instructions: Mix in the shot glass. Ingredients should not be chilled.

cocktail.name: Malibu Snapper
cocktail.instructions: Pour about a quarter of the glass with Malibu rum and fill the rest with Snapple.

cocktail.name: Poontang
cocktail.instructions: Mix Vodka and Triple sec first. Add Tang (and water if powdered Tang).

cocktail.name: Kryptonite
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass and layer 151 proof rum on top.

cocktail.name: BLT
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Limon. Fill with Iced tea. Add lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Blue Monkey
cocktail.instructions: Pour in hurricane glass with crushed ice. Stir or mix gently.

cocktail.name: Carolina Kamikaze
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add more or less blue curacao - you're trying to achieve a Carolina Blue color.

cocktail.name: The Lady in Red
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass. Let stand for 30 seconds and slam it back.

cocktail.name: Slap Your Mama
cocktail.instructions: Shake one part o.j. and one part vodka together. Pour over ice and add one part Mountain Dew, then stir slightly.

cocktail.name: Dead Grasshopper
cocktail.instructions: Shake creme de menthe, creme de cacao and milk with ice. Pour into glass and add a dash of Aftershock. Do not stir.

cocktail.name: Melonball (Spanish Style)
cocktail.instructions: Shake midori, malibu, and pineapple juice and strain into a glass. Add orange juice.

cocktail.name: French Connection #2
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients into a snifter and serve neat, or add a small amount of ice if desired.

cocktail.name: Fizzy Fuzzy Navel
cocktail.instructions: Pour Schnapps and OJ over 2 ice cubes. Fill with Champagne and stir gently.

cocktail.name: Pink Elephant
cocktail.instructions: Pour grenadine into snifter and swirl around so it coats most of the glass surface. Dump out. Add gin.

cocktail.name: Italian Soda #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour chambord into bottom of glass. Top with soda water. Do not stir. Serve with straw.

cocktail.name: Brain Candy
cocktail.instructions: Shake alcohols and juices. Add to glass with ice. Pour grenadine and ginger ale on top. Garnish with cherry and orange wheel.

cocktail.name: Cabana Club
cocktail.instructions: Blend with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Irish Hammer
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Fontainebleau Sidecar
cocktail.instructions: Mix or shake all ingredients, except Grand Marnier, with cracked ice in a shaker. Pour or strain into large chilled wine glass or snifter. Float Grand Marnier on top.

cocktail.name: Almond Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Blend all except ice for 10-15 seconds. Add the ice cubes and blend for another 10 seconds to break up the ice cubes slightly. Serve in a Poco Grande or Hurricane glass garnished with a slice of orange and a Marichino cherry.

cocktail.name: Blue Kamikaze
cocktail.instructions: Combine the Vodka, Blue Curacao, and Lime Juice in a glass with ice. Shake well, then pour through a strainer into a normal glass with ice in it. Makes 1 drink.

cocktail.name: Astroturf
cocktail.instructions: Mix creme de menthe, creme de cacao and milk in glass. When ready to serve, squirt in chocolate syrup and mix until it turns a grass-like green/brown color.

cocktail.name: Sneeky Sucker
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together with lots of ice.

cocktail.name: Goldfish
cocktail.instructions: Mix peach schnapps with vodka. Add mandarin oranges.

cocktail.name: Mexican's Revenge
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Pour on ice. Garnish with straws and a slice of lemon.

cocktail.name: Gingersnap
cocktail.instructions: Shake Kahlua, Bailey's irish cream, Frangelico, and Jgermeister in ice-filled shaker, and strain contents into ice-filled highball glass. Fill with cola.

cocktail.name: Sex on Daytona Beach
cocktail.instructions: Blend ingredients by shaking well.

cocktail.name: Fjellfinn
cocktail.instructions: Mix the two ingredients. Garnish with a birch leaf.

cocktail.name: Placenta
cocktail.instructions: Fill most of the shot glass with schnapps. Top it off with the Tequila Rose. Wait about 30 seconds for the Tequila Rose to curdle (thus the name). Slam it!

cocktail.name: Mandarin Dream
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and splash juices in shaker with ice. Shake vigorously so when poured, a thin layer of ice crystals is visible. Strain into cocktail glass and garnish with orange slice.

cocktail.name: Sour Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing tin. Stir over ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Cocktail glass should be sugar rimmed and garnished with a lemon.

cocktail.name: Afterburner #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: The Brett Schroeder
cocktail.instructions: Shake, then add Orangina and ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Goats Milk
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients and stir.

cocktail.name: Marianne
cocktail.instructions: Blend strawberries, raspberries and apple juice until it is slushy. Fill each champagne flute half way with fruit mix. Fill the remaining flute with champagne, and stir until champagne and fruit mix are mixed. Top off with whipped cream (optional).

cocktail.name: Matt's Tropical Punch
cocktail.instructions: Build on the rocks and stir with a straw.

cocktail.name: Coral Reef
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka, tequila, and blue Curacao over ice and shake Slowly add sour mix until drink is a bright turquois. Remix and serve.

cocktail.name: Tampon String
cocktail.instructions: Layer the vodka and cherry liquer then put whip cream on top and a cherry on that when taking the shot engulf the whole thing and after you swallow pull the stem of the cherry out.

cocktail.name: The Kruzewski
cocktail.instructions: Put a couple ice cubes in the mug then add juices and mix a great morning drink.

cocktail.name: The Cherry Magician
cocktail.instructions: This is to make one quart. Follow the directions on the package to determine the appropriate amount of Kool-Aid mix. Mix all of the ingredients in a bowl/pitcher without ice. Serve in a glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Guinness Punch
cocktail.instructions: Gently pour a well-chilled Guinness into a small mixing bowl or glass that will hold all of the liquid ingredients. Add the sweetened condensed milk, spices, and cocoa (if it's wanted). Stir or whisk well, and pour the mixture into a pint-sized beer mug or pub glass. Makes 1 drink.

cocktail.name: Working Man's Zinfandel
cocktail.instructions: Add shots of liquor to the glass. Fill with Sprite.

cocktail.name: Caribbean Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Donkey Punch
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punchbowl and float orange slices on top.

cocktail.name: Sweedish Blow Job
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients in order. Pour the cream soda to make the whipped cream spurt.

cocktail.name: Waverunner
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the Champagne) with ice. Strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Top with champagne. Squeze and drop another wedge of lemon into the drink (the other two should still be in the tin).

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Volcano #2
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Highball glass.

cocktail.name: No Regrets
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the Irish Cream first. Then add the gold tequila. Shoot down and feel the warmth.

cocktail.name: Sex on the Grass
cocktail.instructions: Shake all except orange juice with ice. Pour into a hiball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Hurricane Laura
cocktail.instructions: Stir and pour in shot glasses.

cocktail.name: The Cornell
cocktail.instructions: In a Highball glass add Vodka, Watermelon Pucker, and sour mix. Fill the rest of the glass with ice and shake well. Finish with a splash of club soda.

cocktail.name: Verno
cocktail.instructions: Pour as is.

cocktail.name: Baduizm
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with grated chocolate.

cocktail.name: Louie Louie
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Creme de Spooge
cocktail.instructions: Mix half a beer with half of a cream soda.

cocktail.name: 78 Camaro
cocktail.instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add liquor and pineapple juice. Shake and serve in glass. Top with champagne.

cocktail.name: Tropical Hibiscus
cocktail.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a iced punch bowl. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: The Green Mile
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Cossak
cocktail.instructions: Add liqueur after filling glass with preferred amount of milk. Vodka can be excluded for a milder drink.

cocktail.name: Peekaboo
cocktail.instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant and fill with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Spanish Fly
cocktail.instructions: Pour in glass and stir. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Under Kurant
cocktail.instructions: Shake the Absolut Kurant, blue curacao, and pineapple juice with ice. Pour into a shot or low-ball glass, be sure and leave a bit of room to spare. Add just enough Chambord to color the bottom of the glass.

cocktail.name: Mindfuck
cocktail.instructions: Just mix over ice in the glass.

cocktail.name: Cranberry Frog
cocktail.instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

cocktail.name: Cranberry Toad
cocktail.instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

cocktail.name: Cranberry Newt
cocktail.instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

cocktail.name: Chihuahua
cocktail.instructions: Pour tequila over ice. Fill with grapefruit juice.

cocktail.name: Red Death #3
cocktail.instructions: Mix up and serve in a highball glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Fury
cocktail.instructions: In a whiskey glass with ice, add equal parts vodka and spiced rum, a splash of sour mix, then top off with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Sour Pussy
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice.

cocktail.name: Blueberry Kami
cocktail.instructions: Shake in shaker with ice. Pour the shots.

cocktail.name: Enchantress
cocktail.instructions: Combine alcoholic ingredients in glass over ice. Fill to top with milk, add splash of grenadine. Stir gently.

cocktail.name: Peach Harpoon
cocktail.instructions: Stir everything together in a glass of ice.

cocktail.name: Canadian Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Shake well and pour over ice or "up" in a martini glass. Garnish with cherry.

cocktail.name: Pink Flamingo #2
cocktail.instructions: Add ice and vanilla schnapps and grenadine. Add the a splashes of orange juice and fill with the cream. Garnish with 2 cherries.

cocktail.name: Formula 420
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in order listed. Stir lightly.

cocktail.name: Seven Veils
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

cocktail.name: Cibola
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

cocktail.name: Black Unicorn
cocktail.instructions: Pour in kahlua, then butterscotch schnapps. Layer Irish cream on top.

cocktail.name: Redhead's Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Pour in vanilla schnapps, layer Irish cream on top.

cocktail.name: Cockteaser
cocktail.instructions: Pour into chilled shot glass.

cocktail.name: EKG
cocktail.instructions: Fill any type glass 1/2 - 3/4 with ice. Add equal amounts of Chocolate Liqueur and Kahlua - enough to cover the ice.

cocktail.name: Mansion Mind Eraser
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes. Pour all the ingredients in order and fill with 7-Up. Drink with two straws like a shot.

cocktail.name: Bat Bite
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Cherry Screwdriver
cocktail.instructions: Stir. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Sweet Pea
cocktail.instructions: Simply pour them together.

cocktail.name: Cinco de Mayo
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with lots of ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with fresh lime wedge if desired.

cocktail.name: Golden Cadillac with White-Walled Tires
cocktail.instructions: Add all of the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a large chilled champagne flute. Garnish with shaved dark chocolate.

cocktail.name: Olive in an Olive
cocktail.instructions: Pour Tequila, Red Sweet Vermouth and Blue Curacao over very cold ice in a shaker. Shake. Strain into glass and drop in olive. The drink should be the appx. colour of the olive.

cocktail.name: Kalabreeze
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a shot glass, and shoot.

cocktail.name: Wa-Hoo-Wa
cocktail.instructions: Combine vodka and curacao in glass over ice. Fill with orange juice. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Glicktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice and add more ginger ale (or club soda) to taste. Stir well.

cocktail.name: Tropical Clarkson
cocktail.instructions: Prepare the hot chocolate and add the Kahlua. Top with whipped cream or marshmallows.

cocktail.name: Grovspol
cocktail.instructions: Start with the whiskey, then bailey's, then cointreau. Then splash Pepsi on top of it.

cocktail.name: Warm Woolly Sheep
cocktail.instructions: Mix Scotch and Drambuie, top with warm milk.

cocktail.name: An Irish Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Pour Baileys and Kahlua into Irish coffee glass, fill glass with hot coffee and top with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Fruit Basket
cocktail.instructions: Mix appropriate amounts in a pitcher or bowl. Pour into glass filled with ice. Garnish with the fruit of your choice.

cocktail.name: The Hollywood
cocktail.instructions: Mix with ice and strain into ice filled highball glass.

cocktail.name: Gold Record
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

cocktail.name: Dixieland Tea
cocktail.instructions: Shake or stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: T-Bone's Cough Syrup
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Hot Damn, then add grape soda and then top off with cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry if you can avoid choking on it.

cocktail.name: Cafe Seattle
cocktail.instructions: Measure Irish cream and Vodka into coffee mug. Add Hershey's chocolate syrup. Fill will coffee and top with Whipping cream.

cocktail.name: F-69
cocktail.instructions: Chill ingredients before hand. Carefully layer the ingredients in order: Rum, Kahlua, Amaretto, Bailey's.

cocktail.name: Mr G
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Orange
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Cake Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts Absolut Citron and Frangelico into a shot glass. Drink the shot, and follow it immediately by sucking on a sugar-coated lemon wedge.

cocktail.name: Long Kiss Goodnight Martini
cocktail.instructions: Freeze a martini glass and it in shaved chocolate to rim. In a shaker put ice, Stoli vanilla, Stoli vodka, and white creme de cacao. Shake lightly and pour into martini glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss.

cocktail.name: Bermuda Triangle
cocktail.instructions: Add ingredients over ice, stir gently and garnish with a fresh orange slice.

cocktail.name: Island Tide
cocktail.instructions: Add all ingredients into a Collins Glass and stir. Ice is optional. Also add 3 mandarin orange slices, and 2 peach slices to the drink. Sink them to the bottom. You may also garnish the glass with a lemon slice, peach slice or mandarin orange slice.

cocktail.name: Fruity Pebble
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Makes a dope shooter or pour over rocks.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Pusser
cocktail.instructions: Mix together in a pitcher. Pour into hurricane glass.

cocktail.name: Godiva Chocolate Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice, shake and pour into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Georgia Pie
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Red Mosquito
cocktail.instructions: Combine vodka and hot damn in shot glass, stir and shoot.

cocktail.name: Flying Moose
cocktail.instructions: Poor liquors into the highball glass, balance with sprite and top with grenadine.

cocktail.name: Italian Sunrise #2
cocktail.instructions: Blend until slushy, pour & enjoy!

cocktail.name: Mean Green Love Making Machine
cocktail.instructions: Put ingredients in shaker, shake, pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Mountain Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Serve over crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Cranberry Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Mix Vodka, then cranberry juice, then orange juice, then top with grenadine

cocktail.name: Vodka Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Mix Vodka, orange juice, then top with grenadine

cocktail.name: Bayou Backwater
cocktail.instructions: Pour Southern Comfort and lemonade into a 12 oz glass. Stir. Add ice if desired.

cocktail.name: Mandarin Metropolitan
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a wedge of mandarin orange on the side.

cocktail.name: Mandarin Split
cocktail.instructions: Shake once.

cocktail.name: Deep South
cocktail.instructions: Mix pineapple juice and molasses well, either shake or blend, stirring won't work. Pour into glass and drop rum on top but do not stir in. Splash on cherry syrup and garnish with a pineapple wedge or pineapple chunks. Serve slightly cooler than room temp, or over ice.

cocktail.name: Bull Rider
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients well and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Midori 2000
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice and garnish with Pineapple wedge, 3 Pineapple leaves, 2 Cherries

cocktail.name: Heartbreaker's Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka into a blender. Add passoa, orange juice and pineapple juice. Add crushed ice and flesh of an orange. Blend well.

cocktail.name: Groader
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients in order.

cocktail.name: Wynonna's Strawberry Delight
cocktail.instructions: Stir with a straw.

cocktail.name: Almond Joy Dark
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquors over ice. Fill with pineapple. Add grenadine to color. Shake. Garnish with pineapple flag.

cocktail.name: Knoxville Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Fill mason jar 3/4 full of large ice cubes. Add peach schnapps and vodka. Add lemonade and ginger ale. Garnish with a slice of orange and two straws.

cocktail.name: Peach May Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: All mixed together. No special ways to mix.

cocktail.name: Pink Cotton Candy
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: California Iced Tea
cocktail.instructions: Shake or roll. Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktail.name: Blue Skies
cocktail.instructions: Simply follow the order above, pouring directly into the glass. Garnish with a slice of orange on the glass.

cocktail.name: Mexican stand-off
cocktail.instructions: Layer in the above order.

cocktail.name: Midnight Flight to Malibu
cocktail.instructions: Build with ice. Can be shaken, or left layered.

cocktail.name: Sweet Satisfaction
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice and combine ingredients, stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Deep Valley
cocktail.instructions: Starting by the gin and the blue curacao and finishing by the soda, mix directly into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a long lemon twist, a cherry and mint leaves.

cocktail.name: The Game
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball with ice, add rum and fill with cranberry, top off with triple sec.

cocktail.name: Shrewsbury Slammer
cocktail.instructions: Stir each ingredient in a mixing tin, then strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Summer Sky
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add gin and triple sec, and fill with pineapple juice. Add a splash of grenadine on top.

cocktail.name: Green Poison
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Pink Millenium
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, cranberry juice and sugar syrup. Pour into a champagne coupe or flute. Fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine.

cocktail.name: Absolut 600
cocktail.instructions: Chop the peach and put into a blender. Blend together with the frozen orangejuice and a few raspberries. Add a few drops grenadine, the limejuice and the vanilla syrup. Blend until it's smooth. Pour the absolut mandarin into a highball glass. Fill the glass to half with the mix from the blender and fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Release
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients in snifter and stir.

cocktail.name: Kick yer Ass Sas
cocktail.instructions: Pour shots and soda over ice in mason jar or antique glass and experience a taste of the old west.

cocktail.name: Blue Lady
cocktail.instructions: Half fill martini glass with crushed ice, pour in alcohol and stir.

cocktail.name: Hurricane #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin, rum(s), amaretto, and triple sec into a tall hurricane-style glass with ice. Add equal amounts of grapefruit juice and pineapple juice until almost full. Top with grenadine to taste.

cocktail.name: White Tornado
cocktail.instructions: The trick to getting the look of the Tornado is to pour the Tequila Rose slowly on the side of the shooter glass on top of the Sambuca.

cocktail.name: Bootzilla
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors. Fill with Pineapple juice. Shake. Garnish with Orange slice. Serve.

cocktail.name: Dressed Up Pina Colada
cocktail.instructions: Make a zig-zag pattern of chocolate syrup on the inside of the glass while turning the glass. Blend rum, coconut milk and pineapple, with 2 cups of crushed ice, on high for a few seconds, until all large chunks of ice are gone. Pour into glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Watermelon
cocktail.instructions: Cut a hole into one end of the watermelon and pour the peach schnapps into it. Put the watermelon into the refrigerator for at least 6 hours. -- Or cut the watermelon into small pieces and place them into a dish. Pour the peach schnapps over the watermelon evenly and refrigerate for a few hours.

cocktail.name: My Wasted Generation
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice.

cocktail.name: Buzzby
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingrediants in highball with ice, and stir. Lime garnish optional.

cocktail.name: Zadarade
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes. Add Absolut Mandrin, triple sec, and sour mix. Add a splash of cranberry juice, and pineapple. Shake, and top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.

cocktail.name: Red Rattlesnake
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice. Shake.

cocktail.name: Vodka Passion
cocktail.instructions: Mix both liquids over ice and strain into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Tropic Heat
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice and shake. Pour into a glass, garnish with fruit.

cocktail.name: Rusty Screw
cocktail.instructions: Combine Scotch and Grand Marnier in snifter. Twist lemon peel into mixture. Sip and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Crowbar
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients and strain over ice.

cocktail.name: Greek Sex On The Beach
cocktail.instructions: Put all ingredients in together, and shake. Serve in a glass filled up to 2/3 with ice.

cocktail.name: ATP
cocktail.instructions: Pour Southern Comfort into a shot glass, then add the amaretto. Stir.

cocktail.name: Italian Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Pour into glass. Stir. Add ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Cubano
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shaker with ice, pour in ingredients, shake well and pour.

cocktail.name: Cloud 9
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients except whipped cream in a blener untill ice is well chopped. Pour in coffee mug and top with generous portion of whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Tropical Titty Twister
cocktail.instructions: Mix in glass then shake.

cocktail.name: The Reservoir Dog
cocktail.instructions: Mix Jgermeister and Irish cream over ice cubes and strain. Pour into cordial glass and serve.

cocktail.name: Midori Sun
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice and stir up! Garnish with a lime/cherry and a orange.

cocktail.name: Swedish pinkie
cocktail.instructions: Put everything in a mixer and mix thoroughly. Pour into a champagne coupe.

cocktail.name: Chiquita
cocktail.instructions: Put lots of ice in your shaker. Then pour first the vodka, then the "creme" and last the milk over the ice. Shake well. Pour into shot glasses. Makes several shots.

cocktail.name: The Rising Skirt
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Pour in a sour glass with ice and top with an orange slice.

cocktail.name: Mandarin Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Mix Absolut Mandarin, peach schnapps, pineapple & orange juice in a shaker with ice. Pour into collins glass fill with 7-up and stir. Add grenadine so that it sinks to bottom and garnish with a twist of lime.

cocktail.name: Jeannie's Dream
cocktail.instructions: In a hurricane glass (or a long drink glass), pour orange juice, pineapple juice and 7-Up. Add Malibu rum and stir gently. Slowly add as a top off the sloe gin, so the red color slowly mixes down through the rest of the drink.

cocktail.name: Black Feather
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an Orange Twist.

cocktail.name: Safe Sex on the Beach
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in a chilled glass and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Orange 43
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice and stir to mix.

cocktail.name: Spanish Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Pour Licor 43 and coffee into a irish coffee cup. Float whipped cream and sprinkle a little cinnamon on top.

cocktail.name: Leprechaun
cocktail.instructions: Pour whiskey over ice in a chilled glass. Top with tonic water and stir gently. Drop in lemon twist.

cocktail.name: Dancing Leprechaun
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass with ice cubes. Add a twist of lemon.

cocktail.name: Akis Special
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice in highball glass. Fill with Sprite and stir.

cocktail.name: Coco Cabana
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple piece.

cocktail.name: Batida de Coco
cocktail.instructions: Blend well and add crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Red Hope
cocktail.instructions: Blend. Pour into collins glass half filled with crushed ice.

cocktail.name: Petite Fleur
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain.

cocktail.name: Whisky Melba
cocktail.instructions: Muddle a small pice of fresh ginger in the glass. Fill glass with ice, add whisky and ginger ale. Drop in a strip of lemon peel and stir gently.

cocktail.name: Call of the Snowfields (Lumikenttien Kutsu)
cocktail.instructions: Blend with ice and pour into cocktail glass. Sprinkle grated nutmeg on top.

cocktail.name: Finlandia Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and Lapponia Lakka into an irish coffee cup. Fill with hot coffee and float fresh cream or whipped cream on top.

cocktail.name: Royal Temptation
cocktail.instructions: Blend. Serve in cocktail glass rimmed with white and brown chocolate flakes.

cocktail.name: Violetta
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with a slice of orange, fresh mint leaves and a cherry. Serve with straws.

cocktail.name: Festrus
cocktail.instructions: Stir in mixing glass. Pour into cocktail glass and add a squeeze of orange peel.

cocktail.name: Green Hope
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Garnish with red and red cherries.

cocktail.name: Magic Star
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Garnish with powdered chocolate and a star made of crystalized fruit.

cocktail.name: Ramcooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour all the ingredients into a 10 oz glass, fill with crushed ice and shake. Garnish with a red cherry and a slice of lime.

cocktail.name: Rheingold
cocktail.instructions: Stir in a mixing glass. Add a twist of orange.

cocktail.name: Juicy Guiness Premier
cocktail.instructions: Mix in the shots of Blue Curacao, Taboo and Vodka. Then add the Guiness to the spirits up to 3cm below the rim of the pint glass. Allow the Guiness to settle before adding the Carling Premier. Allow to settle again before consuming.

cocktail.name: Buttsex
cocktail.instructions: Start with the coffee, preferably espresso. Add in the vodka, triple sec and lemon juice (lime juice can be used instead) and stir. Top with the whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Flaming Lemon Drop
cocktail.instructions: Pour Absolut Citron into shot glass and top off with a splash of Galliano. Place one half lemon slice flat on the rim of the shot glass, put some sugar on the slice and soak the sugar with 151 proof rum. -- Just before drinking, ignite the sugar. Blow the flame out when the it seems to caramelize the sugar. Lick the sugar off the lemon slice, down the vodka mixture, then either suck the juices or bite the pulp of the lemon.

cocktail.name: Grngeist
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Pour in a hurricane glass that has been frosted with sugar. Add a twist of lemon.

cocktail.name: Jumanji
cocktail.instructions: Mix all liqueurs and juice in shaker, add ice and shake well. Pour into a large cocktail glass and garnish with fresh fruit.

cocktail.name: Bruja Mexicana
cocktail.instructions: Mix strega and tequila in a blender the crushed ice. Moist the rim of the glass with lemon and decorate with sugar. Add a little sugar syrup. Pour in and fill with soda.

cocktail.name: Sir Francis
cocktail.instructions: First, pour all 3 vodkas over ice in highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with grenadine, shake & serve.

cocktail.name: Emerald Eye
cocktail.instructions: Add each ingredient to the shot glass. Color should be a bright emerald green.

cocktail.name: Sex with the bartender
cocktail.instructions: Mix rum, triple sec, lime juice, grenadine and 7-up. Garnish with lemon and lime, then splash irish cream down the middle.

cocktail.name: Undertow
cocktail.instructions: Pour schnapps, then curacao into the glass. Do not mix.

cocktail.name: Curious Comfort
cocktail.instructions: Add Blue Curacao, Southern Comfort, and half of the pineapple juice over ice and shake. Add remainder of pineapple juice to taste.

cocktail.name: Iced Velvet
cocktail.instructions: Fill Highball glass with ice. Pour 1 oz. Black Velvet Canadian Whisky over ice. Fill up glass with Iced Tea. Stir with a straw.

cocktail.name: Champagne Martini
cocktail.instructions: Mix and serve.

cocktail.name: Blindside
cocktail.instructions: In a large glass pour strawberry syrup, orange juice, and grapefruit juice, finally, add vodka.

cocktail.name: Raggae Sunsplash
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin and pineapple juice in a shaker and shake well. Pour into the glass over ice. Add the strawberry syrup. Use a straw to add a little bit of the food coloring in the froth.

cocktail.name: Resaca Water
cocktail.instructions: Place the vodka, rum and watermelon liqueur with ice in a shaker. Add the pineapple and orange juice and shake. Pour in a hurricane glass with ice in it. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

cocktail.name: The Crown Cherry
cocktail.instructions: Mix all together in glass with ice.

cocktail.name: CA area 151
cocktail.instructions: Fill cup with ice. Add equal parts of all ingredients. Stir. Serve immediately.

cocktail.name: Ball and Chain
cocktail.instructions: In shot glass, mix 1 part Gold with 1 part Rump, add a splash of Jager over the top. Manly shot with a tasty surprise.

cocktail.name: Ski Shooter
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in a shaker, then the vodka, followed by the amaretto and the sweet and sour. Cover and shake like crazy. Pour into shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Skipper's Ripper
cocktail.instructions: Add rum, whiskey, and grenadine to glass. Fill the rest of the way with Coke. Stir once to mix.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Bum
cocktail.instructions: Pour shots into glass over ice, fill with 7-up, add cream and stir. Garnish with any fruit or cherry.

cocktail.name: San Patricio
cocktail.instructions: Fill mug 3/4 full with coffee. Add Kahlua, Bailey's and cream. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Breast Milk
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in tin with crushed ice. Shake, strain, and serve.

cocktail.name: Tie Me To The Bedpost (Hawaiian)
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an over-sized martini glass. There should be a slight amount of foam from the 7-up.

cocktail.name: Cina Polada
cocktail.instructions: Blend with 2 cups of ice until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge and banana slice.

cocktail.name: Blue Screw
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour Mandrin and Blue in, then fill it with OJ. Simple.

cocktail.name: Spritsor
cocktail.instructions: Add ice, then whisky, fill with soda. Stir and enjoy.

cocktail.name: California Rattle Snake
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts of Southern Comfort, Malibu Rum, an Amerretto in a mixing tin over ice. Add a splash or sour mix, grenadine, and 7-up. Shake well. Can be served over ice or as a shot.

cocktail.name: Gorilla Milk #2
cocktail.instructions: Stir or shake. Ice cream can be used instead of milk and blended in a blender.

cocktail.name: C*m Shot (B-Street Bar)
cocktail.instructions: Sprinkle grains of salt in bottom of shot glass. Pour equal parts of peach schnapps and irish cream. Top with whipped cream. Drink is to be consumed with "no hands" (glass picked up with the mouth and slammed back in one "swallow.") Creamy with just a hint of salt to cut the sweetness.

cocktail.name: Temptress
cocktail.instructions: Toss some ice cubes into a glass. Pour in a shot of grenadine and a shot of vodka. Fill with gingerale or Sprite and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Jack & Ginger
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Jack Daniels then add ginger ale. Stir.

cocktail.name: Bullvodka
cocktail.instructions: Pour 2 shots of Vodka in glass. Fill with cold Red Bull. Add 2 ice cubes (optional).

cocktail.name: Blue Diamond
cocktail.instructions: Pour 3/4 shots of each into old fashioned glass.

cocktail.name: Jacobs Haze
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka, Jgermeister and Red Bull in a glass. Add ice and a slice of kiwi.

cocktail.name: Georgia Peach #2
cocktail.instructions: In a 10 oz highball filled with ice, add Southern Comfort, peach schnapps and fill with orange juice. Mix. Top with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Martina Mandarina
cocktail.instructions: Pour juice, vodka and a splash of Grand Marnier in a shaker. Add ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange curl.

cocktail.name: Cinn's Stop Light
cocktail.instructions: Layer each ingredient on top of each other. Melon first, then grenadine, then baileys. Use back of tablespoon to layer evenly.

cocktail.name: Beer Breezer
cocktail.instructions: Add freezer chilled vodka to frosted glass, add tabasco and celery salt, top up with very cold very strong lager.

cocktail.name: Nappy Dugout
cocktail.instructions: Build over 2 cubes of ice. Stir.

cocktail.name: Murray's Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Put ice cubes in glass. Pour rum, vodka, and citron vodka into glass. Fill with 7-up. Mix.

cocktail.name: Battering Ram
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and tequila in a highball glass, fill up with ice cold Battery and add a dash of lime. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Mocha Frappe
cocktail.instructions: Pour chilled coffe, milk, and instant chocolate milk powder into blender. Mix together. Add Whipped cream and Ice Cream, and Blend together at 'Frappe' setting. Pour into mug.

cocktail.name: Parrot Perch
cocktail.instructions: Put liquor, juice, and syrup in blender. Add the sliced banana and ice. Blend for 45 seconds or until smooth.

cocktail.name: Raging Bull #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill a highball glass half full with ice cubes. Add vodka and tequila, fill up with Red Bull. Add a dash of lime juice.

cocktail.name: Avocado Milkshake
cocktail.instructions: Blend on medium for 3 to 5 minutes.

cocktail.name: Golden Sip
cocktail.instructions: Pour over lots of ice.

cocktail.name: Forgive Me
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice and strain to cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Grandma's Swingin' Eggnog
cocktail.instructions: Beat yolks until light. Add sugar and mix well. Add milk and rum. Mix well, then chill for at least 3 hours. One hour before serving, whip cream and stir into chilled mixture. Return to refrigerator for an hour. Serve in punch cups and dust with nutmeg. Serves 20.

cocktail.name: Naughty Angel
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Colorado Rattlesnake
cocktail.instructions: Pour chilled Tequila in shot glass and put to the side. Pour Tomato Juice in a second shot glass and dash pepper and Tabasco in the Tomato Juice. Shoot Tequila and chase with tomato juice shot.

cocktail.name: Fall of Rome
cocktail.instructions: pour vermouth and brandy into glass, add lime and fill with orange juice, and stir. Splash brandy on top, and serve with straw.

cocktail.name: Cubano Coffee
cocktail.instructions: Warm up rum, creme cacao, sugar and coffee. Float the double fresh cream floating on top. Optionally sprinkle some grated chocolate on top of the cream.

cocktail.name: Jumper Cable
cocktail.instructions: Pour rum over ice, fill with Jolt, and stir.

cocktail.name: Emerald City
cocktail.instructions: Pour into an ice filled hurricane glass.

cocktail.name: Banana JABS
cocktail.instructions: Pour Banana Liqueur into a Highball glass over ice. Add Malibu Rum and top with Mountain Dew.

cocktail.name: Sour Mix
cocktail.instructions: Dissolve sugar in water and add lemon juice. Refrigerate. Optionally you can add a little egg white (will make drinks foamy).

cocktail.name: Aztec Gold
cocktail.instructions: Ice a shaker and add ingredients. Shake vigourously for 12- 15 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel on the rim.

cocktail.name: Forest Funk
cocktail.instructions: Moisten the rim of the Collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.

cocktail.name: Creamy Comfort
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Thorny Mexican
cocktail.instructions: Add Tequila Rose and follow with tequila.

cocktail.name: Key West Lemonade
cocktail.instructions: Mix vodka and sweet and sour proportionally in any size batch, then add sprite or 7-up and cranberry accordingly, a dash each per serving. Directions are for single, regular bar size serving.

cocktail.name: Charlie's Angel
cocktail.instructions: Half fill glass with ice. Pour all ingredients into the beaker of a cocktail shaker apart from the soda. Mix gently. Pour into glass. Take one fresh lime wedge, squeeze and drop in. Add soda to top. Serve with stirrer and straw.

cocktail.name: Cat's Eye
cocktail.instructions: Shake gin, chartreuse, and vermouth in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist orange peel and drop into cocktail.

cocktail.name: Chumbawumba
cocktail.instructions: Pour a basic snake bite of half cider and lager in a pint glass. Then add to the top a shot of whiskey and vodka. Stir and then drink.

cocktail.name: Mind Eraser #2
cocktail.instructions: Place ice cubes in a small, narrow glass. Add the Kahlua, then the vodka and finally the Sprite.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Cake #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour 3/4 oz of vodka and 1/4 oz frangelico into a shot glass. Cover the slice of lime with powdered sugar. Bite on the lime with powdered sugar on it and hold the juice in your mouth. Then take the shot while the lime juice is still in your mouth. You now have a chocolate cake shot.

cocktail.name: Shakes "Party To Go"
cocktail.instructions: Drink the first 6oz of a Fresh Samantha and then discretely add the triple sec and vodka. Then shake baby!

cocktail.name: Lumberjack
cocktail.instructions: Pour into shot glass, no particular order. Add small dash of hot sauce.

cocktail.name: Cosmoquila
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingrediants with ice and strain.

cocktail.name: Casa Noble Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingrediants over ice and stir.

cocktail.name: Applejack (Jack Daniel's original recipe)
cocktail.instructions: Mix in glass on the rocks.

cocktail.name: The Fuzzy Magnum
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients (except lemon wedge) into shaker. Fill glass with ice and pour until about 1/4 inch remains in glass and squeeze lemon wedge into drink then drop lemon wedge in (for color and flavor).

cocktail.name: J's Tropical Orgasm (JTO)
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice. Coat the rim of the glass with sugar, strain shaker contents over ice and add the cherry.

cocktail.name: Cloudberry Dream
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir and garnish with cranberries.

cocktail.name: Black Cow #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice. Stir lightly. Tastes like the treat known as a Black Cow, which is vanilla ice cream and root beer.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Punch
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice, (grenadine last), and stir.

cocktail.name: Bloody Shame
cocktail.instructions: Pour V8 into glass, add Tabasco and stir with celery stalk. Sprinkle on salt and pepper. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Blue Cosmopolitan
cocktail.instructions: Frost the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with sugar. Stir absolut citron, blue curacao, grapefruit juice, and sugar syrup in a mixing glass with ice to prevent cloudiness. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Neopolitan martini
cocktail.instructions: In a mixing glass with ice, pour stoli vanil, stoli oranj, grand marnier, parfait d'amour and lime juice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel

cocktail.name: Stiletto Manhattan
cocktail.instructions: Add 1/2 oz dry vermouth in a chilled cocktail glass, and roll the vermouth around the glass and throw away the excess. In a mixing glass with ice, pour crown royal, amaretto, and orange bitters and stir. Strain into cocktail glass, and garnish with orange peel and maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Absinthe Minded Martini
cocktail.instructions: Properly chill 1 cocktail glass. In mixing glass with ice, pour gin and absinthe, and stir. In your cocktail glass, roll 1/2 oz of dry vermouth and throw away the excess. Strain other ingredients into cocktail glass and float 1/2 oz of grand marnier over top. Garnish with orange peel.

cocktail.name: Tequilini
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Diablo
cocktail.instructions: Put ice in glass, pour Casa Noble Reposado Tequila, Creme de cassis, fresh lime juice and fill with ginger ale, stir. Pud wedge of lime on top.

cocktail.name: Acid Rain
cocktail.instructions: Drink about a third of the bottle of Snapple Rain, and then fill it back up with bacardi. Put the cap back on and shake it up.

cocktail.name: Black Cow #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour Coke into glass of milk

cocktail.name: Jon Lee Hooker
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquor and syrup with some ice, add 7-up and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Long Island Milkshake
cocktail.instructions: In a large blender cup, add ice, sugar cubes, creme de cacao, vanilla extract (optional), and the cream or Half & Half. Mix for no more than 5-10 seconds. Then add the alcoholic beverages in no particular order, then hit the "frappe" or "whip" button on the blender for 15-20 seconds, or until you can see that all the ingredients are well-blended, but before you over-blend and start the ice melting too fast. Serve in a tall pre-chilled Tom Collins or similar tall iced-tea glass. No garnish required, serve with a large-diameter straw.

cocktail.name: Mamacita
cocktail.instructions: In a hurricane glass with ice add malibu rum, passoa, and cointreau. Fill the balance with guava syrup and shake well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple.

cocktail.name: Grinch #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice and put the first 4 acohols in, the put the sweet and sour and 7-up a little more 7-up than Sweet and Sour. Then float the Blue on top. If done right it should go from green to yellow to blue.

cocktail.name: Monet Carribean Frost
cocktail.instructions: Fill snifter with ice, add rums and vanilla. Then splash with cola and then fill rest of glass with orange juice. Pour mixture in blender and half blend so it isn't too thick. Pour back into brandy snifter and serve.

cocktail.name: Cocoa Chanel
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Creative Native
cocktail.instructions: Add all liquid ingredients in blender and set on frappe till the drink is the consistancy of a smoothie. You can serve this in a frosty hurricane glass and top off with whipped cream as desired.

cocktail.name: Chicks Dig It
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice filled glass shake enjoy! the chicks will dig it. can also be served up in a martini glass

cocktail.name: Gorilla Smile
cocktail.instructions: Combine all in a blender with a 8-12 oz of ice, blend. Barnish with a banana slice speared through an umbrella.

cocktail.name: Hot Georgia Peach
cocktail.instructions: Chill and pour in shot glass. Serve.

cocktail.name: Royal Laundry
cocktail.instructions: Mix in cocktail shaker of ice. Let sit till icy cold. Serve in a martini glass.

cocktail.name: Chuck Wagon
cocktail.instructions: Pour jager into shot glass, add drops of tabasco and slam.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Cake
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka then all other ingredients. Stir.

cocktail.name: Viking Blood
cocktail.instructions: Pour Aquavit and Tia Maria over ice, fill with Sprite/7-Up and stir.

cocktail.name: Coffee Crisp
cocktail.instructions: Add four ingredients and shake well, pour into old-fashioned glass. Do not use ice.

cocktail.name: Grinch
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredents pour over ice chill, shake, strain and serve.

cocktail.name: Scrumdriver
cocktail.instructions: Mix the vodka and orange juice in a chilled highball glass over ice. Add several dashes of lime juice at your discretion.

cocktail.name: Candy Corn
cocktail.instructions: Carefully layer on top of each other to resemble the halloween candy. First the Licor 43, then the orange curacao, then finally the cream.

cocktail.name: Candy Corn #2
cocktail.instructions: Start with the vodka, 100 proof is important, then sweet and sour, etc. right in order. It naturally sets up a base for the grenadine to float through. The grenadine dash should top off the shot glass and filter down, leaving no grenadine on top. Tapping the shot while steadying the top of the glass helps this.

cocktail.name: Charlie's Angel #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour the white creme de menth in the highball glass and fill with the double cream to an inch from the top and stir well. Next carefully float the spiced rum on the top. Drink from the bottom with a straw.

cocktail.name: White Rabbit
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice, add in the vodka, vanilla liqueur, and milk shake and surve.

cocktail.name: Purple Nasty
cocktail.instructions: Add the blackcurrant squash undiluted into the pint glass, usually 1-2 cm up the glass will do depending on how blackcurrenty you want it. Then fill up to the 2/3 rds mark with cider, finishing off with larger.

cocktail.name: Four Roses Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake well in cracked ice, strain into cocktail glasses, serve with twist of lemon peel. Serves four.

cocktail.name: St. Clement's
cocktail.instructions: Put the two ingredients into a shaker with cracked ice, and serve in a highball glass over whole ice cubes with a twist of lemon and a twist of orange.

cocktail.name: Ahhhhhh....
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a glass, sit back and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Irish Cream BTB
cocktail.instructions: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly, except for the whipping cream. You can use a mixer (recomended) or by hand. After all the ingredients are mixed well you will add the whipping cream, mix lightly, do not overmix.

cocktail.name: Mind Eraser #3
cocktail.instructions: Fill cup with ice, layer each ingredient starting with Kalhua, then Vodka, then butterscotch schnapps, then 7-up.

cocktail.name: Jack Rogers
cocktail.instructions: Pour Jack Daniels over ice in a tall (collins) glass. Fill with coke. Lace with grenadine to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional).

cocktail.name: White Russian #3
cocktail.instructions: Pour pour vanilla vodka and kalhua over ice. Top off with light cream and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Coffee Crisp Shot
cocktail.instructions: Pour first three in order, layer Bailey's on top.

cocktail.name: Fidel Castro
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add the rum and lime juice. Fill with ginger ale.

cocktail.name: Ski Slope
cocktail.instructions: Mix in any order, serve in glass with ice.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Logic
cocktail.instructions: Pour all of it into a shaker with ice, shake and pour.

cocktail.name: K-Dawg's Apple Pie
cocktail.instructions: In a cup, pour in the Amaretto. Then add the tablespoon of Cinnamon Schnapps. Fill cup with Apple Juice and stir. Served warm.

cocktail.name: Southern Pride
cocktail.instructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into shot glass, then put in the Peach Schnapps. Bottoms up!

cocktail.name: Silverado
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

cocktail.name: Tiger's Milk
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain ingredients into an old-fashioned glass of ice.

cocktail.name: Massacre
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass of ice. Stir well and serve.

cocktail.name: Buzzard's Breath
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: D.P.R.
