cocktail.instructions: Fill collins or tall glass with ice. Add 1 ounce of vodka and .5 ounces of triple sec. Fill with cranberry juice leaving about an inch of space for a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass and place one thin straw into the glass.

cocktail.name: General Lee
cocktail.instructions: Combine the lime juice, club soda, and sugar into a collins glass. Stir, then add ice cubes, Anisette, and gin. Stir again. Fill drink with ginger ale. Stir well and serve.

cocktail.name: Aqueduct
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, shake ingredients vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

cocktail.name: Citronella Cooler
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half filled with ice and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

cocktail.name: Virgin Sex On The Beach
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice. Mix in the nectar, and pour over ice. Pour in the grenadine last so it will sink. Garnish with pineapple.

cocktail.name: Yellow Cake
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: St. Squiggle's Divorce
cocktail.instructions: Just pour the glass 9/10's Coca-Cola, and add 1/10 Jolt Cola, and guzzle.

cocktail.name: Dirty Bong Water
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a glass with ice. Mix and enjoy

cocktail.name: Liquid Cocaine #6
cocktail.instructions: Mix the alcohol in an 8-12oz glass. Cover and shake for about 3 seconds. Mix the juices together in a glass of your choice, (add ice for character), and pour in alcohol. Serve chilled.

cocktail.name: Loose Caboose
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, combine all ingredients and shake well. Strain into collins glass full of ice. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

cocktail.name: Liquid Ecstasy
cocktail.instructions: Build Bacardi, Midori, Blue Curacao, Lemon Juice and Pineapple Juice in that order over ice in a highball glass. Alternativly ingreadiants can also be placed in a shaker and shaken and strained into a martini glass. Add a slice of lemon to the highball glass or add a slice to the rim of the martini glass, add two straws and serve...

cocktail.name: Cherry Popper
cocktail.instructions: Pop cherry into strawberry schnapps / 7-up mix.

cocktail.name: Alaskan Pipeline
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts Yukon Jack and amaretto in a tumbler with ice and shake. Serve in shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Cliffhanger
cocktail.instructions: mix the kahlua, brandy, and irish creme and garnish with whipped creme. chill

cocktail.name: Kursk
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and curacao in a glass filled with ice. Fill it up with Battery.

cocktail.name: Texas T
cocktail.instructions: Make tea add tequila, and shake.

cocktail.name: London Fog #2
cocktail.instructions: Frappe in a highball glass.

cocktail.name: Absinthe Flip
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients well with ice. Strain into a prechilled Delmonico glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

cocktail.name: Absinthe Curacao Frappe
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients and pour over crushed ice in a deep-saucer champagne glass. Add orange slice.

cocktail.name: Absinthe Martini
cocktail.instructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into a prechilled cocktail glass. Very pleasant with an onion stuffed olive. Some bartenders pour a soucon of Absinthe into the glass, swirl it around and then add the martini.

cocktail.name: Ladies Cocktail #2
cocktail.instructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into glass. Serve with piece of pineapple on top.

cocktail.name: Absinthe Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Absinthe Suissesse
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Earthquake Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a Collins glass.

cocktail.name: Sazerac Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Chill an Old Fashioned glass by filling with crushed ice. In another glass mix the sugar with the bitters dissolving the sugar. Add some ice, stirring to chill. In the Old Fashioned glass remove the ice and pour in the absinthe coating the entire glass. Remove the excess absinthe. Add the Rye Whiskey and bitters/sugar mixture. Add the Lemon Twist.

cocktail.name: T N T Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Sea Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with seltzer.

cocktail.name: Liquid Cocaine #7
cocktail.instructions: Mix it all together in a champagne flute and drink away!!

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Logic #2
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients together and mix vigorously. Pour into glass and enjoy!

cocktail.name: Virgin Mary
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

cocktail.name: Lara Croft
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Serve in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Nipple
cocktail.instructions: Pour all liquids over ice and shake. Pour into high ball and garnish with either an orange wheel or a cherry. Can also be made frozen.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Punch #2
cocktail.instructions: Build in hurricane (or collins glass) and stir.

cocktail.name: Tokyo Rose
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktail.name: Dirty Bong Water #2
cocktail.instructions: Blend, chill, and serve in 2-3 shot glasses.

cocktail.name: Screaming Banana
cocktail.instructions: Shake or mix with a straw.

cocktail.name: Screwed Driver
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka. Fill with lemonade and add a dash of cranberry juice.

cocktail.name: Kiddie Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Build in a highball glass. Add 7-up or Sprite over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

cocktail.name: Limoncello
cocktail.instructions: Soak skin of 7 lemons in alcohol for 2 days. Strain. Boil water and sugar and chill. Mix with alcohol. Store in the fridge.

cocktail.name: Jamaican Ass-Kicker
cocktail.instructions: Pour in the rum. Top with cola.

cocktail.name: Almond Casa Noble
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, except almond, then strain into a cocktail glass. Drop lime in glass.

cocktail.name: Green Casa Noble
cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, except lime twist, then strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lime twist.

cocktail.name: Presticles Spectacles Wallet and Watch
cocktail.instructions: Add all four ingredients into a small cup over ice

cocktail.name: Black Cow
cocktail.instructions: Pour root beer over ice cream and chocolate syrup in a large tumbler glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw and a long spoon.

cocktail.name: Dr. Debbie
cocktail.instructions: Squeeze in the lemon slice and shoot it!

cocktail.name: Frozen Vanilla Honey Bee
cocktail.instructions: Mix in blender at blend setting.

cocktail.name: Nut and Honey
cocktail.instructions: Combine and chill.

cocktail.name: Carrot Cake #3
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass to 1/3 with Peach Scnapps, then with 1/3 Bailey's Irish cream and float Glodschlager on top.

cocktail.name: Paralyzer #3
cocktail.instructions: In an 8 oz. glass mix Kalhua, Vodka, Rum, and Coke over ice. Fill rest of glass with Milk and stir.

cocktail.name: Millennium Knockout
cocktail.instructions: In a cocktail shaker, add some ice, either 4 cubes or equivalent crushed. Add Galliano, brandy and vodka. Top up with orange juice. Shake and serve in a highball glass with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Texas Tumbleweed
cocktail.instructions: Blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Dirty Ocean
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins glass with ice, add ingredients and mix. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

cocktail.name: French Russchian
cocktail.instructions: Put the ice cubes in the glass, pour the Anisette in, fill with Schweppes Russchian

cocktail.name: Chocolate Otis
cocktail.instructions: Add from darkest to lightest (Kahlua, Irish Creme, Bacardi 151). For a delightful twist, ignite the 151 for a Flaming Otis.

cocktail.name: Zooom!
cocktail.instructions: Layer the six ingredients in order. Be very careful not to let the baileys and grenadine mix.

cocktail.name: Peach Daiquiri
cocktail.instructions: Blend Ice until throughly crushed. Add Rum, Peach Nectar, and Schapps. Lightly blend until mixed well. Add Frozen Peaches. Blend until slushy. Enjoy

cocktail.name: Tropical Tease
cocktail.instructions: Pour direectly into a Hurricane glass with ice. Shake, do not stir. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktail.name: Sicilian Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, then pour in all alcohol and milk and stir. If desired, garnish with whipped cream.

cocktail.name: Brass Funky
cocktail.instructions: Pour orange juice into Mickey's malt liquor.

cocktail.name: Pam's Root Beer Float
cocktail.instructions: Fill the glass with ice, add 2 shots Irish Cream and fill with cola. Mix gently, it will be very foamy!

cocktail.name: Slim Shady
cocktail.instructions: Pour in Scotch first, then the Guinness.

cocktail.name: Back-up Goalie
cocktail.instructions: Pour together in a single container. Pour in to individual glasses. Just make sure the container is big enough for all the ingrediants.

cocktail.name: Bushwacker #5
cocktail.instructions: Blend until smooth.

cocktail.name: Aussie Riviter
cocktail.instructions: Shake all four ingredients and strain into cocktail glass. Dash of lime is optional. Recipe can be doubled if needed.

cocktail.name: Irish Twist
cocktail.instructions: Pour Bailey's in glass. Add 2 cubes of ice. Add Irish Mist.

cocktail.name: Pineapple Cocktail #2
cocktail.instructions: Get a small pineapple, wash it, cut the top. Using a knife get some of the pulp of the pineapple. In a blender mix the pulp, vodka (best if it is left in the freezer), some ice and the honey. Pour the drink inside the pineapple again (without the ice) and put the top back again, do a small hole in the top and serve with a straw.

cocktail.name: Carjacker
cocktail.instructions: Fill shot glass of Hennessey and then drop it into a pint of malt liquor.

cocktail.name: Ghetto Hell
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka in mason jar, add malt liquor.

cocktail.name: Holy Blue
cocktail.instructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add only a dash of Blue Curacao. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

cocktail.name: Lick-Her-Itch
cocktail.instructions: Mix in a mixing glass with a little ice, Start with Sambuca, add vodka, and then cranberry juice. Shake and Strain into a rocks/shooter glass with no ice. Garnish with a single cherry.

cocktail.name: Black Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with lime and rosary: invoke curse of choice.

cocktail.name: Long Sigh
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal measures of Chambord and Cognac into snifter. Swirl to mix. Microwave for 20-30 seconds - if it begins to bubble, stop heating!

cocktail.name: Berry Patch
cocktail.instructions: Combine the schnapps and creme de cacao in a Collins glass. Then fill the glass almost to the top with 7-up or Sprite, and top with half-and-half. Swirl with a straw before serving to give it a cloudy or milky appearance.

cocktail.name: Sour Cow
cocktail.instructions: Pour bourbon, fill rest of glass with cold chocolate milk. Drink it like a shot and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Prince
cocktail.instructions: Blend ingredients with crushed ice. Garnish the drink with coconut flakes, half a passion fruit and mint leaves.

cocktail.name: Flaming Confederate
cocktail.instructions: Start with dash of grenadine. Layer godiva Liqueur, then float 151 proof rum. Light rum on fire. Blow out shot, then drink.

cocktail.name: Chewybubu
cocktail.instructions: Pour blue curacao into bottom third of shot glass, then, carefully pour the Ice 101 using an upside down spoon. Finally, fill remainder with Jgermeister the same way.

cocktail.name: JEE Sweet
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker and serve in a chilled martini glass.

cocktail.name: Natalie Nosedive
cocktail.instructions: Crush the ice cubes and fill the pitcher half way. Then pour in the vodka and the pink lemonade. Continue to pour in either the vodka or lemonade until you can barely taste the vodka. Stir.

cocktail.name: Berry Breeze
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 oz. each of Chambord, Kahlua, and Baileys. Top with cream. Short Shake.

cocktail.name: Dillinger
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and triple sec in glass, and pour milk into glass, then sprinkle cinnamon on top.

cocktail.name: Blonde on Ice
cocktail.instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add creme de banane, followed by peppermint schnapps and vodka. Fill with cream. Short shake.

cocktail.name: A Smile
cocktail.instructions: With three ice cubes put vodka, light rum, cassis, orange juice, and frozen lemonade made at double strength into a shaker. Shake well. Place half the grenadine in the bottom of each white wine glass, pour in shaken mixture till withine inch of rim. With a large spoon drop whipped cream carefully in glass. Take small spoon spread to all the edges and to look nice. Serve. Makes two glasses.

cocktail.name: Star Burst
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything in the blender.

cocktail.name: Peach Kazi
cocktail.instructions: Combine ingredients with ice, shake and pour into a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Sloe Gin Fizz
cocktail.instructions: Pour sloe gin and lemon juice over ice in glass. Fill with soda. Garnish with cucumber stick or lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Another Hot Day in Fresno
cocktail.instructions: Pour in glass with ice. Fill with 7-Up. Stir.

cocktail.name: Mexican Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake tequila and vermouth with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, add pepper slice.

cocktail.name: Limon Skyy
cocktail.instructions: Add vodka, rum, and ice together in a shaker and shake well. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and add twist of lemon. Serve immediately after pouring.

cocktail.name: Mandrin Sprite
cocktail.instructions: Pour Absolut Mandrin into Collins glass and fill with Sprite. Stir gently.

cocktail.name: Fragile Baby
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquor ingredients, then add coffee to fill. Top off with whip cream and a cherry. Serve right away.

cocktail.name: Gold Coast
cocktail.instructions: Shake and pour into chilled cocktail or martini glass.

cocktail.name: Cream in da Panties
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker half filled with ice, shake and then strain into shotglass

cocktail.name: Terri's Tropical Passion
cocktail.instructions: Pour into collins glass. Garnish with Cherries.

cocktail.name: Monique
cocktail.instructions: Mash the strawberries, fill up with milk, orange juice and tequila. Mix it and fill up with the soda and some ice, decorate with a strawberry.

cocktail.name: Yin-Yang
cocktail.instructions: Layer white chocolate liqueur over coffee liqueur. Enjoy.

cocktail.name: Orange Drop
cocktail.instructions: In mixing tin add liquors and simple syrup, splash oj, shake, and strain.

cocktail.name: Get Jenny
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin, sweet and sour mix, and beer to a beer mug. Add ice and stir lightly.

cocktail.name: Metropolis
cocktail.instructions: In a shaker, combine Vodka and blue curacao. Chill until cloudy. Pour into martini glass. Tilt glass and pour in raspberry schnapps (will sink to the bottom). Float cranberry vodka on top. This will give you levels of color: red - blue - purple.

cocktail.name: Sweet Treat
cocktail.instructions: Pour Tia Maria and Galliano over ice, and fill to taste with Coca Cola

cocktail.name: Spiked Cherry
cocktail.instructions: Shake gin and cherry juce. Fill with 7-up and ice.

cocktail.name: Cadillac Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, sour mix, and lime juice with ice. Pour over ice in salt-rimmed margarita glass. Float Grand Marnier on top. Garnish with slice of lime if desired.

cocktail.name: Auger
cocktail.instructions: Fill a Collin's glass about 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add all other ingredients, stir well, and enjoy.

cocktail.name: Powdered Chocolate Donut
cocktail.instructions: Pour equal parts of malibu rum and creme de cacao into a shot glass. Sprinkle the top lightly with powdered sugar.

cocktail.name: Crase
cocktail.instructions: Shake hard and fast, strain over ice.

cocktail.name: The Incredible Hulk #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour vodka and midori over ice in a highball glass. Add pineapple juice. Top off with a splash of 7-up.

cocktail.name: Liquid Love
cocktail.instructions: Fill high ball glass with ice. Pour vodka and amaretto into glass in equal parts. Then add two parts sour and pineapple juice.

cocktail.name: Geeba
cocktail.instructions: Pour OJ over ice. Add Midori and Absolut. Shake by flipping. Add Sprite. Garnish with orange slice.

cocktail.name: Sunding Over the top
cocktail.instructions: Pour the bacardi then the 7-up, sour mix and finally the russchian on top. Use a lot of ice.

cocktail.name: Pimm's Cup New Orleans Style
cocktail.instructions: In an ice filled collins glass, add Pimm's and lemonade. Top with 7-up or ginger ale. Garnish with cucuber slice.

cocktail.name: Cointreauceptive
cocktail.instructions: There are several ways to mix this drink. Pour the Bailey's over the ice and float the cointreau, or just mix it together. It usually needs a stir no matter.

cocktail.name: Corfu Lule
cocktail.instructions: Ice first, then the vodka, sour mix, almost as much orange juice and some sprite on the top.

cocktail.name: Rudy
cocktail.instructions: Fill Collins glass with ice and pour all ingredients in order and shake. Pour into same glass. Serve with lemon wedge and large straw.

cocktail.name: Puff's Magick Dragon
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingreedients in a punch bowl or large pitcher. Stir and add more liquid if needed.

cocktail.name: Fruit Sangria
cocktail.instructions: Pit cherries and soak in 2 oz. of the brandy. Slice peach and soak in the other 2 oz. of the brandy and all of the triple sec. Juice the lemon and orange into a pitcher and add the sugar syrup. Add the cherry and peach mixtures, and the red wine. Chill. To serve, fill a red wine glasses about 1/3 full with ice and add the alcohol/fruit mixture. Top with club soda to taste.

cocktail.name: White Mistress
cocktail.instructions: Half fill glass with ice. Pour liqueurs into beaker, half full with ice. Pour in chilled hot chocolate. Shake gently. Strain into glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh banana dusted with chocolate powder.

cocktail.name: Lost Cause
cocktail.instructions: Pour Malibu, gin, and lime juice over ice. Stir in club soda.

cocktail.name: Sister S.
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice, but not to hard - with passion & tenderness.

cocktail.name: Blue Bahama
cocktail.instructions: Mix gin, rum, vodka, tequila, triple sec, Midori, blue curacao and sour mix together. shake well and pour into Hurricane glass. Then add a splash of 7-up to the top and serve.

cocktail.name: Sand In Your Crack
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve.

cocktail.name: Bluuzberry Shake
cocktail.instructions: Blend ingredients in blender until thoroughly mixed. Add more ice cream if too thin. Garnish with blueberries and strawberry.

cocktail.name: Scottish Jersey
cocktail.instructions: Pour first the scotch and then the cocoa over a lot of ice in a huge glass. The cocoa is going to melt 5-6 ice cubes, and it is always nice to have some left :)

cocktail.name: Turbulence
cocktail.instructions: Pour in amaretto and southern comfort. Add 7-up and ice as desired.

cocktail.name: Dutch Flag
cocktail.instructions: Layer. Blue curacao first, then pina colada and last grenadine on top.

cocktail.name: The Dire
cocktail.instructions: Pour Tonic Water and Rum equally over ice, and add a splash of orange juice and a lime.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Redneck
cocktail.instructions: Combine rum, Southern Comfort, and pineapple juice in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into old fashioned glass. Add grenadine, just enough to give the classic "sunrise" effect. Stir before drinking.

cocktail.name: Copper Cocktail
cocktail.instructions: Shake rum, chartreuse, campari, and bitters in ice filled cocktail shaker. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Sqeeze lime and drop into drink.

cocktail.name: Bearsicle
cocktail.instructions: Mix over ice. Serve.

cocktail.name: White Parrot
cocktail.instructions: Mix all ingredients and shake well.

cocktail.name: Power Russian
cocktail.instructions: Mix everything, but the ice in a blender, for about 30 seconds. Then you can either add the ice, and blend again, or simply pour the drink over the ice.

cocktail.name: Vampyre Brew
cocktail.instructions: Fill glass with ice, add all ingredients, stir well.

cocktail.name: Coffee Dreamer
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients and strain over a large ice cube in a Red Wine glass.

cocktail.name: Leap Frog
cocktail.instructions: Over ice, add vodka, watermelon schnapps, blue maui,and o.j. Do not stir. Garnish with cherry and slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Lazy Haze
cocktail.instructions: Over ice, add peach schnapps, apple schapps, and orange juice to fill glass. Garnish with apple chunk and orange wedge.

cocktail.name: The Green Monster
cocktail.instructions: This is to be made up in a pint glass. Make up your basic snake bite, add the spirits, stir well, it goes bright green!

cocktail.name: Exotic Pimms
cocktail.instructions: Add the lemonade to the Pimms, then the passion fruit juice and finally a dash of ccranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, a slice of lime, cubes of cucumber and apple and a few mint leaves.

cocktail.name: Classic Pimms
cocktail.instructions: Stir, and add a slice of lemon and a few mint leaves.

cocktail.name: Scandanavian Sun
cocktail.instructions: Chill ingredients in a mixing tin over cracked ice. Stir gently and strain into cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with orange spiral.

cocktail.name: Blue Russian Kiss
cocktail.instructions: Mix Champagne, chilled Vodka, and blue curacao in glass. Over ice if desired.

cocktail.name: Raspberry Southside
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients and pour over ice. You can garnish with mint leaves but I never do.

cocktail.name: Absolut Symphony
cocktail.instructions: Shake. Pour into glass and add Sprite. Garnish with a strawberry.

cocktail.name: Lime Bomber
cocktail.instructions: Fill blender with sherbet. Pour in 1 part vodka and 2 parts lime soda until blender is full. Mix well. For colder drinks add ice when putting ice cream in.

cocktail.name: Kentucky Shitkicker
cocktail.instructions: Mix ingredients together and splash coke. Drink is strong, but very flavorful.

cocktail.name: Ladies Man
cocktail.instructions: Blend all the ingredients together and pour into glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwifruit and sprinkle the top with chocolate.

cocktail.name: Latana
cocktail.instructions: Fill a pint glass half way with white wine. Then pour in sprite. Fill shot glass with raspberry liqueur and drop shot glass into pint glass.

cocktail.name: Detroit Diesel
cocktail.instructions: Pour, and stir gently.

cocktail.name: Mt. Fujiyama
cocktail.instructions: Fill an 8 Oz glass with Mt. Dew and warm sake. serve either chilled or warm.

cocktail.name: Great Green Monster
cocktail.instructions: Mix together and serve in a pitcher with ice.

cocktail.name: Blue Neptune
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shaker with vodka, blue curacao, lemon juice, and ice. Shake well. Strain into sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

cocktail.name: Batida Summerday
cocktail.instructions: Fill a 1/2 glass with crushed ice. Pour in batida de coco, pineapple juice and Kirschwasser. Stir. Last add 3 dashes grenadine over it. Serve with 2 short straws and garnish with trophical fruits.

cocktail.name: Nut Case
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into old-fashioned glass on the rocks.

cocktail.name: Sugared Rose
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain cranberry vodka into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add a splash of lemon juice and cranberry juice. For decoration, insert a stirrer through a slice of lemon to bridge over the glass.

cocktail.name: A Better Melonball
cocktail.instructions: Pack glass with ice. Pour the Midori in first, then add the Peach Schnapps. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite or 7-up.

cocktail.name: Slow Screw up against a Red Wall
cocktail.instructions: Pour shots over ice into shaker, add orange juice. Mix and pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Nham Zoom
cocktail.instructions: Pour a shot of vodka and a shot of brandy into a straight glass. Fill nearly to the top with orange juice. Then take a teaspoon of blackcurrant cordial and gently dribble it onto the surface of the drink so it slowly sinks down to make a lovely pattern. Add a straw, so the drinkee can create swirls if desired.

cocktail.name: A 243
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka, the licor 43 and the blue curacao in a glass and stir. Fill up with soda and some ice cubes.

cocktail.name: Banana Splat
cocktail.instructions: In blender, mix banana liquer, rum, chocolate liquer, creme de cacao and milk with ice and blend until smooth. Pour into either red wine glass or rocks glass, top with a dollop of whipped cream, sprinkle of nutmeg and a cherry on top. Use a VERY light touch with the Malibu.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Soak
cocktail.instructions: Sprinkle sugar over diced strawberries, and toss by hand in a bowl. Pour Alize over strawberries, and let soak for 15 min. to a half an hour. Strain mixture well, and store in Alize bottle for later use. Will yeild more than a bottle, so have another empty bottle ready in reserve.

cocktail.name: Anime Freak
cocktail.instructions: Shake Tropico, Midori, Cranberry Juice, and 7-Up on the rocks. Serve in a glass with no ice.

cocktail.name: Incredible Hulk #2
cocktail.instructions: For one shot, just mix right in the shot glass. For a larger amount, use a shaker with the same proportions.

cocktail.name: Listerine
cocktail.instructions: Combine in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: The Great Hercules
cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingridients but the Sprite. Pour into a highball glass and top with the Sprite.

cocktail.name: Fuzzy Buccaneer
cocktail.instructions: Mix 1 part rum, 1 part peach schnapps, and 2 parts O. J. and shake. Pour over crushed ice. Also makes a great frozen drink when blended like a frozen daiquiri

cocktail.name: Blazing Fire
cocktail.instructions: In mixing glass, pour in equal parts vodka, gin, rum, and triple sec. Add pineapple juice and a hearty dash of grenadine for color. Shake and strain over ice, garnish with orange and cherry spear. It should come out a bright, fiery orange color.

cocktail.name: Captain's Treasure
cocktail.instructions: Pour in shot glass, make sure you have some gold flakes in it.

cocktail.name: Nuclear Mantis
cocktail.instructions: Stir in a collins glass.

cocktail.name: Mellow Tennessee
cocktail.instructions: Pour Jack Daniels into highball glass. Add ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale and finish off by topping it with orange juice.

cocktail.name: Blue Suede Shoes
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Shake and strain.

cocktail.name: Disco LemOnade
cocktail.instructions: Fill the Collins glass with ice, then add in the sloe gin, Bacardi Limon and triple sec. Fill with Lemonade and shake. Top the drink with a circle of blue curacao, stir and garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktail.name: Red Haus
cocktail.instructions: Fill the highball glass with ice, then add the Black Haus and sloe gin. Fill with cranberry juice, shake and serve with a cherry garnish.

cocktail.name: Mind Meld
cocktail.instructions: Fill the hurricane glass with ice, then add the blue curacao, triple sec and peach schnapps. Fill with 7-up and garnish with an orange wheel.

cocktail.name: Eye of Swamp
cocktail.instructions: Build in highball with lots of ice. Fill with Sprite.

cocktail.name: Good & Plenty
cocktail.instructions: Pour anisette, then Kahlua in a shot glass.

cocktail.name: Tootsie Roll #2
cocktail.instructions: Pour over ice.

cocktail.name: Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Put about 8 ounces of crushable ice cubes in a blender with blades that are capable of crushing ice. Add 8 oz of frozen (but thawed) strawberries in sugar sauce. (Available in the frozen foods section of your grocery store). Add sweet and sour mix and tequila. (Triple sec is not needed due to sweetness in strawberry sauce). Blend until desired consistency is obtained. Pour in large clear glass and garnish with a strawberry if available and a straw.

cocktail.name: Vulva
cocktail.instructions: Over rocks, combine schnapps, rum, and triple sec in Collins glass. Fill with orange juice and shake. Serve.

cocktail.name: Cotton Candy #2
cocktail.instructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the ingredients. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail (martini) glass.

cocktail.name: L.A. Riot
cocktail.instructions: Fill half a shot glass with Kahlua, and pour on Baileys in a separate layer, nearly to the top of the glass. Add a small amount of green chartreuse to float on the top. Light the drink on fire and sprinkle over cinnamon. Drink through a straw while still on fire.

cocktail.name: Tequilaville
cocktail.instructions: Shake and pour over ice

cocktail.name: Wife Beater
cocktail.instructions: Combine in shaker. Shake untill cloudy. Pour.

cocktail.name: Cherry Garden
cocktail.instructions: Pour all spirits into cocktail shaker and add cream. Gently mix. Fill glass 2/3 with ice. Pour contents of shaker into glass over the ice. Gently dash grenadine into glass. Garnish with speared cherry.

cocktail.name: Cherry Candycane
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass and mix thoroughly

cocktail.name: I go to Purdue
cocktail.instructions: First pour the aftershock and then the vodka then pour the bacardi down the back side of a spoon to finish the shot.

cocktail.name: Hubbabubba
cocktail.instructions: Mix in the glass.

cocktail.name: Yah Yah
cocktail.instructions: Pour the alcohol (except 151 proof rum) and ice first, then fill with orange juice. Top off with 151 proof rum. Optional, garnish with orange wedge, cherry and pineapple chunk.

cocktail.name: CT
cocktail.instructions: Fill a long-drink glass with ice cubes. Add cognac and fill with tonic water. Put half a slice of lemon in the glass.

cocktail.name: Strawberry Blond
cocktail.instructions: Layer in the order given: Irish Cream, Creme de Cacao, Strawberry Liqueur.

cocktail.name: Man In A Man Suit
cocktail.instructions: Shake the fruit juice and add it to the bowl (make sure it is pure fruit juice), mix in the vodka, whisky and southern comfort. Carefully float the 151 proof rum on the top, light it, but snuff it out before it all burns off. Several people drink it from the bottom with a straw at the same time.

cocktail.name: French 76
cocktail.instructions: Shake the first five ingredients with plenty of ice. Strain into a frozen cocktail glass, fill to the brim with champagne and add a long twist of fresh orange peel

cocktail.name: Senorita Margarita
cocktail.instructions: Mix tequila, triple sec, lime juice, sour mix, and orange juice. Strain into margarita glass with a salted rim, over ice. Garnish with a lime.

cocktail.name: Serial Killer
cocktail.instructions: Mix liquor, juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into ice filled highball glass.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Pour in rum, then vodka follow with Pineapple juice. Drop in grenadine last - let settle for a sunrise effect.

cocktail.name: Faust
cocktail.instructions: Use chilled liquor. Pour the Jgermeister in first, then add Yukon Jack, and finally add 151 Rum.

cocktail.name: Jamestown Kool-Aid
cocktail.instructions: Make the kool-aid as usual, then mix in the Jgermeister, Yukon Jack, and 151 rum in this order. Chill for two hours, serve.

cocktail.name: Risk
cocktail.instructions: Mix all three chilled in this order: Aftershock, Orange Juice, and Yukon Jack

cocktail.name: Sackville Surprise
cocktail.instructions: Rum first, syrup second. Mix well in shot glass.

cocktail.name: Two Turtles
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

cocktail.name: Satin Sheets
cocktail.instructions: Combine kahlua, Irish cream, and chocolate liqueur over ice. Add milk to fill the glass.

cocktail.name: Tea Toddy #2
cocktail.instructions: Make some tea, put it in the cup, half full. Fill up with Baileys to taste. Add a splash of Whisky (optional) to taste

cocktail.name: Sperm Whale
cocktail.instructions: Over ice pour Southern Comfort, Peach Schnapps and Malibu Rum. Top off with Pineapple Juice. Shake and pour into glass.

cocktail.name: Sloppy Joe
cocktail.instructions: Pour cranberry and orange juice in cup, then add the sprite. Last, add the rum.

cocktail.name: Trailer Wench
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient as listed.

cocktail.name: Absolute Chainsaw
cocktail.instructions: Pour each ingredient as listed.

cocktail.name: LaPaglia's Punch
cocktail.instructions: Shake everything and serve on the rocks

cocktail.name: Cheesecake
cocktail.instructions: Mix equal parts of irish cream and pineapple juice in mixing tin filled with ice. Don't shake, just stir lightly. Pour genadine in glass and layer mixture on top.

cocktail.name: Green Label
cocktail.instructions: Build in an ice filled glass. Serve. Great as a frozen drink.

cocktail.name: Brass Skunky
cocktail.instructions: Mix it all together. Serve cold, but not with ice.

cocktail.name: Crap Schnapps
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and strain

cocktail.name: Bluetail Fly
cocktail.instructions: Pour all ingredients in shaker over ice. Shake well and pour in 12 oz. collins glass.

cocktail.name: Fuzznutts
cocktail.instructions: Just pour equally in shot glass

cocktail.name: Bulldozer
cocktail.instructions: Pour a full pint of the malt liquor into a chilled 20 ounce mug or stein, then dump a healthy 2 ounce shot of 151 rum right into the middle of it.

cocktail.name: Crazy Maker
cocktail.instructions: Mix southern comfort and cranberry juice in a glass. Layer orange juice on the top. Squeeze lime over the top of the drink.

cocktail.name: Invisible Parrot
cocktail.instructions: Stir.

cocktail.name: Sunrise
cocktail.instructions: Mix liqueur, vodka and orange juice in a highball glass. Add some ice and fill the glass with ginger ale (or Sprite if you don't have ginger ale). Decorate with a slice of orange.

cocktail.name: Pirate's Punch
cocktail.instructions: Combine over ice in a highball glass and stir.

cocktail.name: Participle
cocktail.instructions: Mix liqueur, juice and vodka in a highball glass. Add ice and fill the glass with sprite. You can decorate the drink with a slice of orange, lemon or kiwi if you want.

cocktail.name: Baroness
cocktail.instructions: Mix juices and cinnamon with ice. Strain to a cocktail glass. Serve cold.

cocktail.name: Power Sangria
cocktail.instructions: Fill a wine glass with 1/3 chilled vermouth and 2/3 red wine.

cocktail.name: Chocolate Martini #4
cocktail.instructions: Pour the vodka and creme de cacao into a shaker with the ice cubes. Rub a slice of orange peel around the rim of the cocktail glass and dip the cocktail glass into the cocoa powder. Strain the liquid into the Cocktail glass. Garnish with the orange peel.

cocktail.name: Okapi
cocktail.instructions: Stir all of the ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.

cocktail.name: Packerita
cocktail.instructions: Place four ice cubes in a glass. Add tequila and triple sec. Fill almost to top with pineapple juice, and add a splash of Blue Curacao. Squeeze lime wedge over drink (optional). Mix thoroughly and enjoy immensely.

cocktail.name: Moulin Rouge
cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

cocktail.name: Drunk-N-ade
cocktail.instructions: Put everything into a shaker. Toss in ice and shake (shaking is easier than stirring). Pour contents into whatever glassware you have.

cocktail.name: Jungle Boogie Punch
cocktail.instructions: Make a sugar syrup by boiling brown sugar, water and orange peel for 30 minutes, then allow it to cool. Stir it together with the other ingredients in a large bowl. Garnish with chunks of pineapple, mango and orange, and sprinkle with freshly grated nutmeg before serving.

cocktail.name: Hawaiian Sugar Plantation
cocktail.instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass.

cocktail.name: Brioni
cocktail.instructions: Pour liquor over ice cubes in a Collins glass. Fill with club soda, stir to mix, and add orange slice for garnish.

cocktail.name: Shore Breeze
cocktail.instructions: Build over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktail.name: Southampton
cocktail.instructions: Pour tonic water over ice in a highball glass. Add a squeeze of lime and Angostura bitters. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktail.name: Moon Pie
cocktail.instructions: Layer. Coffee liqueur first, banana liqueur on top.

cocktail.name: Blue Wave
cocktail.instructions: Shake Hpnotiq, white wine, OJ and ginger ale with ice. Pour into a large red wine glass. Garnish with sliced green apples, green grapes, orange slice and kiwi slices.

cocktail.name: The Blue Fin
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

cocktail.name: Blue Goose
cocktail.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Grnish with an orange twist.

cocktail.name: White Cosmopolitan
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.name: Ibsen
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice, then strain into ice filled whisky glass. Garnish with a pinch of ground cinnamon sprinkled on top.

cocktail.name: Fraise de Champagne
cocktail.instructions: Pour into a coupette glass/champagne saucer.

ingredient.name: Creme de Fraise des Bois (Marie Brizard)

cocktail.name: Cranberry Apple Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

cocktail.name: Washington Apple Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake and serve up in a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar and cinnamon.

cocktail.name: Gotland Summer Night
cocktail.instructions: Pour gin, Cointreau and orange juice over ice. Gently pour grenadine along the inside of the glass so it sinks to the bottom.

cocktail.name: Jameson St. Patrick's Day
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange spiral.

cocktail.name: Sour Apple Martini
cocktail.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of apple.

cocktail.name: Kyoto
cocktail.instructions: Finn a shaker with ice cubes. Add the gin, lemon juice, passion fruit syrup, sugar syrup and mint leaves. Shake and pour into a highball glass, including the ice and mint. Fill with soda water and stir gently.
